LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Shepherd   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Final words, Lost souls, Searches   
Domains: Community, Protection, Repose, Strength   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Two concentric circles bisected by a horizontal line   
Ceyannan first arose from the eddies and foam within the River of Souls created by mortals’ resistance to death, and a piece of the Shepherd resides in every mortal heart, allowing this monitor demigod to sense those who flee death’s embrace. Always seeking to recover these lost fragments, Ceyannan gathers wayward souls—the lost, the stolen, and the stubborn—and returns them to the Boneyard. Rumor holds that when the last mortal dies and the Shepherd is whole, Ceyannan will finally embrace death themself. Until that peace comes, Ceyannan relentlessly hunts missing souls, reserving a special hatred for those who would destroy souls or pervert them into undeath. As the patron of lost souls, they are also responsible for containing those souls that pose an existential threat to the cosmos. Ceyannan’s flesh is maggot-white and impossibly beautiful, and their otherwise humanoid frame sports a pair of wings covered in the oily, black feathers of a carrion bird. They often appear clutching the Apostasy, a simple shepherd’s crook capable of dragging out the faith any mortal soul holds for a god. They claim no realm, instead wandering the Material Plane and the River of Souls in search of their lost portions.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：牧羊人 
阵营：绝对中立 

形态：招魂使 
领域：最后的话，迷失的灵魂，搜索
领域：联盟，保护，休息，力量 
偏好武器：四杖
圣徽：两个同心圆被一条水平线一分为二 Ceyannan 最初来自凡人对死亡的抵抗所产生的灵魂之河中的漩涡和泡沫，牧羊人的一部分存在于每个凡人的心中，让这个监控半神能够感知那些逃离死亡拥抱的人。 Ceyannan 一直在寻求找回这些丢失的碎片，他收集任性的灵魂——迷失的、被盗的和固执的灵魂——并将它们送回 Boneyard。有传言说，当最后一个凡人死去，牧羊人完整时，杰亚南最终将自己拥抱死亡。在和平到来之前，Ceyannan 无情地追捕失踪的灵魂，对那些会摧毁灵魂或将他们变成不死之人的人怀有特殊的仇恨。作为迷失灵魂的守护神，他们也有责任收容那些对宇宙构成生存威胁的灵魂。 Ceyannan 的肉是蛆虫般的白色，美丽得令人难以置信，而它们原本是人形的骨架上长出了一对覆盖着腐肉鸟油性黑色羽毛的翅膀。他们经常出现抓着叛教者，一个简单的牧羊人的骗子，能够拖出任何凡人灵魂对神的信仰。他们没有领地，而是在物质位面和灵魂之河中游荡，寻找他们丢失的部分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ceyannan
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 夨焉捺

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Serendipitous Path   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Fate, Safety, Serendipity   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Luck, Protection   
Subdomains: Azata, Defense, Fate, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Net (Starknife)   
Holy Symbol: Symmetrical water lily   
Sacred Animal: Gecko   
Chadali gently nudges events and individuals to create fortunate detours, harmonious meetings, and unexpected revelations. Her followers claim that a confluence of singular events-a yellow aurora, a lunar eclipse, and a meteor shower-occurred simultaneously on Elysium, and that from that confluence Chadali was born. Chadali appears as a beautiful, middle-aged Vudrani woman who stands firmly on the ground but whose dark eyes often lift to the sky. Fresh water lilies peep out from the coiled masses of her shining black hair, and she wears silken robes of pale yellow that fall to her bare feet. In her hands she holds a net woven of red threads; tiny rubies glimmer within the folds of the net. The Serendipitous Path teaches that fate is beautiful in its unpredictability. Seemingly insignificant events can determine the course of an entire life. Her agents visit those who are afraid to take chances and encourage them to step out into the world and trust fate. The greatest evil, in Chadali's eyes , is rigidly structuring one's life to prevent unexpected events from happening. Chadali lives in the Pavilion of Serendipity, a structure of glimmering light on the coast of the Boundless Azure Ocean in Elysium.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：偶现之径
阵营：混乱善良
神职：命运、安全、偶然
领域：混乱、善良、幸运、保护
子领域：爱塔、防御、天命、纯净
偏好武器：网（星刃）
圣徽：对称睡莲
圣兽：壁虎
察答理轻轻推动事件和个人的进展，创造幸运的弯路、和谐的会议和意想不到的启示。她的追随者声称，在极乐世界同时发生了一系列奇异事件——黄色极光、月食和流星雨，而察答理正是从这种融合中诞生的。
察答理看起来是一个美丽的中年乌荼罗女人，她坚定地站在地上，但黑色双眸经常仰望天空。
新生的睡莲从她闪亮的黑发中探出头来，她穿着浅黄色的丝质长袍，光着脚。她手里拿着一张用红线织成的网；细小的红宝石在网的褶皱中闪烁。
偶现之径教导说，命运的不可预测性是美丽的。看似微不足道的事件可以决定整个人生的进程。她的代理人拜访了那些恐惧冒险的人，并鼓励他们走向世界并相信命运。在察答理眼中，最大的罪恶，就是刻板地安排自己的生活，以防意外事件的发生。察答理住在极乐境无边碧海沿岸的奇缘阁中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Chadali
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 察答理

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beginning at 7th level as a swift action, a dreadknight can spend three uses of their profane corruption to surround their weapon with a profane flame and deliver an attack with their weapon, causing 1d6 points of damage plus an additional 1d6 points of damage for every two dreadknight levels they possesses, as well as applying the cruelty selected.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从第7级开始，以一个迅捷动作，恐惧骑士可以消耗 3 次亵渎之炎使用次数强化他们的武器，使用该武器进行攻击时，额外造成1d6+1d6点/每2个恐惧骑士等级伤害并附加所选残虐的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Channel Profane Corruption
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎之刃

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Beginning at 7th level as a swift action, a dreadknight can spend three uses of their touch of profane corruption to surround their weapon with a profane flame, causing terrible wounds to open on those they attacks. This ability works with any weapon.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从第7级开始，以一个迅捷动作，恐惧骑士可以消耗 3 次亵渎之炎使用次数强化他们的武器，使用该武器进行攻击时，额外造成1d6+1d6点/每2个恐惧骑士等级伤害并附加所选残虐的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Chaos: You are immune to additional damage from critical hits and precision damage (such as sneak attack damage), and weapons you wield count as chaotic for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的技能使用该法术的DC。
混乱：你免疫重击和精准伤害（例如偷袭伤害）造成的额外伤害，并且你使用的武器被视为混乱，以穿透伤害减免。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Chaos Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 混沌领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can baffle and befuddle foes with a touch or a smile, and your beauty and grace are divine. Dazing Touch: You can cause a living creature to become dazed for 1 round as a melee touch attack. Creatures with more Hit Dice than your level in the class that gave you access to this domain are unaffected. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Charming Smile: At 8th level, you can cast charm person as a swift action, with a DC of 10 + 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain + your Wisdom modifier. The effect of charm person lasts for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your caster level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用触摸或微笑来迷惑和迷惑敌人，你的美丽和优雅是神圣的。眩晕之触：你可以作为近战接触攻击使一个活物眩晕 1 轮。生命骰数高于您的等级且允许您访问此领域的生物不受影响。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。迷人的微笑：在第 8 级时，你可以以一个迅捷动作施展魅惑人，DC 为 10 + 1/2 你在允许你进入该领域的职业中的等级 + 你的感知调整值。魅惑人效果持续1轮。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于你的施法者等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can baffle and befuddle foes with a touch or a smile, and your beauty and grace are divine. Dazing Touch: You can cause a living creature to become dazed for 1 round as a melee touch attack. Creatures with more Hit Dice than your level in the class that gave you access to this domain are unaffected. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Charming Smile: At 8th level, you can cast charm person as a swift action, with a DC of 10 + 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain + your Wisdom modifier. The effect of charm person lasts for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to your caster level. Domain Spells: hypnotism, hideous laughter, deep slumber, rainbow pattern, dominate person, mass eagle's splendor, insanity, euphoric tranquility, dominate monster.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用触摸或微笑来迷惑和迷惑敌人，你的美丽和优雅是神圣的。眩晕之触：你可以作为近战接触攻击使一个活物眩晕 1 轮。生命骰数高于您的等级且允许您访问此领域的生物不受影响。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。迷人的微笑：在第 8 级时，你可以以一个迅捷动作施展魅惑人，DC 为 10 + 1/2 你在允许你进入该领域的职业中的等级 + 你的感知调整值。魅惑人效果持续1轮。你每天可以使用此能力的次数等于你的施法者等级。领域法术：催眠术，狰狞笑声，沉睡，虹纹，主宰人，群雄鹰辉，精神错乱，欣快宁静，主宰怪物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Charm Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 魅力领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Charm: You gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Charisma.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
魅力：你的魅力获得+6增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Horror from the Hills   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Blood, Patience, Remote hill country   
Rank: Great Old One  
Domains: Chaos, Death, Evil, War   
Subdomains: Blood, Entropy, Murder, Tactics   
Favoured Weapon: Light pick   
Holy Symbol: Elephantine visage with a bloody trunk  
The entity known as Chaugnar Faugn is ancient beyond imagining, a creature capable of existing in more dimensions than most could even guess at and surviving over epochs of time that birth and destroy worlds. For thousands of millennia, Chaugnar Faugn has dwelled, dormant and immobile, in a shallow cave lost within the depths of a desolate stretch of rugged hill country. This is how the Great Old One gained his appellation as the Horror from the Hills, and most of his more ardent worshipers are those who dwell in such backcountry. Yet he has no particular affinity to the slopes and vales that hide him; they are merely where he has waited for the past unknown eons. Chaugnar Faugn’s faithful adopt the Great Old One’s patience. They are violent and eager for blood, yet they wait generations before acting on plans for vengeance or raids. Many times, the cultists’ enemies have believed them to have been exterminated after a brutal conflict, but each and every time, this was a misconception. The worshipers of the Horror from the Hills were merely content to wait for a proper chance at revenge. In those rare occasions when Chaugnar Faugn does wake, though, worship does nothing to deter his hunger; he feeds on zealots and unbelievers with equal disdain. Chaugnar Faugn is vaguely humanoid in form, yet his head is that of a distorted, nightmarish elephant with vast veined ears, enormous curved tusks, and a trunk that ends in a large disk through which he drains the blood of those who draw too near.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：来自群山的恐怖
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：鲜血、耐心、偏远山区
等级：旧日支配者
领域：混乱、死亡、邪恶、战争
子领域：鲜血、熵、杀戮、战术 
偏好武器：轻十字镐
圣徽：长有淋血长鼻的象面
被称作夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩的实体古老的超乎想象，祂存在于不可设想的维度之中，且能在纪元交替的世界诞生与毁灭中生存下来。数千万年来，夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩一动不动地蛰伏在一片荒凉崎岖山地深处的浅洞之中，这就是这位旧日支配者“来自群山的恐怖”称号的来由，而祂的大多数虔诚信者也都来自于类似的偏远山区。然而，祂对栖身的山地并无特别的兴趣，这里仅仅只是祂等待无尽时光流逝的地方而已。
夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩的虔信者采取了这位旧日支配者的耐心。他们天性暴力，渴求鲜血，但往往会等待数代人才会采取报复或袭击的计划。教团的敌人经常轻信自己已在一场残酷的冲突之后将其剿灭，然而教团总能证明这纯属痴心妄想。来自群山的恐怖的崇拜者们只是乐于等待一个适宜的复仇机会。不过，当夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩偶尔苏醒之时，对祂的敬拜并不能阻止祂的饥渴：祂对虔信者与不信者投以相同的鄙夷轻蔑。
夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩近似人形，但头部类似扭曲而噩梦般的巨象，生有脉络巨耳和弯曲獠牙，长臂末端的大盘被祂用于吸取接近者的鲜血。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Chaugnar Faugn
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 夏乌戈纳尔·法格恩

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Maiden of Haze and Whimsy   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Dreams, Hallucinations, Mists   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Madness, Magic   
Subdomains: Azata, Insanity, Revelry, Whimsy   
Favoured Weapon: Morningstar (Heavy mace)   
Holy Symbol: Eye with rainbow iris   
Sacred Animal: Bird of paradise   
Where mists rise after a gentle shower and wide- eyed prophets see visions of things to come, the hand of Chucaro can be seen. Legend tells that thousands of years ago, an angel fell asleep in a misty dale in Elysium. The angel dreamed of a beautiful woman with a basket full of ethereal visions. When she awoke, she saw her dream made real as Chucaro stepped out of the mist. Chucaro's pale skin gleams iride scently and her eyes shift from color to color in a neverending spectrum. Her frame is draped in robes of living mist. Her waist-length mass of rippled hair shimmers, colorless, like a cascade of rain that rushes continually from her brow. She has a sweet, serious face, and always seems to be listening to something just on the edge of hearing. To combat those fiends who would pervert the visions she grants, Chucaro summons a sap formed of churning mists-anyone struck by the blackjack is overwhelmed by disorienting hallucinations. The Maiden of Haze and Whimsy brings comfort to those afflicted with mad delusions. She soothes their fevers and helps them make sense of the strange images that plague their minds. To her dedicated followers she brings bright, lucid dreams every night. She frowns on those who use harsh drugs to induce visions at the cost of their physical health; Chucaro's agents strive to bring such broken individuals back to health and teach them to draw phantasmagoria from within rather than through the use of external implements. Chucaro can often be found in a delicate house of iridescent pearl in the silver-gray lowlands of Elysium.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：迷蒙狂想少女
阵营：混乱善良
神职：梦，幻景，迷雾
领域：混乱、善良、疯狂、魔法
子领域：爱塔、狂乱、狂欢、滑稽
偏好武器：晨星（重型硬头锤）
圣徽：彩虹瞳膜的眼睛
圣兽：天堂鸟
温和的阵雨后薄雾升起，睁大眼睛的先知看到未来的景象，其中映出了丘卡洛之手。传说数千年前，一位天使在极乐境的迷雾山谷中睡着了。天使梦见一个美丽的女人提着篮子，里面装满了空灵的幻象。当她醒来时，她看到丘卡洛从迷雾中走出来，她的梦想变成了现实。
丘卡洛苍白的皮肤闪烁着迷人的香气，她的眼睛从一种颜色变换到另一种颜色，永无止境。她的身躯披着活雾的长袍。她齐腰长的波涛状头发闪闪发光，无色，像雨点一样不断地从她的额头涌出。她有一张甜美、严肃的脸，似乎总是在倾听耳语。
为了对抗那些会歪曲她给予的幻象的恶魔，丘卡洛召唤了一种由搅动的迷雾形成的汁液——任何被二十一点击中的人都会被迷失方向的幻觉所淹没。迷蒙狂想少女为那些被疯狂妄想折磨的人带来了安抚。她可以缓解他们的发烧，并帮助他们理解困扰他们脑海中的奇怪图像。对于她的忠实追随者，她每晚都会带来明亮、清醒的梦想。她不赞成那些使用刺激性药物以牺牲身体健康为代价来诱发幻觉的人； 丘卡洛的信徒努力让这些沉溺其中的人恢复健康，并教他们从内部而不是通过使用外部工具来绘制幻影。
丘卡洛经常可以在极乐境奔放之野银灰色低地的一间精巧的虹彩珍珠之屋中找到。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Chucaro
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 丘卡洛

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Claws of the False Wyrm are a cult made up of warpriests of Dahak who have been chosen to act as a destuctive foil to Apsu's Silver Champions. Tasked with hunting down the followers of Apsu the most powerful and destuctive of the Claws are granted young drakes to join them on their hunt. These Claws must constantly display their command over their charges as any signs of weakness could be seen as the chance for a drake to succeed its master.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虚龙之爪是一个由达哈克的战争祭司组成的邪教，他们被选为阿普苏银冠勇士对立的破坏性存在。任务是追捕阿普苏的追随者，最强大和最具破坏性的利爪被授予幼年龙加入他们的狩猎。这些利爪必须不断地展示他们对狩猎的指挥能力，因为任何孱弱的行为都可能被视为对龙神的亵渎。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The target’s skin becomes as thick and tough as clay, granting the target DR 5/adamantine. Once the spell has prevented a total of 5 points of damage per caster level (maximum 50 points), it is discharged and the spell ends.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 目标的皮肤变得像粘土一样又厚又硬，使目标获得 DR 5/精金。一旦法术合计阻止了每施法者等级 5 点伤害（最多 50 点），它就会被解除并结束。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 10 minutes/level or until discharged
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 10 分钟/级别 或 直到解除

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The target’s skin becomes as thick and tough as clay, granting the target DR 5/adamantine. Once the spell has prevented a total of 5 points of damage per caster level (maximum 50 points), it is discharged and the spell ends.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 目标的皮肤变得像粘土一样又厚又硬，使目标获得 DR 5/精金。一旦法术总共阻止了每施法者等级 5 点伤害（最多 50 点），它就会被解除并且法术结束。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Clay Skin
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 粘土皮肤

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whether to stop it falling into the wrong hands, or to hold the power for themselves, it is common for an aspiring thief to see a drake egg as a valuable score. Less common is for the egg to hatch while in the thieves care. With a bit of knowledge borrowed from the drake wardens on raising young drakes, the clutch thief gains a new and interesting partner in crime.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 无论是阻止它落入坏人之手，还是为自己掌握权力，一个有抱负的小偷都将龙蛋视为有价值的猎物。出乎意料的是龙蛋在小偷的照料下孵化了。借助从龙兽看守那里借来的一些关于饲养龙兽的知识，龙蛋小偷获得了一个新的、有趣的犯罪伙伴。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Clutch Thief
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙蛋小偷

LocalizedStrings.enGB: By level 17 the clutch thief and the drake instinctively guard each others openings in combat, both gain the Back To Back teamwork feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 到 17 级时，龙蛋小偷和龙兽本能地在战斗中互相守卫，都获得了背靠背团队专长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shared Back to Back Feat
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 共享背靠背专长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, the clutch thieves drake companion is finally strong enough to help as a animal companion, but his drake’s level is equal to his rogue level – 3.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级时，龙蛋小偷龙兽伙伴终于强大到足以作为动物伙伴提供帮助，但他的龙的有效等级等于他的盗贼等级-3。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Clutch Thieves Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙蛋小偷盟誓

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At level 11 both the clutch thief and the drake have mastered fighting in tandem, both gain the Outflank teamwork feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 11 级时，龙蛋小偷和龙兽掌握了联合战斗，都获得了包抄团队专长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shared Outflank Feat
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 共享包抄专长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your touch can heal wounds, and your presence instills unity and strengthens emotional bonds. Calming Touch: You can touch a creature as a standard action to heal it of 1d6 points of damage + 1 point per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. This touch also removes the fatigued, shaken, and sickened conditions (but has no effect on more severe conditions). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Guarded Hearth: At 8th level, you can create a ward that protects a specified area. Creating this ward is a full-round action. All friendly creatures in the area receive a resistance bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier on all saving throws and an equal competence bonus on attack rolls while inside the warded area. The ward lasts for 1 hour per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的触摸可以治愈伤口，你的存在会灌输团结并加强情感纽带。平静之触：你可以用一个标准动作触摸一个生物来治疗它 1d6 点伤害 + 每级 1 点，使你可以进入这个领域。这种接触也消除了疲劳、战栗和恶心的情况（但对更严重的情况没有影响）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。守卫壁炉：在第 8 级，您可以创建一个守卫来保护指定区域。创建这个守卫是一个整轮动作。该区域内的所有友方生物在所有豁免检定上获得等同于你的感知调整值的抗力加值，并且在受保护区域内时在攻击检定上获得相同的能力加值。在允许您访问此域的课程中，病房每级持续 1 小时。您每天可以使用此能力一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your touch can heal wounds, and your presence instills unity and strengthens emotional bonds. Calming Touch: You can touch a creature as a standard action to heal it of 1d6 points of damage + 1 point per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. This touch also removes the fatigued, shaken, and sickened conditions (but has no effect on more severe conditions). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Guarded Hearth: At 8th level, you can create a ward that protects a specified area. Creating this ward is a full-round action. All friendly creatures in the area receive a resistance bonus equal to your Wisdom modifier on all saving throws and an equal competence bonus on attack rolls while inside the warded area. The ward lasts for 1 hour per level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day. Domain Spells: bless, communal protection from alignment, prayer, communal protection from energy, burst of glory, communal stoneskin, greater restoration, legendary proportions, mass heal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的触摸可以治愈伤口，你的存在会灌输团结并加强情感纽带。平静之触：你可以用一个标准动作触摸一个生物来治疗它1d6点伤害+每级1点，使你可以进入这个领域。这种接触也消除了疲劳、战栗和恶心的情况（但对更严重的情况没有影响）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。守卫壁炉：在第 8 级，您可以创建一个守卫来保护指定区域。创建这个守卫是一个整轮动作。区域内的所有友方生物在所有豁免检定上获得等同于你的感知调整值的抗力加值，并且在受保护区域内时在攻击检定上获得相同的能力加值。在允许您访问此域的课程中，病房每级持续 1 小时。您每天可以使用此能力一次。领域法术：祝福，公共保护免受阵营，祈祷，公共保护免受能量，荣耀爆发，公共石皮，更大的恢复，传奇的比例，集体治疗。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Community Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 联盟领域

By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: After the drake grows to a large size it gains the ability to shrink back down to their medium size. When this is active the drakes stats are modified; -4 Strength, +2 Dexterity, and the range on attacks is reduced to the medium size range.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在龙兽长大后，它获得了缩小到中等体型的能力。当此功能处于激活状态时，龙兽能力获得以下变化； -4 力量，+2 敏捷，攻击范围缩小到中等范围。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: After the drake grows to a huge size it gains the ability to shrink back down to their large size. When this is active the drakes stats are modified; -4 Strength, +2 Dexterity, and the range on attacks is reduced to the large size range.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在龙兽长大为巨型后，它获得了缩小到大体型的能力。当此功能处于激活状态时，龙兽能力获得以下变化； -4 力量，+2 敏捷，攻击范围缩小到大型范围。

Speed: 60 ft.
AC: +5 natural armor
Attack: bite (1d6)
Ability scores: Str 14, Dex 21, Con 15, Int -, Wis 13, Cha 6
Special Attacks: bleed (1d6)
At 7th level size becomes Medium, Str +4, Dex -2, Con +2, +1 natural armor, bleed increases to 2d6, gains iterative attacks and the Blood Drain ability.
Blood Drain: Make one attack at highest base attack bonus, if the attack hits the target they suffer 1d2 constitution damage.
This animal companion can't be used as a mount.

体型:小型
移动速度: 60英尺
AC: +5天生防御
攻击: 啮咬 (1d6)
属性:力量 14，敏捷 21，体质 15，智力 -，感知 13，魅力 6
特殊攻击:流血(1d6)
在7级时体型变成中型， 力量 +4，敏捷 -2，体质 +2，+1 天生防御，流血增加到 2d6，获得更多攻击次数和血液流失能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Animal Companion — Giant Fly
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 动物伙伴（巨苍蝇）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Size: Small
Speed: 30 ft.
AC: +5 natural armor
Attack: bite (1d4)
Ability scores: Str 10, Dex 17, Con 10, Int -, Wis 10, Cha 2
Special Attacks: Web
At 4th level size becomes Medium, Str +4, Dex -2, Con +2, +1 natural armor and gains iterative attacks.
Spiders Web: Web creates a many-layered mass of strong, sticky strands. These strands trap those caught in them. Creatures caught within a web become grappled by the sticky fibers.
Anyone in the effect's area when spider's web is cast must make a Reflex save. If this save succeeds, the creature is inside the web but is otherwise unaffected. If the save fails, the creature gains the grappled condition, but can break free by making a combat maneuver check, Athletics check, or Mobility check as a standard action against the DC of this ability. The entire area of the web is considered difficult terrain. Anyone moving through the webs must make a Reflex save each round. Creatures that fail lose their movement and become grappled in the first square of webbing that they enter. Spiders are immune to this ability.
This animal companion can't be used as a mount.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
体型:小型
移动速度: 30英尺
AC: +5天生防御
攻击: 啮咬 (1d4)
属性:力量 10，敏捷 17，体质 10，智力 -，感知 10，魅力 2
特殊攻击:蛛网
在4级时体型变成中型，力量 +4,敏捷 -2, 体质 +2, +1 天生防御并获得更多攻击次数。    
蛛网：制造出一团由强韧而有黏性的丝构成的多层网状结构。  这些丝将牢牢缠住里面的人。  被蛛网捆住的生物将被黏性纤维擒抱。  
在{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}施法{/g}时，效果区域内的所有生物都必须进行反射{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}。 如果豁免成功，生物位于网中，但不受任何影响。 如果豁免失败，生物陷入擒抱状态，但可以花费{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}进行{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}战技{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Check}检定{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}运动检定{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Mobility}灵巧检定{/g}以脱身，检定难度等于此法术的{g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g}。 受蛛网影响的整个区域视作困难地形。 任何在网中移动的生物每{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}都必须进行反射豁免检定，若失败则失去移动，并在进入的第一个方格被擒抱。蜘蛛免疫该能力。
这个动物伙伴不能用作坐骑。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Animal Companion — Web Tyrant Spider

Web creates a many-layered mass of strong, sticky strands. These strands trap those caught in them. Creatures caught within a web become grappled by the sticky fibers.
Anyone in the effect's area when spider's web is cast must make a Reflex save. If this save succeeds, the creature is inside the web but is otherwise unaffected. If the save fails, the creature gains the grappled condition, but can break free by making a combat maneuver check, Athletics check, or Mobility check as a standard action against the DC of this ability. The entire area of the web is considered difficult terrain. Anyone moving through the webs must make a Reflex save each round. LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 动物伙伴（狼獾）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While in rage, a barbarian gains a +2 bonus on melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, thrown weapon damage rolls, and Will saving throws. In addition, she takes a –2 penalty to Armor Class. She also gains 2 temporary hit points per Hit Die.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 处于狂暴状态时，野蛮人在近战攻击检定、近战伤害检定、投掷武器伤害检定和意志豁免检定上获得+2加值。此外，她还要承受 –2 的防御等级减值。她还可以通过每个生命骰获得 2 个临时生命值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Rage
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 愤怒

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While in rage, a barbarian gains a +2 bonus on melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, thrown weapon damage rolls, and Will saving throws. In addition, she takes a –2 penalty to Armor Class. She also gains 2 temporary hit points per Hit Die.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 处于狂暴状态时，野蛮人在近战攻击检定、近战伤害检定、投掷武器伤害检定和意志豁免检定上获得+2加值。此外，她还要承受 –2 的防御等级减值。她还可以通过每个生命骰获得 2 个临时生命值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Conqueror is bent on earthly conquest. They care nothing for the intricacies of divine spellcasting, but malevolent energy still surrounds them. Whether alone or at the head of a marauding host, these cruel warriors bring suffering and death.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 征服者一心要征服尘世。他们对复杂的神术施法毫不在意，但恶毒的能量仍然围绕着他们。无论是独自一人还是在主导掠夺时，这些残暴的战士都会带来痛苦和死亡。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Conqueror
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 征服者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th level, the conqueror's commandments warp the minds of those who accept them even further.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 7 级，征服者的敕命会进一步扭曲那些接受它们的人的思想。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a conqueror receives the ability to incite rage in those he rules over, as per the skald inspired rage class feature. Affected allies gain a +1 bonus to melee attack and damage rolls and a +1 bonus on Will saving throws, but also take a -1 penalty to AC. While under the effects of inspired rage, allies other than the conqueror cannot use any ability that requires patience or concentration. At 4th level and every 4 levels thereafter, the song's bonuses on Will saves increase by 1; the penalty to AC doesn't change. At 8th and 16th levels, the song's bonuses to attack and damage increase by 1. (Unlike the barbarian's rage ability, those affected are not fatigued after the song ends.)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在 1 级，征服者获得挑起他的奴隶愤怒的能力，这个效果等同于野蛮人狂暴职业特性。
受影响的盟友在近战攻击和伤害检定上获得 +1 加值，在意志豁免上获得 +1 加值，但在 AC 上也会受到 -1 减值。
在受到狂暴的影响下，征服者以外的盟友不能使用任何需要耐心或专注的能力。在第 4 级和之后的每 4 级，意志豁免加值增加 1；对 AC 的处罚不变。在第 8 级和第 16 级，攻击和伤害加成增加 1。（与野蛮人的狂暴能力不同，受影响的人在影响结束后不会陷入疲劳。）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Commandment
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎敕命

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 7th level, the conqueror's commandments warp the minds of those who accept them even further, the Strength bonuses of the conquerors incite rage increase by 2, however if affected creature stops attacking or changes the target she suffers (1d6 + his level) points of damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 7 级，征服者的敕命会进一步扭曲那些接受它们的人的思想，征服者亵渎敕命带来的力量加值增加 2，但是如果受影响的生物停止攻击或改变目标，她将受到 (1d6 + 他的等级) 点伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Conquest
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎征服

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Traitor   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Betrayal, Exiles, Shadows   
Domains: Chaos, Darkness, Nobility, Travel   
Subdomains: Exploration, Loss, Martyr, Night   
Favoured Weapon: Rapier   
Holy Symbol: Eye with crescent moon pupil   
Sacred Animal: Bat   
Over eons beyond mortal ken, many Eldest have been forced out of power or vanished into obscurity. Yet only one has managed to do both these things and still exert influence over both the First World and the planes beyond. The creature known as Count Ranalc, for reasons long lost to history—first rose to power in the early days of the multiverse as a physical embodiment of primal darkness and the chaos of creation. Tall and gaunt, constantly wrapped in inky shadow, he was always difficult for the other fey lords to work with, his arrogance born from both power and the knowledge that, in the end, his domain of darkness would consume all things. Still, the other Eldest respected his strength and the necessity of chaos in fueling the fires of existence, which makes it all the more surprising that they eventually banded together to exile him from the plane entirely. What Ranalc did to rouse the ire—or self-preservation—of the other Eldest remains one of the First World’s greatest mysteries, but it was at that point, millennia ago, that he was first given the appellation “the Traitor.” Cast out onto the Shadow Plane, Ranalc shocked the others by refusing to be beaten, instead creating a stronghold within the darkness and embracing his new role as lord of exiles and betrayal. From his darkened realm, he continued to grant power to his followers and influence both the First World and Material Plane. Yet even then the mystery of the dark lord was not yet complete. Though historical records dating all the way back to the Age of Anguish show evidence of Ranalc’s machinations on Golarion, he abruptly disappeared from both his shadowed court and the pages of history in the third century of the Age of Anguish. Whatever the truth, the fact that he continues to grant magic to his followers indicates that, wherever the missing demigod has gone, he has not yet met the same fate as Aroden.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：背叛者
阵营：混乱中立
神职：背叛、放逐、阴影 
领域：混乱、黑暗、崇高、旅行
子领域：探索、失却、殉难、暗夜
偏好武器：木棍
圣徽：带有新月瞳孔的眼睛
圣兽：蝙蝠
超越凡人所知的亿万年，许多始祖被迫失去权力或消失在默默无闻中。然而，只有一个人成功地做到了这两件事，并且仍然对第一世界和其他位面施加影响。
被称为莱诺克伯爵的生物，由于早已被历史遗忘的原因，在在多元宇宙的早期崛起，作为原始黑暗和混沌创造的物理化身。他又高又瘦，总是笼罩在漆黑的阴影中，其他妖精领主总是难以与他共事，他的傲慢来自权力和他的知识，最终，他的黑暗领域将吞噬一切。
尽管如此，另一位始祖仍然尊重他的力量，也尊重他为生存之火助燃引导混乱的必要性，更令人惊讶的是，他们最终联合起来将莱诺克伯爵完全驱逐出位面。莱诺克伯爵为激起另一位始祖的愤怒——或自我保护——所做的事情仍然是第一世界最大的谜团之一，但正是在几千年前，他第一次获得了“背叛者”的称号。
莱诺克伯爵被扔到了阴影位面，他不承认失败，反而在黑暗中建立了一个据点，并接受了他作为流亡和背叛之主的新角色，这让其他人感到震惊。在他黑暗的领域，他继续赋予他的追随者力量，并影响第一世界和主物质位面。然而即便如此，黑暗领主的神秘还没有完全揭开。尽管可以追溯到痛苦时代的历史记录显示了拉纳尔克对葛拉利昂的阴谋的证据，但在痛苦时代的第三世纪，他突然从他阴暗的宫廷和历史的篇章中消失了。不管真相如何，他继续为他的追随者提供魔法这一事实表明，无论这个失踪的半神去了哪里，他还没有遇到与阿罗登一样的命运。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Count Ranalc
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 莱诺克伯爵

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A dreadknight may enhance their Profane Corruption with learned cruelties. Only one cruelty may be selected at a time. 
This cruelty causes the target to be become blinded for 1 round/level of dreadknight upon a failed fortitude save.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士可以通过习得的残虐来增强他们的亵渎之炎。一次只能选择一种残虐。这种残虐会导致目标在一次失败的强韧豁免中目盲 1 轮/恐惧骑士等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The next use of profane corruption will be enhanced with the blinded cruelty.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 下一次对亵渎之炎的使用将因残虐——目盲而得到加强。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, and every three levels thereafter, a dreadknight can select one cruelty. Each cruelty adds an effect to the dreadknight's profane corruption ability. Whenever the dreadknight uses any from of profane corruption to deal damage to one target, the target also receives the additional effect from one of the cruelties possessed by the dreadknight. The Dread Knight selects this cruelty before the attack. The target receives a Fortitude save to avoid this cruelty. If the save is successful, the target takes the damage as normal, but not the effects of the cruelty. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 the dreadknight’s level + the dreadknight’s Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在第 3 级以及之后的每 3 级，恐惧骑士可以选择一种残虐。
每种残虐都能为恐惧骑士的亵渎之炎能力增加一种效果。当恐惧骑士通过亵渎之炎对一个目标造成伤害时，会受到残虐带来的额外异常状态。恐惧骑士必须在攻击前声明使用残虐。目标骰一次强韧豁免以避免这种效果。如果豁免成功，目标将照常受到伤害，但不会受到残虐的影响。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 恐惧骑士的等级 + 恐惧骑士的魅力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cruelty Selection
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 残虐选择

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, and every three levels thereafter, a dreadknight can select one cruelty. Each cruelty adds an effect to the dreadknight's touch of profane corruption ability. Whenever the dreadknight uses touch of profane corruption to deal damage to one target, the target also receives the additional effect from one of the cruelties possessed by the dreadknight. This choice is made when the touch is used. The target receives a Fortitude save to avoid this cruelty. If the save is successful, the target takes the damage as normal, but not the effects of the cruelty. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 the dreadknight’s level + the dreadknight’s Charisma modifier.

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Dreamer in the Deep   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Cataclysms, Dreams, The Stars   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Madness, Void (Destruction)   
Subdomains: Dark Tapestry, Insanity, Nightmare, Stars   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Complex rune around eye   
Although Cthulhu is imprisoned in the sunken corpse city of R’lyeh under a vast ocean on a distant world far from Golarion, his mind is vast and terrible, capable of reaching out to touch dreaming minds across the universe. His cult is spread in this manner, as those sensitive to his dreams of madness (typically half-insane artists, poets, and visionaries) waken with memories not wholly their own. Upon waking, these afflicted artists and dreamers may not even consciously recall their dreams or realize that their actions have been influenced. Cthulhu’s spawn—tremendous entities similar in shape and purpose to their great master—also spread his terrible worship, but deadly as they are, they possess but a shadow of Cthulhu’s power. Cthulhu’s cults are secretive, based in remote swamplands, dense forests, and sprawling sewers under the world’s greatest cities. They know that one day the stars shall align and their master’s city will rise again above the waves on that distant, doomed planet, at which point it is merely a matter of time before they are rewarded with the arrival of their terrible deity upon Golarion as he wipes entire worlds clean in preparation for the return of all of the Outer Gods. Cthulhu is a massive creature, roughly humanoid in shape but hideously inhuman in many regards, with an octopoid face, immense wings, and foul protoplasmic flesh that writhes in ways no flesh should. While imprisoned, his mad thoughts can touch only a dreaming few, but once awake, his alien mind will spread like a virus of insanity through all thinking souls.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：深渊梦者
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：天灾，梦境与群星
等级：旧日支配者 
领域：混乱、邪恶、疯狂、虚空（破坏）
子领域：异幕，狂乱，梦魇，星辰
偏好武器：匕首
圣徽：环绕一只醒眼的复杂符文
虽然克鲁苏被囚禁在某个远离格拉里昂的遥远世界那浩瀚海洋下的沉没死城之中，但祂的心灵强健而可怖以至祂仍能触及宇宙各处的梦中心灵。祂的教团正以这种方式传播——那些对疯狂梦境敏感的人（大多是半癫狂的艺术家、诗人和空想家）醒来时的记忆并不完全属于他们自己。这些备受折磨的艺术家和梦者甚至可能在醒来后依然没有意识到自己的梦境和行为受到了影响。克鲁苏的眷族——一种与它们的伟大主人相似的庞然大物——同样传播着祂的恐怖崇拜，虽然它们强悍而致命，但它们的力量不过是克苏鲁伟力的阴影而已。
克苏鲁教团行踪诡秘，通常藏身于偏僻的沼地、茂密的丛林和遍布世界各大城市的下水道中。他们知道终有一日群星将列于正确的位置，而属于他们主人的城市将从遥远彼方那颗注定毁灭的星球上再度浮起；而祂降临至格拉里昂授予信徒奖赏也仅仅只是时间问题，因为祂注定要净空所有世界以迎接外神归返。
克苏鲁形如体躯庞大略似人形，但每一处都恐怖至极，祂有着类似章鱼的面容，宽阔的翅翼和不断诡异扭动的丑恶原生血肉。在被囚禁之时，祂的疯狂心智只能触及少数梦者，但一旦醒来，祂的异星思想便会如同疯狂病毒一般散播至所有拥有思想的灵魂之中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cthulhu
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 克苏鲁

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet with your malign eye, causing it to take a –2 penalty on all saving throws against your spells. The effect lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以标准动作，你怨恨地瞪了30尺内单个目标一眼，令其对你的所有法术的豁免检定受到-2惩罚。效果持续1分钟或者到目标攻击命中你，每天能使用的次数为“3+感知修正”。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet with your malign eye, causing it to take a –2 penalty on all saving throws against your spells. The effect lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以标准动作，你怨恨地瞪了30尺内单个目标一眼，令其对你的所有法术的豁免检定受到-2惩罚。效果持续1分钟或者到目标攻击命中你，每天能使用的次数为“3+感知修正”。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Malign Eye
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 冷眼

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are infused with fate, spreading ill omens to foes while granting fortune to yourself.
Malign Eye: As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet with your malign eye, causing it to take a –2 penalty on all saving throws against your spells. The effect lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你与命运融为一体，向敌人传播恶兆，同时给自己带来好运。
冷眼:以标准动作，你怨恨地瞪了30尺内单个目标一眼，令其对你的所有法术的豁免检定受到-2惩罚。效果持续1分钟或者到目标攻击命中你，每天能使用的次数为“3+感知修正”。
神圣幸运：6级起，你可以用标准{g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}动作{/g}，以神圣的幸运自我祝福。接下来的等于赋予你此领域的职业等级一半的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}内，你可以为所有d20检定投骰两次，并取最有利的结果。6级时你每天可施展一次此能力，之后你每在赋予你此领域的职业上提升6级，就可再获得一次每日施展次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Curse Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 诅咒子域

Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.

你与命运融为一体，向敌人传播恶兆，同时给自己带来好运。
冷眼:以标准动作，你怨恨地瞪了30尺内单个目标一眼，令其对你的所有法术的豁免检定受到-2惩罚。效果持续1分钟或者到目标攻击命中你，每天能使用的次数为“3+感知修正”。
神圣幸运：6级起，你可以用标准{g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}动作{/g}，以神圣的幸运自我祝福。接下来的等于赋予你此领域的职业等级一半的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}内，你可以为所有d20检定投骰两次，并取最有利的结果。6级时你每天可施展一次此能力，之后你每在赋予你此领域的职业上提升6级，就可再获得一次每日施展次数。
领域法术：绝望术、援助术、降咒、共用防护能量、破除魔咒、凶险注视、高等复原术、狂喜宁静、群体医疗术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are infused with fate, spreading ill omens to foes while granting fortune to yourself.
Malign Eye: As a standard action, you can afflict one target within 30 feet with your malign eye, causing it to take a –2 penalty on all saving throws against your spells. The effect lasts for 1 minute. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.
Domain Spells: bane, aid, bestow curse, communal protection from energy, break enchantment, eyebite, restoration greater, euphoric tranquility, mass heal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你与命运融为一体，向敌人传播恶兆，同时给自己带来好运。

神圣幸运：6级起，你可以用标准{g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}动作{/g}，以神圣的幸运自我祝福。接下来的等于赋予你此领域的职业等级一半的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}内，你可以为所有d20检定投骰两次，并取最有利的结果。6级时你每天可施展一次此能力，之后你每在赋予你此领域的职业上提升6级，就可再获得一次每日施展次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Prince of the Blasted Heath, Demon Lord of Fungus and Parasites, Lord of Filth and Pollution
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Disease, Fungus, Parasites   
Domains: Chaos, Earth, Evil, Plant   
Subdomains: Caves, Decay, Demon, Growth, Plague   
Favoured Weapon: Scimitar   
Holy Symbol: Moldy spiraling tentacle
Sacred Animal: Centipede   
Cyth-V’sug’s realm is both a place and a being—an immense parasitic fungus called the Jeharlu capable of extending tendrils into other planes, corrupting them, and then drawing them into the Abyss to expand itself. A quivering, spherical clot of fungal matter much larger than the largest of planets, the Jeharlu lies at the center of an immense cavern, suspended by thick white filaments that attach it to the surrounding rift. Pallid giant worms, moldering shamblers, deformed fungoid dragons, and all manner of demons are but a few of the Jeharlu’s dangers. Cyth-V’sug dwells at the heart of this fungal sphere, an immense monstrosity that appears as a tangled mass of fungal tubers, tentacles, and grasping claws topped by a heaving draconic body with puff ball eyes and jagged teeth. Cyth-V’sug can be thought of as a planetary parasite that infests worlds and consumes them, adding the waste that he leaves behind to his ever-expanding Abyssal realm. One of Cyth-V’sug’s greatest minions, the nascent demon lord Treerazer, recently established a domain on the Material Plane after a failed coup against Cyth-V’sug, yet curiously, the Prince of the Blasted Heath has done little to strike against his wayward minion since.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：枯萎荒地王子、真菌和寄生虫恶魔领主、污秽和污染领主 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：疾病、真菌、寄生虫
领域：混乱、大地、邪恶、植物 
子领域：洞穴、腐烂、恶魔、生长，瘟疫 
偏好武器：弯刀 
圣徽：发霉的螺旋触手 
圣兽：蜈蚣  
赛斯-痿'撒格 的领域既是一个地方也是一个存在——一种叫做 Jeharlu 的巨大寄生真菌，能够将卷须延伸到其他位面，腐化它们，并且然后将他们拉入深渊以扩张自己。 Jeharlu 是一个颤抖的球形真菌物质块，比最大的行星还要大得多，它位于一个巨大洞穴的中心，由厚厚的白色细丝悬挂，将其连接到周围的裂隙。苍白的巨型蠕虫、腐烂的蹒跚者、畸形的菌类龙和各式各样的恶魔只是杰哈鲁的一小部分危险。 赛斯-痿'撒格 居住在这个真菌球体的中心，这是一个巨大的怪物，看起来像是一团缠结在一起的真菌块茎、触手和抓握的爪子，顶部是一个起伏的龙形身体，长着肿胀的球眼和锯齿状的牙齿。 赛斯-痿'撒格 可以被认为是一种行星寄生虫，它会感染世界并吞噬它们，将他留下的废物添加到他不断扩大的深渊领域。 赛斯-痿'撒格 最伟大的仆从之一，初生的恶魔领主 Treerazer，在对 赛斯-痿'撒格 的政变失败后最近在物质界建立了一个领域，但奇怪的是，Blasted Heath 的王子几乎没有采取任何行动来对抗他任性的爪牙，因为。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Cyth-V'sug
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 赛斯-痿'撒格

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Shadow in the Sea, Demon Lord of the Sea and Sea Monsters   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Deformity, Sea monsters, The Sea   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Water   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Demon, Oceans, Rage   
Favoured Weapon: Trident   
Holy Symbol: Gold disk inscribed with sinister runes around an open octopus eye   
Sacred Animal: Fish   
Dagon dwells in the Abyssal Sea of Ishiar in a sunken city called Ugothanok. The surface of this Abyssal Sea is dotted with countless islands, many of which are settled by fiendish and half-fiend humans known as Ishians who wage constant nautical warfare upon each other in a never-ending battle to claim new islands and impress Dagon with their cruelties. Not quite fish or octopus or eel, Dagon is fond of sending his spawn into the oceans of the Material Plane to spread his inf luence, often physically by breeding with creatures of the deeps or among isolated coastal-dwelling societies. Marsh giants are traditionally among his most fervent worshipers on land, yet in certain remote locations (particularly along the western coastlines of Avistan and Garund), his cult is growing among humans. A village that turns to the worship of Dagon often does so secretly, maintaining a facade of worshiping another deity when in fact the town’s devotions are for the Shadow in the Sea. In the most remote locations, these cults mix with sahuagin, boggards, and other hideous aquatic creatures. The deformed hybrid children of such blasphemous unions are sure signs of Dagon worship. In these regions, such deformities are regarded as badges of honor.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：海之阴影、海魔领主和海怪 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：畸形、海怪、海洋
领域：混乱、毁灭、邪恶、水 
子领域：灾难、恶魔、海洋、狂暴武器：三叉戟 
圣徽：在张开的章鱼眼睛周围刻有邪恶符文的金圆盘 
圣兽：鱼大衮居住在伊什亚尔深海的一座名为乌戈萨诺克的沉没城市中。这片深渊海的表面散布着无数岛屿，其中许多是被称为 Ishians 的恶魔和半恶魔人类定居的地方，他们在无休止的战斗中相互进行海战，以夺取新岛屿并用他们的岛屿给大衮留下深刻印象。残虐。达贡并不完全是鱼、章鱼或鳗鱼，他喜欢将他的后代送入主物质位面的海洋以传播他的影响力，通常是通过与深海生物或与孤立的沿海居民社会进行繁殖来进行物理繁殖。沼泽巨人传统上是他在陆地上最狂热的崇拜者之一，但在某些偏远地区（尤其是阿维斯坦和加伦德的西部海岸线），他的崇拜在人类中日益增长。一个转向崇拜大衮的村庄经常秘密地这样做，保持崇拜另一个神灵的表面，而实际上该镇的信仰是对海影。在最偏远的地方，这些邪教与沙华鱼、沼泽和其他可怕的水生生物混在一起。这种亵渎神明的结合的畸形混血儿无疑是大衮崇拜的迹象。在这些地区，这种畸形被视为荣誉徽章。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 大衮

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The False Wyrm, Sorrowmaker, The Endless Destruction, The Great Darkness   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Destruction, Dragons, Evil, Trachery   
Edict: Kill metallic dragons, destroy things at your whim   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Scalykind, Trickery   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Deception, Demon, Dragon, Rage, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Bite or Whip   
Holy Symbol: Falling burning scale    
Sacred Animal: None   
Dragons believe Dahak was one of the original gods created by Apsu and Tiamat at the beginning of creation.While the other deities began to create, Dahak chose to destroy. He is credited with transforming Hell into a place of agony and flame. He is also believed to be the creator of the metallic dragons, which he formed solely to hunt as sport. Seeing the destruction and chaos wrought, Apsu entered the Material Plane in order to end Dahak's reign of terror. However, Tiamat saw Dahak as a son and wanted him spared. In a deal to save Dahak, Tiamat healed some of the wounded metallic dragons. These dragons became the original chromatic dragons.
Appearance: The only descriptions of Dahak tell of him as ugly, scarred, and covered in spikes, with a burning hatred in his eyes for his father, Apsu.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：无尽毁灭
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：毁灭、龙、邪恶
领域：混乱、破坏、邪恶、鳞类、诡计
子领域：灾难、欺骗、恶魔、龙、狂暴、盗窃 
偏好武器：啮咬、长鞭（徒手击打） 
圣徽：坠落的燃烧鳞片 
圣兽：无 
龙族相信达哈克是阿普苏和提亚马特在创世之初创造的原始神之一。当其他神灵开始创造时，达哈克选择了毁灭。很多人认为是他将地狱变成了一个充满痛苦和火焰的地方。他也被认为是金属龙的创造者，他创造这些金属龙的目的只是为了狩猎。在看到这些破坏和混乱之后，阿普苏进入物质位面打算结束达哈克的恐怖统治。然而，提亚马特视达哈克为儿子，希望他能幸免于难。为了拯救达哈克，提亚马特治愈了一些受伤的金属巨龙。这些龙成为最初的色彩龙。
外貌：对达哈克的唯一描述是丑陋、伤痕累累、长满尖刺，眼中对他的父亲阿普苏怀有炽热的仇恨。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dahak
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达哈克

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Claw gains a spellbook with the bloodrager spelllist and gains spellslots at the same rate as a paladin. All spells provided by Dahak's domains and subdomains are added to the Claw of the False Wyrm spellbook.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 虚龙之爪获得一本带有血怒者法术列表的法术书，并以与圣武士相同的进度获得法术位。达哈克的领域和子领域提供的所有法术都被添加到虚龙之爪法术书中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dahaks's Gift
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达哈克的赠礼

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lady of Foxes   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Agriculture, Craftsmanship, Kitsune, Rice
Edict: Ensure the health of crops and vegetation, perfect a craft or trade, leave offerings for foxes, celebrate the turning of the seasons   
Domains: Animal, Artifice, Community, Plant, Weather   
Subdomains: Construct, Family, Fur, Growth, Home, Industry, Seasons   
Favoured Weapon: Flail   
Holy Symbol: Nine-tailed fox   
Sacred Animal: Fox   Daikitsu is widely worshiped in Tian Xia, as she is the goddess of rice, a staple food in those lands, as well as of agriculture and craftsmanship. Farmers pray to Daikitsu for good harvests, smiths and craftsmen seek her blessing for their creations, and families ask for her protection for their homes and families. Known as the Lady of Foxes, Daikitsu usually appears as beautiful kitsune woman with snow-white fur and nine tails. She is also the patron of kitsune, who venerate her as the mother of their race.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：狐狸女士 
阵营：绝对中立 
神职：农业、技艺、狐妖、稻米
信条：确保作物和植被的健康，完美的手工艺或贸易，为狐狸送上祭品，庆祝季节的转变 
领域：动物、工匠、联盟、植物、天气 
子领域：构装、家族、毛兽、滋长、家园、工业、季节
偏好武器：连枷
圣徽：九尾狐
圣兽：狐狸
大狐女在天洲信者众多，因为她是稻米之神，掌管田地的丰饶，也关照工匠们的手艺。农民向大狐女祈祷自己的庄稼丰收，匠人向大狐女祈祷自己的作品完美，而每家每户都会向大狐女祈祷保佑家宅平安。就像她的尊号所称的那样，大狐女喜欢化身为一个皮毛光洁雪白，长有九条大尾的狐妖美女出现，因为她也正是狐妖一族的保护者，被狐妖们奉为主母。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Daikitsu
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 大狐女

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Denied   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Liquor, Luck, Medicine   
Domains: Healing, Luck, Protection, Repose  
Favoured Weapon: Short sword   
Holy Symbol: Horizontal line crossed by two vertical lines, surrounded by four dots   
While most ushers concern themselves with death, Dammar fixates on life. A physical manifestation of the first resurrection magic, the Denied acts as monitor for all who would journey back to the mortal realm from the Boneyard and ensures that such passages are neither too frequent nor too easy. Concerned as they are with walking back from death, Dammar is also the usher of doctors, medicine, and, due to its long history of use in medical preparations, alcohol and those who produce it. Legends say Dammar created the hangover to grant mortals a peek beyond the veil. Dammar manifests as a portly, androgynous figure swathed in several layers of silk robes, who hides their face behind a veil. Six insectile legs emerge from beneath their robes, and while no arms normally emerge from the swirl of fabric encompassing them, Dammar can manifest dozens at a time to manage various tasks. This uncanny ability—along with their supposed fondness for cockroaches—earns the Denied their unofficial reputation as the usher of insects and creeping things.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：被拒绝的
阵营：绝对中立 

形态：招魂使 
领域：酒、运气、医学
领域：治疗、运气、保护、休息 
偏好武器：短剑 
圣徽：水平线与两条垂直线相交，周围有四个圆点大多数引座员都关心死亡，而达玛则生命。作为第一个复活魔法的物理表现，被拒绝者充当着所有将从墓地返回凡间的人的御衡者，并确保这样的通道既不太频繁也不太容易。尽管他们担心死而复生，但达马尔也是医生、药物的引领者，并且由于其在医疗制剂中的长期使用历史，酒精和生产它的人。传说达马尔创造了宿醉，让凡人能够窥视面纱。 Dammar 显现为一个身材魁梧、雌雄同体的人物，身上裹着几层丝质长袍，面纱掩面。六只昆虫腿从他们的长袍下伸出来，虽然通常不会从环绕它们的织物漩涡中伸出手臂，但达玛一次可以显现数十条来处理各种任务。这种不可思议的能力——连同他们所谓的对蟑螂的喜爱——为否认者赢得了他们作为昆虫和爬行动物的引导者的非官方声誉。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dammar
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达玛尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Weighted Swing  
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Executions, Judiciousness, Responsibility   
Domains: Death, Glory, Good, Law   
Subdomains: Archon, Heroism, Honor, Judgment   
Favoured Weapon: Greataxe   
Holy Symbol: White dove perched on axe   
Sacred Animal: Dove   
Damerrich and his followers believe death to be the defining moment of a mortal's life. How an individual meets her end and why weigh heavily on the spirit in the afterlife. Damerrich understands that evil must sometimes be slain, but never lightly, never easily. Damerrich takes on the weight of all the necessary executions and just deaths in the world. Executioners look to this empyreal lord whenever they have qualms with their line of work, and Damerrich teaches them that while their duty is a s ober and joy-free one, it is necessary to ensure peace and goodness. Damerrich is a silent, monolithic figure clad in black stone armor. His handsome, hairless face is mostly hidden behind his helm; only his weary eyes are clearly visible. Judges, whether appointed officials in city courthouses or village leaders acting as part of a tribunal, pray to Damerrich for guidance in their judgments. Good people may understand the need for executions but shrink from the act; Damerrich and his agents help reas sure them when executions are appropriate or take the burden of mortal guilt upon themselves. Those wrongly sentenced to death pray for intercession from Damerrich, and can hope to receive help in the form of one of his divine agents. Corrupt judges and careless executioners rouse the Weighted Swing's ire like nothing else. Similarly, if an accused deserving of death is set free, Damerrich's agents might appear both to perform the just execution and to chastise those who set the criminal free. The Weighted Swing does not take pleasure in his grim but necessary task, and those who take the matter of execution too lightly or who sadistically revel in the act may expect retribution from Damerrich's chosen elimination squad of shield archons, known as Those of the Heaving Hand.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：权衡之挥
阵营：守序善良 
神职：处刑，明智，责任
领域：死亡、荣耀、善良、守序 
子领域：亚空、英勇、诚实、审判 
偏好武器：巨斧
圣徽：栖息在斧头顶部的白鸽
圣兽: 鸽子
戴莫瑞启和他的追随者相信死亡是凡人生命的决定性时刻。一个人是如何结束她的生命的，为什么在死后会对灵魂产生沉重的影响。达莫里希明白，邪恶有时必须被消灭，但绝不能轻易，也绝不能轻易。
戴莫瑞启承担了世界上所有必要处决和公正死亡的重担。刽子手们在对自己的工作有疑虑时会求助于这位至高天领主，而戴莫瑞启教导他们，虽然他们的职责是冷酷又庄严的，但有必要确保和平与善良。 
戴莫瑞启是一个身着黑色石制盔甲的沉默寡言的人物。他英俊的无毛的脸几乎都隐藏在他的头盔后面；只有他疲劳的眼睛清晰可见。法官，无论是市法院任命的官员，还是作为法庭一部分的村镇领袖，都向戴莫瑞启祈祷，以寻求他们的判决指导。好人可能会理解处决的必要性，但会畏缩不前；戴莫瑞启和他的代理人在适当的处决时帮助他们安抚他们，或者自己承担致命的罪责。那些被错误判处死刑的人祈求戴莫瑞启的帮助，并希望得到他的一位神圣代理人的帮助。
腐败的法官和粗心的刽子手激起权衡之挥的怒火，没有什么比这更重要的了。同样，如果一个该死的被告被释放，戴莫瑞启的代理人可能既要执行公正的处决，又要惩罚那些释放罪犯的人。
权衡之挥不喜欢他严酷但必要的任务，那些对处决问题过于轻率或对这一行为充满残虐的人可能会受到戴莫瑞启挑选的亚空小队的惩罚.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dammerich
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 戴莫瑞启

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a lethal combat dancer, swirling and spinning with grace and precision. You gain a morale bonus on melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, and Mobility checks, and to Armor Class. This bonus is equal to +1 per 3 caster levels (maximum +5 at 15th level). You must remain moving for the spell to stay in effect. If in any round you do not either move at least 10 feet or make a melee attack, the spell’s duration ends.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你成为一个致命的战斗舞者，优雅而精确地旋转和舞动。你在近战攻击检定、近战伤害检定和移动检定以及防御等级上获得士气加值。该加值等于每 3 个施法者等级 +1（在 15 级达到最大 +5）。你必须保持移动才能使法术生效。如果在任何一轮中你没有移动至少 10 英尺或进行近战攻击，则法术的持续时间结束。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a lethal combat dancer, swirling and spinning with grace and precision. You gain a morale bonus on melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, and Mobility checks, and to Armor Class. This bonus is equal to +1 per 3 caster levels (maximum +5 at 15th level). You must remain moving for the spell to stay in effect. If in any round you do not either move at least 10 feet or make a melee attack, the spell’s duration ends.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你成为一个致命的战斗舞者，优雅而精确地旋转舞动。你在近战攻击检定、近战伤害检定和移动检定以及防御等级上获得士气加值。该加值等于每 3 个施法者等级 +1（在 15 级达到最大 +5）。你必须保持移动才能使法术生效。如果在任何一轮中你没有移动至少 10 英尺或进行近战攻击，则法术的持续时间结束。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dance of a Hundred Cuts
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 百袭战舞

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Token
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 代币

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell functions as dance of a hundred cuts, except you also gain the benefits of haste. 
You become a lethal combat dancer, swirling and spinning with grace and precision. You gain a morale bonus on melee attack rolls, melee damage rolls, and Mobility checks, and to Armor Class. This bonus is equal to +1 per 3 caster levels (maximum +5 at 15th level). You must remain moving for the spell to stay in effect. If in any round you do not either move at least 10 feet or make a melee attack, the spell’s duration ends.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 此法术的作用类似于百袭战舞，除了你还获得了加速的好处。你成为一个致命的战斗舞者，优雅而精确地旋转舞动。你在近战攻击检定、近战伤害检定和移动检定以及防御等级上获得士气加值。该加值等于每 3 个施法者等级 +1（在 15 级达到最大 +5）。你必须保持移动才能使法术生效。如果在任何一轮中你没有移动至少 10 英尺或进行近战攻击，则法术的持续时间结束。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dance of a Thousand Cuts
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 千袭战舞

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Darkness: You gain the effects of the improved blind fight feat and are immune to blindness effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
黑暗：你获得高等盲斗专长的效果并且免疫目盲。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Darkness: You gain the effects of the improved blind fight feat and are immune to blindness effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
黑暗：你获得高等盲斗专长的效果并且免疫目盲。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Darkness Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 黑暗领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your performance, dealing 2d8 points of sonic damage to each target. In addition, each target takes 3d6 points of bleed damage for 1d6 rounds. A save negates the bleed damage but not the sonic damage. 
You cannot activate another bardic performance this round. If you have the lingering performance feat the effect lingers as normal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你必须处于一个生效中的吟游演绎中才能施展这个法术。使用时，你立即结束表演，对每个目标造成 2d8 点音波伤害。此外，每个目标都会受到 3d6 点流血伤害，持续 1d6 轮。豁免可以抵消流血伤害，但不能抵消声波伤害。本轮你不能启动另一个吟游表演。如果你有余音绕梁的表演专长，效果会像往常一样余音绕梁。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Deadly Finale
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 致命谢幕曲

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This creature takes 3d6 sonic damage each turn. This effect stacks in duration if reapplied.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 此生物每回合受到 3d6 声波伤害。如果再次使用，此持续时间叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Deadly Vibrations
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 致命振动

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Death: You gain resistance 30 to positive and negative energy that would harm you, you are also immune to energy drain and death effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举圣徽并呼唤你的神灵的名字，你就获得了神性的一个方面。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免的能力使用该法术的 DC。
死亡：你对伤害你的正能量和负能量获得 30 抗性，你也免疫属性流失和死亡效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Death Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 死亡领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once each day, you can emit a 30-foot aura for a number of rounds equal to your cleric level. Allies within the aura gain a +2 deflection bonus to AC and combat maneuver defense.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天1次，你能放出持续轮数为牧师等级的30尺灵光，盟友获得AC+2偏斜加值和+2战技防御。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once each day, you can emit a 30-foot aura for a number of rounds equal to your cleric level. Allies within the aura gain a +2 deflection bonus to AC and combat maneuver defense.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天1次，你能放出持续轮数为牧师等级的30尺灵光，盟友获得AC+2偏斜加值和+2战技防御。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Deflection Aura
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 偏转灵光

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once each day, you can emit a 30-foot aura for a number of rounds equal to your cleric level. Allies within the aura gain a +2 deflection bonus to AC and combat maneuver defense.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天1次，你能放出持续轮数为牧师等级的30尺灵光，盟友获得AC+2偏斜加值和+2战技防御。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你以信念为要塞，赐予你抵抗一切攻击的力量。此外，你在反射豁免检定上获得+1抗力加值。这个加值每在授予你此能力的职业上提升5级额外增加1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Defense Domain Resistance Bonus
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 防御子域抵抗加值

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your faith is your fortitude, inspiring all with the strength to defend aginst any blow. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain.
Deflection Aura: Once each day, you can emit a 30-foot aura for a number of rounds equal to your cleric level. Allies within the aura gain a +2 deflection bonus to AC and combat maneuver defense.
Aura of Protection: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你以信念为要塞，赐予你抵抗一切攻击的力量。此外，你在反射豁免检定上获得+1抗力加值。这个加值每在授予你此能力的职业上提升5级额外增加1。
偏转灵光：每天1次，你能放出持续轮数为牧师等级的30尺灵光，盟友获得AC+2偏斜加值和+2战技防御。
守护灵光：达到8级后，你可发出30英尺范围的守护灵光，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。在此灵光范围内的盟友，包括你自身的{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}获得+1偏斜加值，以及对抗所有能量的5点抗性（酸蚀、寒冷、电击、火焰和音波）。在8级后，赋予你此领域的职业每升4级，可额外提高1点偏斜加值。14级时，对抗所有能量的抗性将提高到10点。生效轮次无需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Defense Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 防御子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your faith is your fortitude, inspiring all with the strength to defend aginst any blow. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain.
Deflection Aura: Once each day, you can emit a 30-foot aura for a number of rounds equal to your cleric level. Allies within the aura gain a +2 deflection bonus to AC and combat maneuver defense.
Aura of Protection: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Domain Spells: shield, barkskin, protection from energy, communal protection from energy, spell resistance, communal stoneskin, particulate form, protection from spells, seamantle.

你以信念为要塞，赐予你抵抗一切攻击的力量。此外，你在反射豁免检定上获得+1抗力加值。这个加值每在授予你此能力的职业上提升5级额外增加1。

守护灵光：达到8级后，你可发出30英尺范围的守护灵光，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。在此灵光范围内的盟友，包括你自身的{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}获得+1偏斜加值，以及对抗所有能量的5点抗性（酸蚀、寒冷、电击、火焰和音波）。在8级后，赋予你此领域的职业每升4级，可额外提高1点偏斜加值。14级时，对抗所有能量的抗性将提高到10点。生效轮次无需连续。
领域法术：护盾术，树肤术，防护能量，共用防护能量，法术抵抗，共用石肤，粒子形态，防护魔法，水幕拒敌。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Since the Age of Destiny, the people of Osirion have worshiped their own local gods, in addition to those deities venerated throughout the Inner Sea region. They were most popular during the early days of Osirion, but their faith waned as the Osirian people gradually turned to the worship of foreign deities. When Osirion was under Keleshite rule, the foreign overlords sought to eradicate the faith in the indigenous gods, but they remain a part of the history of Osirion's land and people, and with the restoration of native Osirian rule, interest in these ancient divinities has been rekindled.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
当文明之芽在刚在痛苦之年从史芬斯河的富饶三角洲破土而出时，移居至此的迦伦德人从大陆南边的家乡带来了在漠南已是古老的诸神信仰。这其中有许多神明长着野兽的头颅─似乎可追溯到更久远以前迦伦德人还在膜拜部族图腾兽的时期─但这只是神明在与凡人互动时选择显现的形象。以太阳神拉，以及继承祂权柄的欧西里斯与荷鲁斯为首，诸神积极介入凡间事务，在史前时代以神君之姿统治众生。作为一个努力奋斗以超脱蛮夷的民族之核心信仰的具现化身，诸神在这片新天地依旧眷顾祂们的天选之民。
阿兹格哈德一世在神君内希斯的引导下在命运之年创建了古奥西里昂。虽然奥西里昂的人民接纳了内海区域所崇拜的众神，他们依然保有对古神的信仰，内希斯、法莱斯玛和莎伦莱的教堂与阿努比斯、伊西斯和拉的圣殿比邻而立。随着古奥西里昂发展到第一和第二时代的顶峰，古老诸神在奥西里昂人心中的分量也越来越小。人类法老君临奥西里昂，而人民也逐渐改为信奉外来的内海众神。终于到了人类黄金时代的登基之年时，古老诸神退隐到了在伟大彼岸的领域，虽然依旧远远地保护与引导奥西里昂，祂们的注意力转移到了埃及古王国─一个遥远世界上的国度。
但在珂治时期，奥西里昂的外族统治者发起了灭绝古神信仰以及其他法老政权痕迹的运动。雕刻被捣毁，塑像被击碎，神殿被夷平。古奥西里昂的宗教就此衰败，但未被根绝，而随着本地法老政权在上个世纪复辟，人民对古奥西里昂历史再次充满兴趣，古神信仰也随之重生。古奥西里昂神系中包含了数十个神祇与半神，在此列举的20个神明是在现代奥西里昂最为活跃，信众也最多的古神信仰。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Deities of Ancient Osirion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 古奥西里昂诸神

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Just as in the lands of the Inner Sea, religion and faith play a vital role in the daily lives of the people of the Dragon Empires. And while there are deities and powerful extraplanar beings beyond count in search of followers, the faiths of 14 gods are particularly strong in Tian Xia
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 就像在内海的土地上一样，宗教和信仰在龙帝国人民的日常生活中也起着至关重要的作用。在天洲占据主要地位的是十四神，但依然有数不清其他的神祇和强大的异界生物在寻找追随者，

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Deities of Tian Xia
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 天洲神祇

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A deity, also known as a god or goddess, is a being or force of incredible power capable of granting its power to mortal beings through divine magic. These are the only beings that can claim full Divinity. A deity is strongly associated with a specific alignment, several domains, and a plane (typically an Outer Sphere plane).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神祇，也称为神或女神，是一种具有不可思议力量的存在或力量，能够通过神圣的魔法将其力量赋予凡人。这些是唯一可以声称完全神性的存在。神祇与特定阵营、多个领域和一个位面（通常是外球体位面）密切相关。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gods and Goddesses
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神与女神

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can give yourself an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1) on melee attacks, melee damage rolls, and combat maneuver checks. This bonus lasts for 1 round. During this round, you take a –2 penalty to AC. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以迅捷动作，你让自己获得等于牧师等级一半的增强加值到近战命中伤害和战技检定上1轮，同时AC受到-2惩罚。每天能用“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can give yourself an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1) on melee attacks, melee damage rolls, and combat maneuver checks. This bonus lasts for 1 round. During this round, you take a –2 penalty to AC. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以迅捷动作，你让自己获得等于牧师等级一半的增强加值到近战命中伤害和战技检定上1轮，同时AC受到-2惩罚。每天能用“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fury of the Abyss
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 深渊狂怒

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your soul embodies the anarchic and evil nature of demonkind, your master grants you the power of the Abyss.
Fury of the Abyss: As a swift action, you can give yourself an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1) on melee attacks, melee damage rolls, and combat maneuver checks. This bonus lasts for 1 round. During this round, you take a –2 penalty to AC. You can use this ability for a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Chaos Blade: At 8th level, you can give a weapon you touch the anarchic special weapon quality for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, and an additional time per day for every four levels beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的灵魂体现了恶魔的无序和邪恶本性，你的主人赋予你深渊的力量。
深渊狂怒：以迅捷动作，你让自己获得等于牧师等级一半的增强加值到近战命中伤害和战技检定上1轮，同时AC受到-2惩罚。每天能用“3+感知修正”次。
混沌之刃：在第 8 级时，你可以赋予你接触到的武器无序附魔，持续轮数等于你获取该领域的职业等级的 1/2。你可以在 8 级时每天使用一次此能力，8 级之后每 4 级每天可以额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A demon lord is a very powerful and unique demon. They are, by definition, rulers of at least one layer of the Abyss, and have hordes of nascent demon lords and lesser demons in their service. Being creatures of chaos, however, not all demons are servants to a demon lord. As the Abyss is nigh infinite, so too are the number of demon lords.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恶魔领主是一个非常强大和独特的恶魔。根据定义，他们是深渊至少一层的统治者，并拥有成群结队的新生恶魔领主和小恶魔为他们服务。然而，作为混沌生物，并非所有恶魔都是恶魔领主的仆人。由于深渊几乎是无限的，所以恶魔领主的数量也是如此。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Demon Lords
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恶魔领主

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Destruction: You gain a +2 bonus on damage rolls with melee weapons, spells you cast from the evocation spell school have their save DCs (if any) increased by 1, and your attacks against enemies with the construct type deal an additional 1d6 points of force damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
毁灭：你在使用近战武器的伤害掷骰上获得 +2 加值，你施展的塑能系法术的豁免 DC（如果有的话）增加 1，你对构装体类型的敌人的攻击额外造成 1d6 点力场伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Destruction Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 毁灭领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Iron Lord, Father of Dis, First King, King of Iron, Asmodeus' Eye, Master of the Tower, Lord of the Second   
Realm: Dis, Hell   
Alignment: Lawful Evil   
Areas of Concern: Cities, Prisons, Rulership   
Domains: Evil, Law, Nobility, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception, Devil, Leadership, Legislation, Thievery   
Profane Symbol: Iron Nail, Crown and Ring   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy Mace   
Profane Animal: Hound   
Profane Colours: Iron gray, Red
The archdevil Dispater is Hell's greatest jailer and politician and rules its second layer, Dis. Also known as the Iron Lord, Father of Dis and First King, Dispater is one of the more active rulers of Hell and one of Asmodeus's closest and longest-standing allies. His unholy symbol is an iron spike driven into a golden ring with a red and purple crown. His symbol of office is an artefact known as The Eclipsing Eye. Alone among the lords of Hell, Dispater believes in the virtues of courtly love, and has taken three wives over the course of his eons-long existence. The first is forgotten, even by the Iron Lord himself, the only token of her existence a shattered statue in Dispater's throne room. The second was Feronia, an elemental demigoddess with whom Dispater shared a brief, tempestuous relationship that led to the birth of his son, the empyreal lord Ragathiel. Dispater's third and current wife is Erecura, a once-mortal demigoddess who was condemned to Hell for stealing the secret of eternal life from Pharasma. Dispater has allied with the archdevil Mephistopheles as they both enjoy the art of ruling, and is married to Erecura.   
Appearance: Dispater appears as a majestic, seven-foot-tall figure with rust-red skin, four horns, and a burning crown that hovers above his head. His skin bears dozens of scars and piercings, each of them a past wound turned into a mark of pride. He retains his angelic wings, though they are now black, and he keeps them retracted within his body at almost all times. The First King's staff of office is The Eclipsing Eye, a bladed staff with a great ruby through which Asmodeus constantly watches him.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：钢铁公爵
阵营：守序邪恶
神职：城市、监狱、统治
领域：邪恶、守序、崇高、诡计
子领域：欺骗、邪魔、领导、立法、盗窃
亵渎符号：铁钉、王冠和戒指
偏好武器：重型硬头锤
亵渎动物：猎犬
大魔鬼迪斯帕特是地狱最伟大的狱卒和政治家，他统治着地狱的第二层，迪斯帕特也被称为钢铁之王、迪斯之父和第一任国王，是地狱中最活跃的统治者之一，也是阿斯莫迪斯最亲密和最长久的盟友之一。他的邪恶象征是一根铁钉，钉在一个带有红色和紫色皇冠的金色戒指中。他的办公室象征是一件被称为“食之眼”的人工制品。
在地狱领主中，迪斯帕特独自一人相信宫廷爱情的美好，并在他漫长的存在过程中娶了三位妻子。
第一个被遗忘了，甚至被钢铁领主本人遗忘，她存在的唯一标志是迪斯帕特王座室中破碎的雕像。
第二位是弗洛尼亚，一位元素半神，迪斯帕特与她有着短暂而激烈的关系，这导致了他的儿子——至高无上的领主拉贾瑟尔的诞生。
迪斯帕特的第三任妻子是埃雷库拉，她是一位曾经是凡人的半神，因从法拉斯玛那里窃取了永生的秘密而被判入狱。
迪斯帕特与大魔鬼墨菲斯托结盟，因为他们都喜欢统治的艺术，并与艾蕾卡拉结婚。
外貌：迪斯帕特看上去充满威严，身高七英尺，皮肤呈锈红色，有四个角，头顶上有一顶燃烧的王冠。他的皮肤上有几十道伤痕和穿孔，每一个都是过去的伤口，变成了骄傲的印记。他保留了他的天使之翼，尽管它们现在是黑色的，而且他几乎一直都将它们缩回体内。第一任国王的权杖是“食眼”，这是一把带有大红宝石的刀杖，阿斯莫迪斯通过它不断地注视着他。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dispater
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 迪斯帕特

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Gain access to the spells and revelations of the dragon mystery. 
Due to the divine herbalist archetype the class skills gained from this archetypeare replaced by the master herbalist feature and the brew potions feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
获取巨龙秘示域的法术和启示。
由于神圣草药师变体，获得的职业技能被草药学大师特性和调制药水专长所取代。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Gain access to the spells and revelations of the heavens mystery. 
Due to the divine herbalist archetype the class skills gained from this archetypeare replaced by the master herbalist feature and the brew potions feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
获得苍天秘示域的法术和启示。
由于神圣草药师变体，获得的职业技能被草药学大师特性和调制药水专长所取代。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Gain access to the spells and revelations of the succor mystery. 
Due to the divine herbalist archetype the class skills gained from this archetypeare replaced by the master herbalist feature and the brew potions feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
获得救助秘示域的法术和启示。
由于神圣草药师变体，获得的职业技能被草药学大师特性和调制药水专长所取代。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Starting at level 1, a living scripture gains spell focus as a bonus feat and at level 2 he can select one spell that he knows to inscribe upon his body, gaining benefits as per the spell specialization feature. The living scripture may replace this spell with any spell known upon gaining the next level. At level 4, he gains spell focus greater as a bonus feat. At 6th level, the living scripture is a magical bastion of his faith, gaining an innate, stackable spell resistance of 13. At levels 10, 15 and 20, the living scripture discovers new ways to increase the power of his spellcasting, choosing a bonus feat from the Wizard class bonus feat selection.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从 1 级开始，活圣经获得法术专攻作为奖励专长，在 2 级时，他可以选择一个他已知的法术铭刻在他的身上，获得法术专精特性的好处。活圣经可以在升级的时候用任何已知的法术来取代这个法术。在 4 级时，作为加成专长，他获得高等法术专注。在第 6 级，活圣经是他信仰的魔法堡垒，获得 13 点与生俱来的、可叠加的法术抗力。在第 10、15 和 20 级，活圣经发现了增加他的施法力量的新方法，选择了获取来自法师职业额外专长可选择的专长。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Living Scripture
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 活圣经

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A Temple Champion does not have the ability to cast spells, instead being granted access to both the Clerical Domains and the Warpriest Blessings of her deitiy to defend her faith and it's faithful. At level 1 she must select both two Domains and a Blessing, gaining access to another Blessing at level 7.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣殿冠军没有施法的能力，而是被赋予了访问牧师领域和她的神灵的战争祭司祝福来捍卫她的信仰和它的忠诚的力量。在 1 级时，她必须同时选择两个领域和一个祝福，在 7 级时获得另一个祝福。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Domain Champion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 冠军领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The second Domain granted by Domain Champion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 冠军领域赋予的第二领域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Champions Second Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 冠军第二领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic companions bear a faint trace of dragon blood that grants them special abilities.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙化伙伴有着微弱的龙族血统带来的印迹，这也给它们带来了别样能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙化

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake gains two natural claw attacks that deal 1d2 damage from a tiny drake, but increase damage dice size each time the drake grows
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽获得两次天生爪击攻击，体型时造成 1d2 伤害，但每次龙兽成长都会提升伤害骰子

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Body
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙体

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake gains two natural Wing attacks that increase damage dice size each time the drake grows, it also gains the Multiattack Feat
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙获得两次翼击，每次龙成长都会提升伤害骰，它还会获得多重攻击专长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, a draconic companion gains a breath weapon, usable once per day, that deals 1d6 points of damage per Hit Dice of the energy type matching its draconic resistance in either a 30-foot cone or a 60-foot line (chosen when the draconic companion gains this ability). At 15th level, it can use the breath weapon three times per day, but it must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. Targets of this breath weapon can attempt a Reflex save (DC = 10 + half the draconic companion’s Hit Dice + the draconic companion’s Constitution modifier) for half damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9级起，龙化伙伴获得1天1次的喷吐武器攻击，造成每HD 1d6点的它所选的能量类型的伤害，范围为30尺扇形或60尺线型(在它获得该能力时选择)。15级时,它能使用喷吐武器攻击的次数上升至每天3次，但两次喷吐武器攻击间必须间隔1d4轮。被喷吐武器攻击的目标可以通过一个DC = （10 + 1/2HD + 体质调整值）的反射检定使得伤害减半。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Breath Weapon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 喷吐武器

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Breath Extra Use
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 喷吐额外使用次数

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, a draconic companion gains a breath weapon, usable once per day, that deals 1d6 points of damage per Hit Dice of the energy type matching its draconic resistance in either a 30-foot cone or a 60-foot line (chosen when the draconic companion gains this ability). At 15th level, it can use the breath weapon three times per day, but it must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. Targets of this breath weapon can attempt a Reflex save (DC = 10 + half the draconic companion’s Hit Dice + the draconic companion’s Constitution modifier) for half damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9级起，龙化伙伴获得1天1次的喷吐武器攻击，造成每HD 1d6点的它所选的能量类型的伤害，范围为30尺扇形或60尺线型(在它获得该能力时选择)。15级时,它能使用喷吐武器攻击的次数上升至每天3次，但两次喷吐武器攻击间必须间隔1d4轮。被喷吐武器攻击的目标可以通过一个DC = （10 + 1/2HD + 体质调整值）的反射检定使得伤害减半。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 喷吐武器 - 酸蚀锥型

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Breath Weapon - Fire Line
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 喷吐武器 - 火焰线型

LocalizedStrings.enGB: In accordance with Draconic Lore, at the dawn of time there flowed two waters, fresh and salt, which became Apsu and Tiamat, parents of the first gods. However, their eldest son Dahak came to Hell to rampage, then killed his siblings, whose shattered remains fell into the Material Plane and became the first metallic dragons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 根据龙的传说，在时间的黎明，有两种水流过，淡水和咸水，它们化为了阿普苏和提亚马特，他们是第一任神的父母。然而，他们的长子达哈克来到地狱横冲直撞，然后杀死了他的兄弟姐妹，他们的残骸落入了主物质位面，成为了第一条金属龙。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Deities
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙神

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Some druids believe that dragons are the ultimate expression of nature, combining elemental fury with majestic beauty. These druids consort with dragons and eventually transform into draconic forms.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一些德鲁伊相信龙是自然的终极表现，结合了元素之怒和雄伟的美感。这些德鲁伊与龙交流并最终转变为龙形。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Druid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙之德鲁伊

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The arcanist can expend 3 points from their arcane reservoir to remove the cooldown on a drakes breath attack weapon. All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以从他们的奥法池中消耗 3 点来移除龙息武器的冷却时间。所有的龙类专研只对盟友的龙兽生效，并且一旦一只龙兽被强化，它在 1 分钟内无法接受另一种强化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Exploit - Breath
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类专研——吐息

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The arcanist can expend 3 points from their arcane reservoir to remove the cooldown on a drakes breath attack weapon. All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以从他们的奥法池中消耗 3 点来移除龙息武器的冷却时间。所有的龙类专研只对盟友的龙兽生效，并且一旦一只龙兽被强化，它在 1 分钟内无法接受另一种强化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Targeted by draconic exploits within 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以 1 分钟内使用的龙类专研为目标。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Exploit Cooldown
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类专研冷却

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The arcanist can expend 3 points from their arcane reservoir to grant a drake 2d6 energy damage on all melee attacks, the energy type matches the subtype of the drake affected, this effect lasts for rounds equal to half your arcanist level. All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以从他们的奥法池中消耗 3 点，在所有近战攻击中给予龙兽 2d6 能量伤害，能量类型与受影响的龙兽亚种相关，此效果持续轮数等于你的奥能师等级的一半。所有的龙类专研只对盟友的龙兽生效，并且一旦一只龙兽被强化，它在 1 分钟内无法接受另一种强化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 1 round/2 levels
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1轮/2级

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Exploit - Elemental Melee
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类专研——元素爪牙

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The arcanist can expend 3 points from their arcane reservoir to grant a drake 2d6 electric damage on all melee attacks, this effect lasts for rounds equal to half your arcanist level. All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以从他们的奥法池中消耗 3 点，在所有近战攻击中给予一只龙兽 2d6 电击伤害，此效果持续的轮数等于你的奥术师等级的一半。所有的龙类专研只对盟友的龙兽生效，并且一旦一只龙兽被强化，它在 1 分钟内无法接受另一种强化。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类专研——火焰爪牙

All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以从他们的奥法池中消耗 3 点，在所有近战攻击中给予一只龙兽 2d6 负能量伤害，此效果持续的轮数等于你的奥术师等级的一半。所有的龙类专研只对盟友的龙兽生效，并且一旦一只龙兽被强化，它在 1 分钟内无法接受另一种强化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Exploit - Negative Energy Melee
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类专研 - 负能量爪牙

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The arcanist can expend 3 points from their arcane reservoir to cure 10 hit points of damage per level of draconic scholar It immediately ends any and all of the following adverse conditions affecting the target: blinded, confused, dazed, dazzled, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, nauseated, poisoned, sickened, and stunned. All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以从他们的奥法池中消耗 3 点来治疗每龙之学者等级 10 点生命值，它立即结束影响目标所有以下不良状态：目盲、困惑、眩晕、目眩、患病、疲劳、力竭，反胃，中毒，恶心和震慑。所有龙类专研都只能针对盟友的龙兽，并且一旦一只龙兽被强化，它在 1 分钟内无法接受另一种强化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Exploit - Heal
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类专研——治疗

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The arcanist can expend 3 points from their arcane reservoir to cure 10 hit points of damage per level of draconic scholar It immediately ends any and all of the following adverse conditions affecting the target: blinded, confused, dazed, dazzled, diseased, exhausted, fatigued, nauseated, poisoned, sickened, and stunned. All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥能师可以从他们的奥法池中消耗 3 点来治疗每龙之学者等级 10 点生命值，它立即结束影响目标所有以下不良状态：目盲、困惑、眩晕、目眩、患病、疲劳、力竭，反胃，中毒，恶心和震慑。所有龙类专研都只能针对盟友的龙兽，并且一旦一只龙兽被强化，它在 1 分钟内无法接受另一种强化。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift actions an arcanist can expend 3 points from their arcane reservoir to grant a drake a +6 bonus in all mental stats and a -2 penalty to all physical stats, this effect lasts for rounds equal to half your arcanist level. All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个迅捷动作，奥能师可以从他们的奥法池中消耗 3 点，使龙兽在所有精神属性上获得 +6 加值，所有物理属性进行 -2 减值，此效果持续轮数等于你的奥能师等级的一半。所有的龙类专研只对盟友的龙兽生效，并且一旦一只龙兽被强化，它在 1 分钟内无法接受另一种强化。

All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift actions an arcanist can expend 3 points from their arcane reservoir to grant a drake a +6 bonus in all physical stats and a -2 penalty to all mental stats, this effect lasts for rounds equal to half your arcanist level. All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个迅捷动作，奥能师可以从他们的奥法池中消耗 3 点，使龙兽在所有身体属性上获得 +6 加值，所有精神属性进行 -2 减值，此效果持续轮数等于你的奥能师等级的一半。所有的龙类专研只对盟友的龙兽生效，并且一旦一只龙兽被强化，它在 1 分钟内无法接受另一种强化。
