All draconic exploits can only target ally drakes and once a drake is targeted by a exploit it cannot benefit from another for 1 minute.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Resistance - Earth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类抗力 - 大地

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Resistance - Cold
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类抗力 - 寒冷

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Resistance - Air
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类抗力 - 空气

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Resistance - Fire
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类抗力 - 火焰

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, choose acid, cold, electricity, or fire, based on the draconic companion’s draconic ancestor. The draconic companion gains resistance 5 against the chosen energy type, as well as a +2 racial bonus on saves against paralysis and sleep.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3级起，根据龙化伙伴的龙类先祖的类型，选择强酸、寒冷、电击或火焰，龙类伙伴在该种类型的能量上获得5点抗力。同时龙化伙伴也在对抗麻痹和睡眠效果的豁免检定上获得+2种族加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Resistance
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类抗力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The unique spellcasting style of dragons is the subject of many scholars. Some arcanists see the combination of natural and learned spellcasting as similar enough to their own, and decide to pair with a draconic charge to further their knowledge of the arcane.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙的独特施法风格是许多学者研究的主题。一些奥能师认为自发施法和记忆施法的组合与他们自己的足够相似，并决定与龙类合作来加深他们对奥术的理解。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Scholar
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙之学者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shaman often have strong ties to dragon gods and imperial dragons who act as mentors. Some of these shamans draw their powers from the might of dragons, rather than from spirits. These shamans each gain a powerful drake as an ally and view caring for that drake as a sacred duty.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 萨满通常与充当导师的龙神和帝龙有着密切的联系。其中一些萨满从龙的力量中获取力量，而不是从精魂中汲取力量。这些萨满每人都获得了一只强大的龙兽作为伙伴，并将照顾那只龙兽视为一项神圣的职责。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Shaman
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙之萨满

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A draconic companion has better vision than normal for it's kind and gains a +2 to perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类伙伴获得比常规类型更好的视野并获得+2察觉检定。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Sight
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类视觉

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The drake gains a Charisma bonus equal to its level minus 5, along with a limited spellbook as its draconic bloodline awakens. 
Spells granted this way are spontaneously cast and scale using Charisma. 
Spells granted are dependent on which type of dragon the drake is descended from.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 随着龙的血统觉醒，龙获得等于其等级-5 的魅力加值，以及有限的法术书。以这种方式授予的法术属于自发施法并使用魅力作为主施法属性。授予的法术取决于龙兽是哪种龙类的后裔。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Soul
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙魂

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This gaze attack can target a single creature within meduim range. The target must make a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier). Those who fail take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage + 1 point for every two cleric levels you possess and are fascinated until the beginning of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. This is a mind-affecting effect.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种凝视攻击可以针对中等距离内的单个生物。目标必须进行意志豁免（DC = 10 + 1/2 你的牧师等级 + 你的感知调整值）。那些失败的人会受到 1d6 点非致命伤害 + 1点/两个牧师等级，并且会被迷魂直到你的下一回合开始。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。这是一种影响心灵的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are a true lord of reptiles, and your gaze can drive weak creatures into unconsciousness. 
Venomous Stare: This gaze attack can target a single creature within meduim range. The target must make a Will save (DC = 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier). Those who fail take 1d6 points of nonlethal damage + 1 point for every two cleric levels you possess and are fascinated until the beginning of your next turn. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. This is a mind-affecting effect. 
Dragonbreath: At 4th level, you may use a breath weapon once per day as a standard action. When you gain this ability, choose acid, cold, fire, or electricity—this determines what kind of damage your breath weapon deals. Your breath weapon fills a 15-foot cone, and deals 3d6 points of damage—this damage increases by 1d6 points at every even-numbered level you gain beyond 4th level. A creature hit by your dragonbreath attack can attempt a Reflex save (DC 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier) to take half damage. At 9th level, you can use this ability two times per day, and at 14th level you can use it three times per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你是爬虫类的真神，只凭一撇便可令弱小的生物昏厥。
剧毒瞪视：可以用一个标准动作以30尺范围内的单一生物为目标发起一次的凝视攻击。目标必须通过一次意志豁免（DC=10+ 1/2牧师等级+感知调整值”，豁免失败则受到1d6点非致命伤害和“1/2牧师等级”点伤害并且被迷魂直到你下回合开始。每日你可使用本能力的次数为“3+感知调整值”。这是一个影响心灵效果。
龙息：每天一次以一个标准动作你可以使用喷吐武器。当你获得该能力时选择一种能量——酸，冷，火，电来决定你吐息的伤害类型。一旦决定无法改变。你的喷吐武器是15尺的锥状，造成3d6伤害。该伤害在你4级之后的每个偶数等级增加1d6。被吐息命中的目标可以通过反射豁免减半伤害（DC =10+牧师等级一半+体质加值）。该能力在9级一天两次，14级一天三次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, you may use a acid breath weapon once per day as a standard action. Your breath weapon fills a 15-foot cone, and deals 3d6 points of acid damage—this damage increases by 1d6 points at every even-numbered level you gain beyond 4th level. A creature hit by your dragonbreath attack can attempt a Reflex save (DC 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier) to take half damage. At 9th level, you can use this ability two times per day, and at 14th level you can use it three times per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，每天一次以一个标准动作你可以使用酸性喷吐武器。你的喷吐武器是15尺的锥状，造成3d6点酸蚀伤害。该伤害在你4级之后的每个偶数等级增加1d6。被吐息命中的目标可以通过反射豁免减半伤害（DC =10+牧师等级一半+体质加值）。该能力在9级一天两次，14级一天三次。

Dragonbreath: At 4th level, you may use a breath weapon once per day as a standard action. When you gain this ability, choose acid, cold, fire, or electricity—this determines what kind of damage your breath weapon deals. Your breath weapon fills a 15-foot cone, and deals 3d6 points of damage—this damage increases by 1d6 points at every even-numbered level you gain beyond 4th level. A creature hit by your dragonbreath attack can attempt a Reflex save (DC 10 + 1/2 your cleric level + your Wisdom modifier) to take half damage. At 9th level, you can use this ability two times per day, and at 14th level you can use it three times per day.
Domain Spells: magic fang, pernicious poison, greater magic fang, dragon breath, animal growth, form of the dragon, creeping doom, animal shapes, shapechange.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你是爬虫类的真神，只凭一撇便可令弱小的生物昏厥。
剧毒瞪视：可以用一个标准动作以30尺范围内的单一生物为目标发起一次的凝视攻击。目标必须通过一次意志豁免（DC=10+ 1/2牧师等级+感知调整值”，豁免失败则受到1d6点非致命伤害和“1/2牧师等级”点伤害并且被迷魂直到你下回合开始。每日你可使用本能力的次数为“3+感知调整值”。这是一个影响心灵效果。
龙息：每天一次以一个标准动作你可以使用喷吐武器。当你获得该能力时选择一种能量——酸，冷，火，电来决定你吐息的伤害类型。一旦决定无法改变。你的喷吐武器是15尺的锥状，造成3d6伤害。该伤害在你4级之后的每个偶数等级增加1d6。被吐息命中的目标可以通过反射豁免减半伤害（DC =10+牧师等级一半+体质加值）。该能力在9级一天两次，14级一天三次。
领域法术：魔牙，致命毒素，高等魔牙，龙息术，动物异变，龙形，漫天虫蚀，动物形态，变化形体。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A draconic druid studies dragons and their history. She gains a + 2 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Knowledge (Arcana) checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙之德鲁伊研究龙及其历史。她在知识（世界）和知识（神秘）检定上获得+2加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Sense
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙族感知

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake companions speed increases as it becomes used to moving and reacting in combat, movement speed increases by an additional 15 feet.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽伙伴的速度随着它习惯于在战斗中移动和反应而增加，移动速度额外增加 15 英尺。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽敏捷

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽血统 蓝

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽血统 黄铜

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Breath Weapon - Ability is not ready yet
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 喷吐武器——冷却中

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This breath weapon deals 4d6 points of acid damage in a 15-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your drake companion level + your Constitution modifier. After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge. Until upgraded you can use this twice a day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 15 英尺锥形范围内造成 4d6 点酸蚀伤害。那些处于吐息覆盖区域的人通过一次成功的反射豁免，使伤害减半。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的龙兽伙伴等级 + 你的体质调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮才能恢复。在升级之前，您可以每天使用两次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Acid Breath
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽酸蚀吐息

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Greater Drake Acid Breath
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 高等龙兽酸蚀吐息

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This breath weapon deals 8d6 points of acid damage in a 30-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your drake companion level + your Constitution modifier. After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge. Until upgraded you can use this 5 times a day. 
Unlocking this allows you to use your lesser breath weapon without spending any resources, however you must wait 1d4 rounds to recharge.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 30 英尺锥形范围内造成 8d6 点酸蚀伤害。那些处于吐息覆盖区域的人通过一次成功的反射豁免，使伤害减半。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的龙兽伙伴等级 + 你的体质调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮才能恢复。在升级之前，您可以每天使用 5 次。解锁它可以让你在不消耗任何资源的情况下使用你的次级喷吐武器，但是你必须等待 1d4 轮才能充能。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This breath weapon deals 1d6 points of acid damage per drake companion level in a 50-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your drake companion level + your Constitution modifier. After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge. You can use this 5 times a day. 
Unlocking this allows you to use your greater breath weapon without spending any resources, however you must wait 1d4 rounds to recharge. 
Unlike non-mythic breath attacks, this does not damage allies.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 50 英尺锥形范围内造成每龙兽伙伴等级 1d6 点酸蚀伤害。那些处于吐息覆盖区域的人通过一次成功的反射豁免，使伤害减半。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的龙兽伙伴等级 + 你的体质调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮才能恢复。您可以每天使用 5 次。解锁它可以让你在不消耗任何资源的情况下使用高等喷吐武器，但是你必须等待 1d4 轮才能充能。与非神话的吐息攻击不同，这不会伤害盟友。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Fire Breath
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽火焰吐息

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This breath weapon deals 4d6 points of fire damage in a 15-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your drake companion level + your Constitution modifier.After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge. Until upgraded you can use this twice a day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 15 英尺锥形范围内造成 4d6 点火焰伤害。那些处于吐息覆盖区域的人通过一次成功的反射豁免，使伤害减半。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的龙兽伙伴等级 + 你的体质调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮才能恢复。在升级之前，您可以每天使用两次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This breath weapon deals 8d6 points of fire damage in a 30-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your drake companion level + your Constitution modifier.After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge. Until upgraded you can use this 5 times a day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 30 英尺锥形范围内造成 8d6 点火焰伤害。那些处于吐息覆盖区域的人通过一次成功的反射豁免，使伤害减半。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的龙兽伙伴等级 + 你的体质调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮才能恢复。在升级之前，您可以每天使用 5 次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Greater Drake Fire Breath
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 高等龙兽火焰吐息

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This breath weapon deals 8d6 points of fire damage in a 30-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your drake companion level + your Constitution modifier.After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge. Until upgraded you can use this 5 times a day. 
Unlocking this allows you to use your lesser breath weapon without spending any resources, however you must wait 1d4 rounds to recharge.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 30 英尺锥形范围内造成 8d6 点火焰伤害。那些处于吐息覆盖区域的人通过一次成功的反射豁免，使伤害减半。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的龙兽伙伴等级 + 你的体质调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮才能恢复。在升级之前，您可以每天使用 5 次。解锁它可以让你在不消耗任何资源的情况下使用你的次级喷吐武器，但是你必须等待 1d4 轮才能充能。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This breath weapon deals 1d6 points of fire damage per drake companion level in a 50-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your drake companion level + your Constitution modifier.After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge. You can use this 5 times a day. 
Unlocking this allows you to use your greater breath weapon without spending any resources, however you must wait 1d4 rounds to recharge. 
Unlike non-mythic breath attacks, this does not damage allies.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 50 英尺锥形范围内造成每龙兽伙伴等级 1d6 点火焰伤害。那些处于吐息覆盖区域的人通过一次成功的反射豁免，使伤害减半。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的龙兽伙伴等级 + 你的体质调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮才能恢复。您可以每天使用 5 次。解锁它可以让你在不消耗任何资源的情况下使用高等喷吐武器，但是你必须等待 1d4 轮才能充能。与非神话般的吐息攻击不同，这不会伤害盟友。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mythic Drake Fire Breath
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神话龙兽火焰吐息

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This breath weapon deals 1d6 points of fire damage per drake companion level in a 50-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your drake companion level + your Constitution modifier.After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge. You can use this 5 times a day. 
Unlocking this allows you to use your greater breath weapon without spending any resources, however you must wait 1d4 rounds to recharge. 
Unlike non-mythic breath attacks, this does not damage allies.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 50 英尺锥形范围内造成每龙兽伙伴等级 1d6 点火焰伤害。那些处于吐息覆盖区域的人通过一次成功的反射豁免，使伤害减半。该豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的龙兽伙伴等级 + 你的体质调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮才能恢复。您可以每天使用 5 次。解锁它可以让你在不消耗任何资源的情况下使用高等喷吐武器，但是你必须等待 1d4 轮才能充能。与非神话的吐息攻击不同，这不会伤害盟友。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This breath weapon deals 4d6 points of  negative damage in a 15-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your drake companion level + your Constitution modifier. After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge. Until upgraded you can use this twice a day.
Targets with an affinity to negative energy (such as undead) are not healed by this ability and are treated as if the ability did not hit them.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 15 英尺的锥形范围内造成 4d6 点负能量伤害。那些处于吐息覆盖区域的人通过一次成功的反射豁免，使伤害减半。此豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的龙兽伙伴等级 + 你的体质调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮来充能。在升级之前，您可以每天使用两次。具有负能量亲和力的目标（例如不死生物）不会被该能力治疗，并且被视为该能力没有击中他们。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drakes are brutish lesser kindred of true dragons. Though they aren’t particularly intelligent, drakes’ significantly faster breeding allows their kind to survive in harsh environments. While a young drake is weaker than a standard animal companion, as they grow they will start to resemble their draconic cousins more and more until they rival them in power.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽是真龙的野蛮小亲戚。虽然它们并不是特别聪明，但龙兽的快速繁衍使它们能够在恶劣的环境中生存。虽然幼年龙兽比标准的动物同伴弱，但随着它们的成长，它们会越来越像它们的真龙表亲，直到它们在力量上与它们相仿。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Companion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽伙伴

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Drakes are brutish lesser kindred of true dragons. Though they aren’t particularly intelligent, drakes’ significantly faster breeding allows their kind to survive in harsh environments. While a young drake is weaker than a standard animal companion, as they grow they will start to resemble their draconic cousins more and more until they rival them in power. 
 This drake is descended from chromatic black dragons, giving it the earth subtype and granting it potential to wield acid breath attacks
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽是真龙的野蛮小亲戚。虽然它们并不是特别聪明，但龙兽的快速繁衍使它们能够在恶劣的环境中生存。虽然幼年龙兽比标准的动物同伴弱，但随着它们的成长，它们会越来越像它们的真龙表亲，直到它们在力量上与它们相仿。这只龙是色彩龙的黑龙的后裔，赋予它土系亚种，并赋予它使用酸蚀龙息的能力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Companion - Black
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽伙伴——黑龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Drakes are brutish lesser kindred of true dragons. Though they aren’t particularly intelligent, drakes’ significantly faster breeding allows their kind to survive in harsh environments. While a young drake is weaker than a standard animal companion, as they grow they will start to resemble their draconic cousins more and more until they rival them in power. 
 This drake is descended from chromatic blue dragons, giving it the air subtype and granting it potential to wield electric breath attacks

 This drake is descended from metallic silver dragons, giving it the cold subtype and granting it potential to wield ice breath attacks
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽是真龙的野蛮小亲戚。虽然它们并不是特别聪明，但龙兽的快速繁衍使它们能够在恶劣的环境中生存。虽然幼年龙兽比标准的动物同伴弱，但随着它们的成长，它们会越来越像它们的真龙表亲，直到它们在力量上与它们相仿。这条龙是金属龙的银龙的后裔，赋予它寒系亚种，并赋予它使用寒冷龙息的能力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Companion - Silver
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽伙伴——银龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Drakes are brutish lesser kindred of true dragons. Though they aren’t particularly intelligent, drakes’ significantly faster breeding allows their kind to survive in harsh environments. While a young drake is weaker than a standard animal companion, as they grow they will start to resemble their draconic cousins more and more until they rival them in power. 
 This drake is descended from umbral dragons from the plain of shadows, giving it the outsider subtype and granting it potential to wield negative energy breath attacks.
Though a living creature, a umbral drake reacts to positive and negative energy as if they were undead — positive energy harms them, while negative energy heals them.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽是真龙的野蛮小亲戚。虽然它们并不是特别聪明，但龙兽的快速繁衍使它们能够在恶劣的环境中生存。虽然幼年龙兽比标准的动物同伴弱，但随着它们的成长，它们会越来越像它们的真龙表亲，直到它们在力量上与它们相仿。这只龙兽是来自阴影平原的影龙的后裔，赋予它异界亚种，并赋予它使用负能量龙息的能力。尽管是活物，影龙兽对正能量和负能量的反应就好像它们是不死生物一样——正能量会伤害它们，而负能量会治愈它们。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Companion - Umbral
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽伙伴——影龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Drakes are brutish lesser kindred of true dragons. Though they aren’t particularly intelligent, drakes’ significantly faster breeding allows their kind to survive in harsh environments. While a young drake is weaker than a standard animal companion, as they grow they will start to resemble their draconic cousins more and more until they rival them in power. 
 This drake is descended from chromatic white dragons, giving it the cold subtype and granting it potential to wield ice breath attacks
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽是真龙的野蛮小亲戚。虽然它们并不是特别聪明，但龙兽的快速繁衍使它们能够在恶劣的环境中生存。虽然幼年龙兽比标准的动物同伴弱，但随着它们的成长，它们会越来越像它们的真龙表亲，直到它们在力量上与它们相仿。这只龙是色彩龙的白龙的后裔，赋予它寒系亚种，并赋予它使用寒冷龙息的能力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Companion - White
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽伙伴——白龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A draconic druid gains a drake companion instead of an animal companion. This ability replaces nature bond, wild empathy, woodland stride, venom immunity, a thousand faces, and timeless body.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙类德鲁伊获得一个龙类伙伴而不是动物伙伴。这种能力取代了自然纽带、野性认同、穿林步、毒素免疫、千面万相和不老身躯。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Feature not available
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 功能不可用

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake’s confidence on the battlefield let it move at full speed without worry of stumbling or harming allies, movement speed increases by an additional 15 feet.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽在战场上的自信让它全速移动而不必担心绊倒或伤害盟友，移动速度额外增加 15 英尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Greater Drake Agility
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 高等龙兽灵巧

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drakes have all the immunities of their older draconic cousins, along with the ability to fly over difficult terrain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽拥有它们古老的龙类表亲的所有免疫力，以及飞越困难地形的能力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Immunities
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽免疫

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake’s Intelligence score increases by 4.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽的智力值增加 4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Intellect
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽智力

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The drake’s Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores each increase by 2. A drake must have intellect to select keen mind.
Unlocks the Spellcasting component of the Mythic Drake Ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
龙的智力、感知和魅力值各增加2点。龙必须有智力才能选择敏锐头脑。
解锁 神话龙兽 技能的施法组件。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Keen Mind
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽敏锐头脑

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake’s natural armor bonus to its AC increases by 2 when the charge reaches 3rd level and every 3 levels thereafter.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 等级达到 3 级时，龙兽的 AC 天生防御加值增加2，之后每3级增加一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Natural Armor
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽天生护甲

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake gains two natural claw attacks that deal 1d2 damage from a tiny drake, but increase damage dice size each time the drake grows
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽获得两次天生爪击攻击，小型龙兽造成 1d2 伤害，但每次龙兽成长都会提升伤害骰

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draken Claws
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙爪

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The drake gains two natural claw attacks that deal 1d2 damage from a tiny drake, but increase damage dice size each time the drake grows
Unlocks the extra Wing attacks component of the Mythic Drake Ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽获得两次爪抓攻击，小型龙兽造成 1d2 伤害，但每次龙兽成长时都会提升伤害骰。解锁 神话龙兽 技能中额外翼击组件。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The drake gains elemental resistances based on its subtype, along with minor resistance to elemental damage from non-opposing elements. 
Fire subtype - Fire resistance 25, Eletricity resistance 5, Acid resistance 5.
Cold subtype - Cold resistance 25, Eletricity resistance 5, Acid resistance 5.
Air subtype - Eletricity resistance 25, Fire resistance 5, Cold resistance 5.
Acid subtype - Acid resistance 25, Fire resistance 5, Cold resistance 5.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
龙兽会根据其亚种获得元素抗性，以及对非对立元素造成的元素伤害的轻微抗性。
火系亚种——耐火 25，耐电 5，耐酸 5。 
寒系亚种——耐寒 25， 耐电 5， 耐酸 5。 
气系亚种——耐电 25， 耐火 5， 耐寒 5。 
土系亚种——耐酸25，耐火5，耐寒5。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draken Scales
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙鳞

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake companions can select from the following drake powers. First at 3rd level and then every 4th level after.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽伙伴可以从以下龙兽之力中进行选择。首次在第 3 级，之后每 4 级选择一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Powers Selection
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽之力选择

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake matures further and advances a size category when the charge reaches 5th level and every 4 levels thereafter. Each time this occurs, the drake’s natural armor bonus to its AC increases by 2, its natural attacks increase in damage based on the new size category, and it gains the following ability scores adjustments: Str +4, Dex –2, Con +2. When the drake reaches Medium size, its speed increases from 20 feet to 30 feet
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当等级达到第 5 级以及之后每 4 级时，龙兽会进一步成熟并提升一个体型等级。每次发生这种情况时，龙兽的 AC 天生防御加值会增加 2，它的天生攻击伤害骰会基于新的体型计算，并且它会获得以下属性值调整：力量 +4，敏捷 –2，体质 +2 .当龙兽达到中型时，它的速度从 20 英尺增加到 30 英尺

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Huge Drake
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巨型龙兽

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The drake matures further and advances a size category when the charge reaches 5th level and every 4 levels thereafter. Each time this occurs, the drake’s natural armor bonus to its AC increases by 2, its natural attacks increase in damage based on the new size category, and it gains the following ability scores adjustments: Str +4, Dex –2, Con +2. When the drake reaches Medium size, its speed increases from 20 feet to 30 feet
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当等级达到第 5 级以及之后每 4 级时，龙兽会进一步成熟并提升一个体型等级。每次发生这种情况时，龙兽的 AC 天生防御加值会增加 2，它的天生攻击伤害骰会基于新的体型计算，并且它会获得以下属性值调整：力量 +4，敏捷 –2，体质 +2 .当龙兽达到中型时，它的速度从 20 英尺增加到 30 英尺

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽体型——大型

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tiny Drake
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 超小型龙兽

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Subtype - Air
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽亚种——空气

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Subtype - Cold
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽亚种——寒冷

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Subtype - Earth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽亚种——大地

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Subtype - Fire
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽亚种——火焰

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Subtype - Umbral
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽亚种 - 暗影

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drakes have both natraly clear eye sight, and near perfect night vision. This gives drakes a +4 to all Perception rolls
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽斯拥有自然清晰的视力和近乎完美的夜视能力。这使龙兽在所有感知检定上获得+4加值

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Vision
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽视觉

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Some rangers specialize in dealing with rambunctious younger drakes, protecting them and teaching them to tolerate, and even trust, humanoid creatures. These drake wardens follow and pass along secret techniques for raising drakes effectively, and thanks to their methods, their drakes are both fiercely loyal and extremely useful for scouting and stealth missions.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一些游侠专门捕捉粗暴的幼年龙兽，保护它们并训练它们容忍甚至信任类人生物。这些龙兽守望者遵循并传授有效饲养龙兽的秘密技术，并且通过他们的方法，他们的龙兽非常忠诚，这对于侦察和隐身任务都非常有用。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Warden
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽守望者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, a drake warden gains a drake companion instead of an animal companion, but his drake’s level is equal to his ranger level – 3.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 4 级时，龙兽守望者获得龙兽伙伴而不是动物伙伴，但他的龙兽等级等于游侠等级——3。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Drake Wardens Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙兽守望者羁绊

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, an Oathbreaker can enter a dreadfully calm rage against those who have harmed her or her allies. The Oathbreaker gains the Defensive Stance ability as per the Stalwart Defender.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，复仇暴徒对那些伤害她或她的盟友的人保持怒气的同时依然能够游刃有余的进行防御。复仇暴徒获得与坚定防御者一样的防御姿态能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dreadful Calm
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 沉稳怒气

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dread Knight Animal Companion Progression
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士动物伙伴进度

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Channeling negative energy causes a burst that damages every creature in a 30-foot radius centered on the Dread Knight. The amount of damage inflicted is equal to 1d6 points of damage plus 1d6 points of damage for every two Dread Knight levels beyond 1st (2d6 at 3rd, 3d6 at 5th, and so on). Creatures that take damage from channeled energy receive a Will save to halve the damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 the Dread Knight's level + the Dread Knight's Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 引导负能量致其爆发，对以恐惧骑士为中心的30英尺半径内的所有生物造成伤害。造成的伤害量等于1d6点伤害加上1级后每两个恐惧骑士等级1d6点伤害（3级2d6，5级3d6，依此类推）。受到引导能量伤害的生物可以通过意志豁免将伤害减半。该豁免的DC等于10+1/2恐惧骑士的等级+恐惧骑士的魅力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Channel Negative Energy
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 引导负能量

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When a Dread Knight reaches 4th level, he gains the supernatural ability to channel negative energy like a cleric. Using this ability consumes two uses of his touch of corruption ability. A Dread Knight uses his level as his effective cleric level when channeling negative energy. This is a Charisma-based ability..
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当恐惧骑士达到 4 级时，他获得了像牧师一样引导负能量的超自然能力。使用这个能力会消耗他的亵渎之炎的两次使用次数。恐惧骑士在引导负能量时使用他的等级作为他的有效牧师等级。这是一个基于魅力的能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Channeling negative energy causes a burst that heals every undead creature in a 30-foot radius centered on the Dread Knight. The amount of damage healed is equal to 1d6 points of damage plus 1d6 points of damage for every two Dread Knight levels beyond 1st (2d6 at 3rd, 3d6 at 5th, and so on).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 引导负能量致其爆发，治疗以恐惧骑士为中心的 30 英尺半径内的所有不死生物。治疗量等于 1d6 点伤害加上 1 级后每两个恐惧骑士等级 1d6 点伤害（3 级时 2d6，5 级时 3d6，依此类推）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Channel Negative Energy - Heal Undead
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 引导负能量 - 治愈不死生物

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Although it is a rare occurrence, paladins do sometimes stray from the path of righteousness. Most of these wayward holy warriors seek out redemption and forgiveness for their misdeeds, regaining their powers through piety, charity, and powerful magic. Yet there are others, the dark and disturbed few, who turn actively to evil, courting the dark powers they once railed against in order to take vengeance on their former brothers. It’s said that those who climb the farthest have the farthest to fall, and tyrants are living proof of this fact, their pride and hatred blinding them to the glory of their forsaken patrons. 
Dread Knights become the antithesis of their former selves. They make pacts with fiends, take the lives of the innocent, and put nothing ahead of their personal power and wealth. Champions of evil, they often lead armies of evil creatures and work with other villains to bring ruin to the holy and tyranny to the weak. Not surprisingly, paladins stop at nothing to put an end to such nefarious antiheroes.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
虽然鲜少发生，但圣武士有时确实会偏离正道。这些任性的圣武士中的大多数都为他们的罪行寻求救赎和宽恕，通过虔诚、慈善和强大的魔法重新获得力量。然而，还有其他一些沉溺于黑暗的人，他们积极投向邪恶，向他们曾经痛恨的黑暗力量索取，以向他们曾经的兄弟复仇。
俗话说走的越远陷得越深，恐惧骑士就是这一事实活生生的例证，骄傲和仇恨蒙蔽了他们的双眼，令他们遗失了曾经信奉神祇的荣耀。恐惧骑士和从前的自己截然相反。他们与恶魔缔结契约，夺取无辜者的生命，将个人权力和财富置于一切之上。他们是邪恶的拥护者，他们通常领导邪恶生物组成的军队，并与其他恶棍合作，为圣洁带来毁灭，为弱者带来暴政。
毫不意外，圣武士将不惜一切代价来终结这些邪恶的反英雄。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The dreadknight is granted a fiendish steed to carry her into battle. This mount functions as a druid’s animal companion, using the dreadknight’s level as her effective druid level. The creature must be one that she is capable of riding and must be suitable as a mount. A Medium dreadknight can select a horse. A Small dreadknight can select a wolf.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士被授予一匹恶魔般的坐骑，将她带入战场。该坐骑相当于德鲁伊的动物伙伴，使用恐惧骑士的等级作为她的有效德鲁伊等级。该生物必须是她能够骑乘的生物，并且必须适合作为坐骑。中型恐惧骑士可以选择马。小型恐惧骑士可以选择狼。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fiendish Servant
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恶魔仆从

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A dreadknight's animal companion gains spell resistance equal to its level +5. It also gains:
1 — 4 HD: resistance 5 to cold and fire.
5 — 10 HD: resistance 10 to cold and fire, DR 5/good
11+ HD: resistance 15 to cold and fire, DR 10/good
Smite Good (Su): Once per day, the fiendish creature may smite a good-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is good, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
恐惧骑士的动物伙伴获得等于其等级 +5 的法术抗力。它还获得：
1——4 HD：对寒冷和火焰的抵抗力 5。 
5 — 10 HD：对寒冷和火焰的抵抗力 10，DR 5/善良 
11+ HD：对寒冷和火焰的抵抗力 15，DR 10/善良
辟善斩（Su）：每天一次，恶魔生物可以惩戒善良阵营生物。以一个迅捷动作，该生物选择视野内的一个目标进行打击。如果这个目标是善良的，那么该生物将其魅力加值（如果有的话）加到攻击检定上，并获得等于其对那个敌人等于自身等级的伤害加值。此效果持续到目标死亡或生物休息为止。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Mount — Fiendish
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎坐骑——恶魔

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dread Knights are proficient with all simple and martial weapons, with all types of armor (heavy, medium, and light), and with shields (except tower shields).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士精通所有简易武器和军用武器，所有类型的盔甲（重型、中型和轻型），以及盾牌（塔盾除外）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dread Knight Proficiences
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士擅长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dread Knights are villains at their most dangerous. They care nothing for the lives of others and actively seek to bring death and destruction to ordered society. They rarely travel with those that they do not subjugate, unless as part of a ruse to bring ruin from within.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士是最危险的恶棍。他们不关心他人的生命，并积极寻求给有序社会带来死亡和破坏。他们很少与那些他们尚未征服的人一起旅行，除非作为从内部带来毁灭的诡计的一部分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Dark Mother   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Birth, Fertility, Tribes   
Domains: Chaos, Community, Evil, Protection   
Subdomains: Defense, Demon, Family, Home   
Favoured Weapon: Scimitar   
Holy Symbol: Two gauntleted fists   
Sacred Animal: Dire wolf   
Dretha reigns over all aspects of orc domestic life. The Dark Mother is not a goddess of love, but of possessiveness. As the goddess of fertility, she watches over female orcs during pregnancy, birthing, and child rearing. She promotes mating, families, and tribes, not because she is a nurturing deity, but because she believes in strength in numbers and fostering strong warriors. Dretha is the patron of crafts, yet all orc gods are war gods, and Dretha is no different. The Dark Mother blesses those who fight jealously to defend their mates, children, lands, and possessions from enemies who would steal or destroy them. Dretha is depicted as a heavily pregnant orc. Sculptures of the Dark Mother emphasize her swollen belly and breasts, while leaving her head and limbs small and lacking in detail. Legends describe Dretha as a sullen goddess who rarely speaks. Yet the stories told by true devotees say her melancholy is a cage that holds a burning rage within. Orcs typically claim Dretha is the mate of the male god their tribe holds in highest esteem. Dretha is the most widely revered of the orc gods, and while tribes may come to blows over which orc god is superior, all acknowledge the Dark Mother. Dretha is primarily worshiped by female orcs, who sacrifice to her to ensure safe childbirth and strong children. But all orcs, regardless of their gender, seek the Dark Mother’s aid in matters of defense or procreation. Tales tell of Dretha’s ancient conflict with Lamashtu, and rarely do her followers also venerate the demonic Mother of Monsters.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：黑暗之母 
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：出生、生育、部落
领域：混乱、联盟、邪恶、保护
子领域：防御、恶魔、家庭、家园
偏好武器：弯刀
圣徽：两个带手套的拳头
圣兽：恐狼
德瑞莎掌管着兽人家庭生活的方方面面。黑暗之母不是爱的女神，而是占有欲的女神。作为生育女神，她在怀孕、分娩和育儿期间照顾女性兽人。她提倡交配、家庭和部落，不是因为她是一个养育之神，而是因为她相信数量的暴力和培养强大战士的需要。
德瑞莎是手工艺品的守护神，但所有的兽人神都是战神，德瑞莎也不例外。黑暗之母祝福那些为了保护他们的伙伴、孩子、土地和财产免受敌人窃取或摧毁他们的嫉妒而战斗的人。
德瑞莎被描绘成一个怀孕严重的兽人。黑暗之母的雕塑强调了她肿胀的腹部和乳房，而她的头部和四肢却很小且缺乏细节。
传说将德瑞莎描述为一个很少说话的闷闷不乐的女神。然而，真正的信徒讲述的故事说，她的忧郁是一个囚笼，里面装着熊熊燃烧的怒火。
兽人通常声称德瑞莎是他们部落最尊敬的男神的配偶。德瑞萨是兽人神中最受尊敬的人，虽然部落可能会因为哪个兽人神祇更优越而发生冲突，但所有人都承认黑暗之母的权威。
德瑞莎主要由女性兽人崇拜，她们为她献祭以确保安全分娩和生育强壮的孩子。但所有兽人，无论其性别如何，都会在防御或生育方面寻求黑暗母亲的帮助。传说讲述了德瑞莎与拉玛什图的古老冲突，她的追随者很少会同时崇拜恶魔之母。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dretha
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 德瑞莎

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Earth: You gain DR 10/bludgeoning and are immune to petrification effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
大地：你获得 DR 10/钝击并且免疫石化效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Earth: You gain DR 10/bludgeoning and are immune to petrification effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。n大地：你获得 DR 10/钝击并且免疫石化效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Earth Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 大地领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Although elves will worship any deity that strikes their fancy, the large majority worship the goddesses Calistria and Desna, and to a lesser extent, Nethys, Shelyn, or even more rarely, the various empyreal lords. They tend to have a less formal relationship with the divine, seeing the gods as general inspiration, and are not tied down with the particulars of dogma. In addition to the worship of the major deities, elves also have a number of minor elven gods who are almost only worshiped by their own kind. These include include Alseta goddess of transitions and the magical elf gates, Findeladlara, the goddess of art and architecture, Ketephys, god of the hunt, and Yuelral the Wise, goddess of crafting and magic.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 尽管精灵会崇拜任何他们喜欢的神祇，但绝大多数人崇拜女神卡莉丝翠和德丝娜，其次是涅希斯、雪琳，甚至更罕见地崇拜各种至高天领主。他们往往与神的关系不太正式，将众神视为泛信仰，不受教条的束缚。除了主要的神祇崇拜之外，精灵也有一些几乎只有自己种族才供奉的次要精灵神明。其中包括奥尔塞塔女神和暮色与传统艺术和建筑之女神芬德烈莱拉、狩猎与月亮之神克忒菲斯和宝石工艺与魔法之女神约拉尔。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Elven Pantheon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 精灵万神殿

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Empyreal Lords, or the Lords of the Empyrean, are unique outsiders who have transcended their original forms and have acquired a small spark of divinity, becoming demigods. They guide mortals on the various paths to righteousness, and the goddess Sarenrae herself is said to have risen from their ranks. Angels, archons, azatas, and powerful agathions known as agathion leaders have all entered the ranks of empyreal lords.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 至高天领主，或称天界领主，是独特的异界生物，他们已经超越了原本的形态，获得了一丝神性，成为了半神。他们引导凡人走上通往正义的各种道路，据说女神莎恩芮本人已从他们的行列中崛起。天使、亚空、爱塔和被称为盖森领袖的强大盖森人都已进入了至高天领主的行列。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Empyreal Lords
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 至高天领主

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the dragon mystery adds Mobility, Persuasion, Perception and Knowledge (Arcana)  to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 具有巨龙秘示域的先知将灵巧、沟通、察觉和知识（世界）添加到她的本职技能列表中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the heavens mystery adds Perception and Knowledge (world)  to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 具有苍天秘示域的先知将感知和知识（世界）添加到她的本职技能列表中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the succor mystery adds Lore (nature) and Stealth to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 具有救助秘示域的先知将学识（自然）和隐匿添加到她的本职技能列表中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A magical field appears around you. This field deflects incoming arrows, rays, and other ranged attacks. Each ranged attack directed at you for which the attacker must make an attack roll has a 20% miss chance (similar to the effects of concealment). Other attacks that simply work at a distance are not affected.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一个神奇的领域出现在你周围。该场偏转来袭的箭头、射线和其他远程攻击。每次针对你的远程攻击都有 20% 的失手几率（类似于隐蔽的效果）。其他只在远处起作用的攻击不受影响。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A magical field appears around you. This field deflects incoming arrows, rays, and other ranged attacks. Each ranged attack directed at you for which the attacker must make an attack roll has a 20% miss chance (similar to the effects of concealment). Other attacks that simply work at a distance are not affected.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 一个神奇的领域出现在你周围。该场偏转来袭的箭头、射线和其他远程攻击。每次针对你的远程攻击都有 20% 的失手几率（类似于隐蔽的效果）。其他只在远处起作用的攻击不受影响。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Entropic Shield
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 熵能护盾

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Heart-Speaker   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Debate, Opinions, Truth   
Domains: Charm, Good, Knowledge, Nobility   
Subdomains: Agathion, Education, Leadership, Memory, Thought   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Lion-shaped lectern   
Sacred Animal: Lion   
At the dawn of creation, so the stories go, the archdevil Geryon filled a pit in the Hellish realm of Stygia with an outpouring of lies. From beneath the weight of these lies rang out a single truth, which flew free of the fifth layer of Hell before ascending to the upper planes. That truth was Eritrice. The muscular Eritrice stands 8 feet tall, and her feminine form is typically covered with a pale brown pelt. Her head is that of a female lion's and her eyes gleam like amethysts. She wears a short leather kilt beneath a rose-colored breastplate. Eritrice's voice is so compelling, it is said, that those who hear her speak forget her remarkable appearance. Eritrice works to spread truth and wisdom throughout the world, but believes that insight gained through spirited debate is more valuable than knowledge gleaned from books. Her agents encourage discussion and respectful disagreement. In regions where lies are spoken aloud but truth remains hidden, Eritrice and her minions help good individuals pass messages. Geryon and his minions are Heart-Speaker's sworn enemies, and the two are known to have had titanic battles in the past. Heart-Speaker makes her home on the broad, sun-soaked plains of Nirvana. Her favorite spot is the Windswept Lea, a green and verdant meadow. When entertaining guests, she stays in a grand pavilion of chestnut wood, whose walls open to the sweet grassland and whose rooms are separated by hanging shantung curtains.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：心语者
阵营：中立善良 
神职：诚实的辩论，观念及真相
领域：魅惑、善良、知识、崇高 
子领域：盖森、教育、领导、记忆、思想
偏好武器：匕首
圣徽：狮子形讲台
圣兽：狮子
心语者艾瑞翠丝司掌诚实的辩论，观念及真相。艾瑞翠丝看重事实与信息，但对她而言，通过讨论得来的真理与智慧比通过书本得来的更有价值。他认为彼此尊敬地观点互异完全没有问题，在讨论时，开诚布公，以包容的心态接纳新的信息，愿意重构新的观点是最为重要的品质。观点的价值在于它们可以帮助一个人理解更多的视角，但艾瑞翠丝提醒他的追随者：观点并非事实，观点可能是错误的，甚至可能是有害的。当谎言通行于某片土地，甚至成为了习俗或法规时，艾瑞翠丝的追随者会组成同志之人的信息网络，将真实散播到所有愿意聆听之人耳中。
心语者的化身看起来像是一个肌肉发达，身高八呎的女性，长着雌狮的头。她身穿玫红色的胸甲，下着短褶裙。当她开口说话时，她的声音如此迷人，充满说服力，以至于那些见到她现身的人很难记得她的其他特征。所有重视真理之人，从辩论者到城镇的传讯人，再到立法者，都是艾瑞翠丝的追随者。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Eritrice
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 艾瑞翠丝

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Evil: You automatically confirm critical hits, and weapons you wield count as evil for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
邪恶：你自动确认重击，并且你使用的武器被视为邪恶武器，用以穿透伤害减免。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Evil: You automatically confirm critical hits, and weapons you wield count as evil for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举圣徽并呼唤你的神灵的名字，你就获得了神性的一个方面。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免的能力使用该法术的 DC。
邪恶：你自动确认重击，并且你使用的武器被视为邪恶武器，用以穿透伤害减免。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Evil Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 邪恶领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Benefit: You can rage for 6 additional rounds per day.\nSpecial: You can gain Extra Rage multiple times. Its effects stack.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
增益:你每天可以多狂暴6轮。
特殊:你可以多次获得额外怒气。它的效果叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Extra Rage (Wolverine)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 额外怒气（狼獾）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, a storm druid is unaffected by all moderate wind and snow effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，风暴德鲁伊不受所有中等风雪效果的影响。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Eyes of the Storm
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风暴之眼

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level, an Oathbreaker gains one of the following as a bonus feat: Great Fortitude, Iron Will, or Lightning Reflexes.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 2 级，复仇暴徒获得以下一项作为奖励专长：强韧、钢铁意志或闪电反射。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Faded Grace
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恩泽已逝

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Warrior's Ring   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Femininity, Martial training, Rings   
Domains: Good, Law, Liberation, Strength   
Subdomains: Archon, Freedom, Resolve, Revolution   
Favoured Weapon: Longsword   
Holy Symbol: Sword held aloft   
Sacred Animal: Cat   
Falayna exemplifies strength of arms and the intersection of combat with the bloom of womanhood, believing the two to be complementary rather than exclusive. Thousands of years ago, it is thought, Falayna represented only beauty and femininity, and was the consort of an empyreal lord who was master of weapons and martial training. Her mate, whose name has been lost to history, fell in combat against the minions of Moloch. Falayna recovered her lover's sword from the teeth of Hell, and from then on she shone as Warrior's Ring. Falayna epitomizes feminine beauty. Though she can take many forms, she often appears as a fair-skinned woman with glossy brown hair and intense blue eyes. Her silk robes complement the silver breastplate beneath, and the empyreal lord carries her razor-edged longsword, Betrothal, with her always. Glittering rings of every imaginable hue bedeck Falayna's fingers; in combat, punishing strikes from her ringed fist complement the swings ofher blessed longsword. Both male and female warriors pay homage to Falayna's skill, though most of her followers are women. Jewelers often seek to craft rings "worthy of Falayna's little finger," and squires in training look to Falayna for guidance. Brides, as well as girls on the threshold of womanhood, ask Falayna for her blessings.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：勇士之戒
阵营：守序善良 
神职：女性气质，战技训练，戒指 
领域：善良、守序、自由、力量 
子领域：亚空、解放、决意、革命
偏好武器：长剑 
圣徽：包裹着丝绸的手高举一柄剑
圣兽：猫
法蕾纳代表了武器的力量以及战斗与女性气质的交集，她相信两者是互补的，而不是互斥的。据称远古时候法蕾纳只司掌美与女性气质，而她的配偶是负责勇武的至高天神使。她的伴侣的名字如今已被载入史册，他在与摩洛克的爪牙的战斗中倒下。法蕾纳从地狱之牙中取回了她爱人的剑，从此她成为了勇士之戒。
法蕾纳是女性美的缩影。尽管她可以采取多种形象，但她经常以皮肤白皙的女人的形象出现，有着光滑的棕色头发和深邃的蓝眼睛。她的丝质长袍与下面的银色胸甲相得益彰，这位至高天领主则随身携带着她的锋利长剑-订婚。 法蕾纳的手指上装饰着每一种可以想象到的颜色的璀璨戒指；在战斗中，她的环拳与她的长剑相得益彰。
男性和女性战士都对法蕾纳的技巧表示敬意，尽管她的大多数追随者都是女性。珠宝商经常寻求制作“配得上法蕾纳的小指头”的戒指，训练中的侍从会向法蕾纳寻求指导。新娘，以及即将成为女人的女孩，都会向法莱娜祈求她的祝福。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Falayna
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 法蕾纳

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can imbue attacks you make this round to be ferocious strikes. If these attacks hit, they deal additional damage equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当进行一次近战攻击时，你可以宣布它成为一次凶猛打击。如果命中，将造成等于牧师等级一半的额外伤害（最少为1），每天“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can imbue attacks you make this round to be ferocious strikes. If these attacks hit, they deal additional damage equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当进行一次近战攻击时，你可以宣布它成为一次凶猛打击。如果命中，将造成等于牧师等级一半的额外伤害（最少为1），每天“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ferocious Strikes
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 凶猛打击

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The will of your deitiy must be delivered with conviction and ferocity — your faith gives you incredible might and fury.
Ferocious Strikes: As a swift action, you can imbue attacks you make this round to be ferocious strikes. If these attacks hit, they deal additional damage equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的神祇的意志必须以信念和凶猛来践行-你的信仰给了你难以置信的力量和愤怒
凶猛打击：当进行一次近战攻击时，你可以宣布它成为一次凶猛打击。如果命中，将造成等于牧师等级一半的额外伤害（最少为1），每天“3+感知修正”次。
神授力量：在8级时，你的运动{g|Encyclopedia:Check}检定{/g}将获得增强加值，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ferocity Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 凶猛子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The will of your deitiy must be delivered with conviction and ferocity — your faith gives you incredible might and fury.
Ferocious Strikes: As a swift action, you can imbue attacks you make this round to be ferocious strikes. If these attacks hit, they deal additional damage equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum +1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.
Domain Spells: enlarge person, bull's strength, magical vestment, mass enlarge person, righteous might, stoneskin, legendary proportions, frightful aspect, transformation.

领域法术：变巨术，牛之蛮力，魔化防具，群体变巨术，正气如虹，石肤，伟岸雄姿，可怖外表，战法转换。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A dreadknight can add the anarchic property to a weapon enhanced with her profane weapon bond, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
An anarchic weapon is infused with chaotic power. It makes the weapon chaotic-aligned and thus overcomes the corresponding damage reduction. It deals an extra 2d6 points of damage against lawful creatures.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士可以将无序属性添加到她的亵渎武器上，但这会占用亵渎武器的 2 点增强加值。无序武器充满了混乱的力量。该武器成为混乱阵营，因此可穿透相应的伤害减免。它对所有守序阵营生物额外造成2d6点伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond - Anarchic
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器盟誓——无序

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond (+1)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器盟誓 (+1)

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond (+2)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器盟誓 (+2)

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond (+3)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器盟誓 (+3)

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond (+4)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器羁绊 (+4)

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond (+5)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器盟誓 (+5)

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond (+6)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器盟誓 (+6)

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器盟誓

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A dreadknight can add the unholy property to a weapon enhanced with her profane weapon bond, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
An unholy weapon is imbued with unholy power. This power makes the weapon evil-aligned and thus overcomes the corresponding damage reduction. It deals an extra 2d6 points of damage against all creatures of good alignment.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士可以将邪恶属性添加到她的亵渎武器上，但这会占用亵渎武器的 2 点增强加值。邪恶武器充满了邪恶的力量。该武器成为邪恶阵营，因此可穿透相应的伤害减免。它对所有善良阵营生物额外造成2d6点伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond - Unholy
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器盟誓——邪恶

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A dreadknight can add the vicious property to a weapon enhanced with her profane weapon bond, but this consumes 1 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
When a vicious weapon strikes an opponent, it creates a flash of disruptive energy that resonates between the opponent and the wielder. This energy deals an extra 2d6 points of damage to the opponent and 1d6 points of damage to the wielder.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士可以将恶毒属性添加到她的亵渎武器上，但这会占用亵渎武器的 1 点增强加值。当恶毒武器命中敌人时，它会瞬间产生出一股破坏性能量，在持用者跟敌人身上回荡。这种能量对对手造成额外 2d6 点伤害，对持有者造成 1d6 点伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond - Vicious
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器盟誓——恶毒

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A dreadknight can add the vorpal property to a weapon enhanced with her profane weapon bond, but this consumes 5 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
A vorpal weapon is infused with terrifying power. It allows the weapon to sever the heads of those it strikes.
Upon a roll of natural 20 (followed by a successful roll to confirm the critical hit), the weapon severs the opponent's head (if it has one) from its body. Some creatures, such as many aberrations and all oozes, have no heads. Others, such as golems and undead creatures other than vampires, are not affected by the loss of their heads. Most other creatures, however, die when their heads are cut off.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 恐惧骑士可以将斩首属性添加到她的亵渎武器上，但这会占用亵渎武器的 5 点增强加值。这种强大而可怕的能力使得武器能砍下敌人的头颅。攻击检定掷出天然20并且重击成功的情况下，武器会砍下对手的头 (如果有的话)。某些生物没有头，比如异怪和泥形生物。其他比如魔像和除了吸血鬼以外的不死生物，不会因失去头而受到影响。而其余的大部分生物会因为头被砍掉而死亡。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Weapon Bond - Vorpal
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎武器盟誓——斩首

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Guiding Hand   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Art, Architecture, Twilight   
Domains: Air, Artifice, Chaos, Community, Good   
Subdomains: Azata, Cloud, Construct, Friendship, Home, Whimsy   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Finger pointing at gold star   
Sacred Animal: Stag   
Though she represents art and architecture, she is more a deity of preserving existing traditions than inspiring innovation. Well-meaning but aloof, she disdains the work of the younger races and never answers the prayers of non-elves. She is always shown dressed in beautiful classically styled or archaic clothing, framed in an elaborate archway of mithral or living branches, and illuminated in the ruddy glow of a sun just below the horizon. Her symbol is a hand pointing upward suspending a golden star or flame.
Appearance: When shown in art, she appears as a beautiful elven woman in traditional elven dress. She is normally depicted standing beneath an archway of either mithral or branches, whilst being illuminated by the setting sun.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：引导之手 
阵营：混乱善良
神职：艺术、建筑、暮光 
领域：空气、工匠、混乱、联盟，善良
子领域：爱塔、云、构装体、友谊、家园、滑稽
偏好武器：木棍 
圣徽：指着金星的手指
圣兽：雄鹿
虽然她代表艺术和建筑，但她更多的是保留现有传统而不是激发创新。
善意但冷漠，她蔑视幼年种族的工作，从不回应非精灵的祈祷。
在艺术作品中，她总是穿着漂亮的古典风格或古老的服饰，站在用秘银或活树枝制成的精致拱门下，同时沐浴在落日的余晖中。
她的圣徽是一只指向上方的手，悬挂着金色的星星或火焰。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Findeladlara
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 芬德烈莱拉

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Fire: You gain fire resistance 30, and as a standard action, you can fire a ray of flame, as per scorching ray (limit one ray) once per round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
火焰：你获得 30 点火焰抗性，并且以一个标准动作，你可以每轮发射一次火焰射线，如同灼热射线（限制一条射线）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Fire: You gain fire resistance 30, and as a standard action, you can fire a ray of flame, as per scorching ray (limit one ray) once per round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
火焰：你获得 30 点火焰抗性，并且以一个标准动作，你可以每轮发射一次火焰射线，如同灼热射线（限制一条射线）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Fire Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 火焰领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can fire a ray of flame, as per scorching ray (limit one ray). This ray deals 4d6 of fire damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，你可以发射一道火焰射线，如同灼热射线（限制一条射线）。这道射线造成 4d6 的火焰伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fire Domain - Scorching Ray
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 火焰领域 - 灼热射线

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of Envy   
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Dishonor, Envy, Graves, Undead   
Edict: Punish those who have unwarranted good fortune, devour the pleasures of the living, encourage resentment, make graveyards supernaturally unsafe   
Domains: Death, Destruction, Evil, Repose, War   
Subdomains: Blood, Daemon, Souls, Rage, Tactics, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Naginata (Glaive)   
Holy Symbol: Red demonic face   
Sacred Animal: Wolf   
Fumeiyoshi is considered the patron of undead and of the oni and both frequently worship him; he is also often worshipped by former paladins or samurai who have fallen from grace or been somehow dishonoured. Because of his patronage, Fumeiyoshi's worship is centred in the Forest of Spirits, Minkai, and the monstrous kingdoms of Chu Ye and Shenmen Cults dedicated to Fumeiyoshi are a particular problem in metropolitan Goka where they make the already free-wheeling city even more dangerous.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：嫉妒领主
阵营：中立邪恶 
神职：耻辱、嫉妒、坟墓、亡灵 
信条：惩罚那些拥有无理好运的人，吞噬生者的快乐，鼓励怨恨，使墓地变得邪异不宁
领域：死亡，毁灭，邪恶、宁静、战争 
子领域：鲜血、邪魔、灵魂、狂暴、战术、亡灵 
偏好武器：薙刀（大砍刀） 
圣徽：红色鬼面 
圣兽：狼
文业被认为是亡灵和鬼的守护神，两者都经常崇拜他，他也经常受到偏离了正道的前圣骑士或堕落武士的崇拜。文业的崇拜者集中在神灵之森、明海，而楚业的恶鬼王国和供奉 文业的深汶教派在都市贡卡已经成为严重的问题，他们使已经无法无天的城市变得更加危险。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fumeiyoshi
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 文业

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, you gain the service of an mammal animal companion. Your effective druid level for this animal companion is equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain – 3. (Druids who take this ability through their nature bond class feature use their druid level – 3 to determine the abilities of their animal companions.)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 4级时，你将获得动物伙伴。你针对动物伙伴的有效德鲁伊等级，等于赋予你此领域的职业等级-3。（将此能力作为自然联结职业特性的德鲁伊，会依照德鲁伊等级-3的原则来决定他们动物伙伴的能力）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fur Subdomain Animal Companion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 毛兽子域动物伙伴

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can, as a swift action, grant yourself a +10-foot bonus to your base speed for 1 round. This bonus increases by 5 feet for every 5 cleric levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以迅捷动作给自己基础移动速度+10尺1轮。每5牧师等级，便再加5尺。每天“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can, as a swift action, grant yourself a +10-foot bonus to your base speed for 1 round. This bonus increases by 5 feet for every 5 cleric levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以迅捷动作给自己基础移动速度+10尺1轮。每5牧师等级，便再加5尺。每天“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Predator’s Grace
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 优雅猎手

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You share a bond with your furred allies. You treat Lore (nature) as a class skill.
Predator’s Grace: You can, as a swift action, grant yourself a +10-foot bonus to your base speed for 1 round. This bonus increases by 5 feet for every 5 cleric levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Animal Companion: At 4th level, you gain the service of an mammal animal companion. Your effective druid level for this animal companion is equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain – 3. (Druids who take this ability through their nature bond class feature use their druid level – 3 to determine the abilities of their animal companions.)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你与毛兽盟友有着共同的纽带。你将学识（自然）视为本职技能。 
优雅猎手：你可以迅捷动作给自己基础移动速度+10尺1轮。每5牧师等级，便再加5尺。每天“3+感知修正”次。
动物伙伴：4级时，你将获得动物伙伴。你针对动物伙伴的有效德鲁伊等级，等于赋予你此领域的职业等级-3。（将此能力作为自然联结职业特性的德鲁伊，会依照德鲁伊等级-3的原则来决定他们动物伙伴的能力）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fur Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 毛兽子域

Predator’s Grace: You can, as a swift action, grant yourself a +10-foot bonus to your base speed for 1 round. This bonus increases by 5 feet for every 5 cleric levels you possess. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Animal Companion: At 4th level, you gain the service of an mammal animal companion. Your effective druid level for this animal companion is equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain – 3. (Druids who take this ability through their nature bond class feature use their druid level – 3 to determine the abilities of their animal companions.)
Domain Spells: magic fang, hold animal, beast shape I, summon nature's ally IV, beast shape III, summon nature's ally VI, summon nature's ally VII, summon nature's ally VIII, summon nature's ally IX.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你与毛兽盟友有着共同的纽带。你将学识（自然）视为本职技能。

 领域法术：魔牙、定身动物、野兽之状 I、召唤自然盟友 IV、野兽之状 III、召唤自然盟友 VI、召唤自然盟友 VII、召唤自然盟友 VIII、变化形体。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You curse the target to suffer unbearable heat. On a failed saving throw, the target is immediately subjected to severe heat, takes 1d4 points of nonlethal damage, and is suffering from heatstroke (fatigued). This spell does not make a creature that is already fatigued, exhausted.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你诅咒目标遭受难以想像的酷热。若目标豁免失败，则立刻受到高温影响，受到1d4点非致命伤害，并且中暑 (疲劳)。该法术不会使已经疲劳的生物变得力竭。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Black Daimyo   
Alignment: Lawful Evil   
Areas of Concern: Archery, Horses, Personal glory, War   
Domains: Evil, Glory, Law, Nobility, War   
Subdomains: Blood, Devil, Heroism, Honor, Leadership, Tactics   
Favoured Weapon: Longbow   
Holy Symbol: Black winged horse   
Sacred Animal: Horse   
General Susumu, also known as the Black Daimyo, is the Tian Xia patron deity of samurai who are interested more in glory and battle than honor and heroism. He is the brother of Shizuru, and the two seldom see eye to eye. His unholy symbol is a black winged horse, and he is worshiped primarily in Chu Ye, Hongal, Kaoling, Minkai, Shokuro, and Xa Hoi.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：黑色大名 
阵营：守序邪恶 
神职：射技、马术、个人荣耀、战争
领域：邪恶、荣耀、守序、崇高、战争
子领域：鲜血、邪魔、英勇、诚实、领导、战术
偏好武器：长弓
圣徽：黑翼飞马
圣兽：马
大将军进，又称黑大名，是天洲武士中，那些比起诚实和英勇更关注荣耀和战斗的一部分的守护神。他是静琉的哥哥，但是两人却形同陌路。他的邪恶圣徽是一匹黑翼飞马，主要在楚业、弘古、高领、明海、诸黑和舍诲被崇拜。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: General Susumu
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 大将军进

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Eternal Source  
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Disasters, Lost islands, Sacrifice   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Destruction, Evil, Madness, Water   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Insanity, Nightmare, Oceans   
Favoured Weapon: Morningster (Flail)   
Holy Symbol: Waves parting around a rising jagged stone   
Some have likened Ghatanothoa to Cthulhu, and certainly there are superficial similarities shared by the two Great Old Ones. Both entities are trapped in immense structures atop sunken islands. Both came to the same distant world in ancient times from the dark places between the stars. And when they wake, their actions cause great storms or disasters, as if the world itself recoiled from their actions. These similarities may be more than superficial, for evidence exists that Ghatanothoa may be one of Cthulhu’s spawn. The worshipers of the Eternal Source deny such claims, and fight against the cult of Cthulhu when they encounter it. Cthulhu’s cult, on the other hand, treats the worshipers of Ghatanothoa as insignificant and no more worthy of notice than any other gathering of mortal madness. The Eternal Source’s insane worshipers are said to be able to raise islands on distant worlds from unknown oceans that serve as portals between the Eternal Source and new vistas to conquer. Ghatanothoa’s form is said to be particularly horrific, and no two accounts are the same; all they agree on is that the merest glance is enough to transform the foolish viewer instantly into a desiccated, living mummy capable of observing the world and feeling the endless passage of time, but incapable of moving or otherwise interacting with the world. This form of immortality is said to be among the most horrific fates a mortal mind could endure.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：不朽之源
阵营：中立邪恶
神职：灾难，失落岛屿与献祭
等级：旧日支配者
领域：毁灭、邪恶、疯狂、流水
子领域：天灾、狂乱、梦魇、海
偏好武器：晨星（连枷）
圣徽：环绕波涛的尖凸浮石
有些说法将加塔诺托亚与克苏鲁相提并论，而这两位旧日支配者也确有一定的相似之处：祂们都被困在沉没岛屿上的巨大建筑之中；祂们都是从远古时代自星间的黑暗所在降临至同一个遥远世界；当祂们苏醒时都会引发巨大的风暴或灾难，就如同世界本身在祂们的举止前畏缩一般。
这些相似之处可能不仅仅流于表面，因为有些证据表明加塔诺托亚可能是克苏鲁的后代之一。不朽之源的崇拜者否认这种说法，并在遭遇克苏鲁教团时与其对抗；而另外一面，克苏鲁教团则将加塔诺托亚的崇拜者视若尘芥，与其他任何疯狂教团相比全然不值一提。
据说不朽之源的狂热崇拜者能够在遥远世界的未知汪洋中升起岛屿，作为不朽之源征服新天地的门扉。
据说加塔诺托亚的形态极端恐怖，但没有任何两种说法相同，不过它们都赞成加塔诺托亚仅仅一眼便能将愚蠢的目击者瞬间变成一具干枯却仍活着的木乃伊，能够观察世界，能够感受时间流逝，却不能移动或与世界互动。此种不朽据说是凡人所能承受的最为可怕的命运之一。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ghatanothoa
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 加塔诺托亚

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Breezes-Still-and-Ripples-Cease   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Ignorance, Placidity, Simplicity   
Domains: Community, Good, Law, Repose   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Archon, Home, Loyalty   
Favoured Weapon: Handaxe   
Holy Symbol: Plant-covered rock in pond   
Sacred Animal: Turtle   
Ghenshau once strove to understand every aspect of creation and to create perfect order and goodness. As the empyreal lord added more and more elements to his world equation, however, he realized that his efforts were futile. Ghenshau abandoned his work and instead learned to appreciate the elements of peace and tranquility that come with acceptance. At first glance, Ghenshau could be mistaken for a Tian peasant boy, often wearing a hat of woven rushes and simple linen clothes. The hat shelters his beautiful face and his level, serene gaze. His clothes bear elegantly embroidered trim depicting fantastic birds, foo creatures, and runes. He carries a pipe in his hand and a workman's axe tucked into his rope belt. Ghenshau and his followers do not hold civilization in contempt, but they do believe the unnecessary complications of society distract people from doing their best. An artisan who maintains a neat shop and works on one project at a time is much happier and more pleasing to Ghenshau than a harried worker in a disarrayed shop. Of course, Ghenshau realizes that the demands of life can force people into lives they are not happy with, simply so they and their families can keep body and soul together. He understands that such circumstances are not always avoidable, and sends his agents to help such flustered individuals find a way out of their dreary responsibilities.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：风静波止
阵营：守序善良
神职：无知、平静、简单
领域：联盟、善良、守序、宁静
子领域：先祖、亚空、家园、忠诚
偏好武器：手斧
圣徽：水池中间一块石头，上面长满藤蔓鲜花
圣兽：乌龟
简肖本来想彻底理解创生并创造出完美的秩序与善良，等发现不可能之后就变为无为而治了。
简肖放弃了他的工作，而是学会了欣赏伴随接受而来的和平与安宁的元素。乍一看，简肖可能被误认为是一个天洲农民，经常戴着一顶编织的灯心草帽子和简单的亚麻衣服。帽子遮住了他美丽的脸庞和他平和而平静的目光。他的衣服上有优雅的刺绣装饰，描绘了奇妙的鸟类、福兽和符文。他手里拿着一根管子，一把工人的斧头塞进他的绳带。 
简肖和他的追随者并不蔑视文明，但他们确实相信社会的不必要的复杂性会分散人们的注意力。对于简肖来说，一个保持整洁的商店并一次只做一个项目的工匠比在一家杂乱无章的商店里忙碌的工人要快乐得多，也更讨人喜欢。当然，简肖意识到生活的需求会迫使人们过上他们不满意的生活，只是为了让他们和他们的家人能够保持身心一体。
他明白这种情况并非总是可以避免的，并派他的代理人帮助这些心慌意乱的人找到摆脱沉闷责任的方法。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ghenshau
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 简肖

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You create one or more bolts of negative energy infused with shadow pulled from the Shadow Plane. You can fire one bolt, plus one for every four levels beyond 5th (to a maximum of three bolts at 13th level) at the same target, each requiring a ranged touch attack to hit. Each bolt deals 4d6 points of damage to a living creature or heals 4d6 points of damage to an undead creature. Furthermore, the bolt’s energy spreads over the skin of creature, possibly blinding it for a short time. Any creature struck by a bolt must succeed at a Reflex saving throw or become blinded for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你创造了一支或多支注入阴影位面能量的负能量弩矢。你能创造1支，加上5级之后每4施法者等级1支的弩矢 (最多13级3支)。你能使其射向同一个或不同的若干个目标，不过所有目标彼此距离不得超过30尺。若远程接触攻击命中，每支弩矢对活物造成4d6伤害或对不死生物提供4d6治疗。此外，弩矢的能量将会包裹目标的皮肤，使其在短时间内陷入目盲。任何被弩矢命中的生物如果反射检定失败则会目盲1轮。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 1 round
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1轮

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gloomblind Bolts
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 黑盲矢

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Relex partial
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 反射 部分

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are infused with the glory of the divine, and are a true foe of the undead. In addition, when you channel positive energy to harm undead creatures, the save DC to halve the damage is increased by 2.
Touch of Glory: You can cause your hand to shimmer with divine radiance, allowing you to touch a creature as a standard action and give it a bonus equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain on a single Charisma-based skill check or Charisma ability check. This ability lasts for 1 hour or until the creature touched applies the bonus to a roll. You can use this ability to grant the bonus a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Aura of Heroism: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of heroism for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Using this ability is a swift action. Allies in the area are treated as if they were under the effects of heroism spell.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你自身已注入圣洁的光辉，是一切不死生物的天生死敌。此外，在你引导正向能量对不死生物造成伤害时，使伤害减半的豁免DC将提升2点。
光辉之触：你的手部可发出圣洁闪光，使你能够以标准动作接触生物，使其在单次基于魅力的技能检定或魅力属性检定时获得加值，加值数等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。此能力可持续1小时，或是在该生物为某次检定应用此加值后结束。每天可使用次数为感知调整值+3。
英雄气概灵光：在8级时，你可发出30英尺范围的英雄气概灵光，每天可持续的轮数等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。施展此能力是一个迅捷动作。在范围内的盟友都视为受到英雄气概的法术效果影响。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Glory: You gain the benefits of heroism and protection from evil, and your first successful attack each round against an undead target deals an additional 1d6 points of positive energy damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
荣耀：你获得英雄气概和防护邪恶的好处，并且你每轮首次对不死生物的成功攻击会造成额外的 1d6 点正能量伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Song of the Swamp, Goddess of the Boggards, Mother of Swamps, Frog Mother   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Amphibians, Boggards, Swamps   
Domains: Chaos, Death, Evil, Water   
Subdomains: Demon, Murder, Oceans, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Whip (dagger)   
Holy Symbol: Twig fetish of a boggard   
Sacred Animal: Frog   
The goddess of the boggards, Gogunta began her life as a mighty mobogo. Her route to ascension as a demon lord is believed by the boggards to have been the result of a life spent slaughtering just the right creatures and feeding on just the right parts of their bodies. Scholars of the demonic believe it more likely that she was a herzrou in Dagon’s service who ascended to the role of demon lord by more traditional means—certainly she favors the hezrous as guardians and lovers, and often sends them to guard or even lead boggard tribes on the Material Plane (particularly tribes in Varisia’s Mushfens, the River Kingdoms, or the Sodden Lands). Gogunta is unusual among the demon lords in that her realm is not wholly her own—the stinking saltmarsh of Mephizim is a vast region, yet it is contained wholly within the realm of Dagon’s Ishiar. Mephizim floats upon the surface of the vast sea of Ishiar, being pulled idly along by the current. Despite the swampy island’s continental size, it remains a relative speck on the surface of the great Abyssal sea. Dagon seems content to let Gogunta rule her tiny realm above his own, ignoring her blasphemous cavortings. Gogunta’s cult often mingles freely with that of Dagon on the Material Plane, with her boggards and Dagon’s cultists mixing and mating in disgusting ways that nature never intended. Gogunta appears as an immense, multi-headed frog with too many eyes and even more tongues, but in some boggard artwork she appears instead as an immense boggard queen.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：沼泽之歌、沼泽地女神、沼泽之母、青蛙母亲 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：两栖动物、沼泽地、沼泽 
领域：混乱、死亡、邪恶、水 
子域：恶魔、谋杀、海洋、不死生物 
武器：鞭子（匕首） 
圣徽：博格德的树枝神物 
圣兽：青蛙 
博格德的女神 Gogunta 开始了她作为强大的 mobogo 的生活。沼怪们认为，她成为恶魔领主的道路是一生都在屠杀正确的生物并以他们身体的正确部位为食的结果。研究恶魔的学者认为，她更有可能是为达贡服务的 herzrou，通过更传统的方式升任恶魔领主的角色——当然，她喜欢 hezrous 作为监护人和爱人，并经常派他们看守甚至领导 boggard 部落在物质位面（特别是瓦里西亚的 Mushfens、河流王国或湿地）的部落。 Gogunta 在恶魔领主中是不寻常的，因为她的领域不完全是她自己的——Mephizim 的恶臭盐沼是一个广阔的区域，但它完全包含在 Dagon 的 Ishiar 领域内。 Mephizim 漂浮在广阔的 Ishiar 海面上，随波逐流。尽管这个沼泽岛有大陆那么大，但它仍然是巨大深海表面上的一个相对斑点。 Dagon 似乎满足于让 Gogunta 统治她自己的小王国，无视她亵渎神明的嬉戏。 Gogunta 的教派经常在主物质位面与 Dagon 的教派自由混合，她的沼人和 Dagon 的教徒以自然从未打算的令人厌恶的方式混合和交配。 Gogunta 看起来像一只巨大的多头青蛙，有太多的眼睛和更多的舌头，但在一些博格德艺术作品中，她反而表现为一个巨大的博格德女王。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gogunta
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 古贡塔

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Casting Goodberry creates a Bunch of Goodberries and stores them in the party inventeory. When eaten the goodberries heal 2d4 point of damage, however if they are eaten more than once a day they can make the creature that ate them sick for a short time.

Good: You are immune to fear and compulsion effects, and weapons you wield count as good for the purpose of overcoming damage reduction.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
善良：你免疫恐惧和胁迫效果，你使用的武器在穿透伤害减免时视为善良武器。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Good Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 善良领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Type: Druidic  
Leader:  The Archdruid   
Domains: Air, Earth, Animal, Fire, Plant. 
Favoured Weapons: Sickle, Quarterstaff
The Green Faith (also known as the Old Faith, the Great Eld, or the Wyrd) is a naturalistic philosophy based on the belief that natural forces are worthy of attention and respect. Followers of the Green Faith meditate daily, commune with natural forms of power, and show respect to nature in all things. They often hang fresh herbs from the lintels of doorways as a sign of respect for nature. Although the Green Faith is based on nature, one need not be a druid to value its tenets, nor do all druids necessarily count themselves as members of this philosophy, although almost all of them appreciate its values. On Golarion, the Green Faith is centred in Andoran, Nirmathas, Taldor, and the River Kingdoms. Sarkoris, prior to its destruction at the hands of demons, was formerly the Green Faith's greatest bastion; since then, Green Faith holdouts continue their fight to protect nature from the corruption of the Worldwound. Humans, elves, and half-elves make up the majority of the Green Faith's members. The Green Faith is one of the oldest forms of worship in Golarion, as evidenced by the numerous druidic symbols found in the cave drawings of early man. According to legend, in the earliest years of its existence, the Green Faith was split into four factions. One group venerated the strength and endurance of stone, another the power and ferocity of wild beasts, a third the bountiful earth, and the last, the cleansing purity of fire. For years, these four factions fought for supremacy, each claiming that the aspect of nature it venerated was the most important. Finally, the leaders of the four factions agreed to resolve their conflict through single combat. Before the battle could begin, however, a multicolored geyser sprang from the ground, equal parts water, earth, and flame. The geyser was followed by an enormous flock of multicolored birds, which flew off in all directions. The faction leaders saw this as a clear sign from nature that no one element could be more important than another, and that ultimately, the four factions shared the same basic philosophy.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
苍翠誓约是一种自然主义哲学，其基础是坚信自然力量值得关注和尊重。苍翠誓约的追随者每天进行冥想，与力量的各种自然形式进行交流，并对自然界的一切事物表示尊重。
领域：动物，大地，火焰，植物，流水。
偏好武器：镰刀

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lady of Ripe Bounty   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Gardens, Orchards, Wine   
Domains: Good, Luck, Plant, Weather   
Subdomains: Agathion, Growth, Revelry, Seasons   
Favoured Weapon: Club   
Holy Symbol: Jug of grapes   
Sacred Animal: Ladybug   
Halcamora appears as a young woman with sun-darkened skin, eyes of green so pale they're almost white, and a friendly, knowing smile. She wears brown robes kilted up to her knees, and her feet are always smudged with dirt and wine stains. From her shoulders sweep shell-like red wings marked with the distinctive black spots of a ladybug. Two slender black antennae curve up from her temples, and sleek black hair falls to her shoulders. Halcamora can be found where sunlight shines on cultivated garden plots, where workers rest after a day in the fields, and anywhere where wine flows and grapes ripen. The Lady of Ripe Bounty leaves wilder areas to others and contents herself with small gardens, parks, and wineries. Peaceful farming communities that build temples to more powerful nature gods often raise a small shrine to Halcamora as well. Gardeners and vintners pay particular homage to the Lady of Ripe Bounty and her celestial agents, particularly in times of drought or harsh weather. The gentle agathion has little room for hatred in her heart, but she despises insect-bodied fiends who blight crops and carry plague. Halcamora is a social empyreal lord and can often been found visiting the palaces of others, relaxing with a jug of wine at her elbow. At other times she resides in a leafy bower in the depths of the Forest of Whispered Longing in Nirvana.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：丰盈满贯女士
阵营：绝对中立 
神职：花园、果园、葡萄酒 
领域：善良、幸运、植物、天气
子领域：盖森、滋长、狂欢、季节
偏好武器：木棒
圣徽：葡萄酒壶
圣兽：瓢虫
哈卡莫拉以幼年女子的形象出现，她的皮肤晒得黝黑，闪烁绿光的眼睛几近白色，还带着友好、会心的微笑。她穿着长及膝盖的棕色长袍，她的脚上总是沾满泥土和酒渍。从她的肩膀上掠过贝壳状的红色翅膀，上面有瓢虫独特的黑色斑点。两根细长的黑色触角从她的太阳穴向上弯曲，光滑的黑发垂到肩上。哈卡莫拉可以在阳光照射在耕地花园的地方，工人在田间休息一天后的地方，以及葡萄酒流动和葡萄成熟的地方。
丰盈满贯女士将荒野留给他人，并以建立小花园、公园和酿酒厂为满足。为更强大的自然神建造寺庙的和平农业联盟通常也会为哈卡莫拉建一座小神殿。园丁和葡萄酒商特别向丰盈满贯女士和她的神祇致敬，特别是在干旱或恶劣天气的时候。温柔的盖森在她的心中几乎没有仇恨的余地，但她鄙视那些破坏庄稼和携带瘟疫的虫体恶魔。
哈卡莫拉是一位至高天领主，经常可以看到她参观其他人的宫殿，手肘端着一壶酒放松身心。其他时候，她住在涅槃境的低语渴望森林深处的一个绿树成荫的凉亭里。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Halcamora
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 哈卡莫拉

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The King in Yellow, Him Who is Not to be Named, The Unspeakable  
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Decadence, Disorder, Nihilism   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Rune, Void (Nobility) 
Subdomains: Dark Tapestry, Language, Stars, Wards  
Favoured Weapon: Rapier   
Holy Symbol: The Yellow Sign: a three-armed triskelion   
As with many of the Great Old Ones, Hastur is imprisoned on a distant world. Yet unlike most of the imprisoned Great Old Ones, Hastur can manifest an avatar on other worlds as long as the light from the strange star in the sky of his prison world shines upon the targeted portion of the second world. He requires the assistance of powerful magic in order to manifest this avatar, known as the King in Yellow, but such magic need not be consciously wrought. His cultists are masters of subtle magics that can trick unsuspecting victims into opening the way for the King in Yellow. Hastur’s symbol, the Yellow Sign, is often used in conjunction with such magic, and often those who find the Yellow Sign become doomed to host the King in Yellow in their own minds, slowly transforming into his agents. Some of his followers regard him as a patron of shepherds, believing that the bulk of humanity are but sheep to be gathered for an unknown future use. None know what Hastur looks like, for he has been imprisoned far longer than mortal life has existed. Those he takes as avatars when manifesting as the King in Yellow appear as entities clad in what seem to be frayed and tattered yellow robes. Only upon closer inspection are the “robes” revealed to be the creatures’ flesh, and what lies hidden under the darkened hoods is horror incarnate.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：黄衣之王
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：颓废，动乱与虚无主义
等级：旧日支配者
领域：混乱、邪恶、符文、虚空（崇高）
子领域：异幕，语言，星辰，守护
偏好武器：细剑
圣徽：黄衣之印
和许多旧日支配者相同，哈斯塔也被囚禁在一个遥远世界。但和大多数旧日支配者不同，当囚禁哈斯塔的怪异行星自天空投下光芒，祂便可在该地显现一个化身。虽然祂需要强大的魔法帮助这个号称黄衣之王的化身降临，然而此种魔法并不需要有意识地完成。
祂的教徒皆是隐秘魔法的大师，致力于欺骗无防备的受害者开启黄衣之王降临的道路。哈斯塔的邪徽被称作黄衣之印，时常与此类魔法同在，而那些寻见黄衣之印的凡人的心灵往往会被黄衣之王侵染，慢慢转化为祂的代理人。祂的部分崇拜者认为祂是牧羊人的保护神，而芸芸众生不过为将来的未知用途备好的羔羊。
无人知晓哈斯塔的真实容貌，因祂被囚禁的时间远比人世更加漫长。当祂以黄衣之王的化身显现时，看上去近似身披褴褛黄袍的实体。然而，仔细观察却能发现“长袍”实为某种生物的血肉，而隐藏在兜帽之下的则是超越人智所能理解的恐怖具现。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Hastur
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 哈斯塔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Mistress of Jubilation   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Dance, Joy, Love, Music, The Sky   
Domains: Air, Chaos, Charm, Good, Travel   
Subdomains: Azata, Cloud, Exploration, Love, Revelry, Trade   
Favoured Weapon: Shortsword   
Holy Symbol: Solar Disk with Horns   
Sacred Animal: Cow   
The cow-headed goddess Hathor was worshiped from the earliest days of Ancient Osirion, and remained a popular deity throughout its history. A divinity of air and sky, Hathor is also a goddess of beauty and love, happiness and merriment. She is the queen of the dance, the mistress of music, and the sovereign of song. Hathor is a wife, a mother, and a lover, a goddess of fertility, sexuality, and motherhood. She is also a goddess of trade and goods that bring wealth from foreign lands. Hathor is the daughter of Ra, and sister to Bastet, Maat, and Sekhmet. She is the consort of Horus, and as he is a god of kings, so is she a goddess of queens, though she is venerated by royalty and commoners alike. Hathor appears as a voluptuous cow-headed woman with the solar disk ofher father Ra between her horns and carrying a sistrum. Sometimes she is depicted as a human woman with a horned headdress. More rarely, she is depicted as a great wild cow whose milk nourishes the living. Hathor is a patron and protector of women, and is worshiped by mothers, wives, and lovers of all ages. She also serves as a patron ofbards, dancers, musicians, and performers, which makes her a popular deity in thriving cities and their playhouses. In her role as a goddess of trade, Hathor is also a patron of miners, particularly those who mine for precious stones. Hathor's priesthood is predominantly female, and her temples hold great festivals full of music and dance where worshipers consume large amounts of beer and wine and revel for days on end.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：欢腾女士
阵营：混乱善良
神职：舞蹈、欢愉、爱情、音乐、天空
领域：空气、混乱、魅力、善良、旅行
子领域：爱塔、云、探索、爱慕、狂欢、交易
偏好武器：短剑
圣徽：日轮与牛角
圣兽：母牛
牛头女神哈索尔从古奥西里昂建国初期就受敬拜，直至今日信众依旧众多。虽为天与空之神，哈索尔也是美、爱、欢、娱的女神。祂是华舞天后，美音女士，以及歌之圣皇。哈索尔也是妻母爱人，是多产、性欲与母性之神。祂同时也是从远方带来财富的贸易与货品女神。
哈索尔是拉的女儿，芭丝特、玛亚特与塞赫美特的姊妹。祂是荷鲁斯的配偶，因此当丈夫是王之神时，祂也是后之神，但祂受到上下各阶级一同崇拜。哈索尔以角间头顶父亲日轮，手持响铃的牛首佳丽姿态示人，有时也会被以穿戴牛角头饰的人类女性形象描绘。更罕见的画像则把祂画成一只乳汁滋养众生的巨大野牛。
哈索尔是女性的守护神，受到各个年龄层的母亲、妻子及爱人所敬拜。祂也是吟游诗人、舞者、音乐家及艺人的守护神，因此在大城市及其中的戏院信徒众多。虽然哈索尔是贸易女神，祂同时也是矿业女神，尤其庇护开采宝石的矿工。哈索尔的祭司几乎全是女人，其神庙会举办充满了音乐与舞蹈，酒流满地且持续数日的盛大狂欢庆典。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Hathor
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 哈索尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This dragon’s scales and insectile wings dance with color, while its whiplike tail waves as if stirred by an unseen breeze. 
Despite their best intentions, the appropriately named havoc dragons often cause collateral damage as they develop whimsical wonderlands of revelry and relaxation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这条龙的鳞片和虫翼跃动着色彩，而它的鞭子般的尾巴则像被看不见的微风吹动一样摇曳着。尽管它们的意图不坏，这种被恰当命名为狂欢龙的生物经常会造成附带损害，因为它们会像在异想天开的仙境中狂欢和放松。
