LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Auroral Tower   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Prostitution, Rites of passage, Virginity   
Edict: Help others achieve their desires, aid and protect sex workers, help others through difficult transitions   
Domains: Community, Good, Law, Protection   
Subdomains: Archon, Friendship, Lust, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Longsword   
Holy Symbol: White-hooded profile   
Sacred Animal: Rabbit   
Lymnieris teaches that the passage from one state of being to another is a sacred time in every mortal's life. He is thought to have originally been a planetar, as evidenced by the empyreal lord's tall stature, emerald green skin, and four white wings. His hard, radiant body is always coated in a thin sheen of perspiration, and he carries no weapons, instead wielding in one of his delicate hands a great white shield made of celestial ivory. Lymnieris and his agents sometimes come to the aid of good-hearted virgins pressed into marriage or threatened with being deflowered against their will, as well as those devotees who wish to fulfill their sexual desires but who are restrained by culture or tradition. Any individual on the threshold of a major personal change may call on Lymnieris for aid. Prostitutes who work lawfully and willingly out of love for their profession also worship Lymnieris, and those forced into carnal service pray to him for salvation. Lymnieris lives in a palace made ofblue agate in Heaven, where he often entertains the visiting Arshea.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：极光之塔
阵营：守序善良
神职：特殊服务，成人礼，贞操
领域：联盟、善良、守序、保护
子领域：亚空，友谊，情欲，纯净
偏好武器：长剑 
圣徽：藏在白斗篷下的脸
圣兽：兔
林尼芮斯教导说，从人生的一个阶段过渡到下一个阶段是神圣的过程。
他被认为最初是一个行星，这可以从这位至高天领主的高大身材、翠绿色的皮肤和四只白色的翅膀中得到证明。他那坚硬而容光焕发的身体总是覆盖着一层薄薄的汗珠，他没有携带任何武器，而是在一只纤巧的手中挥舞着一面由天象牙制成的巨大的白色盾牌。
林尼芮斯和他的代理人有时会帮助那些被迫结婚或违背意愿被剥夺尊严的善良处女，以及那些希望满足性欲但受文化或传统限制的信徒。任何即将发生重大个人变化的个人都可以向林尼芮斯寻求帮助。出于对职业的热爱而合法且自愿地工作的妓女也崇拜林尼芮斯，那些被迫从事肉体服务的妓女向他祈祷以求救赎。
林尼芮斯住在天堂的一座蓝玛瑙宫殿，总是在那里接待好友阿榭依。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lymnieris
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 林尼芮斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Feather of Truth   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Justice, Law, Order, Truth   
Domains: Knowledge, Law, Protection, Void (Travel), Weather   
Subdomains: Inevitable, Judgment, Purity, Seasons, Stars, Thought   
Favoured Weapon: Starknife   
Holy Symbol: Blue Ostrich Feather   
Sacred Animal: Leopard   
When the universe was created, it was given an innate harmony, and the goddess Maat is the guardian of this cosmic order. She is a deity of balance, justice, law, and truth, and is responsible for the uniform movement of the celestial bodies through the sky and the ordered procession of seasons. Ancient Osirians believed that the legitimacy and efficacy of a pharaoh's reign were dependent on upholding the concepts embodied by Maat, and to prevent the universe from dissolving into chaos, this order must be constantly renewed and preserved by both humans and the gods. Maat is the daughter of Ra, sister of Bastet, Hathor, and Sekhmet, and the wife of Thoth. Maat presides over the councils of the gods, being impartial, honest, and fair, and she assists Pharasma in the judgment of souls as they pass on into the afterlife. As the upholder of cosmic order, Maat is opposed to both Set and Apep, who work to bring about chaos and entropy. Maat usually appears as a woman with a blue ostrich feather on her head. She is often depicted with winged arms, holding an ankh and a was scepter, symbols of life and power, respectively. Her sacred animal is the leopard, because the pattern on its coat represents the stars in the night sky. Paladins often worship Maat as the embodiment of justice, and monks and oracles revere the cosmic truth she embodies.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：真理之羽
阵营：守序中立
神职：正义、法律、秩序、真理
领域：知识、守序、保护、虚空（旅行）、天气
子领域：制裁、裁决、纯净、季节、星辰、思想
偏好武器：星刃
圣徽：苍蓝鸵鸟羽
神兽：花豹
当天地创生时，世界一片和谐，而女神玛亚特被赋予了维持宇宙秩序的职责。祂是平衡、正义、法律与真理之神，也负责调度群星整齐移动，以及安排四季顺畅变迁。古奥西里昂人相信法老的天命可以由祂是如何维护玛亚特所象征的概念来判断，而为了不让宇宙陷入无边混乱，这份秩序必须不断地由人神协力更新维持。
玛亚特是拉的女儿，芭丝特、哈索尔与塞赫美特的姊妹，以及托特的配偶。公正无私又诚实的玛亚特在诸神议事时担任主持，祂也协助法莱斯玛审判阴间幽魂。作为宇宙秩序的维护者，玛亚特与谋图带来混乱产生熵的赛特及阿佩普敌对。玛亚特以头顶苍蓝鸵鸟羽饰的女性形象示人，通常还手持象征生命的命符与体现权威的霸杖。祂的圣兽是花豹，因为其毛皮上斑纹的图样形似夜空繁星。圣武士一般把玛亚特当作正义的象征崇拜，而武僧及先知则将祂视为宇宙真理的化身来供奉。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Maat
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 玛亚特

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Three   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Complexity, Fate, Triplets   
Domains: Knowledge, Law, Luck, Rune   
Subdomains: Curse, Fate, Thought, Wards   
Favoured Weapon: Scythe   
Holy Symbol: Green three-pointed knot   
Sacred Animal: Multi-headed animals   
If Pharasma is the goddess of fate, then Magdh is the patron of foreknowledge—and the complications that arise from it. While other Eldest focus on gathering or controlling secrets, time, or forbidden information, Magdh watches the endless tangled lines and interplay between rippling realities, following chains of events back to their origins and into strange culminations on distant planes. She is a seer among seers, the mother of paradox, and even the other Eldest sometimes beseech her for interpretations of her maddeningly opaque visions, for it’s said that in her forest pools Magdh has glimpsed the ends of all things, including the Eldest themselves. Magdh, often known simply as the Three, takes the form of a robed humanoid woman with three faces set equidistantly around her head, the hair framing those faces by turns black, red, and blonde. These faces swivel to address the object of her attention at seemingly random intervals, sometimes mid-sentence, spinning her head in complete circles without apparent ill effect. Though not actually a collective consciousness like Shyka, Madgh’s faces appear to represent different aspects of her personality, though not always the same one—a supplicant who notices the red-haired face radiating maternal affection in one interaction might attempt to curry favor with it the next time, only to find it personifying rage or humor. When necessary, Magdh has even been known to split into three separate women in order to accomplish some task, yet the Eldest often seems reserved or less lucid for a time following such separations.

偏好武器：巨镰

如果法拉斯玛是命运女神，那么玛芙就是预知——和应运而生的纷繁复杂——的守护神。当其他始祖都在专注于收集秘密、禁忌学识或操控时空的时候，玛芙一直观察着无尽的命运之线互相纠葛在一起，和现实激起的阵阵涟漪间的相互作用，追踪着一系列可以追溯到他们起源的事件一步步在遥远的位面进入奇特的高潮。她是先知中的先知、悖论之母，甚至其他始祖有时也会来恳求她解释她那些令人难以捉摸的愿景，也因此传说玛芙在她的林中圣池里能够一窥包括始祖在内的万物终结之时。
玛芙通常被简单的称作“三相”，外表看起来就是一个穿长袍的人类女性有三副面孔等距的环绕在头部上，围绕在这些面孔周围的头发依此是黑色、红色和金色。这些面孔会看似随机的旋转对准引起她注意的事物，她的头颅有时候能在言谈间旋转一周也毫无违和之处。玛芙的几副面孔并不是像夏依卡那样共用一个确切的集体意识，而是用来表现她自己不同的个性，并且还不是保持不变的——一个祈求者可能会在一次接触中发现红发面相表现出了母性的光辉并想要在下一次依此来取悦她，便只会发现转变成了表现狂怒或幽默的一面。在必要时，也听说过玛芙会分裂成三个独立的女人来完成一些工作，不过这位始祖在如此做之后会有一段时间变得缄默或不太清醒。
甚至连其他的始祖都不敢宣称能了解玛芙的动机。虽然时常会听到她委婉的抨击现实世界的递归本质和一些小概率事件对时间长河的影响，但玛芙她自己到底有什么进一步的目的，没有任何人能够说出确切的答案。流行的说法是她通过派遣她的仆从进行一些匪夷所思的任务来妨碍第一世界中的各种生物——包括其他始祖在内，来独自保护第一世界不会发生一些重大的灾难，并且有时也会发现三相本人会带着一些随从进行某些特别的任务。在她所有的同僚中，夏依卡与三相有着最深的联系，也是因为她们会互相交流关于时空和命运的理解，但是这份羁绊也会带有紧张气氛，她们俩经常因为一些微不足道的琐事而陷入冷战状态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Among the Red Mantis worshipers of Achaekek, some hold such strong faith in their assassin god that they gain divine power.They forge themselves into perfect killers in honor of He Who Walks in Blood.These warpriests are a relatively recent addition to the Red Mantis arsenal, but in the few short decades they have served the assassins, they have quickly built a reputation for themselves as particularly fanatical devotees of the Mantis God.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 阿卡艾克克 的红螳螂崇拜者中，有些人对他们的刺客神祇有着如此强烈的信仰，以至于他们获得了神圣的力量。他们将自己塑造成完美的杀手，以纪念浴血行者。这些战争祭司是红螳螂信仰者中新晋的成员，但在他们作为暗杀者服务的短短几十年里，他们迅速树立了自己作为螳螂神的狂热信徒的名声。

Titles: The Creeping Queen, Lord of Vermin, Demon Lord of Vermin and Bindings 
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Bindings, Driders, Vermin   
Domains: Animal, Chaos, Destruction, Evil   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Demon, Rage, Venom   
Favoured Weapon: Net (Kukri)   
Holy Symbol: Skull in spiderweb   
Sacred Animal: Spider   
Mazmezz appears as a hideous tangle of insectoid legs, far too many for any worldly insect to command. Some of these legs end in claws, others in pincers, and still others in spinnerets. At the center, a sickening clot of wriggling hair boils around a roughly spherical body, the only concession toward a “front” being an immense spider’s mouth filled with thrashing pedipalps and fangs. Mazmezz has the insidious ability to wrap herself in gauzy, vexing swaths of webbing that can magically alter her form to anything she can imagine—the form of a beautiful woman or female drider is a particular favorite when she’s dealing with those she might wish to capture and keep as trophies for her horrific harem. Yet when forced to punish foes or do battle, the Creeping Queen always reverts to her nauseating true form. Mazmezz is worshiped primarily by drow, driders, and ettercaps, but some particularly demented humanoids worship her as well—these tend to be isolated admirers rather than members of full-blown cults. Her hive-like Abyssal domain is known as Khavak-Vog, and its tangled ways are the lair of her favored children, the bebiliths. The core of her maze-like lair is guarded by several of these fiends grown to great size. Legend holds that the first bebiliths were spawned by Mazmezz; if true, this would explain the disgust and hatred with which most other demon lords hold the Creeping Queen.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：蠕行女王、害虫之王、害虫恶魔之王和绑定 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：绑定、Driders、害虫 
领域：动物、混乱、毁灭、邪恶 
子领域：灾难、恶魔、狂暴、毒液 
偏好武器：网 (Kukri) 
圣徽：蜘蛛网中的头骨 
圣兽：蜘蛛 
 Mazmezz 看起来像一团可怕的类昆虫腿，数量之多，任何世俗的昆虫都无法指挥。这些腿有的末端是爪子，有的末端是钳子，还有一些末端是喷丝板。在中心，一团令人作呕的蠕动毛发围绕着一个大致球形的身体沸腾，唯一朝向“正面”的让步是一张巨大的蜘蛛嘴，里面长满了扑腾的须肢和尖牙。 Mazmezz 有一种阴险的能力，可以用薄纱、令人烦恼的织带包裹自己，这些织带可以神奇地将她的形态变成她能想象到的任何东西——当她与那些她可能想捕捉的人打交道时，她特别喜欢美丽的女人或女骑手的形态并作为她可怕的后宫的战利品。然而，当被迫惩罚敌人或进行战斗时，蠕行女王总是会恢复到她令人作呕的真实形态。 Mazmezz 主要受到卓尔、driders 和 ettecaps 的崇拜，但一些特别疯狂的类人生物也崇拜她——这些人往往是孤立的崇拜者，而不是成熟教派的成员。她的蜂巢状深渊领域被称为 Khavak-Vog，其错综复杂的道路是她最宠爱的孩子贝比利斯的巢穴。她迷宫般的巢穴的核心由几只体型庞大的恶魔守卫着。传说认为第一批贝比利石是由马兹梅兹产下的；如果属实，这将解释大多数其他恶魔领主对蠕行女王的厌恶和仇恨。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mazmezz
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 马兹梅兹

The archdevil Mephistopheles is the ruler of Caina, the Eighth Layer of Hell, where he keeps many of Hell's greatest secrets and contracts. Mephistopheles' official and true unholy symbol is, in essence, a crimson trident piercing a golden ring, with the three prongs of the trident alluding to the spires of Caina. His symbols are rarely seen, however, as owing one's allegiance to Mephistopheles is most often kept secret. Simpler, alternative versions of his unholy symbol exist, including a red sun eclipsed by three mountains; a tongue pierced with three studs; and a scale surmounted with a feather, topped by a bone. The latter evokes Mephistopheles' three sets of wings. Mephistopheles originated as the consciousness of Hell itself, predating Asmodeus' discovery of the plane. When Asmodeus and his followers entered Hell following their Exodus from Heaven, Asmodeus traveled into Caina and tore Hell's very flesh from its bones, reshaping it into a being he named Mephistopheles. The newly formed entity, the first true devil, pledged to oppose Asmodeus' enemies as if they were its own, and became one of Asmodeus' closest lieutenants. This story is recorded in the Book of the Damned.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：猩红王子
阵营：守序邪恶
神职：契约、恶魔、秘密
领域：邪恶、知识、守序、符文
子领域：邪魔, 语言, 记忆, 思想 
偏好武器：三叉戟
亵渎符号：三叉戟和金戒指
亵渎动物：知更鸟
大魔鬼墨菲斯托是地狱第八层凯纳的统治者，他保存着许多地狱最伟大的秘密和合同。墨菲斯托的官方和真正的邪恶象征本质上是一个刺穿金戒指的深红色三叉戟，三叉戟的三个尖头暗指凯纳的尖顶。
然而，他的符号很少见，因为对墨菲斯托的忠诚通常是保密的。他的邪恶象征存在更简单的替代版本，包括被三座山脉遮蔽的红太阳；用三个螺柱刺穿的舌头；还有一个鳞片，上面覆盖着一根羽毛，顶部是一根骨头。后者让人想起墨菲斯托的三组翅膀。
墨菲斯托起源于地狱本身的意识，甚至早于阿斯莫迪斯发现位面。当阿斯莫迪斯和他的追随者在他们从天堂离开进入地狱时，阿斯莫迪斯进入了凯纳，将地狱的血肉从骨头上撕下，将其重塑为一个他命名为墨菲斯托的存在。
这个新诞生的实体，第一个真正的魔鬼，发誓要像对待自己的敌人一样对抗阿斯莫迪斯的敌人，并成为阿阿斯莫迪斯最亲密的副手之一。这个故事被记录在诅咒之书中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mephistopheles
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 墨菲斯托菲利

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Mother of Witches, Lord of Deception, Demon Lord of Hags and Deception
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Cruelty, Deception, Hags   
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Evil, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception, Demon, Lust, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Punching dagger   
Holy Symbol: Eye on three sharp stones   
Sacred Animal: Black widow   
Patron of hags, witches, and vengeful widows, Mestama takes great delight in murdering young women on the night before their wedding day so she can take their form and wed their husbands-to-be, only to return to her true form (that of a fanged crone with sunken black eyes, talons, raven wings, and a donkey’s tail) at the height of the wedding’s consummation that evening, at which point she castrates the husband and vanishes. Those who survive often receive visits decades later from twisted and hideous half-fiends—their sons or daughters, sent by Mestama to finish off the job and murder their fathers. Mestama’s cult is a hateful one, composed entirely of eunuchs or women who live for the spread of cruelty through deception. Her cultists generally regard competing faiths (such as worshipers of Gyronna) with jealous anger. The Mother of Witches dwells in an Abyssal realm called the Barren Wood, a vexing forest of dead and dying pine and fir trees. Decrepit houses serve witches and hags as dens or traps, and darker creatures haunt the more desolate reaches of the wood. Certain remote forests in Avistan (particularly in Nidal, Taldor, and Galt) are said to connect to the Barren Wood—those who unknowingly wander too deeply into these areas can become lost forever.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：女巫之母、欺骗之王、鬼婆恶魔之王和欺骗 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：残忍、欺骗、鬼婆 
领域：混乱、魅力、邪恶、诡计 
子领域：欺骗、恶魔、欲望、偷窃 
偏好武器：冲刺匕首 
圣徽：三块锋利的石头之眼 
圣兽：黑寡妇 
女巫、女巫和复仇寡妇的守护神，Mestama 非常高兴在婚礼前一天晚上谋杀幼年女性，这样她就可以变成她们的样子并嫁给她们准丈夫们，只是在当晚婚礼圆满结束时变回了她的真实形态（长着长牙的老太婆，长着尖牙，长着凹陷的黑眼睛、爪子、乌鸦翅膀和驴尾巴），这时她阉割了丈夫消失了。那些幸存下来的人经常会在几十年后受到扭曲而丑陋的半恶魔的拜访——他们的儿子或女儿，被梅斯塔玛派来完成工作并谋杀他们的父亲。梅斯塔玛的教派是一个可恶的教派，完全由太监或妇女组成，她们为通过欺骗传播残忍而活。她的教徒通常以嫉妒的愤怒看待相互竞争的信仰（例如吉罗娜的崇拜者）。女巫之母居住在一个叫做贫瘠森林的深渊国度，这是一片充满枯死和垂死的松树和冷杉的令人烦恼的森林。破旧的房屋充当女巫和女巫的巢穴或陷阱，而更黑暗的生物出没于森林中更荒凉的地方。据说阿维斯坦的某些偏远森林（尤其是尼达尔、塔尔多和高尔特）与贫瘠森林相连——那些不知不觉地深入这些地区的人可能会永远迷路。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mestama
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 梅斯塔马

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The World Thunder   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Caverns, Mountains, Volcanoes   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Earth, Fire   
Subdomains: Ash, Catastrophe, Caves, Smoke   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy pick   
Holy Symbol: Shattered triangular rune   
The ancient entity known as Mhar first attempted to enter Golarion eons ago, using the planet’s crust as a womb. The attempt to manifest failed for unknown reasons; perhaps the alignment of the planets was not right, or perhaps other entities acted to still the birth before it came to term. Yet Mhar’s cult believes not that their god failed to be born, but rather that its gestation is merely one measured in eons. The cult further believes that the time for Mhar’s birth draws near, and that when the Great Old One—said to dwell deep under the tallest mountain in the Inner Sea region, a peak in the Kodar Mountains known as Mhar Massif—finally wakens, it will transform much of northern Avistan into a new realm of fire and ash that will spread across world. The time of this birth, the cult believes, can be predicted by a sudden increase in the number of violent, fatal earthquakes and sudden instances of volcanism throughout the world, and some of Mhar’s more powerful worshipers seek to hasten that birth by triggering their own tectonic disasters in key places. Mhar’s true shape is unknown, for the deity technically has yet to enter existence. In images created by its cult, the Great Old One is generally depicted as a volcano-shaped leviathan, its caldera surrounded by huge fangs of molten lava and its slopes bearing forests of terrifying, razorsharp crystal limbs.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：世界轰鸣
阵营：混乱中立
区域： 洞穴，山脉与火山
等级：旧日支配者
领域：混乱、破坏、大地、火焰
子领域：灰烬，天灾，洞窟，烟幕
偏好武器：重十字镐
圣徽：碎裂的三角符文
无数纪元之前，被称为玛尔的古老存在初次尝试进入格拉里昂而将星球的地壳用作子宫。然而祂对显现的尝试由于未知原因失败了：或许由于群星的排列并不正确，又或许其他实体采取行动阻止了祂的诞生。不过，玛尔教团并不认为他们的神未能诞生，而是认为他的孕育期需以亿万年为单位衡量。教团进一步认为，玛尔的降诞之刻已愈发临近，而当这位旧日支配者——据说居住在内海地区最高的山峰，寇达山脉，也被称作玛尔山峦之下的深邃所在——最终醒来时，祂会将阿维斯塔北部的大部分地区变为属于火焰与灰烬的崭新国度并蔓延至整个世界。教团认为降诞之刻可以通过世界各地的突发激烈冲突、剧烈地震和火山活动的急剧增加来预测，而一些较为强大的玛尔信徒则通过在关键地点引发人为的灾害寻求将其提前。
玛尔的真实形态无人知晓，因这位神祇严格来说还未形成实体。在其教团创作的图像之中，这位旧日支配者被描绘为形似火山的巨兽，火山口为凝固熔岩形成的巨大獠牙环绕，山坡上生有狰狞锐利的水晶丛林。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mhar
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 玛尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Everbloom   
Realm(s): Refuge of the Red Rose, Axis/ Milani's Garden, Elysium   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Hope, Devotion, Uprisings   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Healing, Liberation, Protection   
Subdomains: Azata, Defense, Freedom, Purity, Restoration, Revolution   
Favoured Weapon: Morningstar (Mace)   
Holy Symbol: Rose on Bloody Street   
Sacred Animal: Mouse   
Sacred Colours: Red, White   
The minor goddess Milani, also known as the Everbloom, is the patron of all those who fight against oppression and unjust rule. Her symbol is a rose growing out of a blood-soaked street. Until the death of Aroden in 4606 AR, the goddess Milani was simply one of dozens of saints within the Last Azlanti's faith. She was the beacon of hope to all those who fought against repressive regimes, giving courage to those who had little but their desire to live a free life. The death of her patron, combined with the tremendous upheaval and suffering that followed his death, gave her a focus and attracted many new followers. Those devoted to her found the courage to organize the rebellions against the infernal takeover of the Chelish Empire, helping many of her outlying territories break free of its control. They fought against the slow slide into barbarism, restoring people's hope that a just and good society could be restored. Milani has never been as popular as Aroden's other followers,such as Iomedae, perhaps because the Inheritor's worship had already been firmly established before their patron's passing. Milani has two realms: Milani's Garden in Elysium, where she spends most of her time, and the Refuge of the Red Rose in Axis, a small corner located within the collapsing divine realm of Aroden. Only a few square miles in size, the Refuge of the Red Rose sits near the center of her former patron's realm. From here she gives aid to all those fighting oppression and evil, strives to mitigate the institutionalised inequality in Axis, and seeks to relocate the downtrodden to friendlier places.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：永绽之花
阵营：混乱善良
神职：希望、奉献、起义
领域：混乱、善良、医疗、自由、保护
子领域：爱塔、防御, 解放, 纯净, 复原, 革命
偏好武器：钉头锤(重型硬头锤) 
圣徽：在染血的土壤上生长出的一朵美丽的玫瑰 
圣兽：老鼠
密拉妮是反抗压迫之人的守护神，她祝福那些愿意牺牲性命，运用各种方式为无力之人而战的人，尤其是那些帮助俘虏或奴隶的人。在格拉里昂，密拉妮也被称为永绽之花，因为她的圣徽便是在染血的土壤上生长出的一朵美丽的玫瑰。
密拉妮的教会通常是独立的秘密自由斗士组织，而非传统的教会体制。密拉妮的牧师通常经营或者拥有一些低调的小生意或者组织，精心伪装成门脸，用以掩饰背后推翻当地的压迫者，解放那些被奴役，被危害之人的组织。为了隐晦地告知其他密拉妮信徒这一机构的真实用意，这些建筑物通常都带有一个小小的玫瑰园或是其他的玫瑰图案。最古老，最悠久的一个密拉妮安全屋，是位于艾巴萨罗姆，名为“纵情一刺”的一家旅馆，它曾是该地区数百次成功解救行动的中转站。虽然大多数人相信这家旅馆在摧毁了艾巴萨罗姆悬崖区的地震中被毁了，但坊间流传着一个大篷车队的传闻。据说这是一群乘着大篷车四处旅行的密拉妮信徒，他们用这家旅馆的名字自称，从一个地方移动到另一个地方，与各种形式的暴政抗争，不惜一切代价为自由而战。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Milani
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 密拉妮

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Milani's Sacred Weapon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 密拉妮的神圣武器

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Condition of All   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Aeon   
Areas of Concern: Creation, The infinite, Truth   
Domains: Artifice, Darkness, Knowledge, Void (Travel)   
Favoured Weapon: Unarmed   
Holy Symbol: Spiral galaxy   
The Monad is less a being than an ancient design that touches upon and is reflected in all corners of existence. It is intrinsically without form, operating almost exclusively through the host of aeons for which it is the guiding force, originating spirit, and nexus of thought. In fact, due to the way the Monad creates, reabsorbs, and reshapes the aeons’ quintessence, it behaves as much like a plane as a deity, seeming to exist and act outside even the cycle of souls. To aeons, the Monad isn’t merely an expression of the void that predated the cosmos, creation itself, the future infinity, and the truth that binds existence: it actually is all of those things. The Monad’s goals appear fixated on the cosmic status quo. On one hand, the entity seems content so long as the planes are in balance with each other. On the other hand, countless aeons seem to police the multiverse and sustain it based on some inscrutable model that most other beings describe as slightly out of sync with the gods’ designs. Some have speculated that the Monad isn’t simply reality’s figurative immune system but rather is from a previous existence that it aims to recreate with subtle nudges that interact with the present reality’s needs in alien ways. The Monad is an unlikely divine patron. Without approaching the level of detachment and selflessness of an aeon, a mortal worshipper cannot hope to connect with the Monad on anything more than a philosophical level. However, a rare few can tap into the Condition of All, experiencing flashes of insight and wordless directives as if these contemplatives were fledgling aeons. It is unclear if the Monad is even cognizant of its worshippers, though as long as a priest remains centered, honors its vague orders, and works to maintain balance, she can draw upon her patron for spellcasting and even greater boons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：所有阵营的条件：中立
形态：Aeon 
领域：创造、无限、真理
领域：技艺、黑暗、知识、虚空（旅行） 偏好武器：手无寸铁的
圣徽：螺旋星系一种古老的设计，触及并反映在存在的各个角落。它本质上是无形的，几乎完全通过万劫来运作，它是引导力量、起源精神和思想的纽带。事实上，由于 Monad 创造、重新吸收和重塑永恒精髓的方式，它的行为就像一个位面，就像一个神灵，似乎在灵魂的循环之外存在和行动。对永恒而言，Monad 不仅仅是宇宙、创造本身、未来的无限以及束缚存在的真理的表达：它实际上是所有这些东西。 Monad 的目标似乎专注于宇宙现状。一方面，只要位面彼此平衡，实体似乎就满足了。另一方面，无数的永恒似乎在监管着多元宇宙并根据一些难以理解的模型来维持它，大多数其他生物将其描述为与众神的设计略有不同步。一些人推测，Monad 不仅仅是现实的比喻性免疫系统，而是来自以前的存在，它旨在通过微妙的推动重新创造，以外星方式与当前现实的需求相互作用。 Monad是一个不太可能的神圣守护神。如果没有达到永恒的超然和无私的水平，凡人的崇拜者就只能在哲学层面上与单子建立联系。然而，很少有人能够进入万有之境，体验顿悟的闪光和无言的指示，就好像这些冥想者是初出茅庐的万世。尚不清楚 Monad 是否知道它的崇拜者，尽管只要一位祭司保持居中，遵守其模糊的命令，并努力保持平衡，她就可以利用她的守护神来施法甚至更大的恩惠。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Monad
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 始一

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The monitors are enigmatic and ever at odds, yet all share a duty to the fundamental nature of reality. Acting together, they create a homeostasis perfectly suited to maintaining the multiverse as it now exists. The Aeons claim they forged the monitors in the fires of creation, while Psychopomps insist their beloved Pharasma anointed the first monitors to ensure the smooth flow of souls. Inevitables claim they first gave faces to the rules of reality, and Proteans believe that other monitors are simply corrupted Proteans. Monitors seem born from the multiverse itself—fractured pieces of a mind that finds equilibrium only in the conflict of its component parts.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 御衡者是神秘的，总是矛盾的，但所有人都对现实的基本性质负有责任。他们一起行动，创造了一个非常适合维持现在存在的多元宇宙的稳态。 Aeons 声称他们在创造之火中锻造了御衡者，而 招魂使 则坚称他们心爱的 Pharasma 涂抹了第一批御衡者以确保灵魂的顺畅流动。 Inevitables 声称他们首先给现实规则以面孔，而 Proteans 认为其他御衡者只是腐败的 Proteans。御衡者似乎是从多元宇宙本身中诞生的——心灵的碎片，只有在其组成部分的冲突中才能找到平衡。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Monitors
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 御衡者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A mooncaller is bound to the subtle influences of the ever-changing moon and its endless cycles from light to dark and back again.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 唤月者会受到不断变化的月亮的微妙影响，以及它从光明到黑暗再回来的无尽循环。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mooncaller
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 唤月者

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Charnel God   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Darkness, Ghouls, The Voices of the dead   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Darkness, Death, Evil   
Subdomains: Entropy, Loss, Night, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Scimitar   
Holy Symbol: Bloody fangs surrounded by darkness   
In ancient times, Mordiggian was the god of ghouls, yet as these undead spread throughout the countless worlds, many of them lost their way and fell into decadence. These ghouls have forgotten the Charnel God, and only pockets of those from Leng who have not degenerated maintain the ancient rites today. Mordiggian’s primary worshipers in the modern era are humans who venerate him as a death god, yet to the untrained eye, these men and women are little more than ghouls themselves. Using vile rituals and surgical practices, they transform their limbs and visages into ghoulish countenances. In cities where such grotesqueries would cause incident, his worshipers wear heavy cloaks and silver masks to hide their shapes. Mordiggian’s temples are grand mausoleum-cathedrals placed in positions of prominence in their cities. Cities that host such temples have no graveyards of their own, for the priests of Mordiggian collect the bodies of the dead and place them, free of charge, into their sacred vaults for “disposal.” As such, undead and corpse-borne disease are rare contagions in cities under Mordiggian’s care, yet sometimes his priests are too eager in gathering the “dead,” and have been known to take away those in comas or deathlike trances from which they could have recovered. Mordiggian is a living cloud of darkness, capable of congealing and coalescing all or portions of his form within the inky depths to serve his needs, whether he’s manifesting a long, grasping limb to pluck a ripened morsel from a coffin-platter, or visiting his wrath upon those who dare to tread upon halls where only the dead may walk. The Charnel God’s favored form is that of an immense worm with a set of grasping tentacles arrayed around a central maw; this fanged maw appears often in the god’s symbology.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：阴森寒骨之神
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：黑暗，食尸鬼与死者之声
等级：旧日支配者 
领域：混乱、黑暗、死亡、邪恶
子领域：熵，失却，暗夜，亡灵
偏好武器：弯刀
圣徽：黑暗环绕的血腥尖牙
远古时代，莫尔迪基安曾是食尸鬼之神，然而当这些亡灵遍布无数世界时，它们中的大部分迷失方向堕入颓废。这些食尸鬼已经忘记了阴森寒骨之神，只有那些来自冷原的未堕落者仍将古老仪式保留至今。
时至今日，莫尔迪基安的主要信徒是将祂当做死神来敬拜的人类。然而在常人眼中，这些男女却与食尸鬼无异。透过邪恶的仪式和外科手术，他们将四肢和面容变成可怖的形状。若置身于如此怪诞行为会招来麻烦的城市，祂的信徒便已厚重斗篷和银色面具来遮掩身形。莫尔迪基安的神殿是位于城市要地的陵墓圣堂。拥有此种神殿的城市通常没有墓地，因为莫尔迪基安的牧师会收集死者的尸体，将其免费安置在神圣地窖中进行“处置”。正因如此，莫尔迪基安关注下的城市罕有亡灵生物和通过尸体传播的疾病，不过祂的牧师可能会过于渴望收集“死亡”而将那些虽处于昏迷或死状迷眠中但原可恢复的人带走。
莫尔迪基安形如黑暗活云，能够随祂所需在深邃至暗中凝聚部分或全部的身躯，时而展现一只修长而贪婪的肢体自棺台中攫取熟成食物，时而向那些踏足唯有死者才被允许行走的大厅的活人宣泄愤怒。阴森寒骨之神偏爱巨口周围生有触手的巨型蠕虫形态，这种尖牙巨口时常出现在祂的徽记之中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mordiggian
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 莫尔迪基安

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Flesheater  
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Consumption, Renewal, Transformation   
Domains: Animal, Destruction, Healing, Repose  
Favoured Weapon: Sickle   
Holy Symbol: Two crossed diagonal lines with an empty circle above and a filled circle below   
Few things dwell willingly in the Rasputitase, a realm of muck, massive trees, and jagged islands in the Boneyard’s Spirelands, save for the most reclusive of Pharasma’s ushers and her immediate servants. Mother Vulture reflects the duality of rot: the creation and new life that arises from destruction. She is a merciless and unrepentant killer, but also a thoughtful mother, embracing newborns and blessing midwives with long lives and eager students. With her two heads—masked save for her cavernous mouths—Mother Vulture devours the bodies of Pharasma’s enemies to birth neutral-aligned outsiders to serve the Boneyard. Her gruesome feasts leave fertile soil and renewed potential in her wake, and as matron of transformation, she also measures those seeking redemption in life. The Flesheater usually appears as a young, blind mother, but her natural form is barely humanoid and repulsive to behold. Her masked heads are barely supported by her two distended necks, their weight forcing her to hunch low to the ground. She conceals her body beneath four black-feathered wings, which she unfurls when feeding upon new flesh.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：食肉者 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：灵态引导者 
领域：消耗、更新、转化 
领域：动物、毁灭、治疗、安眠 
偏好武器：镰刀 
圣徽：两条交叉的对角线，上方为空圆圈，下方为实心圆圈Rasputitase 几乎没有什么东西愿意居住在 Boneyard 的 Spirelands 中，这是一个由淤泥、大树和锯齿状岛屿组成的王国，除了最隐居的 Pharasma 的引座员和她的直接仆人。秃鹰妈妈反映了腐烂的二元性：从破坏中产生的创造和新生命。她是一个无情不悔改的杀手，也是一个体贴的母亲，怀抱新生儿，祝福助产士长寿和热心的学生。秃鹰妈妈用她的两个头——除了她的海绵状嘴外，都被蒙面——吞噬了 Pharasma 敌人的尸体，从而产生了中立的外来者，为 Boneyard 服务。她可怕的盛宴在她身后留下了肥沃的土壤和新的潜力，作为转变的主妇，她还衡量那些在生活中寻求救赎的人。食肉者通常以幼年、目盲的母亲的形象出现，但她的自然形态几乎不是人形，而且令人厌恶。她的蒙面头几乎被她两条膨胀的脖子支撑着，它们的重量迫使她低着头倒在地上。她将自己的身体隐藏在四个黑色羽毛的翅膀下，当她以新肉为食时，它会展开。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mother Vulture
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 秃鹰之母

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Death's Consort  
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Poetry, Trauma, War  
Domains: Charm, Death, Repose, War  
Favoured Weapon: Greatsword   
Holy Symbol: A circle with five curved lines extending from it 
Mrtyu was the first mortal to die with love on his lips, and Pharasma found the concept intriguing. She wooed the soldier’s soul, and through him she came to understand the emotions of the living. Death’s Consort is a being of strong passions—a commodity often in short supply in the Boneyard—and embraces the souls of those who died in the grips of extreme emotion. He is the usher of soldiers and murder victims, but also those who die of suicide, and Mrtyu feels the rising of each ghost, wight, and other malcontent undead as the pang of personal failure. As much a fighter as a lover, the usher also commands Pharasma’s defenses, often working alongside the Pale Horse to hunt those few who would make an enemy of the Gray Lady. Still resembling his mortal origins, Mrtyu appears as a beautiful young man bearing deep and dark sunken eyes, adorned in rock-rose blossoms and perpetually bleeding from a large wound in his stomach. He carries a basket of fresh fruit or flowers in one hand, and his rusted greatsword, Ardor, in the other. He maintains his realm, the Garden Anima, among Pharasma’s Court as a quiet refuge for souls who need time to reflect and talk after particularly traumatic deaths. While he can occasionally be found at Pharasma’s side, the usher’s intimate connection with the goddess is more an emotional one than a physical one.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：死神 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：诗歌、创伤、战争
领域：魅惑、死亡、安息、战争 
偏好武器：巨剑 
圣徽：一个有五条曲线从它延伸出来的圆圈 Mrtyu 是第一个凡人带着爱死在他的嘴唇上，Pharasma 发现这个概念很有趣。她追求士兵的灵魂，通过他，她了解了生者的情感。 Death's Consort 是一个有着强烈激情的存在——一种在 Boneyard 中经常供不应求的商品——并且拥抱那些在极端情绪中死去的人的灵魂。他是士兵和谋杀受害者的领路人，也是那些死于自杀的人，Mrtyu 将每一个幽灵、wight 和其他不满的不死生物的崛起视为个人失败的痛苦。作为爱人的战士，引座员也指挥着法拉斯玛的防御，经常与苍白的马一起工作，追捕那些少数可能与灰色女士为敌的人。与他的凡人血统相似，Mrtyu 看起来像一个美丽的幼年人，有着深沉而深沉的眼睛，装饰着岩蔷薇花，腹部的大伤口不断流血。他一只手拿着一篮新鲜水果或鲜花，另一只手拿着生锈的大剑Ardor。他在法拉斯玛的法庭中维持着他的领域，即阿尼玛花园，作为在经历了特别痛苦的死亡后需要时间反思和交谈的灵魂的安静避难所。虽然他偶尔会出现在 Pharasma 身边，但引座员与女神的亲密联系更多是情感上的，而不是身体上的。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mrtyu
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 玛缇

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your mythic powers unlock the latent draconic might in your drake companion, granting it new abilities based off its own Drake Power choices.
If your drake has a greater breath weapon it gains access to the mythic variant, dealing 1d6 damage per class level. It also deals no damage to allies. 
If your drake has the draken claws ability it gains 2 natural wing attacks and the Multiattack feat.
If your drake has the keen mind ability it gains a Charisma bonus equal to its level minus 5, along with a limited spellbook. Spells granted this way are spontaneously cast and scale using Charisma. Spells granted are dependent on which type of dragon the drake is descended from.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的神话之力解锁了你的龙兽伙伴身上潜在的龙之力量，根据它自己的龙之力量选择赋予它新的能力。如果你的龙兽拥有高等喷吐武器，它可以使用神话变体，每职业等级造成 1d6 伤害。它也不会对盟友造成伤害。如果你的龙兽拥有龙爪能力，它会获得 2 次天生的翼击和多重攻击专长。如果你的龙兽拥有敏锐思维能力，它将获得等于其等级 -5 的魅力加值，以及有限的法术书。以这种方式授予的法术属于自发施法并使用魅力作为主施法属性。授予的法术取决于龙兽是哪种龙类的后裔。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mythical Drake
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神话龙兽

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Lost Maiden   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Drowning, Romantic Tragedy, Suicide
Domains: Charm, Nobility, Repose, Water   
Subdomains: Love, Lust, Martyr, Souls   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Ornate golden dagger   
Sacred Animal: Swan   
The goddess Naderi was a divine assistant to Shelyn and was tasked with overseeing forbidden relationships among couples. She ascended to divinity when a young couple under her gaze decided to kill themselves instead of fighting the circumstances that forbade their love. Shocked by her apotheosis and afraid of how Shelyn would react, Naderi fled her mistress and finally became the goddess of suicides, particularly romantic tragedies. Shelyn has tried to fix this strange divide between the two of them, but has been unsuccessful due to unusual circumstances. Unlike the adherents of other neutral divinities, few people worship Naderi openly, or for a lifetime. Most of her faithful turn to her only as a last resort when they feel their love is doomed.Those left behind by a loved one’s suicide may supplicate Naderi to care for the departed one—or, in anger at the abandonment, may beseech the goddess to bar the gates of her realm to the deceased, though such prayers are likely to be answered with signs of the goddess’s displeasure.Naderi’s secondary aspect as a goddess of drowning sometimes leads the parents of drowned children to beg her to shepherd their children’s souls safely into the afterlife.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：迷失少女
阵营：绝对中立
神职：溺水、爱情悲剧、自杀
领域：魅惑、崇高、宁静、流水 
子领域：爱慕、情欲、殉难、灵魂
偏好武器：匕首 
圣徽：华丽的金色匕首 
圣兽：天鹅
女神奈德丽曾是纱林的神仆之一，奈德丽得知塔尔多的一对恋人长期以来一直祈求永恒玫瑰的保护，却很快就失去了希望。爱超越了凡间的阻隔，她在一片大瀑布的薄雾中亲自现身于他们面前。为了鼓舞这对恋人，她解释到，爱是少有的有时能超越生命终结，将灵魂聚集在一起的纽带之一。令她震惊的是，年轻的恋人们完全按字面理解了她的话；他们拥抱在一起，跳进了瀑布，感谢她在生命的最后为他们展示了真正在一起的道路。
她本不打算把这对恋人带到死亡之地，这一牺牲推动惊愕的奈德丽成为了自杀，特别是殉情的庇护主。她的晋升烧尽了本性中那些与这领域无关的元素。大多数形式的美无法再触动她，只有爱情的美和悲剧浪漫的诱惑仍在召唤着她。她获得真正快乐的大多数能力也被抛在了身后，只剩下了苦中作乐。奈德丽对自己内心的变化感到恐惧，她认为自己背叛了莎琳，不小心把两位信徒变成了自己的，同时又把他们逼到了自杀的境地，因此逃离了纱林的领域。
莎琳追了过去，不是出于愤怒，而是担心，但奈德丽躲开了她。几个世纪以来，永恒玫瑰多次试图找到奈德丽，因为她感觉到迷失少女的本性正逐渐变得更加黑暗，并决心不再像失去哥哥宗·库山那样失去另一位所爱。与此同时，黑暗之神厄加图雅和泽弗斯也向奈德丽示好，希望鼓励她绽放出人格中更虚无主义的一面。奈德丽本人处在不稳定的平衡中，她执着于作为莎琳的仆人所经历的光明、爱情和美好的记忆，同时也在与一种越来越强烈的信念即爱只有在死亡中才能实现，以及对自杀美学的迷恋进行斗争。她的外观是一位黑发的年轻女子，有着阴魂萦绕的一双大眼睛，穿着浸透了水的白色衣服，手里拿着一把匕首。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Naderi
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奈德丽

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Serpent's Kiss, First Mother, Queen of Nagas   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Fertility, Nagaji, Snakes, Sorcery   
Edict: Seek out magic and use it, use poison, heal poisons, bear or adopt children, raise snakes   
Domains: Charm, Magic, Nobility, Rune, Scalykind  
Subdomains: Arcane, Divine, Leadership, Love, Lust, Wards   
Favoured Weapon: Urumi (Sai)   
Holy Symbol: Lotus flower wherein a snake lies coiled   
Sacred Animal: Snake   
Nalinivati was the legendary first queen of Nagajor, who gave birth to the varied naga races in ages past. A powerful sorceress, Nalinivati used her own sorcery to ascend to godhood. Called the Queen of Nagas, Nalinivati is the goddess of sorcery and snakes, and is the patron goddess of the nagaji. Also known as the Serpent’s Kiss, Nalinivati is a goddess of fertility as well, and has been romantically linked with Daikitsu, though the two goddesses neither confirm nor deny the rumors. Her worship is most widespread in Nagajor, but sorcerers, nagas, smitten lovers, and snake cults throughout Tian Xia venerate her. Nalinivati appears as an immense naga with brilliantly colored hair and scales. She is often depicted in art as emerging from an egg, or as guarding a clutch of eggs.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：蛇之吻、第一母亲、纳迦女王 
阵营：绝对中立 
神职：生育、纳迦、蛇、巫术
信条：寻找魔法并使用它、使用毒药、治愈毒药、生育或收养孩子、养蛇
领域：魅力、魔法、崇高、符文、鳞类
子域：奥术、神力、领导、爱慕、情欲、守护
偏好武器：软剑（十手） 
圣徽：蛇盘绕的莲花 
圣兽：蛇
传奇般的纳丽尼瓦提被奉为纳迦王国的第一女王，也正是她生育了各个纳迦种族到世上，并且通过自己伟大的法术力量她得以升神，并被她的信徒称为纳迦女皇。纳丽尼瓦提是巫术与蛇类之神，也是纳迦裔的种族守护神，她的另一个尊号是圣蛇之吻——代表她让土地富饶的能力，也因为这个原因，纳丽尼瓦提常常被认为和大狐女有点说不清道不明的关系——当然两个女神都认为这是扯淡或者根本不予理会。  纳丽尼瓦提的主要信仰者集中在纳迦国，不过，天洲的术士、纳迦、恋爱者和拜蛇信徒也崇拜她。纳丽尼瓦提的化身是一条鳞片和头发闪闪发光的巨大纳迦，在艺术作品中，她也常被描绘成正在破壳而出，或者正在守护着自己的卵的形象。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Nalinivati
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 纳丽尼瓦提

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Cleansing Sentence 
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Atonement, Difficult choices, Pain  
Domains: Death, Magic, Repose, Rune  
Favoured Weapon: Greataxe   
Holy Symbol: Vertical line intersected by two diagonal lines and capped with a circle 
A composite entity, Narakaas is born from the untold pieces of souls cleaved off as mortals grew and discarded parts of themselves. They reflect personal choices, sacrifice of self, and countless little deaths that come before a soul finally arrives in the Boneyard. They understand that a broken thing—especially one repaired—is not less valuable but simply different, and sometimes even more precious for the history it now embodies. In mortals, such personal change is difficult and almost always accompanied by physical and emotional pain, and many souls wind up straddling two extremes or failing to complete their transformation before they die. The Cleansing Sentence offers such souls the option to endure terrible pain or perform onerous tasks to prove their commitment to redemption or damnation. They are also the psychopomp who judges good mortals driven to terrible deeds by their beliefs and convictions and tests their mettle to see where their souls truly belong. Narakaas represents the acceptance of pain and the growth it fosters; they don’t revel in pain, and entities that do—such as kytons—are anathema to the Cleansing Sentence. Shockingly optimistic given their purview, Narakaas believes in the power of redemption, and they have turned a number of kytons to the Boneyard’s cause. The Cleansing Sentence manifests as an androgynous, humanoid form with stag-like legs, assembled from thousands of smaller pieces held together by a golden light. Nothing beyond simple, expressionless eyes and tear-stained streaks mar their otherwise featureless face. Their divine realm, Menagerel, is likewise patchwork, assembled from a thousand painful memories of home.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：净化句子 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：赎罪、困难选择、痛苦 
领域：死亡、魔法、休息、符文 
偏好武器：巨斧
圣徽：由两条对角线相交并以圆圈为顶的垂直线Narakaas 是一个复合实体，诞生于无数灵魂碎片，这些灵魂碎片随着凡人的成长而被割裂并丢弃了自己的一部分。它们反映了个人选择、自我牺牲以及灵魂最终到达墓地之前发生的无数次小死亡。他们明白，一件破损的东西——尤其是修复过的东西——不仅价值不低，而且完全不同，有时甚至因为它现在所体现的历史而更加珍贵。在凡人中，这样的个人转变是困难的，而且几乎总是伴随着身体和情感上的痛苦，许多灵魂最终跨越了两个极端，或者未能在死前完成转变。 Cleansing Sentence 为这些灵魂提供了忍受可怕痛苦或执行繁重任务以证明他们对救赎或诅咒的承诺的选择。他们也是精神病患者，他们判断因信仰和信念驱使做出可怕行为的好人，并测试他们的勇气，看看他们的灵魂真正属于哪里。 Narakaas 代表着对痛苦的接受和它所促进的成长；他们不陶醉于痛苦，而那些这样做的实体——例如 kytons——是对净化句的诅咒。鉴于他们的职权范围令人震慑的乐观，Narakaas 相信救赎的力量，他们已经将许多 kytons 转向了 Boneyard 的事业。净化句显现为一个雌雄同体的人形，有着雄鹿般的腿，由数千个小块组装而成，被一道金色的光芒连接在一起。除了简单、没有表情的眼睛和泪痕累累的条纹之外，没有什么能破坏他们原本毫无特征的脸。他们的神圣领域，猛虎，同样是拼凑而成，由一千个关于家乡的痛苦记忆拼凑而成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Narakaas
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 纳拉克斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Crownless, The Maker of Kings, Intercessor of the Speakers 
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Form: Protean Lord  
Areas of Concern: Ascendance, Keketars, Revelations  
Domains: Chaos, Knowledge, Liberation, Madness   
Favoured Weapon: Handaxe   
Holy Symbol: Imentesh head wreathed in flame   
Narriseminek, sometimes called Intercessor of the Speakers, often manifests as a naunet, imentesh, or keketar protean, with a circular scar or burn upon its head as if it had been mutilated by a molten crown. Their rarely observed true form is that of a golden, iridescent protean with empty eye sockets, crowned with a drifting halo of dozens of burning eyes. They rarely deal with non-proteans, as they are largely occupied with exalting lesser proteans into keketars or izfiitars as well as granting philosophy-altering revelations to entire choruses at a time. The clergy of the Crownless focus on prophecy and transformation, spending their time divining the future and using transformative magic to alter their bodies and those of any other willing creatures—an act which the Maker of Kings supports. Members of Narriseminek’s clergy have even been known to physically embody their own patron. The domain of Narriseminek, whose name is sung and largely incomprehensible to non-proteans, is more commonly known as the Drifting Mountain of Narriseminek the Crownless. A massive, mileswide concretion of stone and crystal with myriad constellation islands, it pulses with a subtle heartbeat and contains a great subterranean temple of the proteans’ dualistic divinity. At the heart of this domain is a mysterious artifact known as the Singing-Luminous Eye of the Speakers.

称号：无冕者、国王的创造者、演讲者的代祷者
阵营：混乱中立
形态：多变的领主

领域：混乱、知识、解放、疯狂
偏好武器：手斧
圣徽：Imentesh 头环在火焰中，纳瑞斯米内克，有时被称为代祷者，通常表现为一个 naunet、imentesh 或 keketar protean，头上有一个圆形疤痕或烧伤，就好像它被熔化的王冠肢解了一样。他们很少见到的真实形态是一个金色的、闪烁着虹彩的变化无常的人，眼窝空空如也，头上戴着数十只燃烧着的眼睛的飘荡光环。他们很少与非变形者打交道，因为他们主要忙于将较小的变形者提升为 keketars 或 izfiitars 以及一次向整个合唱团提供改变哲学的启示。无冕者的神职人员专注于预言和改造，他们将时间花在预测未来并使用改造魔法来改变他们和任何其他自愿生物的身体——国王的创造者支持这种行为。 Narriseminek 的神职人员甚至以身体上体现了他们自己的守护神而闻名。 Narriseminek 的领地，它的名字被歌唱，非变形者在很大程度上难以理解，通常被称为无冠的 Narriseminek 的漂流山。一个巨大的、数英里宽的石头和水晶结块，上面有无数的星座岛，它以微妙的心跳脉动，并包含一个巨大的地下神殿，里面有千变万化的二元神性。在这个领域的核心是一个神秘的神器，被称为说话者的歌夜之眼。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Narriseminek
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 纳瑞色尼米克

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Ruler of Arrows   
Alignment: Neutral Good   
Areas of Concern: Hunting, War, Weaving   
Domains: Animal, Artifice, Good, War, Water   
Subdomains: Agathion, Construct, Feather, Fur, Oceans, Tactics   
Favoured Weapon: Shortbow   
Holy Symbol: A shield and two crossed arrows   
Sacred Animal: Bee   
Neith is a goddess of war and hunting, but also of domestic arts such as weaving. She stands guard over the bodies of fallen soldiers and is responsible for teaching humanity how to make the weapons of war. From her loom, she also weaves bandages and shrouds for wounded or slain warriors, and in this aspect she is venerated as a funerary goddess. Neith is the protector of the stomach, and guards the canopic jar that holds this organ. A divinity of creation, Neith is said to weave the world on her loom every day, though Ptah and Ra are more usually venerated as creators. Neith is also a water deity, and as Wadjet is the embodiment of the River Sphinx, Neith is goddess of the oceans that surround Osirion. While on a long hunt in the desert, Neith encountered Set, and their liaison resulted in the birth of a son, the crocodile god Sobek. Neith is respected for her wisdom, and on many occasions has served as a mediator between Horus and Set. Neith appears as a woman wearing a red deshret crown. She is occasionally depicted wearing armor, and always carries a bow and arrows. Hunters, rangers, sailors, smiths, soldiers, and warriors all worship Neith as their patron. Clerics of Neith are usually skilled smiths or weavers, or both, and like their goddess, they do not marry.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：箭矢女王
阵营：中立善良
神职：狩猎、战争、编织
领域：动物、工匠、善良、战争、流水
子领域：盖森、构装、飞羽、毛兽、海、战术
偏好武器：短弓
圣徽：盾与交矢
圣兽：蜂
奈斯是战争与狩猎的女神，但同时也司掌了诸如纺织等家务工艺。祂守望战死士兵的尸骸，也是教授人类制作兵器的神明。由于祂也用织机为伤兵制作绷带、为战死者编出裹尸布，祂在这方面也被视为葬礼之神。奈斯是胃的守护神，看护着装载了此一器官的卡诺波坛。也有一说祂是创世之神，每日在织机前编织著世界，但一般而言造物主之位属于卜塔或拉。
奈斯也是水神，一如瓦吉特是史芬斯河的化身一般，奈斯象征了围绕奥西里昂的大海。有次在沙漠中的漫长狩猎时，奈斯偶遇了赛特，一夜风流以后产下了鳄神索贝克一子。奈斯因其睿智受诸神敬重，长多次出面调停荷鲁斯与赛特的争执。奈斯以头戴红冠的女性形象示人，通常穿着盔甲，而弓箭从不离身。
猎人、游侠、水手、铁匠、士兵及武人将奈斯作为守护神敬拜。奈斯的牧师常是技艺精湛的铁匠和/或织工，并和他们所侍奉的神一样终身不娶嫁。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Neith
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奈斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Mistress of the Mansion   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Mourning, Night, Protection of the Dead   
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Community, Darkness, Protection   
Subdomains: Cooperation, Defense, Lust, Night, Protean, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Lightmace   
Holy Symbol: A basket atop a palice   
Sacred Animal: Kite   
The ancient Osirians placed great importance on the safety of their deceased loved ones, and Nephthys was a funerary deity who protected the dead and mourned their loss. In particular, Nephthys is the guardian of the lungs and the canopic jar that contains them. As her husband and brother Set is the god of darkness and deserts, Nephthys is the goddess of night and the edge of the desert, the border between civilization and wilderness. Nephthys is the sister oflsis and Osiris and the sister-wife of Set. Following Osiris's murder at the hands of Set, Nephthys grieved along with Isis, and helped her sister gather the scattered pieces of Osiris's dismembered body. She also nursed and protected the young Horus. Although she is Set's wife, Nephthys does not normally support her husband, instead siding with Isis and Osiris in most conflicts . Having conceived no children with Set, Nephthys plied Osiris with wine and seduced him, later giving birth to a son, Anubis. Nephthys appears as a woman with winged arms wearing a headdress in the shape of a basket atop a tower-a representation of the hieroglyphic symbol ofher name, and also her holy symbol. Nephthys does not usually have temples of her own, though she is often repre sented in churches of Anubis, Isis, and Osiris, or more rarely, alongside her husband Set in his temples. These small shrines are available for worshipers to leave their goddess small offerings and offer her prayers. Clerics of Nephthys assist other priests at funerals and work as professional mourners, even working closely with the church of Pharasma when needed.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：大院女士
阵营：混乱中立 
神职：哀悼、夜晚、守护亡者
领域：混乱、魅惑、联盟、黑暗、保护
子领域：合作、防御、情欲、暗夜、星灵、纯净
偏好武器：轻型硬头锤
圣徽：篮顶宫殿
圣兽：鸢
古奥西里昂人十分重视亲族死者的安宁，而奈芙蒂斯是守护亡者并为他们的离世哀悼的丧葬之神。具体来说，奈芙蒂斯是肺的守护神，庇护装载了该脏器的卡诺波坛。作为沙漠与黑暗之神赛特的妻子/姊妹，奈芙蒂斯是黑夜与沙漠边缘─文明与蛮荒的分界点─的女神。
奈芙蒂斯是伊西斯及欧西里斯的姊妹，同时也是赛特的配偶/姊妹。在欧西里斯惨死于赛特之手后，奈芙蒂斯与伊西斯一同哀悼，并帮助好姊妹回收夫君四散的尸块。祂也照顾过年幼时期的荷鲁斯。虽然身为赛特的妻子，奈芙蒂斯并不赞同丈夫的恶行，常与伊西斯及欧西里斯联手对抗之。由于与赛特长年无后，奈芙蒂斯灌醉勾引欧西里斯后，产下阿努比斯一子。奈芙蒂斯以双臂生羽，头戴篮顶宫殿─既是象征祂的象形文字也是圣徽─状的头饰的女子姿态示人。
一般没有专门供奉奈芙蒂斯的神殿，但在阿努比斯、伊西斯、欧西里斯的神庙中，甚至偶有罕见地在配偶赛特身侧立有神位。这些小祭坛一般被用来让信众向祂献上少许供品或是祈祷。奈芙蒂斯的牧师担任专业哭丧者来协助其他祭司进行丧礼，若有需要也会与法莱斯玛教会密切合作。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Nephthys
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奈芙蒂斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Hooded, The Lord of the Crossroads   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: The Seasons, Secrets, Wanderers   
Domains: Knowledge, Magic, Travel, Weather   
Subdomains: Exploration, Seasons, Thought, Trade   
Favoured Weapon: Gauntlet (Punching dagger)   
Holy Symbol: Silver hood containing stars and a comet   
Sacred Animal: Migratory animals   
Taciturn and mysterious, Ng the Hooded is the patron of those wanderers who—unlike happy-go-lucky Desnans—understand the seriousness of what they do, cognizant of the physical dangers of the open road as well as the larger metaphysical dangers such freedom represents. As with every traveler met on a lonely road far from civilization, the Lord of the Crossroads is an enigma. While many Eldest and gods like Norgorber concern themselves with secrets, Ng’s are perhaps the greatest, as even his most steadfast worshipers have no idea what he truly is, nor what ends he might be pursuing. Indeed, the Hooded rarely acknowledges his worshipers at all, leading some to question whether he’s actually responsible for granting spells to those who pray to him. Ng’s seemingly aimless wanderings and inscrutable questions have led to many theories about his nature. Some paint him as a ghost, the shade of some forgotten Eldest too powerful to abandon the First World entirely. Others cite his endless patience and logic as those of a clockwork automaton, a servant of whatever distant being created the Palace of Seasons, or perhaps even the mouthpiece through which a departed god maintains a hand in the plane’s affairs. Still others believe him to be the voice of the First World itself, the avatar of a vast emergent consciousness. Ng has heard all of these theories, and met them with stoic silence. Whatever his nature or motives, they remain solidly and silently his own—a fitting response for a lord of secrets.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：兜帽
阵营：绝对中立 
神职：季节、秘密、游荡者
领域：知识、魔法、旅行、天气
子领域：探索、四季、思想、交易
偏好武器：铁手套(拳匕)
圣徽：银色兜帽，内含星星和彗星
圣兽：迁徙动物
沉默寡言、神秘莫测，戴兜帽的无是那些流浪者的守护神——他们不像随遇而安的德斯南人——了解他们所做的事情的严重性，认识到开阔道路上的物理危险，以及这种自由所代表的更大的形而上学的危险。
就像在远离文明的孤独路上遇到的每个旅行者一样，歧路之王是一个谜。虽然许多始祖和像诺格伯这样的神都关心秘密，但无可能是最伟大的，因为即使是他最忠诚的信徒也不知道他的真实身份，也不知道他可能追求的目标是什么。事实上，兜帽很少承认他的信徒，这导致一些人质疑他是否真的有责任向那些向他祈祷的人授予法术。
无看似漫无目的的游荡和高深莫测的问题导致了许多关于他本性的理论。有些人把他描绘成一个幽灵，某个被遗忘的始祖的阴影，他太过强大而无法完全脱离第一世界。
其他人将他无尽的耐心和逻辑称为发条自律机械，无论遥远的存在创造了季节宫殿的仆人，或者甚至可能是已故的神在位面事务中保持一手的喉舌。还有一些人认为他是第一世界本身的声音，是一个巨大的涌现意识的化身。 无听到了所有这些理论，并以坚忍的沉默面对它们。无论他的本性或动机如何，他们都忠诚地、沉默地保持着他自己的——对于一个秘密之王来说，这是一个恰当的回应。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ng
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 无

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Empty Death   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Despair, Ghosts, Swamps   
Rank: Outer God   
Domains: Chaos, Death, Evil, Plant, Void (Madness)   
Subdomains: Dark Tapestry, Decay, Entropy, Fear, Isolation, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Flail   
Holy Symbol: Dripping skull with jaw stuffed with wet moss   
When mortals die, their souls slip from the flesh and enter the River of Souls, where they are eventually carried to Pharasma’s Boneyard to be judged. Yet this river, as with any river, is not wholly without peril. Predators hunt the metaphysical banks and depths of the River of Souls, eager to pluck out and devour drifting souls before they can be sent on to their final rewards. Mysterious Nhimbaloth feeds upon those predators, and revels in the digestion of souls already being digested in the gullets of those who would deem themselves the hunters of the dead. Nhimbaloth’s presence is most often felt in tangled swamps, desolate shorelines, or remote stretches of river. Her cultists hold that will-o’-wisps are her eyes and believe that the fear one endures when one knows death is near is her breath. While those who die know grief and pain, their souls can one day go on to be something greater. But those touched by Nhimbaloth know only the agony of death. They do not go on. They simply end. The Empty Death is shapeless, yet evidence of her presence can be seen in the tortured, faceless undead that often haunt places she has brushed against. Wildlife grows more antagonistic in these areas, and plants grow strangely hateful to the eye and eager to tear the flesh. Strange markings on riverbanks or island shores—clusters of seven perfectly spaced divots of crumbling dry earth—are thought to be her fingerprints. Where Nhimbaloth has hunted, the world itself recoils.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：空无之死
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：绝望，幽魂与沼泽
等级：外神
领域：混乱、死亡、邪恶、植物、虚空（疯狂
子领域：异幕，腐朽，熵，恐惧，孤寂，亡灵
偏好武器：连枷
圣徽：颚中塞满潮湿苔藓的湿淋骷髅
在凡人死后，他们的灵魂自肉体中滑出涌入灵魂长河，最终流向法莱斯玛的骨园接受审判。然而这条长河与其他河流同样并非绝对安全。掠食者们在灵魂长河的概念性河岸与深处狩猎，渴望能在漂流的灵魂接受最终报应之前扯出吞食。而神秘的宁布洛斯则以这些掠食者为食，陶醉于这些自谓死亡猎手的喉中已被消化的灵魂。
宁布洛斯常在杂乱的沼泽、荒凉的海岸或偏远的河流分支中现身。她的信徒们认为鬼火（Will-o'-Wisp）即是她的眼睛，而人死期将近时承受的恐惧则是她的吐息。在死者完全理解悲伤与痛苦之后，他们的灵魂终有一日能够通向更加伟大的来世。然而那些为宁布洛斯所触者能够感受到的仅有死之痛苦。再无来世。一切皆终。
空无之死虽然无形，但在那些因与其擦身而过而饱受折磨面目全非的亡灵四处游荡之处或可寻见祂存在的证据。这些地方的野生动物敌意愈强，连植物也生出诡异眼睛渴求撕裂血肉。河岸或岛屿沿海的奇异标记——由七堆碎裂干土以完美的间隔构成的堆群——被认为是她的指痕。宁布洛斯猎行之处，世界本身亦会退避。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Nhimbaloth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 宁布洛斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level, a Mooncallers vision enhances to better traverse the land at night. They gain a +4 bonus to their Perception.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 2 级，唤月者的视野增强，以便在夜间更好地穿越陆地。他们的感知获得+4加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Night Sight
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 夜视

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are a great leader, an inspiration to all who follow the teachings of your faith. Inspiring Word: As a standard action, you can speak an inspiring word to a creature within 30 feet. That creature receives a +2 morale bonus on attack rolls, skill checks, ability checks, and saving throws for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Inspiring Command: At 8th level, you can issue an inspiring command to your allies, who must all be within 30 feet of you. Affected allies gain a +2 insight bonus on attack rolls, AC, Combat Maneuver Defense, and skill checks for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this power a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你是伟大的导师，是所有受你信仰指引的信徒的精神依托。
激励演说：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可对30英尺范围内的一个生物进行激励演说。使该生物的{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击检定{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能检定{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}属性检定{/g}以及{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}获得+2士气{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，效果持续{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为1）。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
激励命令：在8级时，你可向距离你30英尺内的所有盟友发出激励命令。使盟友的攻击{g|Encyclopedia:Check}检定{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CMD}战技防御{/g}以及技能{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}检定{/g}获得+2洞察加值，效果持续轮数等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为1）。每天可使用次数为感知调整值+3。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Nobility Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 崇高领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Nobility: As a move action, you can issue one order to a single creature to halt. This effect functions as if you had cast the spell command.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举圣徽并呼唤你的神灵的名字，你就获得了神性的一个方面。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免的能力使用该法术的 DC。
崇高：作为一个移动动作，你可以向单个生物发出一个停止命令。这个效果就像你施展了法术命令术一样。

Nobility: As a move action, you can issue one order to a single creature to halt. This effect functions as if you had cast the spell command.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举圣徽并呼唤你的神灵的名字，你就获得了神性的一个方面。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免的能力使用该法术的 DC。
崇高：作为一个移动动作，你可以向单个生物发出一个停止命令。这个效果就像你施展了法术命令术一样

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Nobility Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 崇高领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The subject stands in place for 1 round. It may not take any actions but is not considered helpless. If the subject can't carry out your command on its next turn, the spell automatically fails.
This ability takes a Move action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 对象在原地站立 1 轮。它可能不会采取任何行动，但不会被认为是无助的。如果受术者在下一回合不能执行你的命令，法术将自动失败。该能力需要一个移动动作。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Nobility Domain - Command to Halt
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 崇高领域 - 停止命令

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Our Lady in Shadow, Demon Lord of Darkness and Lust   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Assassins, Darkness, Lust   
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Darkness, Evil   
Subdomains: Demon, Loss, Lust, Night   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Thorny pointed crown   
Sacred Animal: Bat   
A cruel sadist on one hand, and a seductive beauty on the other, Nocticula is patron to traitors, assassins, and succubi (both literally and figuratively). Assassins' guilds in her service are established in many cities and are constantly at odds with other guilds, especially the feared Red Mantis, often leading to protracted shadow wars. She is particularly popular amongst the drow of Golarion, and is the patron of House Misraria. She is also worshiped in places of decadence such as Katapesh, Nex, Geb, and certain River Kingdoms. Nocticula is also venerated among the Lamyros, a group of Pharasma-cursed creatures that loathe all the gods, and take pleasure in confounding and destroying their mortal servants. Nocticula appears as a succubus, wearing her dark hair in a complex style. Her eyes devoid of pupils, her fingers tipped with talons, and her feet end in stony hooves that exude red-hot, liquid iron.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：暗影中的圣母，黑暗的恶魔领主和欲望
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：刺客，黑暗，欲望
领域：混乱，魅力，黑暗，邪恶
子领域：恶魔，损失，欲望，夜宠武器：匕首圣徽: 尖尖的皇冠 圣兽：蝙蝠 一方面是残虐的残虐狂，另一方面是诱人的美人，夜猫子是叛徒、刺客和魅魔（无论是字面上还是比喻上）的守护神。为她服务的刺客公会在许多城市都建立起来，并且经常与其他公会发生冲突，尤其是令人恐惧的红螳螂，经常导致旷日持久的影子战争。她在戈拉利安的卓尔精灵中特别受欢迎，并且是密斯拉里亚家族的守护神。她还在颓废的地方受到崇拜，例如 Katapesh、Nex、Geb 和某些河流王国。 Nocticula 在 Lamyros 中也受到崇敬，这是一群被法拉斯玛诅咒的生物，厌恶所有的神灵，并乐于混淆和摧毁他们的凡人仆人。 Nocticula 以魅魔的形象出现，她的黑发造型复杂。她的眼睛没有瞳孔，她的手指尖有爪子，她的脚末端是石质的蹄子，散发着炽热的液态铁。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Nocticula
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 诺缇库拉

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Blood God   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Anger, Rage, Strength   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Strength, War   
Subdomains: Blood, Demon, Ferocity, Rage   
Favoured Weapon: Orc double axe   
Holy Symbol: Bloody double axe   
Sacred Animal: Wolverine   
Orcs believe that the essence of a creature is contained in its blood, and for the orc race, that essence is anger. The Blood God is credited with giving orcs their innate ferocity, which when kindled like an ember becomes an uncontrollable inferno of rage. Nulgreth eschews ranged combat, preferring to look his opponents in the eyes and feel their blood splatter on him as he kills them. He makes no complex schemes or long-term plans. He knows only bloodlust, and through his gifts of strength and rage, he impels orcs to wage bloody warfare across Golarion. Nulgreth is depicted as an orc barbarian with bloodred skin. Indeed, most images of Nulgreth are painted in blood; devotees color themselves so to emulate the Blood God, using red ochre when fresh blood isn’t available. Nulgreth is always in the throes of rage. Though none question his prowess in battle, Nulgreth’s need for immediate gratification often conflicts with the carefully considered plans of his brothers Lanishra, Sezelrian, and Varg. All orcs revere Nulgreth as the source of their ferocity, but his worship is especially popular among barbarians. Like their patron, tribes dedicated to the Blood God are excessively violent in battle. Not satisfied merely to kill their enemies, these orcs disembowel the corpses and bathe in the blood. These tribes rarely keep slaves; an enemy who survives combat is soon sacrificed in a bloody ritual. Though Nulgreth does not grant the Destruction domain, his clerics can take the Rage subdomain because of the god’s close association with that violent emotion.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：血神
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：愤怒、狂暴、力量
领域：混乱、邪恶、力量、战争
子领域：鲜血、恶魔、凶猛、狂暴
偏好武器：兽人双头斧
圣徽：血腥双斧
圣兽：狼獾
兽人相信一个生物的本质是包含在它的血液中的，而对于兽人种族来说，这种本质就是愤怒。
血神赋予了兽人与生俱来的凶猛，当它像余烬一样被点燃时，就会变成无法控制的地狱之怒。
努尔格雷斯不喜欢远程战斗，他更喜欢直视他对手的双眼，感觉他们的血溅在自己身上的感觉。他不擅长制定复杂的计划或长期计划。他只爱好嗜血，并通过他的力量和愤怒的赠礼，他促使兽人在戈拉利安发动血腥的战争。
努尔格雷斯被描绘成一个有着血红色皮肤的兽人野蛮人。事实上，大多数努尔格雷斯的画像都是用血涂成的。奉徒们给自己涂上颜色以效仿血神，在没有新鲜血液时使用红赭石。
努尔格雷斯总是处于愤怒的痛苦之中。尽管没有人质疑他在战斗中的实力，但努尔格雷斯对及时行乐的观念经常与他的兄弟拉尼什拉、塞泽里安和瓦尔格深思熟虑的计划相冲突。
所有兽人都将努尔格雷斯视为他们凶残的根源，但他的信仰在野蛮人中尤其受欢迎。像他们的守护神一样，献身于血神的部落在战斗中过于暴力。这些兽人不满足于仅仅杀死他们的敌人，他们还剖开尸体并沐浴在鲜血中。这些部落很少接受俘虏；一个在战斗中幸存下来的敌人很快就会在一场血腥的仪式中被献祭。
虽然努尔格雷斯不授予破坏领域，但他的牧师可以使用狂暴子领域，因为他们的神与那种强烈的情绪息息相关。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Nulgreth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 努尔格雷斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Shining Scourge, Lord of Senseless War 
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Deserts, Senseless warfare, The Sun   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Fire, Sun   
Subdomains: Ash, Day, Demon, Smoke   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy mace   
Holy Symbol: Lion jaws around the sun   
Sacred Animal: Lion   
Not all who worship the sun do so with joy and kindness in their hearts. Those who venerate the Shining Scourge worship out of fear or awe. Nurgal embodies the destructive aspects of the sun, and his minions walk without fear in the full light of day. His lower body is that of a golden lion with a draconic tail. His torso is deeply tanned and masculine, and he is rarely seen without a heavy mace, the head of which appears to be a miniature sun, held in one four-fingered, taloned hand. His head is that of a lion as well, and blinding light spews from his eyes and mouth. Nurgal’s faith was quite strong in ancient Azlant, and not a few Azlanti ruins bear evidence of this connection in carvings that depict a fanged mouth around a sun or the presence of lion-like monsters. Today, his worship has lessened, and is limited to the deserts of northern Garund, Qadira, and ruined Ninshabur. His Abyssal realm is known as Kuthan, an expansive region of alternating desert and dry savannas under a vast red sun that never moves from its noontime height above. Narrow gorges hundreds of miles long connect Kuthan to its neighboring realm, the Sea of Whispering Sands, where Nurgal’s lover, Areshkagal, used to rule before being banished to the Blood Clefts by her sister. Nurgal is also believed to be the half-brother of Socothbenoth, but this relationship is not friendly, and the two have been at war for as long as they both have existed.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：闪耀天灾，无意义战争之王 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：沙漠，无意义战争，太阳 
领域：混乱、邪恶、火焰、太阳 
子域：灰烬、白昼、恶魔、烟雾 
偏好武器：重锤 
圣徽：围绕太阳的狮子下颚 
圣兽：狮子 
并非所有崇拜太阳的人都怀着喜悦和善良的心这样做。那些崇敬 Shining Scourge 的人是出于恐惧或敬畏。 Nurgal 体现了太阳的破坏性方面，他的仆从在白天的阳炎射线下毫无恐惧地行走。他的下半身是一头龙尾金狮。他的躯干晒成深褐色，颇具阳刚之气，很少见到他不带沉重的狼牙棒，狼牙棒的头部似乎是一个微型太阳，握在一只长有利爪的四指手中。他的头也是狮子的头，眼睛和嘴巴里喷出炫目的光芒。 Nurgal 对古代阿兹兰特的信仰相当强烈，不少阿兹兰特遗址的雕刻都证明了这种联系，这些雕刻描绘了围绕着太阳的长着尖牙的嘴巴或狮子般的怪物的存在。今天，他的崇拜已经减少，并且仅限于北部 Garund、Qadira 和废墟 Ninshabur 的沙漠。他的深渊领域被称为 Kuthan，这是一片广阔的地区，沙漠和干燥的稀树草原交替出现，巨大的红色太阳从不从正午的高度移动。数百英里长的狭窄峡谷将 Kuthan 与其邻近的领域，细语沙之海相连，Nurgal 的情人 Areshkagal 在被她的姐姐放逐到血裂之地之前曾统治这里。 Nurgal 也被认为是 Socothbenoth 的同父异母兄弟，但这种关系并不友好，只要他们存在，两人就一直处于战争状态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Nurgal
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 努加尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Crawling Chaos, The Faceless Sphinx, The Haunter of the Dark, The Black Pharaoh   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Conspiracies, Dangerous secrets, Forbidden magic   
Rank: Outer God   
Domains: Air, Chaos, Darkness, Evil, Knowledge, Magic, Trickery   
Subdomains: Arcane, Cloud, Deception, Divine, Loss, Memory, Night, Thought, Thievery, Wind   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff, Punching dagger, Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Inverted ankh, Featureless face, Circle with winglike arms   
Said to have a thousand different forms, Nyarlathotep is unusual among the Outer Gods in that he seems to enjoy toying with and causing discord among mortal races, rather than leaving this to his cultists. Scholars of the Dark Tapestry believe that Nyarlathotep himself is the prime mover in preparing countless worlds for the devastating return of the Great Old Ones, nudging events along in subtle ways to encourage various apocalyptic ends. Some believe that it was Nyarlathotep’s advice that moved Taldor to launch the Armies of Exploration that ultimately presaged that nation’s fall from glory, and that led the dwarves of Dongun Hold to invent the first firearm. Certainly his influence can be seen in the troubled history of Osirion, a culture he seems particularly interested in. Nyarlathotep’s forms are each associated with their own distinct cults. The best-known of the god’s manifestations are the Haunter of the Dark (a batlike entity with a tri-lobed burning eye) and the Black Pharaoh (a humanoid form that has links to Ancient Osirion as well as to many modern witch cults).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：伏行之混沌、黑法老、猎黑行者、无面斯芬克斯
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：阴谋，危险秘密与禁忌魔法
等级：外神
领域：空气、混乱、黑暗、邪恶、知识、魔法、诡计
子领域：奥术、云、欺骗、神圣、失却、记忆、暗夜、思想、盗窃、风
偏好武器：木棍、拳匕、匕首 
圣徽：倒安卡十字架（黑法老），带有翼状手臂的圆环（猎黑行者），没有特征的面容形象（无面斯芬克斯）
据称拥有千种形貌的奈亚拉托提普在外神之中格外另类，因祂似乎更乐于亲自挑起凡人间的纷争而非将其留给信徒来做。研究黑暗异幕的学者们认为，奈亚拉托提普即是在无数世界迎接旧日支配者破灭归返的原初要因，祂以巧妙难察的方式推动事件引领各种天灾末日。某些人认为，正是奈亚拉托提普的建议促使塔尔多（Taldor）组织了探索军团（Armies of Exploration）且预示了这个国家自荣耀中衰落，甚至促使顿加堡（Dongun Hold）的矮人发明了第一支火器。祂的影响在奥斯利昂（Osirion）的混乱历史中清晰可见，该文化似乎让祂兴趣颇浓。
奈亚拉托提普的每个化身都拥有独特的教团。最著名的化身是猎黑行者（拥有三瓣火眼的蝙蝠实体）和黑法老（与古代奥斯利昂以及众多现代巫术教团紧密联系的人形实体）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Nyarlathotep
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奈亚拉托提普

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oathbreakers are proficient with all simple and martial weapons, with all types of armor (heavy, medium, and light), and with shields (except tower shields).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 复仇暴徒精通所有简易和军用武器，所有类型的盔甲（重型、中型和轻型），以及盾牌（塔盾除外）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oathbreaker Proficiences
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 复仇暴徒擅长

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While paladins often collaborate with less righteous adventurers in order to further their causes, those who spend too much time around companions with particularly loose morals run the risk of adopting those same unscrupulous ideologies and methods. Such an Oathbreaker, as these fallen paladins are known, strikes out for retribution and revenge, far more interested in tearing down those who have harmed her or her companions than furthering a distant deity’s cause.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 尽管圣武士通常会为了自己的事业而与那些不怎么正义的冒险者合作，但在和道德观念淡薄的伙伴进行长时间协作之后，她们也会冒险采纳同样堕落的手段和思维方式。就像复仇暴徒，这些堕落的圣武士为了惩罚和复仇而挥舞力量，相对于遥远神祇所赋予的事业，她对撕碎那些伤害自己或同伴的敌人更感兴趣。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oathbreaker
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 复仇暴徒

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An Oathbreaker is particularly ruthless against those who have harmed her or her allies. Once per day as a swift action, she can channel her anger at one target within sight who is engaged in melee combat with her or an ally. She adds her Charisma modifier to her attack rolls and adds her Oathbreaker level to damage rolls against the target of her bane. In addition, while Oathbreaker's Bane is in effect, the Oathbreaker gains a deflection bonus equal to her Charisma bonus (if any) to her AC against attacks by the target of the smite.  The Oathbreaker's Bane effect remains until the target of the Oathbreaker's Bane is dead or the next time the Oathbreaker rests and regains her uses of this ability. At 4th level and every 3 levels thereafter, the Oathbreaker can invoke her Oathbreaker's Bane one additional time per day, to a maximum of seven times per day at 19th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 复仇暴徒对那些伤害了自己或盟友的敌人极为残忍。每日1次以迅捷动作（swift action），她能够制裁视野范围内的1名曾经对她或她的盟友造成了伤害的目标。她将自己的魅力调整值加到对制裁目标作出的攻击检定上，并且将她的圣武士等级加到对制裁目标作出的伤害检定上。此外，当复仇制裁生效时，复仇暴徒会在对抗制裁目标的攻击时，AC获得相当于自身魅力加值（若有的话）的偏斜加值。复仇制裁效果会持续至制裁目标死亡或者复仇暴徒下一次休息并恢复该能力的使用次数为止。在4级以及之后的每3个等级，复仇暴徒都会额外获得1次复仇制裁的每日使用次数，最高为19级时的最高每日7次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Until the target of the bane is dead
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 直到复仇的目标死亡

LocalizedStrings.enGB: None
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 没有

Once per day as a swift action, she can channel her anger at one target within sight who is engaged in melee combat with her or an ally. She adds her Charisma modifier to her attack rolls and adds her Oathbreaker level to damage rolls against the target of her bane. LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 复仇暴徒对那些伤害了自己或盟友的敌人极为残忍。每日1次以迅捷动作（swift action），她能够制裁视野范围内的1名曾经对她或她的盟友造成了伤害的目标。她将自己的魅力调整值加到对制裁目标作出的攻击检定上，并且将她的圣武士等级加到对制裁目标作出的伤害检定上。此外，当复仇制裁生效时，复仇暴徒会在对抗制裁目标的攻击时，AC获得相当于自身魅力加值（若有的话）的偏斜加值。复仇制裁效果会持续至制裁目标死亡或者复仇暴徒下一次休息并恢复该能力的使用次数为止。在4级以及之后的每3个等级，复仇暴徒都会额外获得1次复仇制裁的每日使用次数，最高为19级时的最高每日7次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oathbreaker's Bane - Additional Use
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 复仇制裁——额外使用次数

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, the Oathbreaker can, as a move action, indicate an enemy in combat and rally her allies to focus on that target. The Oathbreaker and her allies gain a +1 bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against the target. This ability applies only to allies who can see or hear the Oathbreaker and who are within 30 feet of the Oathbreaker at the time she activates this ability. At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter (10th, 15th, and 20th level), the bonus increases by 1. The Oathbreaker's Direction lasts until the target dies or the Oathbreaker selects a new target.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 1 级，复仇暴徒与同伴结成了一种亲密的联系，她可以以一个移动动作指定单个目标并召集她的盟友集中攻击目标。复仇暴徒和她的盟友在对目标的武器攻击和伤害检定上获得 +1 加值。这些盟友需要距离复仇暴徒30尺范围内，且能够看到和听到她。在第 5 级和之后的每 5 级（第 10 级、第 15 级和第 20 级），加值增加 1。 复仇指引会持续到目标死亡或复仇暴徒选择新目标为止。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Until the directed target is dead
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 直到指定目标死亡

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 11th level, an Oathbreaker can active her Oathbreaker's Direction ability as a swift action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 11 级时，复仇暴徒可以以一个迅捷动作激活她的复仇指引能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oathbreaker's Direction (Swift)

The Oathbreaker and her allies gain a +1 bonus on weapon attack and damage rolls against the target. This ability applies only to allies who can see or hear the Oathbreaker and who are within 30 feet of the Oathbreaker at the time she activates this ability. At 5th level and every 5 levels thereafter (10th, 15th, and 20th level), the bonus increases by 1. The Oathbreaker's Direction lasts until the target dies or the Oathbreaker selects a new target.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level, all of the Oathbreaker's allies are treated as if they possessed the same teamwork feats as the Oathbreaker for the purpose of determining whether the Oathbreaker receives a bonus from her teamwork feats. Her allies do not receive any bonuses from these feats unless they actually possess the feats themselves. The allies' positioning and actions must still meet the prerequisites listed in the teamwork feat for the Oathbreaker to receive the listed bonus.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 2 级时，所有复仇暴徒的盟友都被视为拥有与复仇暴徒相同的团队专长，以确定复仇暴徒是否从她的团队专长中获利。她的盟友不会从这些专长中获得任何加成，除非他们已拥有这些专长。盟友的站位和行动仍然必须满足团队专长中列出的先决条件，复仇暴徒才能获得所列的加成。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Solo Tactics
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 独行战术

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 14th level, an Oathbreaker gains Stalwart, as per the Inquisitor class feature, except she can also benefit from this ability while wearing heavy armor.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 14 级时，复仇暴徒获得坚定特性，如同审判官同名特性，另外她在穿着重甲时也能受益于该能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stalwart
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 坚定

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level and every 6 levels thereafter, an Oathbreaker gains a bonus feat in addition to those gained from normal advancement. These bonus feats must be selected from those listed as teamwork feats. The Oathbreaker must meet the prerequisites of the selected bonus feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 3 级和之后的每 6 级，除了从正常升级中获得的专长外，复仇暴徒还会获得一个额外专长。这些加成专长必须从团队专长中选择。复仇暴徒必须满足所选加成专长的先决条件。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Teamwork Feat
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 团队专长

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Gain access to the spells and revelations of the ancestors mystery 
Due to the ocean's echo archetype the class skills gained from this archtypeare changed to Persuasion, Knowledge (world) and Lore (nature)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
获得先祖秘示域的法术和启示。
由于海洋回声变体，从该变体获得的本职技能更改为沟通、知识（世界）和学识（自然）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ancestors
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 先祖

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Although many merfolk claim deep connections to both art and the natural world, a rare few merfolk can manipulate the forces of nature and weave them into song. An ocean’s echo is a merfolk gifted with the powers of an oracle and a singing voice that evokes the legendary tales of merfolk virtuosos.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 尽管许多人鱼声称与艺术和自然世界有着深厚的联系，但很少有人能够操纵自然的力量并将它们编织成歌声。海洋回声是具有先知力量和歌声的人鱼，它的歌声能让人想起人鱼艺术大师的传奇故事。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ocean's Echo
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 海洋回声

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A ocean's echo of 3rd level or higher can use her performance to help allies succeed at a task. They must be within 30 feet and able to see and hear the ocean's echo. They get a +2 competence bonus on all skill checks as long as they continue to hear the ocean's echo's performance. This bonus increases by +1 for every four levels the ocean's echo has attained beyond 3rd (+3 at 7th, +4 at 11th, +5 at 15th, and +6 at 19th).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3 级或更高等级的海洋回声可以利用她的表现帮助盟友成功完成任务。他们必须在 30 英尺范围内，并且能够看到和听到海洋回声。只要他们持续听到海洋回声的表演，他们在所有技能检定上都会获得 +2 表现加值。海洋回声在第 3 级之后每达到 4 个等级，此加值就会增加 +1（第 7 级时 +3，第 11 级时 +4，第 15 级时 +5，第 19 级时 +6）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A ocean's echo of 3rd level or higher can use her performance to help allies succeed at a task. They must be within 30 feet and able to see and hear the ocean's echo. They get a +2 competence bonus on all skill checks as long as they continue to hear the ocean's echo's performance. This bonus increases by +1 for every four levels the ocean's echo has attained beyond 3rd (+3 at 7th, +4 at 11th, +5 at 15th, and +6 at 19th).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 3 级或更高等级的海洋回声可以利用她的表现帮助盟友成功完成任务。他们必须在 30 英尺范围内，并且能够看到和听到海洋回声。只要他们持续听到海洋回声的表演，他们在所有技能检定上都会获得 +2 表现加值。海洋回声在第 3 级之后每达到 4 个等级，此加值就会增加 +1（第 7 级时 +3，第 11 级时 +4，第 15 级时 +5，第 19 级时 +6）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Inspiring Song - Competence
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 信念颂歌

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A 1st level ocean's echo can use her performance to inspire courage in her allies (including himself), bolstering them against fear and improving their combat abilities. To be affected, an ally must be able to perceive the ocean's echo's performance. An affected ally receives a +1 morale bonus on saving throws against charm and fear effects and a +1 competence bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls. At 5th level, and every six ocean's echo levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +1, to a maximum of +4 at 17th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1 级海洋回声可以利用她的表现来激发她的盟友（包括他自己）的勇气，增强他们对抗恐惧的能力并提高他们的战斗能力。要受到影响，盟友必须能够感知海洋回声的表演。受影响的盟友在对抗魅惑和恐惧效果的豁免上获得 +1 士气加值，在攻击和武器伤害检定上获得 +1 表现加值。在 5 级，以及之后每 6 个海洋回声等级，该加值增加 +1，在 17 级达到最大值 +4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A 1st level ocean's echo can use her performance to inspire courage in her allies (including himself), bolstering them against fear and improving their combat abilities. To be affected, an ally must be able to perceive the ocean's echo's performance. An affected ally receives a +1 morale bonus on saving throws against charm and fear effects and a +1 competence bonus on attack and weapon damage rolls. At 5th level, and every six ocean's echo levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +1, to a maximum of +4 at 17th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1 级海洋回声可以利用她的表现来激发她的盟友（包括他自己）的勇气，增强他们对抗恐惧的能力并提高他们的战斗能力。要受到影响，盟友必须能够感知海洋回声的表演。受影响的盟友在对抗魅惑和恐惧效果的豁免上获得 +1 士气加值，在攻击和武器伤害检定上获得 +1 表现加值。在 5 级，以及之后每 6 个海洋回声等级，该加值增加 +1，在 17 级达到最大值 +4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Inspiring Song - Courage
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 勇气颂歌

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An ocean's echo of 15th level or higher can inspire tremendous heroism in all allies within 30 feet. Inspired creatures gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws and a +4 dodge bonus to AC. The effect lasts for as long as the targets are able to witness the performance.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 15 级或更高等级的海洋回声可以激发 30 英尺内所有盟友的崇高英雄主义精神。受启发的生物在豁免检定上获得+4 士气加值，AC 上获得+4 闪避加值。只要目标能够看到表演，效果就会持续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An ocean's echo of 15th level or higher can inspire tremendous heroism in all allies within 30 feet. Inspired creatures gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws and a +4 dodge bonus to AC. The effect lasts for as long as the targets are able to witness the performance.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 15 级或更高等级的海洋回声可以激发 30 英尺内所有盟友的崇高英雄主义精神。受启发的生物在豁免检定上获得+4 士气加值，AC 上获得+4 闪避加值。只要目标能够看到表演，效果就会持续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Inspiring Song - Heroics
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 英雄颂歌

Gain access to the spells and revelations of the life mystery 
Due to the ocean's echo archetype the class skills gained from this archtypeare changed to Persuasion, Knowledge (world) and Lore (nature)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
获得生命之秘示域的法术和启示
由于海洋回声变体，从该变体获得的本职技能更改为沟通、知识（世界）和学识（自然）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Life
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 生命

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Each oracle draws upon a divine mystery to grant her spells and powers. This mystery also grants additional class skills and other special abilities. This mystery can represent a devotion to one ideal, prayers to deities that support the concept, or a natural calling to champion a cause. Regardless of its source, the mystery manifests in a number of ways as the oracle gains levels. An oracle must pick one mystery upon taking her first level of oracle. Once made, this choice cannot be changed.
At 2nd level, and every two levels thereafter, an oracle learns an additional spell derived from her mystery. 
A ocean's echo adds Persuasion, Knowledge (world) and Lore (nature) to her list of class skills. These replace the additional class skills from her mystery.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每个先知的{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}和力量都来源于一个神圣的秘示域。秘示域还会提供额外的本职{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}和其他{g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}特殊能力{/g}。秘示域代表着对一种理想的献身，对支持这种概念的神祇的祷告，或是为一项事业而斗争的本能使命感。不论来源如何，秘示域都会随着先知提升等级而以各种形式显现出来。先知必须在获得第一个等级时就选择一个秘示域，选定之后无法更改。
2级时，以及之后每提升两个等级，先知都可以额外学习一个来自于秘示域的法术。海洋回声将沟通、知识（世界）和学识（自然）添加到她的本职技能列表中。这些取代了她秘示域的额外职业技能。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 秘示域

由于海洋回声变体，从该变体获得的本职技能更改为沟通、知识（世界）和学识（自然）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wind

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Just Arbiter   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Deservedness, Nobility, Rulership   
Domains: Good, Law, Nobility, Protection   
Subdomains: Archon, Defense, Leadership, Martyr   
Favoured Weapon: Halberd (Glaive)   
Holy Symbol: Figure framed by branches   
Sacred Animal: Wolf   
It is said that Olheon knows the lineage of every noble soul in existence. She tracks the passage of power-and the responsibilities such power brings with it-from parent to child, ruler to heir, and dynasty to dynasty. Whether power transfers legitimately through inheritance or election or forcibly through coup or rebellion, Olheon sees the change and judges accordingly. The Just Arbiter is among the most magnificent empyreal lords to behold. Olheon stands over 16 feet tall, towering over most mortals, and her blue eyes blaze in a face of burnished gold. She wears a heavy silver breastplate and greaves, but her gauntleted hands and forearms are stained crimson, as if she had plunged her armored fists into pools of fresh blood. In one hand she carries a ruby-bladed halberd even taller than herself; in the other hand, she bears a heavy golden seal of office affirming her charge. Olheon despises tyrants and boils at the sight of legitimate rulers who, through weakness or ignorance, cause hardship and unjust living conditions for those under their dominion. She works through her subjects and divine minions to teach those who can be taught and to punish those who cannot. Officials, noble rulers, and even parents all look to Olheon for guidance, and they are in turn judged according to their actions. Olheon occupies the northern wing of the Courts of Accord, where the magicals crying mirrors hung in her vast Hall of Thrones displays cenes of accession and rulership throughout the multiverse.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：公正仲裁者
阵营：守序善良
神职：价值，贵族，统治
领域：善良、守序、崇高、保护
子领域：亚空、防御、领导、殉难
偏好武器：长戟（大砍刀）
圣徽：背后有银色网络的低首人像
圣兽：狼
说奥理翁知道每一个贵族的谱系，追踪权力的易手——以及这种权力带来的责任——从父母到孩子，从统治者到继承人，从王朝到王朝。无论是通过继承或选举合法地转移权力，还是通过政变或叛乱强制转移，奥理翁都看到了变化并做出相应的判断。
公正仲裁者是最伟大的至高天领主之一。奥理翁身高超过 16 英尺，比大多数凡人都要高，她的蓝眼睛在光滑的金色脸庞上闪耀着光芒。她戴着沉重的银色胸甲和护胫，手套则是如血般殷红，就好像她把她的装甲拳头扎进了鲜血的池子里。
她一手持比自己还高的红宝石刃战戟，另一手持黄金之印。奥理翁鄙视暴君，并对利用软弱或无知给他们统治下的人造成困难和不公正的生活条件的统治者感到愤怒腾。
她通过她的臣民和神仆来教导那些可以被教导的人和惩罚那些不能被教导的人。官员，高位统治者，甚至父母都向奥理翁寻求指导，并根据他们的行为反过来对他们进行评判。
奥理翁和谐法庭的北翼，她的御座之间里面有面镜子，反射出多元宇宙所有即位和统治的景象。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Olheon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥理翁

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon reaching 20th level, your draconic destiny unfolds. You gain immunity to paralysis, sleep, and damage of your energy type. If you have the breath weapon revelation, you can use your breath weapon an unlimited number of times per day, though no more often than once every 1d4+1 rounds.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 达到 20 级后，你的龙之命运开始展现。你将获得对麻痹、睡眠和你选择的能量类型伤害的免疫力。如果你拥有喷吐武器启示，你每天可以无限次地使用喷吐武器，但每次冷却 1d4+1 轮。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Final Revelation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 最终启示

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 具有巨龙秘示域的先知将灵巧、沟通、感知和知识（世界）添加到她的本职技能列表中。
