LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon achieving 20th level, your rapport with the heavens grants you perfect harmony with the universe. You receive a bonus on all saving throws equal to your Charisma modifier. You become immune to fear effects, and automatically confirm all critical hits. Once per day, should you die, 1 round after dying you are reborn. Your body re-forms with all your equipment, and you return to life with maximum hit points.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在达到第20级时，你与天堂的融洽关系赋予你与宇宙的完美和谐。你在所有豁免检定中获得等同于你的魅力调整值的加成。你对恐惧效果免疫，并自动确认所有重击。每天一次，如果你死亡，死后 1 轮你会重生。你的身体会随着你所有的装备而重塑，你会以最大的生命值复活。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the heavens mystery adds Perception and Knowledge (world)  to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 具有苍天秘示域的先知将感知和知识（世界）添加到她的本职技能列表中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Heavens
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 苍天

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your phantasmagoric displays accurately model the mysteries of the night sky, dumbfounding all who behold them. The spell DC of all Pattern spells are increased by 2, additionally you gain access to scintillating pattern as a 8th level spell. (You still need to be able to cast 8th level spells to cast scintillating pattern) 
Pattern spells: color spray, hypnotic pattern, rainbow pattern, scintillating pattern.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您的幻象显示准确地模拟了夜空的奥秘，让所有看到它们的人都目瞪口呆。所有图纹法术的法术 DC 增加 2，另外你可以像 8 级法术一样使用闪光图纹。 （你仍然需要能够施展 8 级法术才能施展闪光图纹）图纹法术：七彩喷射、催眠图纹、虹彩图纹、闪光图纹。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Awesome Display
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 宏伟显现

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You conjure a coat of starry radiance that grants you a +4 armor bonus. At 7th level, and every four levels thereafter, this bonus increases by +2. At 13th level, this armor grants you DR 5/slashing. You can use this coat for 1 hour number of times per day equal to oracle level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你召唤出一件星光灿烂的外衣，使你获得 +4 盔甲加值。在第 7 级以及之后的每 4 级，该加值增加 +2。在第 13 级，这件盔甲使你获得 DR 5/挥砍。您可以使用此能力1小时，每天次数等于先知等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Like the great dragons, you are not easily harmed by common means of attack. You gain acid resistance 5 and a +1 natural armor bonus. At 9th level, your acid resistance increases to 10 and your natural armor bonus increases to +2. At 15th level, your acid resistance increases to 20 and your natural armor bonus increases to +4.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 像巨龙一样，你不容易受到普通攻击的伤害。你获得 5 点酸蚀抗性和 +1 天生防御加值。在第 9 级，你的酸蚀抗性增加到 10，你的天生防御加值增加到 +2。在 15 级时，你的酸蚀抗性增加到 20，你的天生防御加值增加到 +4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This breath weapon deals 1d6 points of acid damage per 2 oracle levels you have (minimum 1d6)in a 30-foot cone. Those caught in the area of the breath receive a Reflex save for half damage. The DC of this save is equal to 10 + 1/2 your oracle level + your Charisma modifier.After use this ability takes 1d4 rounds to recharge.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这种喷吐武器在 30 英尺锥形范围内造成 每 2 个先知等级（至少 1d6）1d6 点酸蚀伤害。那些处于吐息区域的人需要通过一个成功的反射豁免来使伤害减半。此豁免的 DC 等于 10 + 1/2 你的先知等级 + 你的魅力调整值。使用此能力后需要 1d4 轮才能恢复。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oracle Dragon Breath - Fire Line
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 远古龙息——火焰射线

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The primal power of dragonkind seethes within you. You gain a breath weapon. This breath weapon deals 1d6 points of damage of your energy type per 2 oracle levels you have (minimum 1d6; Reflex half ). The shape of the breath weapon is either a 30-foot cone or a 60- foot line, selected when choosing this revelation. You can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time at 5th level and one additional time per day for every 5 levels beyond 5th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
龙类的原始力量在你体内沸腾。你获得喷吐武器。这件喷吐武器造成每 2 个先知等级 1d6 点与你选择的能量类型相同的伤害（至少 1d6；反射减半）。喷吐武器的形状是 30 英尺锥形或 60 英尺线形，在选择此启示时选择。你可以在 1 级每天使用一次此能力，
在 5 级时可以额外使用一次，在 5 级之后每 5 级每天可以额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Breath Weapon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙息武器

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your senses take on a keen draconic edge. You gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks. At 5th level gain a blindsense of 30 feet allowing you to locate unseen foes. At 11th level gain the Blind Fight feat. At 15th level your Perception check bonus increases to +4.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的感官呈现出敏锐的龙类优势。你在察觉检定上获得 +2 加值。第 5 级时获得 30 英尺的盲感，让你能够定位看不见的敌人。 11 级时获得盲斗专长。在 15 级时，你的感知检定加值增加到 +4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You fight with the fearsome talons of dragonkind. You can grow claws as a free action. These claws are treated as natural weapons, allowing you to make two claw attacks as a full attack using your full base attack bonus. Each of these attacks deals 1d4 points of damage plus your Strength modifier (1d3 if you are Small). At 5th level, these claws are considered magic weapons for the purpose of overcoming DR. At 7th level, the damage increases by one step to 1d6 points of damage (1d4 if you are Small). At 11th level, these claws deal an additional 1d6 points of acid damage on a successful hit. You can use your claws for a number of rounds per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你可以使用龙类可怕的爪子战斗。你可以以自由动作长出爪子。这些爪子被视为天生武器，允许你使用你的全部基本攻击加值进行两次爪子攻击作为一次整轮攻击。这些攻击中的每一次都会造成 1d4 点加上你力量调整值的伤害（如果你是小型的，则为 1d3）。
在 5 级时，这些爪子在穿透伤害减免时被视为魔法武器。在第 7 级，伤害增加一级至 1d6 点伤害（如果你是小型的，则为 1d4）。在 11 级时，这些爪子在成功击中时会造成额外 1d6 点酸蚀伤害。你每天可以使用爪子的轮数等于 3 + 你的魅力调整值。这些轮次不需要是连续的。

你可以使用龙类可怕的爪子战斗。你可以以自由动作长出爪子。这些爪子被视为天生武器，允许你使用你的全部基本攻击加值进行两次爪子攻击作为一次整轮攻击。这些攻击中的每一次都会造成 1d4 点加上你力量调整值的伤害（如果你是小型的，则为 1d3）。
在 5 级时，这些爪子在穿透伤害减免时被视为魔法武器。在第 7 级，伤害增加一级至 1d6 点伤害（如果你是小型的，则为 1d4）。在第 11 级，这些爪子在成功击中时额外造成 1d6 点你选择的能量类型。你每天可以使用爪子的轮数等于 3 + 你的魅力调整值。这些轮次不需要是连续的。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Talons of the Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 巨龙之爪

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, you cast your psyche into the void of space to attract the attention of a terrible otherworldly being. 
Phantasmal Killer: You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the subject simply by forming the fears of the subject's subconscious mind into something that its conscious mind can visualize: this most horrible beast. Only the spell's subject can see the phantasmal killer. You see only a vague shape. The target first gets a Will save to recognize the image as unreal. If that save fails, the phantasm touches the subject, and the subject must succeed on a Fortitude save or die from fear. Even if the Fortitude save is successful, the subject takes 3d6 points of damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，你将你的心灵投入太空的虚空，以吸引一个可怕的异界生物的注意。
魅影杀手：通过将目标潜意识中的恐惧之物具象化，你将制造出该目标所能想象到的，最为骇人怪物的幻象。只有受{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}影响的生物才能看到此魅影杀手。你只能看到模糊的轮廓。目标生物首先要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免{/g}以识破幻象。如果意志豁免失败，魅影会接触到目标，此时目标必须进行强韧豁免检定，若失败，则会死于恐惧。即使目标的强韧豁免成功，它仍要承受{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dweller in the Darkness - Phantasmal Killer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暗夜居者 - 魅影杀手

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, you cast your psyche into the void of space to attract the attention of a terrible otherworldly being. 
This spell functions like phantasmal killer, except it can affect more than one creature. Only the affected creatures see the phantasmal creatures attacking them, though you see the attackers as shadowy shapes. If a subject's Fortitude save succeeds, it still takes 3d6 points of damage and is stunned for 1 round. The subject also takes 1d4 points of Strength damage. 
Phantasmal Killer: You create a phantasmal image of the most fearsome creature imaginable to the subject simply by forming the fears of the subject's subconscious mind into something that its conscious mind can visualize: this most horrible beast. Only the spell's subject can see the phantasmal killer. You see only a vague shape. The target first gets a Will save to recognize the image as unreal. If that save fails, the phantasm touches the subject, and the subject must succeed on a Fortitude save or die from fear. Even if the Fortitude save is successful, the subject takes 3d6 points of damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每天一次，你将你的心灵投入太空的虚空，以吸引一个可怕的异界生物的注意。
此{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}与魅影杀手类似，但能影响多个生物。即使你能看到朦胧的进攻者{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}廓，也只有受法术影响的生物才能真切看到{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}它们的魅影生物。
即使目标的强韧{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免{/g}成功，它仍要承受{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}，并震慑1轮。受术目标还会承受1d4点{g|Encyclopedia:Strength}力量{/g}伤害。
魅影杀手：通过将目标潜意识中的恐惧之物具象化，你将制造出该目标所能想象到的，最为骇人怪物的幻象。只有受法术影响的生物才能看到此魅影杀手。你只能看到模糊的轮廓。目标生物首先要进行意志豁免以识破幻象。如果意志豁免失败，魅影会接触到目标，此时目标必须进行强韧豁免检定，若失败，则会死于恐惧。即使目标的强韧豁免成功，它仍要承受3d6点伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dweller in the Darkness - Weird
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暗夜居者 - 诡影杀手

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, you cast your psyche into the void of space to attract the attention of a terrible otherworldly being. The dweller in darkness behaves as if you had cast phantasmal killer. At 17th level, the dweller in darkness can be perceived by more than one creature, as if you had cast weird. You must be at least 11th level to choose this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你将你的心灵投入太空的虚空，以吸引一个可怕的异界生物的注意。暗夜居者表现得就好像你施展了魅影杀手一样。在第 17 级，暗夜居者可以被不止一个生物感知，从而可以影响多个目标，就好像你施展了诡影杀手一样。你必须至少达到 11 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dweller in the Darkness
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暗夜居者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whenever you cast a inflict spell, the maximum number damage dealt is based on your oracle level, not the limit based on the spell. For example, an 11th-level oracle of succor with this revelation may cast inflict light wounds to cause 1d8+11 hit points  of damage instead of the normal 1d8+5 maximum.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每当你施放造成伤害法术时，造成的最大伤害数量取决于你的先知等级，而不是基于法术的限制。例如，具有此启示的 11 级救助先知可以施展造成轻伤以造成 1d8+11 点生命值伤害，而不是正常的 1d8+5 最大值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Enhanced Inflictions
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 增强伤害

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a medium dragon-like creature. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, a +4 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). Your breath weapon and resistance depend on the type of your dragon prototype. You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了中型龙类生物。你在力量上获得 +4 体型加值，在体质上获得 +2 体型加值，在 AC 上获得 +4 形态天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，喷吐武器和对一种元素的抵抗力。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬 (1d8)、两次爪抓 (1d6) 和两次翼击 (1d4)。你的喷吐武器和抗性取决于你的龙种的类型。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 6d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oracles Form of the Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 先知龙形

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a medium dragon-like creature. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, a +4 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). Your breath weapon and resistance depend on the type of your dragon prototype. You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了中型龙类生物。你在力量上获得 +4 体型加值，在体质上获得 +2 体型加值，在 AC 上获得 +4 形态天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，喷吐武器和对一种元素的抵抗力。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬 (1d8)、两次爪抓 (1d6) 和两次翼击 (1d4)。你的喷吐武器和抗性取决于你的龙种的类型。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 6d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This spell functions as dragonkind I except that it also allows you to assume the form of a large dragon-like creature. You gain the following abilities: a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, damage reduction 5/magic, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d6), two claws (1d8), two wing attacks (1d6), and one tail slap attack (1d8). You can only use the breath weapon twice per casting of this spell (when you use it, the duration of your breath weapon ability is reduced by 1/2 caster level minutes), and you must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage. Line breath weapons increase to 80-foot lines and cones increase to 40-foot cones.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这道法术的作用与龙形I 相同，只是它还允许你变成大型龙类生物的形态。你获得以下能力：力量+6体型加值，体质+4体型加值，AC+6形态天生防御加值，免疫困难地形，喷吐武器，伤害减免5/魔法，抵抗一种元素。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（2d6）、两次爪抓（1d8）、两次翼击（1d6）和一次尾扫（1d8）。每次施展此法术你只能使用喷吐武器两次（当你使用它时，你的喷吐武器能力的持续时间减少 1/2 施法者等级分钟），并且你必须在两次使用之间等待 1d4 轮。所有喷吐武器造成 8d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。线型喷吐武器增加到 80 英尺，锥形增加到 40 英尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oracles Form of the Dragon II
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 先知龙形 II

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This spell functions as dragonkind I except that it also allows you to assume the form of a large dragon-like creature. You gain the following abilities: a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, damage reduction 5/magic, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d6), two claws (1d8), two wing attacks (1d6), and one tail slap attack (1d8). You can only use the breath weapon twice per casting of this spell (when you use it, the duration of your breath weapon ability is reduced by 1/2 caster level minutes), and you must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage. Line breath weapons increase to 80-foot lines and cones increase to 40-foot cones.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这道法术的作用与 龙形 I 相同，只是它还允许你变成大型龙类生物的形态。你获得以下能力：力量+6体型加值，体质+4体型加值，AC+6形态天生防御加值，免疫困难地形，喷吐武器，伤害减免5/魔法，抵抗一种元素。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（2d6）、两次爪抓（1d8）、两次翼击（1d6）和一次尾扫（1d8）。每次施展此法术你只能使用喷吐武器两次（当你使用它时，你的喷吐武器能力的持续时间减少 1/2 施法者等级分钟），并且你必须在两次使用之间等待 1d4 轮。所有喷吐武器造成 8d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。线型喷吐武器增加到 80 英尺，锥形增加到 40 英尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This spell functions as dragonkind II save that it also allows you to take the form of a huge dragon-like creature. You gain the following abilities: a +10 size bonus to Strength, a +8 size bonus to Constitution, a +8 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, blindsense with a range of 60 feet, a breath weapon, damage reduction 10/magic, frightful presence (DC equal to the DC for this spell), and immunity to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d8), two claws (2d6), two wing attacks (1d8), and one tail slap attack (2d6). You can use the breath weapon as often as you like, but you must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. All breath weapons deal 12d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage. Line breath weapons increase to 100-foot lines and cones increase to 50-foot cones.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 这个法术的作用与龙类 II 一样，除了它还允许你变成一个巨大的类龙生物的形式。你获得以下能力：力量+10体型加值，体质+8体型加值，AC+8体型天生防御加值，免疫困难地形，60英尺范围内的盲感，喷吐武器，伤害减少 10/魔法，可怖外表（DC 等于该法术的 DC），免疫一种元素。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（2d8）、两次爪抓（2d6）、两次翼击（1d8）和一次尾扫（2d6）。你可以随心所欲地使用喷吐武器，但你必须在两次使用之间等待 1d4 轮。所有喷吐武器造成 12d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。线型喷吐武器增加到 100 英尺，锥形增加到 50 英尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Oracles Form of the Dragon III
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 先知龙形 III

You gain the following abilities: a +10 size bonus to Strength, a +8 size bonus to Constitution, a +8 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, blindsense with a range of 60 feet, a breath weapon, damage reduction 10/magic, frightful presence (DC equal to the DC for this spell), and immunity to one element. LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a medium black dragon. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, a +4 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a acid breath weapon, and resistance to acid 20. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成一条中型黑龙。你的力量获得 +4 体型加值，体质获得 +2 体型加值，AC 获得 +4 形态天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，酸性喷吐武器和对酸液的抵抗力 20。你的移动速度增加10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬 (1d8)、两次爪抓 (1d6) 和两次翼击 (1d4)。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 6d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成一条巨型蓝龙。你的力量获得+10体型加值，体质获得+8体型加值，AC获得+8形态天生防御加值，免疫困难地形，60英尺范围内的盲感，闪电喷吐武器，伤害减免10/魔法，可怖外表（DC等于该法术的DC），以及对电的免疫。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬 (2d8)、两次爪抓 (2d6)、两次翼击 (1d8) 和一次尾扫 (2d6)。你可以随心所欲地使用喷吐武器，但你必须在两次使用之间等待 1d4 轮。所有喷吐武器造成 12d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。线型喷吐武器增加到 100 英尺，锥形增加到 50 英尺。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You become a medium brass dragon. LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your kinship with dragonkind allows you to take on the form of a dragon. As a standard action, you can assume the form of a Medium dragon, as per form of the dragon I. At 15th level, you can assume the form of a Large dragon, as per form of the dragon II. At 19th level, you can assume the form of a Huge dragon, as per form of the dragon III. You can use this ability once per day, but the duration is 10 minutes per oracle level. You must be at least 11th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 您与龙种的血缘关系使您化为龙形。以一个标准动作，你可以变成一条中型龙的形态，就像龙 I 的形态一样。在 15 级时，你可以变成一条大型龙的形态，就像龙 II 的形态。在第 19 级，你可以按照龙 III 的形态呈现巨龙的形态。你每天可以使用该能力一次，但持续时间为每个先知等级 10 分钟。您必须至少达到 11 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stars themselves hold many answers, you may add your Charisma modifier to your Wisdom modifier on all Wisdom-based checks. In addition, once per day you can cast one spell from the oracle spellbook as if it were modified by the Empower Spell or Extend Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星辰蕴含着许多奥秘，你可以在所有基于感知的检查中将您的魅力调整值添加到你的感知调整值。此外，每天一次，你可以从先知法术书中施展一个法术，就好像它应用了法术强效或法术延时专长，但不会增加法术的施法时间或等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day you can cast one spell from the oracle spellbook as if it were modified by the Empower Spell or Extend Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以从先知法术书中施展一个法术，就好像它应用了法术强效或法术延时专长，但不会增加法术的施法时间或等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Guiding Star
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星引导

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day you can cast one spell from the oracle spellbook as if it were modified by the Empower Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以从先知法术书中施展一个法术，就好像它应用了法术强效专长，但不会增加法术的施法时间或等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day you can cast one spell from the oracle spellbook as if it were modified by the Extend Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以从先知法术书中施展一个法术，就好像它应用了法术延时专长，但不会增加法术的施法时间或等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day you can cast one spell from the oracle spellbook as if it were modified by the Empower Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以从先知法术书中施展一个法术，就好像它应用了法术强效专长，但不会增加法术的施法时间或等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Guiding Star - Empower Spell
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星引导 - 法术强效

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day you can cast one spell from the oracle spellbook as if it were modified by the Extend Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以从先知法术书中施展一个法术，就好像它应用了法术延时专长，但不会增加法术的施法时间或等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Guiding Star - Extend Spell
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星引导 - 法术延时

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stars themselves hold many answers, you may add your Charisma modifier to your Wisdom modifier on all Wisdom-based checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星辰蕴含着许多奥秘，你可以在所有基于感知的检查中将您的魅力调整值添加到你的感知调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Guiding Star - Skill Bonus
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星引导 - 技能加值

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You call upon the frigid depths of outer space to bring a terrible chill to your enemies. As a standard action, one target within 30 feet is cloaked in the void and takes 1d6 points of cold damage per level. A successful Fortitude save halves this damage. At 10th level, the interstellar void is so extreme that enemies who fail their saving throw are fatigued. At 15th level, creatures who fail their save are exhausted and stunned for 1 round. You can use this ability once per day plus one additional time per day at 10th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你呼唤深空的极寒给你的敌人带来可怕的寒冷。以一个标准动作，将30 英尺范围内的一个目标遮蔽在虚空中，并受到每等级 1d6 点寒冷伤害。一次成功的强韧豁免可使该伤害减半。在第 10 级，星际虚空极端寒冷，以至于豁免失败的敌人会感到疲劳。在 15 级时，豁免失败的生物将力竭并昏迷 1 轮。你每天可以使用此能力一次，在 10 级时每天可以额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Interstallar Void
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 寒宙虚空

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your connection to the skies above is so strong that your feet barely touch the ground. At 1st level, you no longer leave tracks gaining a +1 to stealth. At 5th level, you can hover up to 6 inches above the ground, avoiding difficult terrain. At 10th level you gain the ability to fly along the ground, gaining a +3 dodge bonus to AC against melee attacks, for a number of minutes per day equal to your oracle level. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你与天空的联系如此强烈，以至于你的脚几乎不需要接触地面。在第 1 级，你不再留下踪迹获得 +1 隐匿。在第 5 级，你可以悬停在离地面最多 6 英寸的地方，避开困难地形。在第 10 级，你获得沿地面飞行的能力，在对抗近战攻击时 AC 获得 +3 闪避加值，每天的持续时间等同于你的先知等级。此持续时间不需要连续，但每次使用至少1分钟。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lure of the Heavens
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 苍穹诱惑

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can effortlessly give aid to your allies, whether that means providing them with help attacking or defending them in the heat of combat. Whenever you use the aid another action to inflict a penalty on attack rolls or to AC against one of your allies, the penalty you inflict increases by 1. This bonus increases by 1 at 4th level and every 5 oracle levels thereafter (to a maximum of -5 at 19th level). It doesn’t stack with other feats or class features that improve the bonus you provide when using the aid another action. This revelation also counts as the Combat Expertise feat, but only for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of the Swift Aid feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以毫不费力地为你的盟友提供帮助，无论是帮助他们在激烈的战斗中攻击还是保护他们。每当你使用援助动作对你的一个盟友带来攻击检定或 AC 加值时，加值增加 1。此加值在第 4 级和此后每 5 个先知等级增加 1（最多-5 在 19 级）。它不与其他专长或职业特性叠加，这些专长或职业特性可以提高您在使用援助动作时提供的加值。这个启示也算作战斗专家专长，但只是为了满足快速援助专长的先决条件。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Perfect Aid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 完美援助

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Those who would oppose you must overcome their fear of dragons or be struck with terror at your draconic majesty. As a swift action, you can manifest an aura of draconic might around yourself. Enemies within 30 feet who can see you when you activate this ability must attempt a Will save. Success means that the creature is immune to this ability for the following 24 hours. On a failed save, the opponent is shaken for 2d6 rounds. This is a mind-affecting fear effect. You can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels beyond 5th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 那些反对你的人必须克服他们对龙的恐惧，否则就会对你龙威感到恐惧。以一个迅捷动作，你可以在自己周围展现出一股龙威。当你激活此能力时，30 英尺内能看到你的敌人必须尝试进行意志豁免。成功意味着该生物在接下来的 24 小时内免疫此能力。如果豁免失败，会被震慑 2d6 轮。这是一种影响心灵的恐惧效果。你可以在第 1 级每天使用一次此能力，在第 5 级每天以及在第 5 级以后每 5 级额外使用一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Those who would oppose you must overcome their fear of dragons or be struck with terror at your draconic majesty. As a swift action, you can manifest an aura of draconic might around yourself. Enemies within 30 feet who can see you when you activate this ability must attempt a Will save. Success means that the creature is immune to this ability for the following 24 hours. On a failed save, the opponent is shaken for 2d6 rounds. This is a mind-affecting fear effect. You can use this ability once per day at 1st level, plus one additional time per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels beyond 5th.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Presence of Dragons
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙威

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Succeeding the Will saving throw of Presence of Dragons had caused this creature to be immune to the ability for 24 hours.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 成功通过龙威的意志豁免使该生物在 24 小时内免疫该能力。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Presence of Dragons Immunity
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙威免疫

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can manifest the scaly toughness of dragonkind. Once per day as a swift action you can harden your skin, granting you DR 10/magic. During this time, you are also immune to paralysis and sleep effects. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level. At 13th level, you can use this ability twice per day. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以表现出龙鳞般的强韧。每天一次，以一个迅捷动作，你可以硬化你的皮肤，给予你 10 点DR/魔法。在此期间，您也对麻痹和睡眠效果免疫。这个效果持续的轮数等于你的先知等级。第 13 级时，你每天可以使用此能力两次。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can manifest the scaly toughness of dragonkind. Once per day as a swift action you can harden your skin, granting you DR 10/magic. During this time, you are also immune to paralysis and sleep effects. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to your oracle level. At 13th level, you can use this ability twice per day. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以表现出龙鳞般的强韧。每天一次，以一个迅捷动作，你可以硬化你的皮肤，给予你 10 点DR/魔法。在此期间，您也对麻痹和睡眠效果免疫。这个效果持续的轮数等于你的先知等级。第 13 级时，你每天可以使用此能力两次。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Scaled Toughness
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙鳞韧性

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can surround an ally with bolstering energies that supplement its health and grant it extra vigor. With a touch from you (a standard action), one creature gains a ward of restorative energy, granting it a number of temporary hit points equal to your Charisma bonus + 1d6 per 2 oracle levels you have (maximum 10d6). These temporary hit points last 1 minute per oracle level you have. You can use this revelation once per day, plus one additional time at 11th and 19th levels. You must be at least 3rd level before selecting this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用增强的能量包围盟友，以补充它的生命值并赋予其额外的活力。通过你的一次接触（一个标准动作），一个生物获得一层恢复能量，给予它等于你的魅力加值+ 1d6的临时生命值(最多10d6)。这些临时生命值持续 1 分钟，你拥有每个先知等级。你每天可以使用此启示一次，并在第 11 级和第 19 级时额外使用一次。在选择此启示之前，你必须至少达到 3 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can surround an ally with bolstering energies that supplement its health and grant it extra vigor. With a touch from you (a standard action), one creature gains a ward of restorative energy, granting it a number of temporary hit points equal to your Charisma bonus + 1d6 per 2 oracle levels you have (maximum 10d6). These temporary hit points last 1 minute per oracle level you have. You can use this revelation once per day, plus one additional time at 11th and 19th levels. You must be at least 3rd level before selecting this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用增强的能量包围盟友，以补充它的生命值并赋予其额外的活力。通过你的一次接触（一个标准动作），一个生物获得一层恢复能量，给予它等于你的魅力加值+ 1d6的临时生命值(最多10d6)。这些临时生命值持续 1 分钟，你拥有每个先知等级。你每天可以使用此启示一次，并在第 11 级和第 19 级时额外使用一次。在选择此启示之前，你必须至少达到 3 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can surround an ally with bolstering energies that supplement its health and grant it extra vigor. With a touch from you (a standard action), one creature gains a ward of restorative energy, granting it a number of temporary hit points equal to your Charisma bonus + 1d6 per 2 oracle levels you have (maximum 10d6). These temporary hit points last 1 minute per oracle level you have.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用增强的能量包围盟友，以补充它的生命值并赋予其额外的活力。通过你的一次接触（一个标准动作），一个生物获得一层恢复能量，给予它等于你的魅力加值+ 1d6的临时生命值(最多10d6)。这些临时生命值持续 1 分钟，你拥有每个先知等级。你每天可以使用此启示一次，并在第 11 级和第 19 级时额外使用一次。在选择此启示之前，你必须至少达到 3 级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Shell of Succor
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 救助之盾

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
As a standard action, you can unleash a ball of energy that explodes in a 5-foot radius burst dealing 1d4 points of fire damage per level. A successful Reflex save halves this damage. You can fire one explosive ball per day, plus one additional ball per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels thereafter. You can fire more than one ball at a time, but creatures caught inside more than one explosion per round only take damage once. 
Other energy balls shot by this ability are used with the "Free Action" version of this ability.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以一个标准动作，你可以释放一个能量球，在 5 英尺半径范围内爆炸，造成每等级 1d4 点火焰伤害。成功的反射豁免可使此伤害减半。您每天可以发射一个能量球，在第 5 级和之后的每 5 级每天可以额外发射一次。您一次可以发射多个，但每轮陷入不止一次爆炸的生物只会受到一次伤害。
此能力射出的其他能量球与此能力的“自由动作”版本相同。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Reflex partial
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 反射 部分

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can unleash a ball of energy that explodes in a 5-foot radius burst dealing 1d4 points of fire damage per level. A successful Reflex save halves this damage. This attack has a range of 60 feet. You can fire one explosive ball per day, plus one additional ball per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels thereafter. You can fire more than one ball at a time, but creatures caught inside more than one simultaneous explosions only take damage once.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，你可以释放一个能量球，在 5 英尺半径范围内爆炸，造成每等级 1d4 点火焰伤害。成功的反射豁免可使此伤害减半。您每天可以发射一个能量球，在第 5 级和之后的每 5 级每天可以额外发射一次。您一次可以发射多个，但每轮陷入不止一次爆炸的生物只会受到一次伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
As a free action, you can unleash a ball of energy that explodes in a 5-foot radius burst dealing 1d4 points of fire damage per level. A successful Reflex save halves this damage. You can fire one explosive ball per day, plus one additional ball per day at 5th level and for every 5 levels thereafter. You can fire more than one ball at a time, but creatures caught inside more than one explosion per round only take damage once. 
Using spray of shooting stars - free action requires using the standard version at least once in the same round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以一个自由动作，你可以释放一个能量球，在 5 英尺半径范围内爆炸，造成每等级 1d4 点火焰伤害。成功的反射豁免可使此伤害减半。你每天可以发射一个能量球，在第 5 级和之后每 5 级每天可以发射一个额外的球。您一次可以发射多个球，但每轮陷入不止一次爆炸的生物只会受到一次伤害。
使用流星飞射 - 自由动作需要在同一回合中至少使用一次标准版本。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spray of Shooting Stars - Free Action
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 流星飞射 - 自由动作

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You may use spray of shooting stars as a free action this round as many times as you wish, until you run out of daily uses. Unused uses of this ability will be available next round if not used.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以在本轮中以一个自由动作多次使用流星飞射，直到你用完每日使用次数。如果未使用，则下一轮可以使用剩下的次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spray of Shooting Stars
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 流星飞射

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are an immaculate team player and can distribute your team-based insights to your allies with a touch. You can touch an ally as a standard action to confer upon it the benefits of any one teamwork feat that you have. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level (minimum 1). You can confer the benefits of a teamwork feat you have a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你是一个完美的团队合作者，可以通过触摸将你基于团队的见解分享给你的盟友。你可以以一个标准动作接触一个盟友，以赋予它你拥有的任何一项团队合作专长的好处。此效果持续的轮数等于你的先知等级的 1/2（最少 1 轮）。你每天可以授予团队合作专长的次数等于 3 + 你的魅力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: 1 minute/2 levels
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1分钟/2级

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Teamwork Mastery
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 团队合作精通

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are an immaculate team player and can distribute your team-based insights to your allies with a touch. This revelation grants you a bonus teamwork feat. You must meet the teamwork feat’s prerequisites, if any. Additionally, you can touch an ally as a standard action to confer upon it the benefits of any one teamwork feat that you have. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your oracle level (minimum 1). You can confer the benefits of a teamwork feat you have a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你是一个完美的团队合作者，可以通过触摸将你基于团队的见解分享给你的盟友。你可以以一个标准动作接触一个盟友，以赋予它你拥有的任何一项团队合作专长的好处。此效果持续的轮数等于你的先知等级的 1/2（最少 1 轮）。你每天可以授予团队合作专长的次数等于 3 + 你的魅力调整值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can gain a pair of black wings that grant a +3 dodge bonus to AC against melee attacks and an immunity to ground based effects, such as difficult terrain. You can use these wings for 1 minute per day for each oracle level you have. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. At 11th level you can use these wings for 10 minutes per day for each oracle level you have. At 15th level, you can use the wings indefinitely. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以获得一对黑色翅膀，在对抗近战攻击时 AC 获得 +3 闪避加值，并且免疫地面效果，例如困难地形。你每天可以使用这些翅膀 1 分钟每个先知等级。此能力无需要连续使用，但每次使用至少 1 分钟。在第 11 级时，您每天可以使用这些翅膀 10 分钟/每个先知等级。 15 级时，你可以无限期地使用翅膀。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can gain a pair of black wings that grant a +3 dodge bonus to AC against melee attacks and an immunity to ground based effects, such as difficult terrain. You can use these wings for 1 minute per day for each oracle level you have. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. At 11th level you can use these wings for 10 minutes per day for each oracle level you have. At 15th level, you can use the wings indefinitely. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以获得一对黑色翅膀，在对抗近战攻击时 AC 获得 +3 闪避加值，并且免疫地面效果，例如困难地形。你每天可以使用这些翅膀 1 分钟每个先知等级。此能力无需要连续使用，但每次使用至少 1 分钟。在第 11 级时，您每天可以使用这些翅膀 10 分钟/每个先知等级。 15 级时，你可以无限期地使用翅膀。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以获得一对白色的翅膀，在对抗近战攻击时 AC 获得 +3 闪避加值，并且免疫地面效果，例如困难地形。你每天可以使用这些翅膀 1 分钟每个先知等级。此能力无需要连续使用，但每次使用至少 1 分钟。在第 11 级时，您每天可以使用这些翅膀 10 分钟/每个先知等级。 15 级时，你可以无限期地使用翅膀。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a swift action, you can gain a pair of white wings that grant a +3 dodge bonus to AC against melee attacks and an immunity to ground based effects, such as difficult terrain. You can use these wings for 1 minute per day for each oracle level you have. This duration does not need to be consecutive, but it must be spent in 1-minute increments. At 11th level you can use these wings for 10 minutes per day for each oracle level you have. At 15th level, you can use the wings indefinitely. You must be at least 7th level to select this revelation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个迅捷动作，你可以获得一对白色的翅膀，在对抗近战攻击时 AC 获得 +3 闪避加值，并且免疫地面效果，例如困难地形。你每天可以使用这些翅膀 1 分钟每个先知等级。此能力无需要连续使用，但每次使用至少 1 分钟。在第 11 级时，您每天可以使用这些翅膀 10 分钟/每个先知等级。 15 级时，你可以无限期地使用翅膀。您必须至少达到 7 级才能选择此启示。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wings of the Dragon - White
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙之翼——白龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, all spells with cure, restore hp, or temporary hp descriptors cast by the oracle are always empowered, as though using the Empower Spell feat.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在 20 级时，先知者施展的所有具有治疗、恢复生命值或临时生命值描述符的法术总是被强化，就像使用法术强效专长一样。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An oracle with the succor mystery adds Lore (nature) and Stealth to her list of class skills.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 具有救助秘示域的先知将学识（自然）和隐匿添加到她的本职技能列表中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Succor
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 救助

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Orcs are not known for their discretion, yet in matters of religion, they are surprisingly tight-lipped. When a common orc refers to a god, even his own patron deity, he never uses its name, only one of its titles. The superstitious orcs believe that the names of gods hold power, and to speak a god’s name is to draw its attention. Orcs may revere violent gods, not even they wish to see the full manifestation of such deities’ destructive power. Only the shamans and witch doctors dare speak these unholy names, and then only in the midst of ecstatic rituals. This reticence on the part of orcs has led many outsiders to the erroneous conclusion that orc gods have no names. Some scholars have even gone so far as to suggest that the orc gods are not even gods at all.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
兽人并不以他们的判断力而闻名，但在宗教问题上，他们出奇地守口如瓶。当一个普通的兽人提到一个神，甚至是他自己的守护神时，他从不使用它的名字，只使用它的一个
称号。迷信的兽人相信神灵的名字拥有力量，说出神灵的名字就是为了引起它的注意。兽人可能崇敬狂暴的神祇，他们甚至不希望看到这些神祇的破坏力充分展现。只有巫师和巫医才敢说出这些邪恶的名字，而且只有在狂喜的仪式中。兽人的这种缄默，让很多外人误以为兽人神没有名字。一些学者甚至认为兽人神根本就不是神。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Orc Pantheon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 兽人万神殿

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Prince of Undeath, Demon Lord of Necromancy and the Undead 
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Death, Necromancy, Wrath, Undeath   
Domains: Chaos, Death, Evil, Magic   
Subdomains: Demon, Divine, Murder, Undead   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy Mace   
Holy Symbol: Four-horned goat head   
Sacred Animal: Goat   
Although Orcus doesn’t have a strong following on Golarion (his worship is mostly restricted to the nation of Geb and certain backwater regions in Nidal), he has far more dealings with other worlds than most of Golarion’s demon lords. His cultists maintain that the Prince of Undeath is merely waiting for matters in other worlds to resolve themselves before turning his gaze upon this world as his next prize—and that when he does, his faithful shall be rightly rewarded for preparing the way. Of course, fierce competition for worshipers with the cults of Zura and Kabriri and the church of Urgathoa is a more likely reason why Orcus’s cult on Golarion isn’t more widespread. Orcus appears as an immense, fat humanoid with a ram’s head, bat-like wings, cloven feet, and a long tail ending in a stinger. His legendary weapon, the Wand of Orcus, is never far from his taloned hand. His Abyssal realm of Uligor is an entire world of undead-haunted ruins, frozen seas, ragged mountains, and hideous deserts and swamps. Orcus shares this realm with a large number of evil thanatotic titans, not all of whom worship or even ally with the Prince of Undeath. Large regions of Uligor are scarred by the unending civil war between the titans. It is unknown what shadowy force directly opposes Orcus on Uligor, but his war with this mysterious demigod has lasted for millennia.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：亡灵王子、死灵法术恶魔领主和不死族 
阵营：混乱邪恶 
关注领域：死亡、死灵法术、愤怒、不死族 
领域：混乱、死亡、邪恶、魔法 
子域：恶魔、神圣、谋杀、不死族 
偏好武器：重型权杖 
圣徽：四角山羊头 
圣兽：山羊 
尽管奥库斯在格拉利昂没有很强的追随者（他的崇拜主要限于盖布国和尼达尔的某些偏远地区），但他与其他人的交往要多得多世界比格拉利昂的大多数恶魔领主都要多。他的教徒坚持认为，亡灵王子只是在等待其他世界的事情自己解决，然后再将目光投向这个世界，作为他的下一个战利品——当他这样做时，他的信徒会因准备道路而得到应有的回报。当然，与 Zura 和 Kabriri 的教派以及 Urgathoa 的教会争夺崇拜者的激烈竞争更可能是 Orcus 对 Golarion 的崇拜没有更广泛传播的原因。 Orcus 看起来是一个巨大、肥胖的类人生物，长着公羊头、蝙蝠状翅膀、偶蹄和长长的尾巴，末端是一根毒刺。他的传奇武器奥库斯魔杖就在他的利爪手边。他的深渊国度 Uligor 是一个充满不死生物出没的废墟、冰冻的海洋、崎岖的山脉以及可怕的沙漠和沼泽的整个世界。奥库斯与大量邪恶的泰坦共享这个国度，但并非所有人都崇拜亡灵王子，甚至不与亡灵王子结盟。泰坦之间无休止的内战使 Uligor 的大片地区伤痕累累。不知道是什么暗影力量在乌利戈尔直接对抗奥库斯，但他与这个神秘的半神的战争已经持续了千年。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Orcus
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥库斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Faceless God   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Alchemy, Caverns, Hunger, Subterranean waterways   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Earth, Evil, Water   
Subdomains: Caves, Entropy, Fear, Ice, Metal, Oceans   
Favoured Weapon: Spear   
Holy Symbol: Open maw surrounding rune   
In the Land of Black Blood deep below central Avistan, strange lakes of frozen fluid bubble and roil. Similar in appearance and consistency to crude oil, this black blood is freezing cold to the touch, yet bolsters and invigorates undead flesh. It was within these un-waters that the race known as the charda were spawned, and first among their kind was the Faceless God, Orgesh. Orgesh no longer dwells in the Land of Black Blood, having abandoned its children to that realm. Although they still worship it, generations of neglect have had a positive effect on the charda—they retain their unpredictable ways, yet are no longer driven by cruelty and vengeful hunger. Those who remember but do not venerate Orgesh believe the Faceless God abandoned its children for others found far to the west in the deepest, darkest trenches of the Sightless Sea. Orgesh has no organized cult, and its followers see each other as the greatest threat. Some believe that by consuming the flesh and bones of a fellow devotee of the Faceless God, one can take in that devotee’s faith, and that when but one worshiper remains, Orgesh will return to use this final fanatic to unleash a new race upon the vaults of Orv—a race that may not stop its expansion until all has been consumed. None alive has looked upon Orgesh, yet statues of it remain strangely impervious to erosion, and thus provide evidence of its visage, or lack thereof. These statues depict Orgesh as a vaguely humanoid figure with a hugely distended belly, clawed and doglike legs, and an open mouth filled with shark’s teeth, but with no other facial features whatsoever.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：无面之神
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：炼金，饥饿与地下水道
等级：旧日支配者 
领域：混乱、大地、邪恶、流水
子领域：洞穴、熵、恐惧、冰、铁、海
偏好武器：矛
圣徽：含有符文的大开咽喉
在位于阿维斯坦中部地下深处的黑血之地中，有一个由寒冷液体形成且不断起泡翻滚的湖泊。这种液体外观与稠度近似原油，触感冰冷彻骨，却能够强化活化亡灵身躯。被称为黑水怪（charda）即诞自这片非水之中，而无面之神欧格什则是其中首位。
欧格什将后代遗弃于黑血之地，已经不再居于其中。尽管黑水怪仍崇敬祂，但数代以来的漠视却产生了较为积极的影响——它们仍保持着难以理解的习俗，但已不再被冷酷残忍和渴求报复所驱使。那些虽然记得却不敬拜欧格什者认为无面之神舍弃了自己的后代，选择了位于遥远西方无光之海（Sightless Sea）至深至暗的海沟之中的种族。欧格什并无有组织的教团，祂的崇拜者将彼此视为最大的威胁。其中一些认为，献祭无面之神信徒的血肉骸骨便可汇聚其信仰，而当存活的信徒仅剩最后一个的时候，欧格什便会返回并利用这个狂热者在奥瓦（Orv）的穹顶释放一个崭新的种族——一个在吞尽一切之前绝不停止扩张的种族。
未曾有生者目击过欧格什，但祂的神像仍奇异地不受侵蚀并证明了祂的面貌，或称祂的无面。这些神像将欧格什描绘为模糊的人形实体，拥有肿胀巨腹，长爪与狗状的腿，大张的口中生满鲨鱼牙齿，但没有任何其他面部特征。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Orgesh
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 欧格什

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Monkey King, Aware of Vacuity   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Afterlife, Fertility, Rebirth, Resurrection   
Domains: Good, Healing, Law, Plant, Repose   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Archon, Growth, Restoration, Resurrection, Souls   
Favoured Weapon: Flail   
Holy Symbol: Crook and flail   
Sacred Animal: Ram   
Myths say that during the Age of Legend, Osiris ruled Osirion as its king. But his brother Set was jealous of Osiris's power and coveted his throne, so Set killed Osiris, dismembered his brother's body, and scattered the pieces across the world. Isis gathered up the pieces, and using her magic, she brought her husband back to life. Now free from death, Osiris became a god of death and life after death, whose resurrection mirrors the rebirth of souls in the afterlife. Osiris is also a fertility god, a deity of nature and growth who dies each year with the harvest and is reborn again in the spring when vegetation sprouts again. Osiris always appears wrapped up like a mummy, but with green skin symbolizing his role as a god of fertility. He wears a white atef crown with two ostrich feathers and carries a crook and flail, the symbols of pharaonic rule. Osiris is the brother of Nephthys and Set. His sister Isis is also his wife, and he is the father of Horus. As a death god, Osiris is tightly aligned with the likes of Pharasma and Anubis, but his brother Set remains his sworn enemy.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：生灵天尊
阵营：守序中立
神职：阴间、多产、重生、复活
领域：善良，治疗，秩序，植物，宁静
子领域：先祖、亚空、滋长、复原、回生、灵魂
偏好武器：连枷
圣徽：曲杖与连枷
圣兽：公羊
神话流传在传说之年时，欧西里斯是统御奥西里昂之王。但祂的兄弟赛特忌妒祂的权力，渴求祂的王位，因此诛杀欧西里斯，将亲兄弟碎尸万段，将尸块洒遍天地。伊西斯收集起遗体的碎片后透过魔法让丈夫复归人世。超脱生死后的欧西里斯成为了死亡与阴间之神，祂的复活被视为是死者的灵魂在阴间重生的象征。欧西里斯也是多产之神，是在每年秋收死去但随后在隔年春天植物破土时复生的自然与滋长之神。
欧西里斯的形象总是像个木乃伊一般全身包得紧紧实实，长了象征著多产神职的苍绿肤色。头戴两根鸵鸟羽饰的白冠，手持象征法老政权的曲杖连枷。欧西里斯是奈芙蒂斯和赛特的兄弟，也是伊西斯的配偶/兄弟，及荷鲁斯的父亲。身为死亡之神的欧西里斯与同类的法莱斯玛及阿努比斯关系良好，但兄弟赛特依然是祂的仇敌。
欧西里斯的神职人员主要由牧师、德鲁伊及圣武士构成。也有许多据说掌握了生死之理的秘教供奉着祂。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Osiris
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 欧西里斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Universal   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Form: Primordial Inevitable   
Areas of Concern: Machinery, Mathematics, Physics   
Domains: Artifice, Fire, Knowledge, Law   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy Mace   
Holy Symbol: Planet held within a geometrical compass  
Physics is at the heart of the cosmos, spawning nebulae, destroying stars, maintaining orbits, and more. Yet supernatural forces like magic, souls, outsiders, and deities introduce variations that both warp a logical universe and even gnaw at the foundation of mathematics itself. Otolmens watches the universe from Axis with the help of thousands of axiomites who tirelessly process the vast stream of data and observations she records. Where her predictions encounter anomalies, she dispatches teams of outsiders—or, rarely, mortals—to investigate, report back, and even correct the disturbance directly. Sites where the cosmic calculus is at risk are especially high priorities, and her agents as often clash with aeons over how to amend disturbances as they cooperate. Otolmens regularly submits reports to a host of deities, summarizing her findings and the means by which she intends to correct the errors. After millions of such dispatches, these reports are largely formalities—not only because the divine host has largely grown inured to these messages, but also because there’s little a divinity might say in response that would discourage her. On a cosmic scale, her recalibrations are subtle and ultimately help sustain the multiverse, so she continues her calculations virtually uninterrupted, with the assistance of thousands of devoted axiomites and visiting mortal mathematicians.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：宇宙
阵营：守序中立
形态：原始不可避免
领域：机械、数学、物理
领域：技巧、火、知识、守序
偏好武器：重锤
圣徽：几何罗盘内的行星物理学是核心宇宙，产生星云，摧毁恒星，维持轨道等等。然而，魔法、灵魂、外来者和神灵等超自然力量引入了变化，这些变化既扭曲了逻辑宇宙，甚至侵蚀了数学本身的基础。 Otolmens 在成千上万的公理家的帮助下从 Axis 观察宇宙，这些公理家不知疲倦地处理她记录的大量数据和观察结果。当她的预测遇到异常时，她会派出一群外人——或者，很少是凡人——去调查、报告，甚至直接纠正干扰。宇宙演算存在风险的地点尤其受到高度重视，她的特工们在合作时经常就如何修正干扰问题发生冲突。 Otolmens 定期向众多神灵提交报告，总结她的发现以及她打算纠正错误的方法。在数以百万计的此类发送之后，这些报告大多是形式——不仅因为神圣的宿主在很大程度上已经习惯了这些信息，而且还因为几乎没有神灵会在回应时说让她气馁。在宇宙尺度上，她的重新校准是微妙的，并最终有助于维持多元宇宙，因此她几乎不间断地继续她的计算，并在数千名忠诚的公理家和来访的凡人数学家的帮助下。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Otolmens
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 奥托门斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A pantheon is a group of related gods worshipped either individually or together. Most pantheons are associated with a specific ancestry or geopolitical region, but rarely, a pantheon consists of deities with overlapping areas of concern. Followers work to advance the shared interests of their pantheon, directing prayers to whichever god presides over their current activity or circumstance.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 万神殿是一组单独或共同崇拜的相关神。大多数万神殿都与特定的祖先或地缘政治地区有关，但很少有万神殿由具有重叠领域的神灵组成。追随者致力于促进他们万神殿的共同利益，将祈祷指向主持他们当前活动或情况的任何神。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Pantheons
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 万神殿

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The targets’ physical forms undergo a bizarre transformation. They look and function normally, but are composed of countless particles that separate and reconnect to remain whole. Each target gains fast healing 1 and is immune to bleed damage, critical hits, sneak attacks, and other forms of precision damage. The value of this fast healing increases by 1 at caster levels 10th, 15th, and 20th. Any target can end the spell effect on itself as a swift action; the target then regains 5d6 hit points and can attempt an additional saving throw against one disease or poison affecting it (at the original save DC), ending that disease or poison with a successful saving throw.

The targets’ physical forms undergo a bizarre transformation. They look and function normally, but are composed of countless particles that separate and reconnect to remain whole. Each target gains fast healing 1 and is immune to bleed damage, critical hits, sneak attacks, and other forms of precision damage. The value of this fast healing increases by 1 at caster levels 10th, 15th, and 20th. Any target can end the spell effect on itself as a swift action; the target then regains 5d6 hit points and can attempt an additional saving throw against one disease or poison affecting it (at the original save DC), ending that disease or poison with a successful saving throw.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 目标的物理形态经历了怪诞的变形。虽然他们的外观与言行都正常，但是他们的身体由无数的分离的小颗粒所组成，并重聚回一个整体。每个目标获得快速医疗1，并对流血伤害，偷袭，重击和其他形式的精准伤害免疫。该快速医疗的值在施法者等级达到10，15和20级时再+1。任何目标能用一个迅捷动作终止它自己身上的该法术效果。之后它会恢复5d6点HP并可以额外尝试一次豁免骰来对抗任意一个作用在它身上的疾病或毒素效果（使用原本的豁免DC），一个成功的豁免骰可以终止这个疾病或者毒素效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You may end the effect of particulate form on yourself early as a swift action; regaining 5d6 hit points and attempting a additional saving throw against one disease or poison affecting you (at the original save DC), ending that disease or poison with a successful saving throw.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以用一个迅捷动作终止它自己身上的该法术效果。之后会恢复5d6点HP并可以额外尝试一次豁免骰来对抗任意一个作用在它身上的疾病或毒素效果（使用原本的豁免DC），一个成功的豁免骰可以终止这个疾病或者毒素效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Particulate Form
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 粒子形态

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: King of the Wind Demons, Demon Lord of the Sky and Winged Creatures   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: The Sky, Temptation, Winged creatures   
Domains: Air, Chaos, Evil, Trickery   
Subdomains: Cloud, Deception, Demon, Wind   
Favoured Weapon: Longsword   
Holy Symbol: Image of Pazuzu, right hand raised   
Sacred Animal: All flying animals   
Pazuzu appears as a wiry human with eagle’s legs and talons, a demonic avian head, two pairs of bird wings, a scorpion tail, and a writhing snake in place of his genitals. Pazuzu is an aggressive demon fond of possessing mortals and using them to work his evils upon the world—it is said that Pazuzu can hear his name when an innocent speaks it unknowingly, and that this may be all that is needed to invite possession by the demon. He is the patron of all evil things that fly, particularly vrocks and harpies. His breath is a cloud of locusts, and it is said that at the dawn of civilization his first breath of air upon the Material Plane spawned the demon that, in time, would become Deskari. Pazuzu is among the oldest of the demon lords, one of the first to rise to power in the Abyss long ago alongside the likes of Lamashtu, Abraxas, and Dagon, yet his long conf lictwith Lamashtu has prevented him from achieving greater power or perhaps even godhood himself—a fact that only serves to spur his unending conflict with the Mother of Monsters. Pazuzu’s Abyssal realm of High M’Vania exists on the side of one of the great Abyssal rifts. This vertical realm includes an immense city on a vast shelf, as well as the depths below it and the skies above. The unique location of this realm allows Pazuzu unprecedented mobility among the Outer Planes, a freedom he often abuses in his war against Lamashtu, recruiting powerful allies from Hell, Abaddon, and beyond. Pazuzu’s personal rookery is a tangle of towers called Shibaxet—a place only his most trusted minions or his favored meals ever get to see.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：风魔王、天空魔王和有翼生物
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：天空、诱惑、有翼生物
领域：空气、混乱、邪恶、诡计
子领域：云、欺骗、恶魔、风偏好武器：长剑 
圣徽：帕祖祖的形象，右手举起 
圣兽：所有飞行动物 帕祖祖以鹰腿和爪子、恶魔鸟头、两对鸟翼、蝎尾和扭动的蛇的形式出现代替他的生殖器。帕祖祖是一个好斗的恶魔，喜欢附身凡人并利用他们在世界上作恶——据说帕祖祖可以在一个无辜的人在不知不觉中说出他的名字时听到他的名字，而这可能就是邀请人类附身所需要的一切恶魔。他是所有会飞的邪恶事物的守护神，尤其是弗洛克和鹰身女妖。他的吐息是一团蝗虫，据说在文明的黎明，他在主物质位面的第一口空气催生了恶魔，而恶魔最终会变成Deskari。帕祖祖是最古老的恶魔领主之一，很久以前与拉玛什图、阿布拉克萨斯和大衮等人一起在深渊中获得权力的第一批人之一，但他与拉玛什图的长期冲突使他无法获得更大的权力，甚至无法获得更大的权力神性本身——这一事实只会刺激他与怪物之母的无休止的冲突。 Pazuzu 的深渊王国 High M'Vania 位于一个巨大的深渊裂隙的一侧。这个垂直领域包括一个巨大的架子上的巨大城市，以及它下面的深处和上面的天空。这个领域的独特位置使 Pazuzu 在外层位面中拥有前所未有的灵巧，这是他在与 Lamashtu 的战争中经常滥用的自由，从地狱、阿巴顿和其他地方招募强大的盟友。 Pazuzu 的私人巢穴是一团被称为 Shibaxet 的塔楼——只有他最信任的爪牙或他最喜欢的饭菜才能看到。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Pazuzu
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 帕祖祖

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can effortlessly give aid to your allies, whether that means providing them with help attacking or defending them in the heat of combat. Whenever you use the aid another action to inflict a penalty on attack rolls or to AC against one of your allies, the penalty you inflict increases by 1. This bonus increases by 1 at 4th level and every 5 oracle levels thereafter (to a maximum of -5 at 19th level). It doesn’t stack with other feats or class features that improve the bonus you provide when using the aid another action.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你可以毫不费力地为你的盟友提供帮助，无论是帮助他们在激烈的战斗中攻击还是保卫他们。每当你使用援助动作对你的一个盟友带来攻击检定或 AC 加值时，你造成的加值增加 1。此加值在第 4 级和此后每 5 个先知等级增加 1（最多-5 在 19 级）。它不与其他专长或职业特性叠加，这些专长或职业特性可以提高您在使用援助其他动作时提供的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Perfect Aid Another - Defence
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 完美助人 - 防御

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Perfect Aid Another - Distracted Attacks
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 完美助人 - 干扰攻击

This bonus increases by 1 at 4th level and every 5 oracle levels thereafter (to a maximum of -5 at 19th level). LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 完美助人 - 攻击

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Perfect Aid Another - Distracted Defending
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 完美助人 - 干扰防御

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Used a Finale this round
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 本轮已经使用了谢幕曲能力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Philosophies of Golarion differ from religions in that they are teachings and ways of thinking that are propounded by a mortal founder who, usually, does not become a deity. By assenting to a particular philosophy, one is generally not limited in choosing any particular occupation; however, some combinations of philosophy and religion present inherent conflicts. The study of various fundamental underpinnings of many philosophies is known as metaphysics.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 葛拉利昂的哲学不同于宗教，因为它们是由通常不会成为神灵的凡人创始人提出的教义和思维方式。通过同意一种特定的哲学，一个人通常不受限制于选择任何特定的职业；然而，哲学和宗教的某些组合存在内在冲突。对许多哲学的各种基本基础的研究被称为形而上学。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Philosophies
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 哲学

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Consoler of Atheists  
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Atheists, Legacies, Reincarnation  
Domains: Artifice, Earth, Knowledge, Repose  
Favoured Weapon: Longbow   
Holy Symbol: Two circles overlapping vertically  
In life, Phlegyas was an arrogant but gifted man. He was cast out from Shelyn’s church for his blasphemy and pride, but the clergy’s attempt to wipe away Phlegyas’s legacy was undone, as the mortal’s name survived among admirers and detractors alike. Pharasma saw this form of immortality as fundamental to mortal experience and raised Phlegyas up to be a patron both of art outlasting its creator and of those who spurned the gods. As a symbol of creations outliving their creators, she is also the usher of new parents, especially those who die in childbirth. Unlike Shelyn’s domain of beauty, the Consoler of Atheists embodies resonance, and the works Phlegyas inspires are as often painful or horrifying as they are beautiful. Time and perspective cooled Phlegyas’s resentment of the divine, and now she and her servants offer respite to atheists who arrive at the Boneyard. Those godless souls who show potential she reserves to train as psychopomps. Phlegyas is the most human of the ushers: a tall, broadshouldered woman wearing a simple, plaster domino mask and carrying an oar she uses to ferry those who spurn the call of their gods. Her realm is the Anonymous Loggia, a museum of works by long-forgotten creators that still remain linchpins in mortal cultures.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：无神论者的安慰者 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：无神论者、遗产、轮回
领域：技艺、大地、知识、安眠 偏好武器：长弓 
圣徽：两个垂直重叠的圆圈 在生活中，Phlegyas 是一个傲慢但有天赋的男人。他因亵渎神灵和骄傲而被逐出谢林的教堂，但神职人员抹去弗莱吉亚斯遗产的企图失败了，因为凡人的名字在仰慕者和批评者中都幸存下来。 Pharasma 认为这种永生形式是凡人体验的基础，并将 Phlegyas 提升为比其创造者更持久的艺术和那些唾弃众神的人的守护神。作为创造物比创造者更长寿的象征，她也是新父母的引领者，尤其是那些死于分娩的父母。与 Shelyn 的美领域不同，无神论者的安慰者体现了共鸣，而 Phlegyas 所激发的作品往往既美丽又痛苦或可怕。时间和视角冷却了 Phlegyas 对神的怨恨，现在她和她的仆人为到达 Boneyard 的无神论者提供了喘息的机会。那些表现出潜力的无神灵魂，她保留训练成精神错乱者。 Phlegyas 是最人性化的引座员：一个身材高大、肩膀宽阔的女人，戴着简单的石膏多米诺骨牌面具，手持桨，用来运送那些拒绝神的召唤的人。她的领域是匿名凉廊，这是一个由长期被遗忘的创作者的作品博物馆，这些作品仍然是凡人文化的关键。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Phlegyas
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 痰液

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Merrygleam   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Jokes, Pranks, Surprises   
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Good, Trickery   
Subdomains: Azata, Deception, Revelry, Whimsy   
Favoured Weapon: Blowgun (Dart)   
Holy Symbol: Snake on a tree branch   
Sacred Animal: Tree snake   
The eternal prankster, Picoperi finds delight in the simplest of jokes and finds existence a never-ending series of surprises. He can take any form that best suits his capers, but when he appears to mortals, he typically does so as a young boy with brown skin and wildly curling black hair. His delicate features, graceful limbs, and pointed ears suggest elven ancestry, and he is never seen without his telltale woven wool vest dyed bright green and yellow and worked with images of llamas, tree frogs, and snakes. Good folk who look at the world with wonder and delight often pay homage to Picoperi. Inventors, particularly alchemists who use ingredients derived from jungle plants, sometimes let Picoperi's love of surprises guide them to new discoveries. Picoperi takes great delight in taunting the forces of evil. In battle, he prefers ambushes and traps over forward charges, and he poisons his victims with darts that cause uncontrollable laughter and dreamy euphoria. Legend tells that thousands of years ago, Urxehl smiled at one of Picoperi's jokes, and the demon lord has sought to destroy the merry trickster ever since. Picoperi lives in the heart of a kapok tree on Elysium. Though the tree looks small from the outside, the inside holds a network of comfortable rooms carved into the tree's trunk.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：欢愉烁光
阵营：混乱善良 
神职：笑话，恶作剧，惊喜
领域：混乱、魅惑、善良、诡计
子领域：爱塔、欺骗、狂欢、滑稽
偏好武器：吹枪（飞镖） 
圣徽：缠绕在树枝上的一条挤眉弄眼的蛇
圣兽：树蛇
永远的恶作剧者，皮可皮里能从最简单的笑话中找到乐趣，并发现存在一系列永无止境的惊喜。
他可以以任何最适合他的形式出现，但当他出现在人类面前时，他通常会以一个棕色皮肤，黑色卷发的小男孩的形象出现。他精致的五官、优美的四肢和尖尖的耳朵暗示着精灵的血统，他总是穿着染上亮绿色和黄色的、带有羊驼、树蛙和蛇的图案的编织羊毛背心。
以惊奇和喜悦的眼光看待世界的好人经常向皮可皮里致敬。发明家，尤其是使用丛林植物成分的炼金术士，有时会让皮可皮里对惊喜的热爱引导他们获得新的发现。皮可皮里以嘲弄邪恶势力为乐。
在战斗中，他更喜欢伏击和陷阱而不是前锋，他用飞镖毒害他的受害者，引起无法控制的笑声和梦幻般的兴奋。传说数千年前，厄桀尔被皮可皮里的一个笑话逗笑了，从那以后，恶魔领主就一直试图摧毁这个快乐的骗子。
皮可皮里住在极乐境的奔放之野一颗木棉树里，看上去虽小，里面藏着无数舒适的房间。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Picoperi
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 皮可皮里

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level, the powers of darkness make the dreadknight a beacon of corruption and disease. A dreadknight does not take any damage or take any penalty from diseases.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 3 级，黑暗的力量使恐惧骑士成为腐败和疾病的灯塔。恐惧骑士免疫疾病。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Plague Bringer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瘟疫使者

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Plant: You become immune to paralysis, poison, polymorph effects, sleep effects, and stunning.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
植物：你对麻痹、毒素、变形效果、睡眠效果和震慑效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Plant: You become immune to paralysis, poison, polymorph effects, sleep effects, and stunning.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
植物：你对麻痹、毒素、变形效果、睡眠效果和震慑效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Plant Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 植物领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Upon reaching 5th level, a dreadknight receives a boon from their dark patrons. This boon can take one of two forms. Once the form is chosen, it cannot be changed. The first type of bond allows the dread knight to enhance their weapon as a standard action by calling upon the aid of a fiendish spirit for 1 minute per dreadknight level. When called, the spirit causes the weapon to shed unholy light as a torch. At 5th level, this spirit grants the weapon a + 1 enhancement bonus.For every three levels beyond 5th, the weapon gains another + 1 enhancement bonus, to a maximum of + 6 at 20th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
5级时，恐惧骑士会从他们的亵渎领主那里获得恩惠。这种恩惠有两种形式，二选其一。
亵渎武器盟誓：第一种恩惠允许恐惧骑士以一个标准动作来增强他们的武器，在1分钟/每恐惧骑士等级内呼唤恶魔之魂。当被召唤时，灵魂会使武器像火炬一样散发出邪恶的光芒。
在 5级时，精魂给予武器+1增强加值。5级之后每3级，武器再获得+1增强加值，在20级时达到最高+6。
恶魔仆从：第二种恩惠授予恐惧骑士一匹恶魔般的坐骑，将她带入战场。该坐骑相当于德鲁伊的动物伙伴，使用恐惧骑士的等级作为她的有效德鲁伊等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Boon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎恩惠

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 20th level, a dreadknight becomes a conduit for the might of dark powers. Her DR increases to 10/good. 
The dreadknight gains an additional 3 uses of Profane Corruption. In addition, whenever she channels negative energy or uses touch of corruption to damage a creature, she deals the maximum possible amount.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 20 级，恐惧骑士成为黑暗力量的门户。她的 DR 增加 10/善良。恐惧骑士获得额外 3 次亵渎之炎的使用次数。此外，每当她引导负能量或使用亵渎之炎对生物造成伤害时，她都会造成尽可能多的伤害，如同被极效。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Champion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎冠军

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 20th level, a conqueror becomes a beacon of unyielding force. A conquerors inspired rage no longer gives allies a penalty to AC, nor limits what skills or abilities they can use. Additionally, they act as if under a haste effect.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 20 级时，征服者成为不屈力量的灯塔。亵渎敕命不再给予盟友 AC 惩罚，也不会限制他们使用的技能或能力。此外，它们如同处于加速术效果下一样。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Lord
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎之主

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level, a dreadknight gains a bonus equal to his Charisma bonus (if any) on all saving throws.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 2 级，恐惧骑士在所有豁免检定上获得等同于他的魅力调整值（如果有的话）的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Profane Resilience
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亵渎之力

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. Resistant Touch: As a standard action, you can touch an ally to grant them your resistance bonus for 1 minute. When you use this ability, you lose your resistance bonus granted by the Protection domain for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Aura of Protection: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的信仰是你坚定防护的源泉，而且你也可以利用信仰之力保护他人。此外，你的{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}将获得+1抗力{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。你每升5级可额外获得1点抗力加值。
抵抗之触：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}一个盟友后，可使其拥有你的抗力加值，持续1分钟。在你使用此能力时，你将失去来自保护领域的抗力加值，持续1分钟。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
守护灵光：达到8级后，你可发出30英尺范围的守护灵光，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。在此灵光范围内的盟友，包括你自身的{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}获得+1偏斜加值，以及对抗所有能量的5点抗性（酸蚀、寒冷、电击、火焰和音波）。在8级后，赋予你此领域的职业每升4级，可额外提高1点偏斜加值。14级时，对抗所有能量的抗性将提高到10点。生效轮次无需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your faith is your greatest source of protection, and you can use that faith to defend others. In addition, you receive a +1 resistance bonus on saving throws. This bonus increases by 1 for every 5 levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. Resistant Touch: As a standard action, you can touch an ally to grant them your resistance bonus for 1 minute. When you use this ability, you lose your resistance bonus granted by the Protection domain for 1 minute. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier. Aura of Protection: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot aura of protection for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. You and your allies within this aura gain a +1 deflection bonus to AC and resistance 5 against all elements (acid, cold, electricity, fire, and sonic). The deflection bonus increases by +1 for every four levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain beyond 8th. At 14th level, the resistance against all elements increases to 10. These rounds do not need to be consecutive. Domain Spells: protection from alignment, barkskin, protection from energy, communal protection from energy, spell resistance, communal stoneskin, greater restoration, protection from spells, seamantle.

你的信仰是你坚定防护的源泉，而且你也可以利用信仰之力保护他人。此外，你的{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}将获得+1抗力{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}。你每升5级可额外获得1点抗力加值。

守护灵光：达到8级后，你可发出30英尺范围的守护灵光，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。在此灵光范围内的盟友，包括你自身的{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}获得+1偏斜加值，以及对抗所有能量的5点抗性（酸蚀、寒冷、电击、火焰和音波）。在8级后，赋予你此领域的职业每升4级，可额外提高1点偏斜加值。14级时，对抗所有能量的抗性将提高到10点。生效轮次无需连续。
领域法术：防护阵营，树肤，防护能量，共用防护能量，法术抵抗，共用石肤，高等复原术，防护魔法，水幕拒敌。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Protection Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 保护领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Protection: You gain the protection of the following spells: false life, delay poison, protection from alignment, mage armor, and shield.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
保护：你获得以下法术效果：虚假生命、延缓毒发、防护阵营、法师护甲和护盾术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Protection Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 保护领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You channel the power of the Boneyard, the place of judgement for all souls, your touch can move foes to an early rest.
Bleeding Touch: As a melee touch attack, you can cause a living creature to take 1d6 points of damage per round. This effect persists for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Spirit Touch: At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你引导所有灵魂的审判之地——骨原的力量，你的触碰可以让敌人早日安眠。
流血之触：作为近战接触攻击，你可以使活物每轮受到 1d6 点伤害。这种效果持续的轮数等于赋予你领域的职业等级的 1/2（至少 1 轮）。你每天可以使用这个能力的次数等于 3 + 你的感知调整值。
灵触：在第 6 级，以一个迅捷动作，你可以赋予你的天生武器或任何你使用的武器的幽冥属性。你每天可以使用此能力的轮数等于你的牧师等级。生效轮次无需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.
A ghost touch weapon deals damage normally against incorporeal creatures, regardless of its bonus. An incorporeal creature's 50% reduction in damage from corporeal sources does not apply to attacks made against it with ghost touch weapons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
在第 6 级，以一个迅捷动作，你可以赋予你的天生武器或任何你使用的武器的幽冥属性。你每天可以使用此能力的轮数等于你的牧师等级。生效轮次无需连续。
幽冥武器能够无视{g|Encyclopedia:Incorporeal_Touch_Attack}虚体{/g}形态的加值，对其造成正常{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。虚体生物从实体来源受到的伤害会降低50%，而由幽冥武器做出的攻击，其伤害无法被降低。

You channel the power of the Boneyard, the place of judgement for all souls, your touch can move foes to an early rest.
Gentle Rest: Your touch can fill a creature with lethargy, causing a living creature to become staggered for 1 round as a melee touch attack. If you touch a staggered living creature, that creature falls asleep for 1 round instead. Undead creatures touched are staggered for a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom modifier. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Spirit Touch: At 6th level, as a swift action, you can give your natural weapons or any weapons you wield the ghost touch weapon special ability. You can use this power a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. These rounds need not be consecutive.

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of Eternity   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Architecture, Craftsmanship, Creation, Metalworking   
Domains: Artifice, Earth, Fire, Knowledge, Travel   
Subdomains: Ash, Construct, Metal, Smoke, Thought, Trade   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Staff composed of the ankh, djed, and was   
Sacred Animal: Bull   
According to ancient Osirian mythology, Ptah is the demiurge who created the universe through his thought and creative word. He is the artisan of the gods, a deity of creation and the arts, of architecture, invention, metalworking, and sculpture. Such is Ptah's creative power that alone among the ancient Osirian gods, he created himself. He is the fire beneath the earth, and earthquakes and tremors are said to be signs of his disfavor. Ptah is the husband of Sekhmet, and an ally of Ra and Maat. Although he normally remains aloof from divine politics, he has come into conflict with Apep and Set when those gods attempt to destroy his creations. Ptah normally appears as a man wearing the wrappings of a mummy, with a simple skullcap on his head, and holding a staff in his hands composed of three combined symbols of his creative power-the ankh, representing life; the djed pillar, signifying stability; and the was scepter, symbolizing power. At other times, Ptah is depicted as a naked and deformed dwarf, and it is in this form that the Pahmet dwarves of Osirion venerate him. Ptah is the patron of alchemists, architects, artisans, artists, bards, builders, carpenters, masons, metalworkers, shipbuilders, and anyone else who is involved in creative endeavors. Additionally, Ptah is said to hear the prayers of all mortal worshipers, and he often intercedes with the other gods on behalf of humanity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：永恒之主
阵营：绝对中立
神职：建筑、手艺、创造、金工
领域：工匠、大地、火焰、知识、旅行
子领域：灰烬、构装、金属、烟幕、思想、交易
偏好武器：木棍
圣徽由命符、稳柱与霸杖组成的权杖
圣兽：公牛
根据古奥西里昂神话，卜塔是透过思想与文字创作出宇宙的造物主。祂是诸神之中的艺匠，创作与工艺─例如建筑、发明、金工与雕刻─之神。卜塔的创造力之强，祂是唯一一个自我创造的神祇，大异于其他古奥西里昂诸神。祂是地底下的烈焰，地震与颤动被视为祂不悦的征兆。
卜塔是塞赫美特的配偶，拉和玛亚特的盟友。虽然祂平常不在乎天界政治，每当阿佩普及赛特威胁到祂的造物时也会出手对抗。卜塔一般以戴着简单圆帽，身上紧包木乃伊裹尸布的男子姿态示人，手持以三个祂所创造的符号─生命的命符、稳定的稳柱、权威的霸杖─组合而成的权杖。有时祂也会被描绘成一个裸体的畸形矮人，奥西里昂的帕梅矮人崇拜祂的此一形象。
卜塔是炼金术师、建筑师、艺匠、吟游诗人、建筑工、木匠、石匠、金工师、船匠以及其他任何进行创作活动者的守护神。此外，据说卜塔会倾听所有凡人的祈祷，不时为了人类向诸神说情。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Ptah
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 卜塔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Shimmering Maiden, The North Star, Mistress of the Stars, Light of the Aurora  
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Constellations, Homesickness, Northern Lights
Domains: Air, Chaos, Good, Weather   
Subdomains: Azata, Cloud, Seasons, Stars   
Favoured Weapon: Sling
Holy Symbol: Face in Northern Lights   
Sacred Animal: Firefly   
Sacred Colour: Midnight Blue   
Pulura, the mistress of the stars and the aurora, is an angel empyreal lord, the patron of those travellers that become homesick, lost, or injured in the snowy wastes of the far north.Pulura was worshiped as a major deity in the lost Kellid realm of Sarkoris. The Sarkorians saw her and the demon lord Kostchtchie as dualistic gods of cold. She was honoured by a mighty ring of idols in the city of Dyinglight but, in common with the rest of Sarkoris, the city fell to the demons of the Worldwound. A cascade named for her, Pulura's Fall, once flowed to the northeast of Iz; it has since been swallowed by the Worldwound, but its namesake, a temple to Pulura, remains, and has been withstanding a demonic siege for more than a century. An idol to Pulura stands on the Walk of Lost Gods in the ravaged town of Gundrun.
Appearance: Pulura appears as a lovely, alluring Tian woman with the grace of a dancer, a gravity about her expression, and black, flowing hair gleaming with the light of stars. Her robes appear to be made from green and pink light, and flicker with every one of her movements. She often appears dancing amid the aurora borealis in the skies of far northern lands, and legend has it that her extraordinary beauty will burn any mortals who dare approach her too closely. She wields a sling made from sighs that fires bullets of starlight.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号:微光少女
阵营: 混乱善良
神职:星座，思乡，北极光
领域: 空气, 混乱, 善良, 天气
子领域: 爱塔, 云, 季节, 星辰
偏好武器：投石索（投石杖）
圣徽：幻化成人脸的北极光
圣兽：萤火虫
微光少女舞动于北天之上，代表着星座，思乡与北极光。璞露拉明白星座是凡人在世界中行走时的指引，群星照亮地上的道路，让那些旅行探索之人总能找到回家的方向。星座的故事不但提供给人们娱乐，讲述关于良善，光明与力量的故事，也是帮助人们学习记忆星辰的工具。它们确保星图总是能够易读难忘。微光少女呼唤她的信徒学习星图，为那些迷失者和需求向导之人提供帮助，并且比这更重要的是，信徒要自行学会在旅途中解读天穹，为自己导航。
通常，凡人很难看到微光少女，她出现在凡人面前时，就像一颗遥远而明亮的炽热星辰。当人们能够看到她时，她的外表看起来就像是一个天洲女性，漆黑的长发中闪动着星光。她身着嫩绿桃粉的长袍——袍子的材料不似任何人间的织物，而像是由纯粹的光编织而成。璞露拉的追随者包括旅行者，向导，游牧民，探险家，水手，观星者和猎人。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your bardic performance, removing one of the following conditions on a creature within range affected by your bardic performance: dazzled, exhausted, paralyzed, shaken, or stunned.
You cannot activate another bardic performance this round. If you have the lingering performance feat the effect lingers as normal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你必须处于一个生效中的吟游演绎中才能施展这个法术。使用时，你立即结束表演，移除受你的吟游表演影响范围内的生物的以下状态之一：目眩、力竭、麻痹、颤栗或震慑。本轮你不能激活另一个吟游表演。如果你有余音绕梁的表演专长，效果会像往常一样持续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Purging Finale
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 净化谢幕曲

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 净化谢幕曲——麻痹

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your bardic performance, removing the shaken condition on a creature within range affected by your bardic performance.
You cannot activate another bardic performance this round. If you have the lingering performance feat the effect lingers as normal.
