The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃兽群座并获得陌客座。
陌客座: 观星者明白如何完美地融入其他文化之中。他可以用迅捷动作对自身释放渐隐术，这是一个类法术能力，每日使用次数等于其观星者等级的一半（最低1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 兽群座 -> 陌客座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃兽群座并获得画眉座。
画眉座: 观星者的嗓音变得悦耳动听。观星者会在魅力相关的技能检定上获得相当于职业等级的一半（最低1） 的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 兽群座 -> 画眉座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Pack and gains The Wagon.
The Wagon: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃兽群座并获得车辇座。
车辇座: 观星者的行动变得迅捷且稳定。他的移动速度获得+10尺增强加值。此外，每日3次以迅捷动作，他能够在1轮内获得行动自如的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pack to The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 兽群座 -> 车辇座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者获得对方向的直觉。他在知识（世界）和察觉检定中获得+4加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者获得对方向的直觉。他在知识（世界）和察觉检定中获得+4加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sidereal Arcana - The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘（族长座）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Patriarch and gains The Bridge.
The Bridge: The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃族长座并获得桥梁座。
桥梁座: 观星者能够抵御来自冬日的黑暗。他会获得5点寒冷抗力并免疫恶魔创造的目盲效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Patriarch to The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 族长座 -> 桥梁座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Patriarch and gains The Daughter.
The Daughter: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃族长座并获得息女座。
息女座: 息女座能用春季的到来以及万物的新生鼓舞人心。观星者和10尺范围内的所有盟友会在对抗恐惧的豁免检定中获得+4士气加值。观星者免疫恶魔创造的恐惧效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Patriarch to The Daughter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 族长座 -> 息女座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Patriarch and gains The Follower.
The Follower: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃族长座并获得猎命座。
猎命座: 死之阴影跟随着观星者，让他免受毁灭之痛。观星者在对抗死亡效果的豁免检定中获得+4加值。此外，他免疫所有由恶魔创造的死亡效果、负能量效果和负向等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Patriarch to The Follower
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 族长座 -> 猎命座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Patriarch and gains The Lantern Bearer.
The LanternBearer: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃族长座并获得灯夫座。
灯夫座: 观星者塑造光明的力量得到了增强。观星者释放的所有带有火描述标识的法术的环级视为比正常高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Patriarch to The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 族长座 -> 灯夫座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Patriarch and gains The Mother.
The Mother: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃族长座并获得慈母座。
慈母座: 观星者引导着星座群的慈爱之心。每当观星者施放一个治疗类法术或者使用治疗巫术时，他都能够将其职业等级的两倍加到恢复的生命值上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Patriarch to The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 族长座 -> 慈母座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Patriarch and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃族长座并获得好合座。
好合座: 相爱之人缠绵合一的标志赋予观星者一种神秘的魅力。他释放的拥有胁迫描述标识的法术豁免DC都会增加1点。此外，他在对抗胁迫效果的豁免检定上获得+2士气加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Patriarch to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 族长座 -> 好合座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Patriarch and gains The Pack.
The Pack: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃族长座并获得兽群座。
兽群座: 观星者与星座群中负责背负篷车的野兽产生联结。他会在学识（自然）检定上获得+2加值。此外，每当他施放能够呼唤复数动物类生物的召唤法术时，都会额外召唤1只该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Patriarch to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 族长座 -> 兽群座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Patriarch. 
The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。
该组能力放弃族长座。
观星者获得对方向的直觉。他在知识（世界）和察觉检定中获得+4加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星之舞（族长座）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Patriarch and gains The Rider.
The Rider: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃族长座并获得骑士座。
骑士座: 观星者和坐骑人马一体。骑乘时他和坐骑都在所有豁免上获得+1加值并免疫困难地形。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Patriarch to The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 族长座 -> 骑士座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Patriarch and gains The Stargazer.
The Stargazer: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃族长座并获得观星座。
观星座: 与观星者同名的星座向他发出警告。这让观星者的先攻检定获得+2洞察加值，而且自身在战斗中进行行动之前不会被视为措手不及，但是该效果并不会真的让他能够提前进行行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Patriarch to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 族长座 -> 观星座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Patriarch and gains The Stranger.
The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.

每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃族长座并获得陌客座。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃骑士座并获得观星座。
观星座: 与观星者同名的星座向他发出警告。这让观星者的先攻检定获得+2洞察加值，而且自身在战斗中进行行动之前不会被视为措手不及，但是该效果并不会真的让他能够提前进行行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 骑士座 -> 观星座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Stranger.
The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃骑士座并获得陌客座。
陌客座: 观星者明白如何完美地融入其他文化之中。他可以用迅捷动作对自身释放渐隐术，这是一个类法术能力，每日使用次数等于其观星者等级的一半（最低1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 骑士座 -> 陌客座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃骑士座并获得画眉座。
画眉座: 观星者的嗓音变得悦耳动听。观星者会在魅力相关的技能检定上获得相当于职业等级的一半（最低1） 的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 骑士座 -> 画眉座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Rider and gains The Wagon.
The Wagon: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃骑士座并获得车辇座。
车辇座: 观星者的行动变得迅捷且稳定。他的移动速度获得+10尺增强加值。此外，每日3次以迅捷动作，他能够在1轮内获得行动自如的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Rider to The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 骑士座 -> 车辇座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 与观星者同名的星座向他发出警告。这让观星者的先攻检定获得+2洞察加值，而且自身在战斗中进行行动之前不会被视为措手不及，但是该效果并不会真的让他能够提前进行行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 与观星者同名的星座向他发出警告。这让观星者的先攻检定获得+2洞察加值，而且自身在战斗中进行行动之前不会被视为措手不及，但是该效果并不会真的让他能够提前进行行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sidereal Arcana - The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘（观星座）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stargazer and gains The Bridge.
The Bridge: The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃观星座并获得桥梁座。
桥梁座: 观星者能够抵御来自冬日的黑暗。他会获得5点寒冷抗力并免疫恶魔创造的目盲效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stargazer to The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星座 -> 桥梁座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stargazer and gains The Daughter.
The Daughter: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃观星座并获得息女座。
息女座: 息女座能用春季的到来以及万物的新生鼓舞人心。观星者和10尺范围内的所有盟友会在对抗恐惧的豁免检定中获得+4士气加值。观星者免疫恶魔创造的恐惧效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stargazer to The Daughter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星座 -> 息女座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stargazer and gains The Follower.
The Follower: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃观星座并获得猎命座。
猎命座: 死之阴影跟随着观星者，让他免受毁灭之痛。观星者在对抗死亡效果的豁免检定中获得+4加值。此外，他免疫所有由恶魔创造的死亡效果、负能量效果和负向等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stargazer to The Follower
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星座 -> 猎命座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stargazer and gains The Lantern Bearer.
The LanternBearer: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃观星座并获得灯夫座。
灯夫座: 观星者塑造光明的力量得到了增强。观星者释放的所有带有火描述标识的法术的环级视为比正常高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stargazer to The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星座 -> 灯夫座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stargazer and gains The Mother.
The Mother: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃观星座并获得慈母座。
慈母座: 观星者引导着星座群的慈爱之心。每当观星者施放一个治疗类法术或者使用治疗巫术时，他都能够将其职业等级的两倍加到恢复的生命值上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stargazer to The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星座 -> 慈母座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stargazer and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃观星座并获得好合座。
好合座: 相爱之人缠绵合一的标志赋予观星者一种神秘的魅力。他释放的拥有胁迫描述标识的法术豁免DC都会增加1点。此外，他在对抗胁迫效果的豁免检定上获得+2士气加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stargazer to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星座 -> 好合座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stargazer and gains The Pack.
The Pack: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃观星座并获得兽群座。
兽群座: 观星者与星座群中负责背负篷车的野兽产生联结。他会在学识（自然）检定上获得+2加值。此外，每当他施放能够呼唤复数动物类生物的召唤法术时，都会额外召唤1只该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stargazer to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星座 -> 兽群座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Stargazer. 
The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。
该组能力放弃观星座。
与观星者同名的星座向他发出警告。这让观星者的先攻检定获得+2洞察加值，而且自身在战斗中进行行动之前不会被视为措手不及，但是该效果并不会真的让他能够提前进行行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星之舞（观星座）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stargazer and gains The Patriarch.
The Patriarch: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃观星座并获得族长座。
族长座: 观星者获得对方向的直觉。他在知识（世界）和察觉检定中获得+4加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stargazer to The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星座 -> 族长座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stargazer and gains The Rider.
The Rider: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃观星座并获得骑士座。
骑士座: 观星者和坐骑人马一体。骑乘时他和坐骑都在所有豁免上获得+1加值并免疫困难地形。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stargazer to The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星座 -> 骑士座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stargazer and gains The Stranger.
The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.

每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃观星座并获得陌客座。
陌客座: 观星者明白如何完美地融入其他文化之中。他可以用迅捷动作对自身释放渐隐术，这是一个类法术能力，每日使用次数等于其观星者等级的一半（最低1）。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃陌客座并获得兽群座。
兽群座: 观星者与星座群中负责背负篷车的野兽产生联结。他会在学识（自然）检定上获得+2加值。此外，每当他施放能够呼唤复数动物类生物的召唤法术时，都会额外召唤1只该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌客座 -> 兽群座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Stranger. 
The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。
该组能力放弃陌客座。
观星者明白如何完美地融入其他文化之中。他可以用迅捷动作对自身释放渐隐术，这是一个类法术能力，每日使用次数等于其观星者等级的一半（最低1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星之舞（陌客座）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Patriarch.
The Patriarch: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃陌客座并获得族长座。
族长座: 观星者获得对方向的直觉。他在知识（世界）和察觉检定中获得+4加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌客座 -> 族长座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Rider.
The Rider: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃陌客座并获得骑士座。
骑士座: 观星者和坐骑人马一体。骑乘时他和坐骑都在所有豁免上获得+1加值并免疫困难地形。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌客座 -> 骑士座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Stargazer.
The Stargazer: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃陌客座并获得观星座。
观星座: 与观星者同名的星座向他发出警告。这让观星者的先攻检定获得+2洞察加值，而且自身在战斗中进行行动之前不会被视为措手不及，但是该效果并不会真的让他能够提前进行行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌客座 -> 观星座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃陌客座并获得画眉座。
画眉座: 观星者的嗓音变得悦耳动听。观星者会在魅力相关的技能检定上获得相当于职业等级的一半（最低1） 的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌客座 -> 画眉座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Stranger and gains The Wagon.
The Wagon: The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃陌客座并获得车辇座。
车辇座: 观星者的行动变得迅捷且稳定。他的移动速度获得+10尺增强加值。此外，每日3次以迅捷动作，他能够在1轮内获得行动自如的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stranger to The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 陌客座 -> 车辇座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的嗓音变得悦耳动听。观星者会在魅力相关的技能检定上获得相当于职业等级的一半（最低1） 的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 观星者的嗓音变得悦耳动听。观星者会在魅力相关的技能检定上获得相当于职业等级的一半（最低1） 的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sidereal Arcana - The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星座奥秘（画眉座）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Thrush and gains The Bridge.
The Bridge: The stargazer is warded against winter’s darkness. He gains cold resistance 5 and an immunity to blindness effects caused by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃画眉座并获得桥梁座。
桥梁座: 观星者能够抵御来自冬日的黑暗。他会获得5点寒冷抗力并免疫恶魔创造的目盲效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Thrush to The Bridge
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 画眉座 -> 桥梁座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Thrush and gains The Daughter.
The Daughter: The Daughter emboldens hearts with the promise of springtime and new life. The stargazer and allies within 10 feet gain a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear. The stargazer is immune to fear effects created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃画眉座并获得息女座。
息女座: 息女座能用春季的到来以及万物的新生鼓舞人心。观星者和10尺范围内的所有盟友会在对抗恐惧的豁免检定中获得+4士气加值。观星者免疫恶魔创造的恐惧效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Thrush to The Daughter
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 画眉座 -> 息女座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Thrush and gains The Follower.
The Follower: The specter of death follows the stargazer, shielding him from doom. The stargazer gains a +4 bonus on saves against death effects. In addition, he is immune to all death effects, negative energy effects, and negative levels created by demons.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃画眉座并获得猎命座。
猎命座: 死之阴影跟随着观星者，让他免受毁灭之痛。观星者在对抗死亡效果的豁免检定中获得+4加值。此外，他免疫所有由恶魔创造的死亡效果、负能量效果和负向等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Thrush to The Follower
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 画眉座 -> 猎命座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Thrush and gains The Lantern Bearer.
The LanternBearer: The stargazer’s ability to conjure light increases. Any spell cast by the stargazer with the fire descriptor has its spell level increased by 2.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃画眉座并获得灯夫座。
灯夫座: 观星者塑造光明的力量得到了增强。观星者释放的所有带有火描述标识的法术的环级视为比正常高2级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Thrush to The Lantern Bearer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 画眉座 -> 灯夫座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Thrush and gains The Mother.
The Mother: The stargazer channels the nurturing heart of the Caravan. Whenever the stargazer casts a cure spell, casts breath of life, or uses the healing hex, he adds twice his class level to the hit points restored.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃画眉座并获得慈母座。
慈母座: 观星者引导着星座群的慈爱之心。每当观星者施放一个治疗类法术或者使用治疗巫术时，他都能够将其职业等级的两倍加到恢复的生命值上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Thrush to The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 画眉座 -> 慈母座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Thrush and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃画眉座并获得好合座。
好合座: 相爱之人缠绵合一的标志赋予观星者一种神秘的魅力。他释放的拥有胁迫描述标识的法术豁免DC都会增加1点。此外，他在对抗胁迫效果的豁免检定上获得+2士气加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Thrush to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 画眉座 -> 好合座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Thrush and gains The Pack.
The Pack: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃画眉座并获得兽群座。
兽群座: 观星者与星座群中负责背负篷车的野兽产生联结。他会在学识（自然）检定上获得+2加值。此外，每当他施放能够呼唤复数动物类生物的召唤法术时，都会额外召唤1只该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Thrush to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 画眉座 -> 兽群座

Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Thrush. 
The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃车辇座并获得慈母座。
慈母座: 观星者引导着星座群的慈爱之心。每当观星者施放一个治疗类法术或者使用治疗巫术时，他都能够将其职业等级的两倍加到恢复的生命值上。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 车辇座 -> 慈母座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Newlyweds.
The Newlyweds: The sign of intertwined lovers grants the stargazer a romantic mystique. Whenever he uses a spell with the compulsion descriptor the save DC increases by 1. In addition, stargazer gains a +2 morale bonus on saving throws against compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃车辇座并获得好合座。
好合座: 相爱之人缠绵合一的标志赋予观星者一种神秘的魅力。他释放的拥有胁迫描述标识的法术豁免DC都会增加1点。此外，他在对抗胁迫效果的豁免检定上获得+2士气加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Newlyweds
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 车辇座 -> 好合座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Pack.
The Pack: The stargazer becomes attuned to the beasts that follow the Caravan. He gains a +2 bonus on Nature checks. In addition, whenever he casts a summoning spell that conjures multiple creatures of the animal type, he summons an additional animal of that type.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃车辇座并获得兽群座。
兽群座: 观星者与星座群中负责背负篷车的野兽产生联结。他会在学识（自然）检定上获得+2加值。此外，每当他施放能够呼唤复数动物类生物的召唤法术时，都会额外召唤1只该类型的动物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Pack
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 车辇座 -> 兽群座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. 
All variants of this ability give up The Wagon. 
The stargazer’s movement becomes swift and steady. He gains a +10-foot enhancement bonus to his movement speed. In addition, three times per day as a swift action, he can gain the effects of freedom of movement for 1 round.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。
该组能力放弃车辇座。
观星者的行动变得迅捷且稳定。他的移动速度获得+10尺增强加值。此外，每日3次以迅捷动作，他能够在1轮内获得行动自如的效果。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stars’ Dance - The Wagon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星之舞（车辇座）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Patriarch.
The Patriarch: The stargazer gains an innate sense of direction. He gains a +4 bonus on Knowledge (World) and Perception checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃车辇座并获得族长座。
族长座: 观星者获得对方向的直觉。他在知识（世界）和察觉检定中获得+4加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Patriarch
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 车辇座 -> 族长座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Rider.
The Rider: The stargazer and his mount ride as one. While he is mounted both rider and mount gain +1 on all saves and an immunity to difficult terrain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃车辇座并获得骑士座。
骑士座: 观星者和坐骑人马一体。骑乘时他和坐骑都在所有豁免上获得+1加值并免疫困难地形。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Rider
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 车辇座 -> 骑士座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Stargazer.
The Stargazer: The constellation that shares his name warns the stargazer of danger. The stargazer gains a +2 insight bonus on initiative checks and is not considered flat-footed before he acts in combat, although this does not allow him to act if he could not otherwise do so.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃车辇座并获得观星座。
观星座: 与观星者同名的星座向他发出警告。这让观星者的先攻检定获得+2洞察加值，而且自身在战斗中进行行动之前不会被视为措手不及，但是该效果并不会真的让他能够提前进行行动。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 车辇座 -> 观星座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Stranger.
The Stranger: The stargazer learns to blend seamlessly into others’ cultures. He can use vanish on himself as a swift action spell-like ability a number of times equal to half his stargazer level (min 1) per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃车辇座并获得陌客座。
陌客座: 观星者明白如何完美地融入其他文化之中。他可以用迅捷动作对自身释放渐隐术，这是一个类法术能力，每日使用次数等于其观星者等级的一半（最低1）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Stranger
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 车辇座 -> 陌客座

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Once per day, the stargazer can replace one of his sidereal arcana with any other one. This ability gives up The Wagon and gains The Thrush.
The Thrush: The stargazer’s voice becomes harmonious. The stargazer gains a bonus equal to half his class level on charisma skill checks (minimum 1).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
每日1次，观星者能够将自己已有的星座奥秘替换为任意一个其他的星座奥秘。该能力放弃车辇座并获得画眉座。
画眉座: 观星者的嗓音变得悦耳动听。观星者会在魅力相关的技能检定上获得相当于职业等级的一半（最低1） 的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Wagon to The Thrush
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 车辇座 -> 画眉座

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stars Are Right - Stargazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星归位（观星者）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Stars Are Right - Stargazer Check
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 群星归位（观星者检定）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, and at every level thereafter, a Stargazer gains new spells per day as if he had also gained a level in a spellcasting class he belonged to before adding the prestige class. He does not, however, gain any other benefit a character of that class would have gained, except for additional spells per day, spells known, and an increased effective level of spellcasting. If a character had more than one spellcasting class before becoming a Stargazer, he must decide to which class he adds the new level for purposes of determining spells per day.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级时，以及之后每个等级，观星者都能够获得新的每日{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}量，如同他在进阶之前已有的施法职业上也获得了一个等级。但是除了额外的每日法术量、已知法术、有效施法者等级之外，他无法获得该职业角色升级之际本应获得的其他好处。若角色在进阶成为观星者之前拥有多个施法职业，那么他必须决定将新的一级追加在哪个职业上，以用于判断每日法术量。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 剑圣

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 1级时，以及之后每个等级，观星者都能够获得新的每日{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}量，如同他在进阶之前已有的施法职业上也获得了一个等级。但是除了额外的每日法术量、已知法术、有效施法者等级之外，他无法获得该职业角色升级之际本应获得的其他好处。若角色在进阶成为观星者之前拥有多个施法职业，那么他必须决定将新的一级追加在哪个职业上，以用于判断每日法术量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
The firmament provides you inspiration, and you draw power from the stars’ distant light.
Guarded Mind: You gain a +2 insight bonus on saving throws against all mind-affecting effects.
The Stars Are Right: At 8th level, you may spontaneously cast any of your Stars subdomain spells by swapping out a spell of an equal spell level. Any Stars subdomain spell that you cast heals you an amount of hit point damage equal to the spell’s level; this effect happens as you cast the spell.

苍穹为你提供灵感，你从遥远的星光中汲取力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: For the duration of the spell, you can fire rays of steam once per round as a standard action (and you also fire these rays as part of casting this spell). You may fire three rays, plus one additional ray for every four levels beyond 11th (to a maximum of five rays at 19th level). Each ray requires a ranged touch attack to hit and deals 4d6 points of fire damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在法术持续时间内，你可以以一个标准动作每轮发射一次蒸汽射线（你也可以在施展该法术时发射这些射线）。你可以发射 3 道射线，超过 11 级后每 4 级可以发射 1 道额外射线（在 19 级时最多发射 5 道射线）。每条射线都需要一次远程接触攻击才能命中并造成 4d6 点火焰伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Buff 1 round/level
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: Buff 1 轮/级

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per round as a standard action you may fire three rays, plus one additional ray for every four levels beyond 11th (to a maximum of five rays at 19th level). Each ray requires a ranged touch attack to hit and deals 4d6 points of fire damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每轮一次，以一个标准动作，你可以发射三道射线，再加上 11 级之后每 4 级额外的一道射线（在 19 级时最多发射五道射线）。每条射线都需要一次远程接触攻击才能命中并造成 4d6 点火焰伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per round as a standard action you may fire three rays, plus one additional ray for every four levels beyond 11th (to a maximum of five rays at 19th level). Each ray requires a ranged touch attack to hit and deals 4d6 points of fire damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每轮一次，以一个标准动作，你可以发射三道射线，再加上 11 级之后每 4 级额外的一道射线（在 19 级时最多发射五道射线）。每条射线都需要一次远程接触攻击才能命中并造成 4d6 点火焰伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Steam Ray Fusillade
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 蒸汽融化射线

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
With power over storm and sky, you can call down the wrath of the gods upon the world below.
Storm Burst: As a standard action, you can create a storm burst targeting any foe within 30 feet as a ranged touch attack. The storm burst deals 1d6 points of damage + 1 point for every two levels you possess in the class that gave you access to this domain. In addition, the target is buffeted by winds and rain, causing it to take a –2 penalty on attack rolls for 1 round. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Gale Aura (Su): At 6th level, as a standard action, you can create a 30-foot aura of gale-like winds that slows the progress of enemies. Creatures in the aura cannot take a 5-foot step and treat it as as difficult terrain. You can use this ability for a number of rounds per day equal to your cleric level. The rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
利用暴风与天空的力量，你可召唤诸神之怒降临人世。
暴风冲击：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你能够以远程{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}的方式，对30英尺内的任意敌人施以暴风的冲击。暴风冲击将造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}，赋予你此领域的职业等级每提升2级，可额外造成1点伤害。此外，该目标将持续受到风雨的影响，{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击检定{/g}受到-2{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}，效果持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
暴风氛围：在6级,你召来阻碍敌人靠近的狂风，令30尺内生物无法五尺快步，且范围内敌人向你靠近时视为经过艰难地形。每天使用轮数为牧师等级，不需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Storm Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风暴子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Unable to take 5-foot steps and is affected by difficult terrain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 无法迈出 5 英尺并受困难地形影响

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Gale Aura
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风氛围

The rounds do not need to be consecutive.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While most druids focus their attention upon the rich earth and the bounty of nature that springs forth from it, the storm druid’s eyes have ever been cast to the skies and the endless expanse of blue, channeling the most raw and untamed aspects of nature.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当大部分的德鲁伊将他们的注意力放在丰饶的大地与大自然赐与的泉水上时，暴风之主却将他们的目光放在苍天那无尽苍蓝之上，那最原始且未经改变的自然之道。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Storm Druid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid may not choose an animal companion. A storm druid must choose the Air or Weather domain, or the Storm or Wind subdomain.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主无法选择动物伙伴，他必须从必须选择空气或天气领域，或者风暴 或风子域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Storm Druids Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主纽带

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into air domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any air domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主可以把已经准备好的法术转化为空气领域法术，他可以失去一个已经准备好的法术以施展同级或更低等级的空气领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Air Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发空气领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into storm domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any storm domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主可以把已经准备好的法术转化为风暴领域法术，他可以失去一个已经准备好的法术以施展同级或更低等级的风暴领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Storm Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发风暴领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into weather domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any weather domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主可以把已经准备好的法术转化为天气领域法术，他可以失去一个已经准备好的法术以施展同级或更低等级的天气领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A storm druid can channel stored spell energy into wind domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any wind domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 暴风之主可以把已经准备好的法术转化为风领域法术，他可以失去一个已经准备好的法术以施展同级或更低等级的风领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Wind Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发风领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 13th level, a storm druid is unaffected by all natural and magical wind effects. She gains +2 bonus on saving throws against sonic effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 13级时，暴风之主不会被自然或魔法效应产生的风影响，并在对抗声音的豁免检定上得到+2的加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Storm Lord
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风暴之君

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
In strength and brawn there is truth — your faith gives you incredible might and power.
Strength Surge: As a standard action, you can touch a creature to give it great strength. For 1 round, the target gains an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum +1) to melee attacks and Athletics checks. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
力量与强壮的实质是-你的信仰赋予你无尽的力量与能量。
力量激荡：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}生物赋予其强大的力量。在1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}内，该目标的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近战攻击{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}运动检定{/g}将获得增强{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为+1）。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
神授力量：在8级时，你的运动{g|Encyclopedia:Check}检定{/g}将获得增强加值，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Strength Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 力量领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
In strength and brawn there is truth — your faith gives you incredible might and power.
Strength Surge: As a standard action, you can touch a creature to give it great strength. For 1 round, the target gains an enhancement bonus equal to 1/2 your level in the class that gave you access to this domain (minimum +1) to melee attacks and Athletics checks. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Might of the Gods: At 8th level, you add 1/2 of your level in the class that gave you access to this domain as an enhancement bonus to your Athletics checks.
Domain Spells: enlarge person, bull's strength, magical vestment, mass enlarge person, righteous might, stoneskin, legendary proportions, frightful aspect, transformation.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
力量与强壮的实质是-你的信仰赋予你无尽的力量与能量。
力量激荡：作为{g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}标准动作{/g}，你可{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触{/g}生物赋予其强大的力量。在1{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮{/g}内，该目标的{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}近战攻击{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:Athletics}运动检定{/g}将获得增强{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级（最小为+1）。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
神授力量：在8级时，你的运动{g|Encyclopedia:Check}检定{/g}将获得增强加值，加值等于1/2赋予你此领域的职业等级。领域法术：变巨术，牛之蛮力，魔化防具，群体变巨术，正气如虹，石肤，伟岸雄姿，可怖外表，战法转换。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Strength: You gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举圣徽并呼唤你的神灵的名字，你就获得了神性的一个方面。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免的能力使用该法术的 DC。
力量：你的力量获得+6增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Strength: You gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Strength.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
力量：你的力量获得+6增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Strength Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 力量领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You must have a bardic performance in effect to cast this spell. With a flourish, you immediately end your bardic performance, assaulting the senses of the targets with your finale. Each target is stunned for 1 round. On a successful saving throw, a target is staggered for 1 round.
You cannot activate another bardic performance this round. If you have the lingering performance feat the effect lingers as normal.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你必须处于一个生效中的吟游演绎中才能施展这个法术。使用时，你立即结束你的吟游表演，用你的谢幕曲攻击目标的感官。每个目标都会被眩晕 1 轮。豁免成功后，目标会错开一轮。本轮你不能激活另一个吟游表演。如果你有余音绕梁的表演专长，效果会像往常一样持续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Stunning Finale
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 惊叹谢幕曲

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell summons to your side 1d3 natural advanced grizzly bears. The summoned allies appear where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.
Advanced: Creature has natural armor increased by 2, gains a +4 bonus all ability scores (except Int scores of 2 or less).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
这个法术召唤 1d3 只高等灰熊到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。
高等：生物的天生防御增加 2，获得所有属性值的 +4 加值（除了 2 或更少的智力值）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Summon Advanced Grizzly Bear (1d3)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤高等灰熊 (1d3)

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell summons to your side 1d4 + 1 natural advanced grizzly bears. The summoned allies appear where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.
Advanced: Creature has natural armor increased by 2, gains a +4 bonus all ability scores (except Int scores of 2 or less).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
该法术召唤 1d4 + 1 只高等灰熊到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。
高等：生物的天生防御增加 2，获得所有属性值的 +4 加值（智力值不超过 2 除外）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Summon Advanced Grizzly Bear (1d4 + 1)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤高等灰熊 (1d4 + 1)

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell summons to your side a natural advanced grizzly bear. The summoned ally appears where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.

LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
这个法术会召唤一只高等灰熊到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤高等灰熊

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This spell summons to your side 1d3 natural giant advanced grizzly bears. The summoned allies appear where you designate and acts according to its initiative check results. It attacks your opponents to the best of its ability.
Giant + Advanced: Creature is one size category larger, has natural armor increased by 5, gains a +8 bonus to strength and constitution, a +4 bonus to wisdom and charisma, and a +2 bonus to dexterity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
这个法术召唤 1d3 只巨型高等灰熊到你身边。被召唤的盟友出现在你指定的地方，并根据其先攻检定结果行动。它会尽其所能攻击你的对手。
巨型+高等：：生物体型增大一级，天生防御增加5，力量和体质+8，感知和魅力+4，敏捷+2。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You see truth in the pure and burning light of the sun, and can call upon its blessing or wrath to work great deeds.
Sun's Blessing: Whenever you channel positive energy to harm undead creatures, add your level in the class that gave you access to this domain to the damage dealt. Undead do not add their channel resistance to their saves when you channel positive energy.
Nimbus of Light: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot nimbus of light for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Any hostile creature within this radius must succeed at a Fortitude save to resist the effects of this aura. If the creature fails, it is blinded until it leaves the area of the spell. A creature that has resisted the effect cannot be affected again by this particular aura. In addition, undead within this radius take an amount of damage equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain each round that they remain inside the nimbus. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你在纯净而灼热的日光中洞悉真理，并能借助它的祝福或怒火来达成伟大的壮举。
阳光祝福：当你引导正向能量{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}不死生物时，可以造成等于赋予你此领域的职业等级的额外伤害。不死生物在进行{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}对抗你所引导的正向能量时，它们的引导抗性不会生效。
光晕：在8级时，你可发出30英尺范围的光晕，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。任何处于此范围内的敌对生物必须进行强韧豁免检定，以抵抗此灵光的效果。如果豁免失败，则该生物将持续目盲，直至离开该{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}的范围。成功抵抗该效果的生物将不会再次被同一个灵光影响。此外，不死生物如果一直处于光晕范围内，每轮都会受到伤害，伤害量等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。生效轮次无需连续。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Sun Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 太阳领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You see truth in the pure and burning light of the sun, and can call upon its blessing or wrath to work great deeds.
Sun's Blessing: Whenever you channel positive energy to harm undead creatures, add your level in the class that gave you access to this domain to the damage dealt. Undead do not add their channel resistance to their saves when you channel positive energy.
Nimbus of Light: At 8th level, you can emit a 30-foot nimbus of light for a number of rounds per day equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain. Any hostile creature within this radius must succeed at a Fortitude save to resist the effects of this aura. If the creature fails, it is blinded until it leaves the area of the spell. A creature that has resisted the effect cannot be affected again by this particular aura. In addition, undead within this radius take an amount of damage equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain each round that they remain inside the nimbus. These rounds do not need to be consecutive.
Domain Spells: faerie fire, see invisibility, searing light, shield of dawn, flame strike, chains of light, sunbeam, sunburst, elemental swarm (fire).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你在纯净而灼热的日光中洞悉真理，并能借助它的祝福或怒火来达成伟大的壮举。
阳光祝福：当你引导正向能量{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}不死生物时，可以造成等于赋予你此领域的职业等级的额外伤害。不死生物在进行{g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}豁免检定{/g}对抗你所引导的正向能量时，它们的引导抗性不会生效。
光晕：在8级时，你可发出30英尺范围的光晕，每天可持续的{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}轮数{/g}等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。任何处于此范围内的敌对生物必须进行强韧豁免检定，以抵抗此灵光的效果。如果豁免失败，则该生物将持续目盲，直至离开该{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}的范围。成功抵抗该效果的生物将不会再次被同一个灵光影响。此外，不死生物如果一直处于光晕范围内，每轮都会受到伤害，伤害量等于赋予你此领域的职业等级。生效轮次无需连续。
领域法术：妖火，识破隐形，炽热光辉，曙光护盾，炽焰击，链状闪电，阳炎光束，阳炎爆，召集元素（火）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Sun: You are immune to the blindness, dazed, and dazzled conditions.Any enemies that attack you with melee weapons find their vision obscured by divine sun-rays (50% miss chance).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
太阳：你免疫目盲、眩晕和目眩。任何用近战武器攻击你的敌人都会发现他们的视线被神圣的太阳射线遮挡（50% 失手几率）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Sun Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 太阳领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
In melee combat, you can help your allies attack or defend by distracting or interfering with an opponent. If you’re in position to make a melee attack on an opponent you can attempt to aid your allies against that enemy as a swift action. The distracted enemy is inflicted with a -1 penalty to either their AC against the next attack by your allies, or a -1 penalty on their next attack roll against your allies. This penalty only applies to the first attack roll and is removed after 1 round. 
This penalty does not stack with the standard aid another penalty.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在近战中，您可以通过分散或干扰对手来帮助您的盟友进攻或防御。如果你处于对对手进行近战攻击的位置，你可以尝试以一个迅捷动作帮助你的盟友对抗该敌人。分心的敌人在对抗你盟友的下一次攻击时，他们的 AC 将受到 -1 惩罚，或者在他们对你盟友的下一次攻击检定中受到 -1 惩罚。此惩罚仅适用于第一次攻击掷骰，并在 1 轮后移除。该处罚不与标准援助的另一处罚叠加。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Swift Aid Another
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 迅速援助

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
With a quick but harmless swipe, you can aid an ally’s assault. 
As a swift action, you can attempt the aid another action, granting your enemy either a -1 penalty on their next attack roll or a -1 bonus to their AC. This ability still confers any extra effects your standard aid another ability would.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 通过快速但无害的一击，您可以协助盟友的攻击。以一个迅捷动作，你可以尝试援助盟友，使你的敌人在他们的下一次攻击检定上获得 -1 减值或在他们的 AC 上获得 -1 加值。此能力仍会赋予您的标准辅助其他能力所具有的任何额外效果。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 迅速援助

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Aurulent Eye   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Night, Owls, Watchfulness   
Domains: Animal, Darkness, Good, Law   
Subdomains: Archon, Feather, Moon, Night   
Favoured Weapon: Kukri   
Holy Symbol: Shadowed golden eye   
Sacred Animal: Owl   
Tanagaar watches from the darkness, always alert for evil working under the cloak of night. His great golden eyes never close, and his sharp beak and fierce talons are always ready to tear apart those who challenge him. In his true form, Tanagaar is a giant owl, 14 feet tall, with luminous golden eyes; it is said that he can swivel his head in any direction and can see perfectly at any distance. Tanagaar's plumage is dusky platinum gray tipped with inky black, perfect for melding into the shadows of the forest. His beak and talons shine like platinum as well, but are actually cold iron, and never catch the moonlight to betray his position. Lookouts, guards, and forest wardens all pay homage to the Aurulent Eye. The empyreal lord is as concerned with law as any archon, and his influence envelopes borders, watchtowers, and wild preserves. His servants frown on poaching, but if such illegal hunting is done unwittingly or out of desperation, these celestial agents typically send poachers away with a stern warning and perhaps an offer of lawful aid. Poachers or trappers who leave wounded animals in distress or use cruel hunting tactics face the full wrath of Tanagaar's faithful. Guards who find themselves overwhelmed while defending legitimate borders may find unexpected aid from Tanagaar, and more than one border conflict has seen the tide of battle turn because of hundreds of screeching owls swooping down on the unlawful assailants. Tanagaar concerns himself with watching the borders of Heaven from the depths of the Unbent Forest on the lowest slopes of the mountain. There he maintains a force ofhound archon s couts who assist him in patrolling and defending their divine realm.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：黄金眼
阵营：守序善良
神职：夜晚、猫头鹰、警戒
领域：动物、黑暗、善良、守序
子领域：亚空、飞羽、月、暗夜
偏好武器：反曲刀
圣徽：暗影金眼
圣兽：猫头鹰
塔那加在黑暗中守望，时刻警惕在黑夜的掩护下行事的邪恶。他金色的大眼睛从不闭上，锋利的喙和凶猛的爪子随时准备撕裂挑战他的人。在他的真实形态下，塔那加是一只巨大的猫头鹰，14 英尺高，有着明亮的金色眼睛；据说他可以向任何方向旋转头部，并且可以在任何距离上都能看得很清楚。 塔那加的羽毛是暗淡的铂灰色，末端带有墨黑色，非常适合融入森林的阴影中。他的喙和爪子也像铂金一样闪耀，但实际上是冰冷的铁，月光从不暴露他的位置。瞭望台、守卫和森林管理员都向黄金眼致敬。
至高天领主与任何亚空一样关心秩序，他的影响力笼罩着边境、瞭望塔和野生保护区。他的仆人对偷猎不屑一顾，但如果这种非法狩猎是无意或出于绝望而进行的，这些信徒通常会在严厉警告并可能提供合法援助的情况下将偷猎者赶走。让受伤的动物陷入困境或使用残虐的狩猎策略的偷猎者或捕猎者将面临塔那加信徒的愤怒。在保卫边界时发现自己不知所措的卫兵可能会从塔那加那里得到意想不到的帮助，不止一场边界冲突因为数百只尖叫的猫头鹰猛扑向非法袭击者而导致战局发生转变。
塔那加关心的是从山坡最低处的不屈森林深处观察天堂的边界。在那里，他维持着一支猎犬亚空的侦察部队，协助他巡逻和保卫他们的神圣领域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tanagaar
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 塔那加

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Creature gains spell resistance equal to its level +5. It also gains:
1 — 4 HD: resistance 5 to cold and fire.
5 — 10 HD: resistance 10 to cold and fire, DR 5/good
11+ HD: resistance 15 to cold and fire, DR 10/good
Smite Good (Su): Once per day, the fiendish creature may smite a good-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is good, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
生物获得等于其等级+5的法术抗力。它还获得：
1——4 HD：对寒冷和火焰的抵抗力 5。
5 — 10 HD：对寒冷和火焰的抵抗力 10，DR 5/善良
11+ HD：对寒冷和火焰的抵抗力 15，DR 10/善良
惩戒善良（Su）：每天一次，恶魔生物可以惩戒善良阵营生物。以一个迅捷动作，该生物选择视野内的一个目标进行打击。如果这个目标是善良的，那么该生物将其魅力加值（如果有的话）加到攻击检定上，并获得等于其对那个敌人的 HD 的伤害加值。此效果持续到目标死亡或生物休息为止。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Fiendish Template
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 炼狱模板

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Until the target of the smite is dead
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 直到惩戒的目标死亡

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day, the fiendish creature may smite a good-aligned creature. As a swift action, the creature chooses one target within sight to smite. If this target is good, the creature adds its Charisma bonus (if any) to attack rolls and gains a damage bonus equal to its HD against that foe. This effect persists until the target is dead or the creature rests.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，炼狱生物可以惩戒善良阵营的生物。以一个迅捷动作，该生物选择视野内的一个目标进行打击。如果这个目标是好目标，该生物将其魅力加值（如果有的话）加到攻击检定上，并获得等于其对那个敌人的 HD 的伤害加值。该效果持续到目标死亡或生物休息为止。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Smite Good
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 惩戒善良

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A temple champion is a powerful warrior dedicated to a good or lawful deity. She thinks of herself primarily as a servant of her deity and secondarily as an agent of her deity’s church. She has a refined understanding of a specific aspect of that faith and gives up standard paladin spellcasting in favor of a warpriest’s domain-based blessings and granted powers.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣殿冠军是一位强大的战士，献身于一个善良或守序的神祇。她认为自己首先是她的神灵的仆人，其次是她神灵教会的代理人。她对这种信仰的特定方面有着深刻的理解，并放弃了标准的圣武士施法，转而支持战争祭司基于领域的祝福和授予的力量。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Temple Champion
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣殿冠军

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Constant wearing of the Temples armor has reduced its effect on movement, the Temple Champion gains Armored Swiftness at level 4 and Improved Armored Swiftness at level 12.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 持续穿着神殿盔甲降低了它对移动的影响，圣殿冠军在 4 级获得盔甲迅捷，在 12 级获得精通盔甲迅捷。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Temple Armor
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 圣殿盔甲

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Primordial Poison   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Ageing, Poison, Venomous creatures  
Domains: Healing, Magic, Repose, Scalykind 
Favoured Weapon: Chakram (Starknife) 
Holy Symbol: Circle pierced by two vertical lines  
When Pharasma saw that mortals loved life too dearly to part with it when their time came, she reached down, lifted up an asp, and reshaped it into the usher Teshallas. The Primordial Poison’s venom—age—would flow through the veins of all mortals and slowly rob them of memory, passion, and vitality until they eventually welcomed the embrace of death. Many curse the usher’s name and regard them as an example of Pharasma’s indifference and cruelty, but others recognize that poison is in the dose, and that those fluids that kill can also bring life. Teshallas’s embrace allows mortals to grow and mature, to discover experiences and wisdom that eluded them earlier in life. While Dammar serves as the usher of doctors and healers, Teshallas is patron of herbalists and others who refine nature’s poisons into potent medicines. They are also the usher most associated with scaly folk, and they manage the souls of kobolds, lizardfolk, serpentfolk, and other cold-blooded sapients. The Primordial Poison manifests as a serpent devouring their own tail, supported by four feathered wings not physically connected to their looping body. Teshallas often wanders the Ethereal Plane but resides in the Bower Antimony, a greenhouse brimming with poisonous plants and extreme temperatures. Worshippers often maintain their own small gardens of poisonous plants in homage and use their crops to distill a variety of medicines.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：原始毒药 
阵营：绝对中立 形态：招魂使 
领域：衰老、毒药、有毒生物 
领域：治疗、魔法、安眠、鳞类 
偏好武器：飞轮（星刃） 
圣徽：被两条垂直线刺穿的圆圈 当 Pharasma 看到凡人对生命的热爱太深，以至于当他们的时间到来时不会放弃它，她伸手，举起一根木棍，把它重新塑造成引座员 Teshallas。原始毒药的毒液——年龄——会在所有凡人的血管中流淌，慢慢地夺走他们的记忆、激情和活力，直到他们最终迎来死亡的拥抱。许多人诅咒引座员的名字，并认为他们是法拉斯玛冷漠和残忍的一个例子，但其他人承认毒药在剂量中，那些杀死的液体也可以带来生命。 Teshallas 的拥抱让凡人得以成长和成熟，发现他们早年无法获得的经验和智慧。 Dammar 是医生和治疗师的引路人，而 Teshallas 则是草药师和其他将大自然的毒药提炼成强效药物的人的守护神。他们也是与有鳞的人联系最紧密的引座员，他们管理狗头人、蜥蜴人、蛇人和其他冷血智慧生物的灵魂。原始毒药表现为一条吞食自己尾巴的蛇，由四只羽毛翅膀支撑，这些翅膀与它们的环状身体没有物理连接。 Teshallas 经常在以太位面徘徊，但居住在 Bower Antimony，这是一个充满有毒植物和极端温度的温室。崇拜者经常维护自己的有毒植物小花园以示敬意，并使用他们的作物来蒸馏各种药物。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Teshallas
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 特沙拉斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: In the early days, there were older gods whose existence dwarfed even those who helped shape the course of written history. These are the unimaginably ancient and inconceivably potent Great Old Ones, who in turn serve and worship the even greater Outer Gods. Scholars call these entities by many names, but on Golarion, their faiths and the entities themselves are known as the Elder Mythos. Worshipped primarily by the mad or desperate, the knowledge gained from gazing into the Dark Tapestry will often break even the strongest mind, freeing it to maddening truth.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在早期，即使是那些帮助塑造书面历史进程的人，他们的存在也相形见绌。这些是不可思议的古老和不可思议的强大的旧日支配者，他们反过来侍奉和崇拜更伟大的外神。学者们用许多名字称呼这些实体，但在 Golarion 上，他们的信仰和实体本身被称为远古神话。主要由疯狂或绝望的人崇拜，从凝视黑暗挂毯中获得的知识往往会打破最强大的思想，将其释放到令人发狂的真相中。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Elder Mythos
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 古神

LocalizedStrings.enGB: When the gods abandoned the First World to focus their attentions on the Material Plane and the cycle of souls, they left behind a power vacuum. The fey were like children abandoned by their parents, and like those children, they fought and despaired, tormenting each other in hopes that an authority would appear to make them stop.Into this void stepped the realm’s most powerful remaining residents, creatures that might as well have been gods in the minds of the average fey.Seeking all the same boons that had drawn them to the faith of the original gods—safety, belonging, knowledge, power—the common people not only served these great beings, but worshiped them.In time, these powerful fey learned the trick of granting spells to their worshipers, and thus the Eldest became gods in truth.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当神明们抛弃第一世界的时候，精类的国度陷入了混乱，直到它们之中的最强者站了出来取得了权力，混乱才最终停歇。在漫长的时间过后，这些遗留下来的始祖成为了真正的神明。这些始祖中包括流亡的叛徒伯爵莱诺克，秀色可餐的绿母，巨大的双重存在因博莱克斯，拨弄是非的灯王，孤独的失落王子，明察秋毫的玛芙，神秘的流浪者无，神话般的海洋之主拉格达恩，还有时间的主人塞卡。透过它们的代理人，后裔，以及深远的计划，始祖们影响着格拉利昂的诸多地区。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Eldest
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 妖精始祖

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Feasting Flower, The Hungry Blossom   
Alignment: Neutral Evil   
Areas of Concern: Carnivorous plants, Intrigue, Seduction   
Domains: Charm, Earth, Evil, Plant   
Subdomains: Caves, Decay, Growth, Lust   
Favoured Weapon: Sickle   
Holy Symbol: Sensual, female, briar-wrapped lips   
Sacred Animal: None (carnivorous plants)   
From the elegant flower that draws in the bee to the bioluminescent lures that call deep-sea fish to the slaughter, seduction is an integral part of the natural world, bringing both pleasure and pain. No creature embodies this idea better than the Green Mother. The Green Mother resembles a beautiful humanoid woman with bark-like skin and green hair, her features a constantly shifting mix of elf, dryad, and nymph. As befits the Eldest most associated with simplistic human ideas of nature, her body regularly changes to incorporate natural features: hands becoming gnarled roots, hair becoming a literal waterfall, or skin suddenly becoming a mirror-smooth pond capable of sucking in and drowning an unfortunate lover. Travelers from beyond the First World are often quick to cast the Green Mother in one of two lights: either as the villainous temptress of morality plays or as the equally deadly seductress of bawdy tales (contributing to such thinly veiled sobriquets as "The Feasting Flower" and "The Hungry Blossom"). Yet the Green Mother is not merely a creature of lust. Rather, she is the seduction of nature incarnate, the caution to the unwary. She is the rolling landscape that calls to the wanderer, the primal need that leads salmon to spawn and die, the mantis gnawing on the corpse of her mate. She is both the flower’s bloom and the inevitable death that follows. To attempt to define her via mortal concepts of morality is to miss the point entirely. She is a master puppeteer, pulling strings that affect events even far beyond the First World’s borders. Though her sense of humor is dark, and many see evil in her tricks and traps, the Green Mother sees herself as merely impartial, helping to guide natural selection by uncovering and exploiting weaknesses. If the practice amuses her as well, surely she deserves such a small reward.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：盛宴之花，饥饿之花
阵营：中立邪恶
神职：藤蔓植物、阴谋、色诱
领域：魅惑，大地，邪恶，植物
子领域：洞窟，腐朽，滋长，情欲
偏好武器：镰刀
圣徽：性感，被荆棘包裹的女性嘴唇 
圣兽：无（食肉植物）
从吸引蜜蜂的优雅花朵到召唤深海鱼类屠宰的生物发光诱饵，诱惑是自然界不可或缺的一部分，既能带来愉悦也带来痛苦。
没有任何生物比绿母更能体现这一理念。绿母是个高大美丽的女人，留有一头绿色的波浪发，就像一个介于宁芙、精灵和树精之间的生物。最与人类对自然的简单印象相得益彰的始祖，她的身体会定期变化以融入自然特征：手变成粗糙的根，头发变成真正的瀑布，或者皮肤突然变成镜面一般光滑的池塘，能够吸入并淹死一对不幸的情人。
来自第一世界以外的旅行者通常很快就将绿母描绘成两种角色中的一种：要么作为道德剧中的邪恶诱惑者，要么作为同样致命的淫秽故事的诱惑者（这导致了“盛宴之花”和“饥饿之花”等几乎不加掩饰的称号）。
然而，绿母不仅仅是欲望的产物。相反，她是自然诱惑的化身，对粗心之人的谨慎。她是呼唤流浪者的绵延风景，是导致鲑鱼产卵和死亡的原始需求，是螳螂啃噬伴侣尸体的需求。她既是花朵的绽放，也是随之而来的不可避免的死亡。试图通过凡人的道德观念来定义她是不得要领的。
她是一位大师级的木偶师，甚至可以影响远在第一世界边界之外的事件。尽管她的幽默感是黑暗的，而且许多人认为她的技艺和陷阱是邪恶的，但绿母认为自己只是公正的，通过发现和利用弱点来帮助引导自然选择。如果这种做法也能让她感到开心，那么她理应得到这么些许的嘉奖。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Green Mother
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 绿母

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Laughing Lie   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Laughter, Mischief, Transformation   
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Madness, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception, Love, Lust, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Golden lantern   
Sacred Animal: Firefly   
Even on a plane filled with tricksters and illusions, the Lantern King is a prankster without peer, making the lives of those he touches more interesting—often at their expense. The Lantern King usually appears as a 1-foot-wide ball of floating golden light that shifts in color when making a point or expressing emotion, sometimes circled by glowing runes in the shape of a coronet. His form has led many to suggest that he was the original archetype for lantern archons or else the progenitor of all will-o’-wisps—both claims he laughs off without answering. Other than his name, the only outward sign of the Lantern King’s gender is his voice, a booming, merry baritone. While his preferred form as a ball of light is his most common and thus presumably true appearance, the Lantern King is also fond of transforming into the shapes of other creatures for the purposes of mischief, up to and including impersonating other Eldest. According to the Laughing Lie, his sole purpose is to make the First World less boring, preferably with the injection of a little good-natured chaos and confusion. Unfortunately for the plane’s other residents, what amuses the Lantern King isn’t always comfortable or pleasant, and even his “good-natured” pranks can be deeply inconvenient. For instance, the Laughing Lie might help a man whose house burns down by hiding a valuable magical sword in the ashes or the Eldest might transform the man into a fish, so that he need never fear fire again.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：微笑谎言
阵营：混乱中立
神职：欢笑者、恶作剧、转化 
领域：混乱、魅惑、疯狂、诡计
子领域：欺骗、爱慕、情欲、盗窃 
偏好武器：匕首
圣徽：金灯笼
圣兽：偶数萤火虫
在对于第一世界的原生种族来说，反复无常的作风和违反常理的恶作剧司空见惯，而要在这样的一个世界里选出一位诡计之神的话，那一定非也被称为“微笑谎言”的灯王莫属了。
灯王通常表现为一个 1 英尺宽的漂浮金色光球，在提出观点或表达情感时会发生颜色变化，有时会被皇冠形状的发光符文环绕。
他的形态让许多人认为他是灯笼亚空的初始原型，或者是所有鬼火的祖先——两种说法他都一笑置之，不予回答。
除了他的名字，灯王的性别唯一的外在标志就是他的声音，一个低沉、欢快的男中音。虽然他最喜欢而且最常见的外形是光球，因此可能是真实的外表，但灯王也喜欢为了恶作剧而变成其他生物的外貌，甚至包括模仿其他始祖。
按照微笑谎言的说法，他唯一的目的是让第一世界不那么无聊，最好是注入一点善意的混乱和困惑。不幸的是，对于计划里的其他居民来说，灯王的娱乐并不总是那么舒适或愉快，甚至他的“善意”恶作剧也可能非常不便。譬如，微笑谎言可能会帮助一个房屋被烧毁的人，在灰烬中藏一把珍贵的魔法剑，或者始祖可能会将这个人变成一条鱼，这样他就再也不用害怕火了。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Lantern King
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 灯王

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Melancholy Lord   
Alignment: Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Forgotten things, Sadness, Solitude   
Domains: Knowledge, Madness, Nobility, Repose   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Insanity, Martyr, Memory   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Crumbling black tower   
Sacred Animal: Raven   
While no one can claim to know the origins of the Eldest, the Lost Prince is persistently rumored to be the only one not from the First World. The nature of his birthplace—some world far distant on the Material Plane, a demiplane long since lost to the Maelstrom, or another reality entirely—is a subject of much whispered debate, as is the question of why he left, and when and how he might someday return. Whether or not it’s his original form, the Lost Prince always appears to his subjects as a pale human man dressed all in black, with completely black eyes and a mess of unruly black hair. The only bits of color are the glowing red symbols that seem tattooed across his brow in a coronet-like band, or the similarly glowing 4-pointed star on the back of each hand. Despite being painfully gaunt, the Lost Prince has delicate features that might be handsome, if not for his constant frown. Famous for his constant melancholy, the Lost Prince nevertheless has a large coterie of devoted servants and followers. While the love of these attendants might seem unwarranted by the thankless Eldest, the truth is that the Lost Prince has a tendency to quietly aid those who share his depression, particularly those who have lost their homes or families. He never admits to such acts, and those he helps receive the same surface-level disdain as all others, yet those who have found a second home in his court are fierce in their defense of his character. Though the Lost Prince himself rarely expresses much enthusiasm about anything, he has a keen interest in information about planar travel and the history of the multiverse.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：忧郁之主
阵营：绝对中立 
神职：被遗忘之物、悲伤、孤独 
领域：知识、疯狂、崇高、宁静 
子领域：先祖、狂乱、殉难、记忆
偏好武器：铁头木棒（木棍） 
圣徽：摇摇欲坠的黑塔
圣兽：乌鸦
没有人可以声称知道长老的来历，一直有传言说失落王子是唯一一个不是来自第一世界的人。他的出生地的性质——在物质位面遥远的某个世界，一个早已被大漩涡迷失的半位面，或者完全是另一个现实——是一个备受争议的话题，就像他为什么离开、何时以及如何离开的问题一样他可能有一天会回来。
不管是不是他的原形，迷失王子在他的臣民面前总是以一袭黑衣、全黑的眼睛和一头凌乱的黑发的苍白人类的形象出现。唯一的色彩是发亮的红色符号，看起来像皇冠一样纹在他的额头上，或者是每只手背上同样发亮的四角星。尽管憔悴得令人悲伤，但失落王子拥有精致的五官，如果不是因为他经常皱眉头，可能会很英俊。
失落王子以他一贯的忧郁而闻名，但仍有一大群忠诚的仆人和追随者。虽然这些侍从似乎吃力不讨好的爱戴在始祖看来是毫无根据的，但事实是，失落王子倾向于悄悄地帮助那些与他有同样抑郁症的人，尤其是那些失去家园或家人的人。他从不承认这种行为，他帮助的人与其他人一样受到表面上的蔑视，但那些在他的宫廷中找到第二故乡的人却为他的性格辩护。
虽然失落王子本人很少对任何事情表现出太多热情，但他对有关位面旅行和多元宇宙历史的信息有着浓厚的兴趣。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Lost Prince
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 失落王子

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Lash and the Plough   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Beasts of burden, Duty, Revenge 
Domains: Death, Repose, Travel, Water  
Favoured Weapon: Trident   
Holy Symbol: Horizontal line with a circle and three dots at one end  
Once, the Pale Horse rode the Astral Plane and poached souls without remorse from the River of Souls, gorging on suffering; accounts conflict if this abominable entity were a daemonic harbinger or a Horseman. Yet as the Pale Horse grew fat off mortal suffering, he also grew discontent. The pressures of freedom, the burden of leadership, and the weight of every choice shackled his heart and soured his meals. In a moment of weakness, he faltered in his daemonic nature and sought service. Pharasma offered the Pale Horse respite until he saved half again as many souls as he had damned. The Pale Horse prostrated himself before the Lady of Graves and wept in joy, freed now from his burden of choice. The Pale Horse has since become Pharasma’s avenging angel, hunting those who steal from the River of Souls as he once did. He luxuriates in his duties and obeys the tenants set forth by Pharasma, and his soldiers likewise obey without question. He represents both the pain and the bounty in servitude, guiding both those who die in service and those who die unattended and alone thanks to their own miserable choices. His wrath is legendary, especially in regard to daemons, and Abaddon long ago struck the Lash and the Plough’s true name from its monuments and libraries. Despite his apparent loyalty, some among the psychopomps worry the Pale Horse remains a daemon at his core, and that upon completion of his sentence he will visit an equally terrible vengeance upon the Boneyard. The Pale Horse appears as a powerful white stallion, missing its head save for a disembodied skull and a floating crown of flames, though he sometimes appears as a silent rider on a white horse.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：鞭笞和犁 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：驮兽、职责、复仇 
领域：死亡、安眠、旅行、水 
偏好武器：三叉戟 
圣徽：带圆圈和三个点的水平线有一次，苍白的马骑着星界，从灵魂之河中毫无悔意地偷猎灵魂，吃尽苦头；如果这个可恶的实体是恶魔预兆或骑士，帐户就会发生冲突。然而，随着苍白马因凡人的痛苦而变得肥胖，他也越来越不满。自由的压力，领导的负担，每一个选择的重量，都束缚着他的心，使他的饭菜变酸。在虚弱的时刻，他在他的恶魔本性中颤栗并寻求服务。法拉斯玛让苍白马得以喘息，直到他拯救了他所诅咒的灵魂的一半。苍白的马在坟墓夫人面前俯伏，高兴地哭了，现在从他选择的负担中解脱了出来。苍白的马从此成为了法拉斯玛的复仇天使，像他曾经那样追捕那些从灵魂之河偷窃的人。他尽职尽责，服从法拉斯玛规定的佃户，他的士兵同样毫无疑问地服从。他既代表了奴役中的痛苦和恩惠，也指导了那些因服务而死的人，以及那些因自己悲惨的选择而在无人看管的情况下独自死去的人。他的愤怒是传奇的，尤其是在恶魔方面，而阿巴顿很久以前就从它的纪念碑和图书馆中发现了鞭笞和犁的真名。尽管他显然很忠诚，但一些精神病患者担心苍白马在他的核心仍然是一个恶魔，并且在他完成判决后，他将对墓地进行同样可怕的报复。苍白马看起来像一匹强大的白色种马，除了一个没有实体的头骨和一个漂浮的火焰冠冕外，没有了它的头，尽管他有时看起来像一匹白马上的沉默的骑手。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The Pale Horse
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 苍白之马

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You are a master of thievery, both in the name of your god and yourself. Trickery and Stealth are class skills.
Copycat: You can create an illusory double of yourself as a move action. This double functions as a single mirror image, and lasts for a number of rounds equal to your level in the class that gave you access to this domain, or until the illusory duplicate is dispelled or destroyed. You can have no more than one copycat at a time. This ability does not stack with the mirror image spell. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Thief of the Gods: At 8th level, you can make grant yourself the ability to roll twice on any trickery skill check, this abilities effect lasts until used then dispels itself. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level, plus one additional time per day for every 2 levels beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以你的神祇和你自己的名义，你是个盗窃大师。巧手和隐匿是你的本职技能。
复制幻象：你可以用一个移动动作制造一个与自身极为相似的幻象。此幻象如同单个的“镜影术”般生效，并持续等同于你的牧师等级的轮数，或直到该复制幻象被解除或毁灭。你同时只能拥有一个复制幻象。此能力与镜影术无法同时生效。你每日可使用本能力的次数为“3+感知修正”。
神偷：到了8级当你进行巧手检定之时，可自由动作发动此能力双投取高。此能力在8级能每天用1次，每比8级高2级多1次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of Divine Words   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Magic, Moon, Wisdom, Writing   
Domains: Darkness, Knowledge, Law, Magic, Rune   
Subdomains: Arcane, Language, Inevitable, Memory, Moon, Wards   
Favoured Weapon: Sickle   
Holy Symbol: Scroll with lunar disk and crescent   
Sacred Animal: Ibis   
All knowledge and wisdom comes from Thoth, the god of science, mathematics, history, philosophy, religion, and wisdom. He is also god of the moon and magic, particularly arcane magic. Thoth is also the patron of language, literature, and writing, and is said to have invented the hieroglyphs first used by Ancient Osirian scribes and that are still used, in modified form, in the modern Osiriani language. He is the reckoner of years, recording the passage of time and details of all the events of life, from the honorable reigns of kings to the simple daily lives of peasants. Thoth normally takes the form of a man with the head of an ibis, though occasionally his form is that of a seated baboon or even a man with the head of a baboon. He is the husband of Maat, the goddess of order and truth, and he serves as secretary and counselor to Ra. It was Thoth who gave Isis the magic words she used to resurrect her dead husband Osiris. He is the scribe of the gods, and mediates between them fairly in their disputes. Thoth is the patron of archivists, scribes, researchers, and scholars, and alchemists, witches, and wizards all worship him as the god of magic and spells. His temples usually include well-stocked libraries and archives, and often include orders of monks who venerate him for his knowledge and wisdom.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：天书之王
阵营：守序中立
神职：魔法、月亮、睿智、文书
领域：黑暗、知识、守序、魔法、符文
子领域：奥秘、语言、制裁、记忆、月、守护
偏好武器：镰刀
圣徽：绘有月轮与弯月的卷轴
圣兽：涉禽
天地间的知识与智慧皆出自托特，科学、数理、历史、哲学、宗教与睿智之神。祂也是月与魔法之神，具体来说主管奥术。托特也是语言、文学及书简的守护神，传说从古奥西里昂直至今日依然被使用着的象形文字─虽然笔画多少有变─即是出自祂手。祂是岁月的纪录者，记述了时间的流逝以及与众生相关从明君德政到百姓日常的一切事件。
托特一般以鸟首男子的姿态示人，但有时也会化身坐着的狒狒或是生著狒狒头的男子形象。祂是秩序与真理之神玛亚特的配偶，并担任拉的秘书和顾问。教授伊西斯如何复活欧西里斯的咒文的正是托特。祂是诸神的书记，在天庭发生纠纷时出面调解。
托特是纪录者、书记、研究家、学者的守护神，炼金术师、巫师及法师也将祂作为魔法与法术之神敬拜。祂的神庙一般附设藏书齐全的图书馆或资料库，也常住着一批因其知识与睿智而供奉祂的武僧。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Thoth
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 托特

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Snow-Strider   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Cold, Frozen wilds, Survival   
Domains: Chaos, Good, Travel, Water   
Subdomains: Azata, Exploration, Ice, Storms   
Favoured Weapon: Javelin   
Holy Symbol: Antlers and ice javelin   
Sacred Animal: Caribou   
Tole is master of the frozen lands, where people struggle daily to survive the harsh elements. He gazes favorably upon those who learn to live within this wild domain and appreciate its fierce beauty. Tole stands 7 feet tall and has a stout but muscular figure. His light brown skin always holds a rosy flush, as though the empyreal lord had just stepped in from the cold. Numerous scars mar his broad face, which constantly sports a stern expression, though a kind light occasionally warms his hardened gaze. From his back stretch two arching tusks carved from celestial ice. Snow-Strider and his agents help worthy individuals struggling to live in cold, inhospitable climes. Many northern cultures credit Tole with teaching their people to build shelters from ice. Tole is a sworn enemy of Kostchtchie, and Tole's champions hone their skills in battle to best combat frost giants and white dragons. On occasion, a mortal champion catches Tole's attention long enough for the empyreal lord to grant this mortal divine strength and tactical knowledge with which to defend her kinsfolk. Tole can sometimes be found in the coldest reaches of Elysium's mountains, but his followers on the Material Plane claim to see Snow-Strider in their temple-longhouses with some frequency. Many believe he assumes the guise of a wanderer in need of respite and leaves flecks of gold in the bedding of those who provide him hospitality.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：踏雪者
阵营：混乱善良 
神职：寒冷、冰封荒野、生存
领域：混乱、善良、旅行、流水 
子领域：爱塔、探索、冰、风暴
偏好武器：标枪 
圣徽：鹿角和冰标枪
圣兽: 驯鹿
托克是冰冻土地的主人，人们每天都在为在严酷的环境中生存而奋斗。他看好那些学会在这片荒野中生活并欣赏其凶猛美丽的人。
托克身高 7 英尺，身材结实但肌肉发达。浅褐色的皮肤上，总是带着红润的红晕，仿佛天帝刚刚从寒风中踏来。他宽阔的脸上布满了伤痕，脸上始终带着严厉的表情，尽管偶尔有一丝善意的光芒温暖了他僵硬的目光。从他的背部伸出两根由天冰雕刻而成的拱形獠牙。
踏雪者和他的代理人帮助那些在寒冷、荒凉地区挣扎的有价值的人。许多北方文化认为托尔教他们的人民用冰建造避难所。
托克是阔什提克提凯的死敌，托克的勇士们在战斗中磨练他们的技能，以最好地对抗霜巨人和白龙。有时，一位凡人勇士会引起托尔的注意足够长的时间，让这位至高无上的领主给予这种凡人神圣的力量和战术知识来保护她的亲属。
托克有时会在极乐境山脉最寒冷的地方，但他在物质位面的追随者声称在他们的神殿长屋中经常看到踏雪者。许多人认为他伪装成一个需要喘息的流浪者，并在为他提供住所的好客人的床上留下金子。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tolc
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 托克

LocalizedStrings.enGB: TotemCreature
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 图腾生物

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Beginning at 2nd level, a dreadknight surrounds his hand with a profane flame, causing terrible wounds to open on those he touches. Each day he can use this ability a number of times equal to 1/2 his Dread Knight level + his Charisma modifier. As a touch attack, a dreadknight can cause 1d6 points of damage plus an additional 1d6 points of damage for every two dreadknight levels he possesses. Using this ability is a standard action that does not provoke attacks of opportunity. 
Alternatively, a dreadknight can use this power to heal undead creatures, restoring 1d6 hit points plus an additional 1d6 hit points for every two levels the dreadknight possesses.This ability is modified by any feat, spell, or effect that specifically works with the lay on hands paladin class feature. For example, the Extra Lay On Hands feat grants a dreadknight 2 additional uses of the touch of corruption class feature.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 从第 2 级开始，恐惧骑士使用包裹着腐蚀性火焰的手碰触目标造成可怕的溃烂。每天他可以使用此能力的次数等于他的恐惧骑士等级的 1/2 + 他的魅力调整值。恐惧骑士进行接触攻击，造成 1d6 + 额外1d6/每2个恐惧骑士等级的伤害。使用此能力是一个标准动作，不会引发借机攻击。此外，恐惧骑士也可以使用此能力来治疗不死生物，恢复等同于伤害数值的生命值。此能力会受益于任何影响圣武士圣疗能力的专长、法术或效果。例如，额外圣疗专长使恐惧骑士获得 2 次额外使用次数亵渎之炎次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Travel: You gain a +6 enhancement bonus to Constitution.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
旅行：你的体质获得+6增强加值。
