LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Lord of the Blasted Tarn   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Corruption of nature, Pollution   
Domains: Chaos, Destruction, Evil, Plant   
Subdomains: Catastrophe, Decay, Demon, Rage   
Favoured Weapon: Greataxe   
Holy Symbol: Axe in bleeding tree stump   
Sacred Animal: Deinonychus   
Treerazer, the self-styled Lord of the Blasted Tarn, was once the favored minion and lieutenant of Cyth-V’sug, Demon Lord of Fungus and Parasites. After a failed attempt to wrest that crown away from Cyth-V’sug, Treerazer fled to the Material Plane. Cyth-V’sug was unable to pursue, but took steps to ensure that Treerazer would remain there by exiling him, transforming Treerazer into a native outsider and severing his bond to the Abyss. He spent many centuries wandering the remote corners of Golarion before finally coming upon the abandoned elven nation of Kyonin in 2497 ar. In the Sovyrian Stone, he found an artifact that he believed he could use to reinstate his Abyssal link and, perhaps, even uproot the entire nation and refocus the portal from Sovyrian to the Abyss, thereby reclaiming his position there and taking one more step toward revenge against Cyth-V’sug. Yet the elves sensed his tamperings and returned to confront the demon. A terrific battle resulted, and while the elves were able to drive Treerazer out of Iadara and into southern Kyonin, they were unable to slay him or force him out completely—they merely concentrated his power in a smaller region. Instead, the elves walled off this region, a perverted realm known today as the Tanglebriar. Treerazer lurks at the Tanglebriar’s heart to this day, the greatest bogeyman in elven mythology and a very real and constant threat to the nation’s security. Cults of Treerazer are quite rare beyond Kyonin, where secret cabals of cultists venerate him. When they do appear beyond these borders, they are secretive but sadistic groups, eager to sacrifice nonbelievers yet cunning in remaining undetected by the law of the land.

子领域：灾难、腐烂、恶魔、狂暴
偏好武器：巨斧
圣徽：斧头插在流血的树桩上圣兽：Deinonychus Treerazer，自封的诅咒之湖领主，曾经是真菌和寄生虫恶魔领主 Cyth-V'sug 的宠儿和副官。在试图从 Cyth-V'sug 手中夺取王冠失败后，Treerazer 逃到了主物质位面。 Cyth-V'sug 无法继续追捕，但采取措施确保 Treerazer 能留在那里，将他放逐，将 Treerazer 变成一个本地异界者，并切断他与深渊的联系。在 2497 年终于来到被遗弃的精灵国 Kyonin 之前，他花了许多世纪在戈拉利安的偏远角落徘徊。在苏维利亚之石中，他发现了一件神器，他相信他可以用它来恢复他的深渊链接，甚至可能连根拔起整个国家，并将传送门从苏维利亚重新聚焦到深渊，从而重新夺回他在那里的位置，朝着更进一步的方向迈进。报复 Cyth-V'sug。然而精灵们察觉到了他的颤栗并返回与恶魔对峙。一场可怕的战斗发生了，虽然精灵们能够将 Treerazer 赶出 Iadara 并进入 Kyonin 南部，但他们无法将他完全杀死或将他赶出——他们只是将他的力量集中在一个较小的区域。取而代之的是，精灵们围住了这个地区，这是一个今天被称为 Tanglebriar 的变态领域。直到今天，Treerazer 潜伏在 Tanglebriar 的心脏，是精灵神话中最伟大的怪物，并且对国家安全构成了非常真实和持续的威胁。除了 Kyonin 之外，Treerazer 的邪教非常罕见，那里有邪教的秘密阴谋集团崇拜他。当他们确实出现在这些边界之外时，他们是秘密但残虐狂的团体，渴望牺牲非信徒，但狡猾地保持不被土地守序发现。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Treerazer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 泰拉泽尔

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Trickery: You gain a +4 enhancement bonus to Persuasion, Thievery and Stealth checks.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
诡计：你在沟通、巧手和隐匿检定上获得 +4 增强加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Trickery Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 诡计领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Father of Night, Saint Toad, The Sleeper in the Deep   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Magic, Outcasts, The Underworld   
Rank: Great Old One   
Domains: Chaos, Evil, Knowledge, Magic   
Subdomains: Arcane, Divine, Thought, Whimsy   
Favoured Weapon: Shortsword   
Holy Symbol: Crouching eyeless toad   
Tsathoggua dwells in the same network of vast caverns wherein can be found other divinities of the Elder Mythos, such as Abhoth, Atlach-Nacha, and Orgesh. Some maintain the specific underground realm ruled by Tsathoggua is a blue-lit realm called K’n-Yan, while others say the denizens of K’n-Yan rose up against Tsathoggua and drove him from that realm to a deeper lair where even light dreads to go—a dark tangle of caverns called N’kai. Tsathoggua has a strange, almost whimsical nature; while evil and unpredictable, at times he can appear almost benevolent in his dealings with mortals. Yet such dealings are never long-lived, and more often than not end in tragedy for those who would treat with the Great Old One. Tsathoggua appears as a semi-humanoid creature whose features mix those of a toad, a bat, and a sloth, with sleepy-looking eyes and a toothy grin.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：暗夜之父、圣蟾蜍、深渊中的沉睡者
阵营：混乱邪恶 
神职：魔法，被遗弃者与里世界
等级：旧日支配者
领域：混乱、邪恶、知识、魔法 
子领域：奥秘、神力、思想、滑稽
偏好武器：短剑
圣徽：蹲伏的无眼蟾蜍
撒托古亚居住在巨大的洞穴网络之中，在那之中也可找到其他古老神话中的神祇，例如阿布霍斯、阿特拉克·纳克亚和欧格什。某些说法认为撒托古亚统治着一个唤作昆扬（K'n-Yan）的闪耀蓝光的地下国度，而另外一些说法则称昆扬的居民奋起反抗撒托古亚，将祂驱赶至更为深邃，任何光明也不敢前往的所在——唤作恩凯（N'kai）的至暗深穴。
撒托古亚有一种古怪，甚至近乎异想天开的天性：虽仍然邪恶且不可预测，但有时祂在与凡人交往时却显得近乎仁慈。然而，这样的交往绝不长久，而那些愿与旧日支配者交往之人也往往以悲剧收场。
撒托古亚半似人形，混合了蟾蜍、蝙蝠与树懒的特征，双眼昏昏欲睡而咧嘴带笑。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tsathoggua
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 撒托古亚

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Prince of the Moon   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Jade, The Moon, Spirits   
Domains: Darkness, Good, Law, Madness, Repose   
Subdomains: Ancestors, Archon, Insanity, Moon, Night, Souls   
Favoured Weapon: Longspear   
Holy Symbol: Jade Crescent Moon   
Sacred Animal: Hair   
Tsukiyo is the god of jade, the moon, and spirits. He is the brother of Fumeiyoshi, the god of envy, and lover of thesun goddess Shizuru. Called the Prince of the Moon, Tsukiyo was slain by his jealous brother, and it is said that Shizuru’s tears, mingled with Tsukiyo’s blood, formed the first stones of jade, which remains sacred to the moon god’s faith. Tsukiyo was returned to life by Shizuru, and upon his rebirth, he acquired the portfolio of spirits and became patron of the reincarnated samsaran race. His worship is popular in the Forest of Spirits, and his shrines can often be found attached to larger temples to Shizuru.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：碧月亲王
阵营：守序善良
神祗：玉、月亮、精神
领域：黑暗、善良、守序、疯狂、宁静
子领域：先祖、亚空、狂乱、月亮、暗夜、灵魂
偏好武器：长矛
圣徽：玉制新月
圣兽：野兔
月夜是碧玉，月亮和灵魂之神，也是嫉妒之神文业的兄弟和太阳女神静琉的爱人。碧月亲王曾经被他妒火满溢的兄弟所杀死过，据说那时月夜流下的鲜血和静琉流下的眼泪融合，成为了第一条玉石矿脉，所以碧玉也就成为了月夜教会的圣物。  后来月夜为静琉（在齐仲的协助下）所复活。通过这次重生，月夜获得了灵魂的神职，并且也因此经历而被轮回者一族奉为守护神。月夜的信徒主要聚居在神灵之森中，不过，凡是有静琉神社的地方，通常也会在正殿旁为月夜修建一座小一些的神祠一起供奉。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Tsukiyo
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 月夜

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can cause a creature to take on some of the traits of the undead with a melee touch attack. Touched creatures are treated as undead for the purposes of effects that heal or cause damage based on positive and negative energy. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的接触可令生物如不死生物般，受负能量治疗正能量伤害。此效果持续轮数为你牧师等级一半（最少1），每天“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are treated as undead for the purposes of effects that heal or cause damage based on positive and negative energy
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 如不死生物般，受负能量治疗正能量伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Death’s Kiss
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 死亡之吻

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch can allow others to embrace undeath, willfully or not.
Death’s Kiss: You can cause a creature to take on some of the traits of the undead with a melee touch attack. Touched creatures are treated as undead for the purposes of effects that heal or cause damage based on positive and negative energy. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Death's Embrace: At 8th level, you heal damage instead of taking damage from channeled negative energy. If the channeled negative energy targets undead, you heal hit points just like undead in the area.
If you are undead, then you instead do not take damage from positive energy.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你的触摸可以让其他人拥抱不死，无论是否有意。
死亡之吻：你的接触可令生物如不死生物般，受负能量治疗正能量伤害。此效果持续轮数为你牧师等级一半（最少1），每天“3+感知修正”次。
死亡之拥：在8级时，你能从引导的负能量中获得治疗，而不是受到伤害。若该引导负能量的目标是不死生物时，则你如同范围内的不死生物一般获得治疗。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Undead Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 亡灵子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch can allow others to embrace undeath, willfully or not.
Death’s Kiss: You can cause a creature to take on some of the traits of the undead with a melee touch attack. Touched creatures are treated as undead for the purposes of effects that heal or cause damage based on positive and negative energy. This effect lasts for a number of rounds equal to 1/2 your cleric level (minimum 1). You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Death's Embrace: At 8th level, you heal damage instead of taking damage from channeled negative energy. If the channeled negative energy targets undead, you heal hit points just like undead in the area.
If you are undead, then you instead do not take damage from positive energy.
Domain Spells: cause fear, frigid touch, bestow curse, enervation, slay living, circle of death, destruction, horrid wilting, energy drain.

领域法术：惊恐术，极寒之触，降咒，弱能术，杀生术，死亡法阵，灰飞烟灭，凋死术，吸能术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Unmountable
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 不可安装的

LocalizedStrings.enGB: While many druids keep to the wilderness, some make their way within settlements, communing with the animals and vermin who live there and speaking for the nature that runs rampant in civilization’s very cradle.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 当大多数德鲁伊守望的荒野的时候，有一小批德鲁伊以他们自己的方式守卫着聚落，关照着那里的飞虫走兽，并且为那些在文明摇篮周遭运行的自然事物发声。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Urban Druid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 城镇德鲁伊

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An urban druid may not select an animal companion. Instead, she must choose from the following domains, rather than those usually available to druids: Charm, Community, Knowledge, Nobility, Protection, Repose, Rune, or Weather.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 由于生活在偏离自然的地区，城镇德鲁伊不获得动物伙伴；但他可以从以下领域中选一个作为他自然纽带的连结：魅惑、联盟、知识、崇高、保护、宁静、符文或天气。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Urban Druids Bond
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 城镇德鲁伊纽带

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level an urban druid adds Use Magic Device to her class skills. She also gains a +2 bonus on Use Magic Device, Knowledge (Arcana), and Knowledge (World) skill checks
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 2 级，城镇德鲁伊将使用魔法装置添加到她的本职技能中。她还在使用魔法装置、知识（神秘）和知识（世界）技能检定上获得 +2 加值

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Lorekeeper
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 博学者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, an urban druid gains immunity to charm and compulsion effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9 级时，城镇德鲁伊对魅惑和胁迫效果免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Mental Strength
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 坚毅心灵

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 4th level, an urban druid gains a +2 bonus on saves against divinations and enchantments.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 4 级，城镇德鲁伊在对抗所有预言学派和惑控学派效果时得到豁免+2加值。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Resist Temptation
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 抵抗幻惑

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A urban druid can channel stored spell energy into charm domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any charm domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 城镇德鲁伊可以将储存的法术能量引导到她没有提前准备好的魅惑领域法术中。她可以“失去”一个准备好的法术，以施展任何同等级的魅惑领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Charm Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发魅力领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A urban druid can channel stored spell energy into community domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any community domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 城镇德鲁伊可以将储存的法术能量引导到她没有提前准备好的联盟领域法术中。她可以“失去”一个准备好的法术，以施展任何同级的联盟领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发联盟领域施法

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发知识领域施法

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发崇高领域施法

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发保护领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Repose Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发宁静领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Rune Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发符文领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A urban druid can channel stored spell energy into weather domain spells that she hasn't prepared ahead of time. She can "lose" a prepared spell in order to cast any weather domain spell of the same level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 城镇德鲁伊可以将储存的法术能量引导到她没有提前准备好的天气领域法术中。她可以“失去”一个准备好的法术来施展任何同等级的天气领域法术。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Spontaneous Weather Domain Spellcasting
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 自发天气领域施法

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Due to the urban druids closeness to civilization, wild shape transformations are much more difficult to acheve. An urban druid gains wild shape forms 4 levels later than a standard druid.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 由于城镇德鲁伊接近文明，自然变形的转换更难实现。城镇德鲁伊比标准德鲁伊晚 4 级获得野性形态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wild Shape - Urban Druid
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野性变身 - 城镇德鲁伊

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: Fireshaker, The Father of Islands   
Alignment: Chaotic Good   
Areas of Concern: Change, Growth, Primal forces   
Domains: Chaos, Earth, Good, Weather   
Subdomains: Azata, Growth, Seasons, Storms   
Favoured Weapon: Club   
Holy Symbol: Volcano with gold lava   
Sacred Animal: Dinosaur   
It is said that trees bend beneath the force of Valani's laugh and his wrathful roar can split the ground around him. Valani's hot temper is well known among the empyreal lords, and his peers respect him for his mastery over the forces of nature. Fireshaker understands that change cannot be forestalled and that growth requires destruction in order for goodness to take root in what was once evil soil. Valani is a massive figure, standing 10 feet tall with the thick arms and legs of a primate and the head of a boar. His wavy dark hair falls free under a crown of spiked grass and purple flowers. The skin left uncovered by ornate armor crafted from tiles of shell and obsidian is dark brown and ruddy, as if the light of a fire were always burning just beneath his flesh. When angered-which is often-his majestic features contort into an expres sion of awful rage. Aside from his wrath, Valani is also known for being a proud and wise father countless times over. Dozens of tribes on serene islands through the multiverse claim their blessings stem from being favored children ofFireshaker. Valani lives in the heart of the Bright-Burning Volcano in Elysium.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：撼火者、岛屿之父
阵营：混乱善良
神职：变化，生长，原始之力
领域：混乱、大地、善良、天气
子领域：爱塔、滋长、季节、风暴
偏好武器：木棒
圣徽：喷发金色岩浆的火山
神兽：恐龙
据说树木在瓦拉尼的笑声中弯折，他愤怒的咆哮可以撕裂周围的土地。森林与自然之主脾气火爆，理解创造善必先毁灭恶。撼火者明白变化无法阻止，森林的成长需要先进行破坏才能让善良在曾经邪恶的土壤中生根发芽。
瓦拉尼身材魁梧，身高8尺，野猪头，四肢粗壮，身披黑曜石铠甲。他那卷曲的黑发披散在荆棘紫花冠。由贝壳和黑曜石制成的华丽盔甲所覆盖的皮肤呈深褐色和红润，仿佛皮肤下有火焰在燃烧。
当他生气时——通常是这样——他威严的容貌会扭曲成一种可怕的愤怒表情。除了愤怒之外，瓦拉尼瓦拉尼也是一个骄傲而明智的父亲。在多元宇宙的宁静岛屿上，数十个部落声称他们的祝福源于成为撼火者的宠儿。
瓦拉尼住在极乐境奔放之野熊焰火山。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Valani
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瓦拉尼

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Court of Ancestors   
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Consequence, Superstition, Tradition  
Domains: Community, Knowledge, Nobility, Repose  
Favoured Weapon: Heavy flail   
Holy Symbol: Three circles bisected by a horizontal line  
The Court of Ancestors washed ashore in the Boneyard, borne on the first wave in the River of Souls by the collective weight of mortal cultures and the influence they impose on living hearts. Vale serves the Boneyard as chief prosecutor, in that they champion the cause of judging souls based only upon external criteria and impact, without regard for individual intentions. As a gatherer of knowledge and advocate for agnostics, Vale also finds themself the Boneyard’s authority on matters of faith unrelated to gods, such as superstitions. Vale manifests as several naked, androgynous figures merged into a single being, crowned with a floating circle of white crystal. Their domain is the Mall of Jurisprudence, a winding network of libraries and offices.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：先祖之庭 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：后果、迷信、传统 
领域：联盟、知识、崇高、安眠 
偏好武器：重型连枷 
圣徽：被水平线一分为二的三个圆圈 先祖之庭被人类文化的集体重量及其对活生生的心灵的影响，在灵魂之河的第一波涛潮中被冲上岸。 Vale 担任 Boneyard 首席检察官，因为他们支持仅根据外部标准和影响来判断灵魂的事业，而不考虑个人意图。作为知识的收集者和不可知论者的倡导者，Vale 还发现自己是 Boneyard 在与神无关的信仰问题上的权威，例如迷信。谷显现为几个赤裸的、雌雄同体的人形融合成一个个体，其冠冕是一圈漂浮的白色水晶。他们的领域是法学商城，一个由图书馆和办公室组成的蜿蜒网络。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vale
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 佤勒

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Answering Rite   
Alignment: Lawful Neutral   
Form: Primordial Inevitable   
Areas of Concern: Ceremonies, Magic, Preparation   
Domains: Law, Magic, Rune, Water   
Favoured Weapon: Kukri   
Holy Symbol: Scroll twisting upon itself   
By nature of their supernatural genesis, most outsiders easily command magic to do their bidding. However, the aligned essence of these beings guides their actions, ensuring they use magic in a manner that befits their nature and the multiverse’s needs. Mortals, on the other hand, greedily seek out and exploit magic, possessing neither the underlying instincts to use it responsibly nor the eternity of practice to do so perfectly. But whether mortal spellcasters are cognizant of it or not, magic is a fundamental force guided by principles, and whenever simple creatures would trivialize or abuse magic, Valmallos presides. Valmallos considers mortals unpredictable and reckless, and seeks to keep them from treating magic as a toy. In part, he is responsible for the array of complex material, somatic, and verbal components so prevalent in magic, many of which act as gatekeepers to ensure an amateur cannot wield magic without putting in the requisite training and practice to use the power responsibly. As a result, Valmallos typically approves of wizards’ methodologies, and his faithful handle sorcerers and other innate spellcasters with extreme caution—and sometimes even with prejudice. Valmallos regards most other mortal spellcasters on a case-by-case basis, and the way in which one has used magic in the past matters far more to him than the esoteric tradition that granted the power in the first place. Valmallos sees his faithful less as worshippers than as students and advocates who can learn from him and further complicate magical practices to protect them from fools.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：回答仪式 
阵营：守序中立
形态：原始不可避免 
领域：仪式、魔法、准备
领域：守序、魔法、符文、水 
偏好武器：Kukri 
圣徽：卷轴扭曲自身外人很容易指挥魔法来完成他们的命令。然而，这些生物的一致本质指导着他们的行动，确保他们以适合他们的本性和多元宇宙需求的方式使用魔法。另一方面，凡人贪婪地寻找和利用魔法，既不具备负责任地使用它的潜在本能，也没有永恒的实践来完美地做到这一点。但无论凡人施法者是否意识到这一点，魔法都是一种以原则为指导的基本力量，每当简单的生物轻视或滥用魔法时，瓦尔马洛斯都会主持。 Valmallos 认为凡人不可预测且鲁莽，并试图阻止他们将魔法视为玩具。在某种程度上，他负责魔法中如此普遍的复杂材料、躯体和语言成分的阵列，其中许多充当守门人，以确保业余爱好者在没有进行必要的训练和练习以负责任地使用这种力量的情况下无法使用魔法。因此，瓦尔马洛斯通常赞同巫师的方法，他的忠实信徒对待巫师和其他施法者时会极其谨慎——有时甚至带有偏见。 Valmallos 对大多数其他凡人施法者视情况视情况而定，而对他而言，过去使用魔法的方式远比最初授予权力的秘传传统更为重要。 Valmallos 认为他的信徒与其说是崇拜者，不如说是作为学生和倡导者，他们可以向他学习，并进一步复杂化魔法实践以保护他们免受傻瓜的伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Valmallos
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瓦尔马洛斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vampirism
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 吸血鬼化

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You crave the taste of fresh, warm blood. 
You take damage from positive energy and heal from negative energy as if you were undead. 
At 5th level, you gain channel resistance +4. 
At 10th level, you add vampiric touch to your list of 3rd-level oracle spells known and create undead to your list of 5th-level oracle spells known. 
At 15th level, you gain damage reduction 5/magic.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你渴望新鲜、温暖的血液的味道。你受到正能量的伤害并从负能量中恢复，就好像你是不死生物一样。
第 5 级时，你获得 +4 引导能量抗性。
在第 10 级时，你将吸血鬼之触添加到你的 3 级先知法术列表中，将创造不死生物添加到你的 5 级先知法术列表中。
15 级时，你获得 5/魔法的伤害减免。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Iron Warrior   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Iron, Siege Engines, War   
Domains: Chaos, Earth, Evil, War   
Subdomains: Demon, Fear, Metal, Tactics   
Favoured Weapon: Greataxw   
Holy Symbol: Crumbling, smoking tower   
Sacred Animal: Woolly rhinoceros   
Varg is the orc god of innovation, tactics, and technology. He taught the orcs how to forge blades and to build complex siege engines. While all orc gods are war gods, the Iron Warrior is the master of strategy. He disdains battle plans that rely solely on enthusiasm and overwhelming numbers to win the day. Instead, Varg teaches orcs, if not discipline, at least more efficient ways to use their strength. Varg favors weapons that not only deal damage, but also instill fear. The Iron Warrior knows that intimidation can defeat an enemy as quickly as any wound, and he sees no shame in striking from behind at a foe in retreat. Varg is depicted as an orc general wearing half-plate armor that was assembled from varied sources. He never wears a helm that would hinder his ability to see and hear what is happening on the battlefield. Varg has honed his abilities through countless battles against his brothers and the gods of other pantheons. When not opposing the Iron Warrior, the other orc gods depend on him to equip their armies. Varg is the most inventive and forward thinking of orc gods, but his genius is only for battle. His followers have little interest in using technology to improve other aspects of orc life, and the most devout of his faithful see innovation in other arenas as a blasphemous misuse of Varg’s gifts. All but the most savage orcs make use of metal weapons and armor, and they give thanks to Varg when they craft or steal these items. Tribes dedicated to the Iron Warrior make extensive use of siege weapons, and individual worshipers compete against each other to build the most complex and destructive devices of death.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：钢铁战士
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：钢铁、攻城车、战争
领域：混乱、大地、邪恶、战争
子领域：恶魔、恐惧、铁、战术
偏好武器：巨斧
圣徽：摇摇欲坠、冒烟的塔 
圣兽：披毛犀
瓦尔格 是兽人的创新、战术和技术之神。
他教兽人如何锻造刀片和制造复杂的攻城器械。虽然所有兽人神都是战神，但钢铁战士同时也是是战略大师。他鄙视仅依靠热情和压倒性人数来赢得胜利的战斗计划。相反，瓦尔格教导兽人，如果不守纪律，至少更有效的方式来使用他们的力量。
瓦尔格偏爱那些不仅能造成伤害，还能灌输恐惧的武器。钢铁战士知道恐惧可以像任何伤害一样迅速地击败敌人，他认为从背后攻击撤退的敌人并不丢人。
瓦尔格被描绘成一个穿着从不同来源的零件拼凑而成的半板甲的兽人将军。他从不穿戴会妨碍他看到和听到战场上发生的事情的头盔。
瓦尔格通过与他的兄弟和其他万神殿的众神的无数次战斗来磨练自己的能力。当不与钢铁战士对抗时，其他兽人神祇依靠他来训练武装他们的军队。
瓦尔格是兽人诸神中最具创造力和前瞻性的，但他的天赋只用于战斗。他的追随者对使用科技来改善兽人生活的其他方面几乎没有兴趣，他最虔诚的信徒将其他领域的创新视为对瓦尔格天赋的亵渎。除了最野蛮的兽人外，所有兽人都使用金属武器和盔甲，当他们制作或偷窃这些物品时，他们会感谢瓦尔格。献身于钢铁战士的部落广泛使用攻城武器，信徒之间相互竞争，以制造出最复杂和最具破坏性的死亡装置。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Varg
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瓦尔格

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Steeple's Skull  
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Gargoyles, Holy ground, Rest   
Domains: Darkness, Earth, Protection, Repose   
Favoured Weapon: Shortbow   
Holy Symbol: Vertical line with a shorter horizontal crossbar near the top, and a circle around the overlap  
The brooding master of the spires and steeples, Vavaalrav is the architect of the Boneyard, manifested from the mortal need to leave a legacy for the fallen. He is the patron and protector of sacred sites, and his cold, earthy breath flows through the world’s mausoleums with eerie reverence. He has no patience for those who disturb sacred spaces, and many mortals—both Pharasmins and those who are simply superstitious—carve his holy symbol into tombs or fashion headstones in its shape to help protect the site from foul spirits and grave robbers. Those gargoyles who take up residence on cathedrals, temples, and tombs also pay at least lip service to this usher. Vavaalrav makes his home in the Wailing Tor, a tall, steepled tower in the heart of the Eight Courts. He manifests as a skeletal gray figure garbed in a breastplate, robe, and wings of stone, with three eyes upon his right hand. Whether his countenance bears any eyes as well remains unknown, as the Steeple’s Skull covers the top half of his head with a delicate silk veil.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：尖塔的骷髅 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：石像鬼、圣地、休息
领域：黑暗、大地、保护、安眠 
偏好武器：短弓 
圣徽：垂直线，顶部附近有较短的水平横杆，以及围绕重叠的圆圈 尖塔和尖塔的沉思大师，Vavaalrav 是 Boneyard 的建筑师，从凡人需要为堕落者留下遗产中体现出来。他是圣地的守护者和保护者，他冰冷、朴实的气息带着诡异的崇敬流过世界的陵墓。他对那些扰乱神圣空间的人没有耐心，许多凡人——无论是法拉斯敏人还是迷信的人——都将他的圣徽雕刻成坟墓或时尚的墓碑，以帮助保护该地点免受恶灵和盗墓者的侵害。那些在大教堂、寺庙和坟墓中居住的石像鬼也至少对这位招待员做了口头上的服务。瓦瓦拉夫在哀嚎之门安家，这是一座高大的尖塔，位于八宫的中心。他现身为一个灰色的骷髅人物，身着胸甲、长袍和石制翅膀，右手上有三只眼睛。他的脸是否也有任何眼睛仍然未知，因为尖顶的骷髅用精致的丝绸面纱覆盖了他的上半部分。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vavaalrav
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瓦瓦拉夫

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Despoiler   
Alignment: Chaotic Evil   
Areas of Concern: Lust, Pillage, Plunder   
Domains: Chaos, Charm, Evil, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception,Lust,Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Battleaxw   
Holy Symbol: Rat with gold coin   
Sacred Animal: Dire rat   
In other cultures, the gods of avarice might lurk in shadows, and their worshipers would do the same, practicing their faith in secret, but not among orcs, for whom greed and lust are practically virtues. Verex is a brazen thief who encourages orcs to take whatever or whomever they desire. He is the patron of plunderers and usurpers who take by force. Yet duplicity and stealth are not beneath Verex, so he is also the god of grifters and thieves. Orcs praise the Despoiler when their raids yield valuable treasures, but they may curse his name when they become the victims of theft or simply misplace an item. Verex is depicted as an orc rogue wearing studded leather armor, in contrast to the heavy hide and metal favored by his brothers. The Despoiler’s irises are the color of gold coins, and it’s said he can see the deepest desire of any creature that looks him in the eyes. In his time, Verex has allied with and stolen from all the other orc gods, though he has the least contact with Zagresh, who rarely possesses anything of value and is thus not worth the Despoiler’s time. As raiding is important to their survival, many orcs call upon the Despoiler when looting a village or pillaging a rival tribe, but his most dedicated worshipers are typically rogues. Tribes dedicated to Verex prefer guerrilla warfare to attacking en masse, and use diplomacy to deflect fights they can’t win—at least until they can attain a stronger position. For followers of Verex, success is measured in gold, mates, and slaves rather than kills; any orc who can attain goals through guile and deception is valued among Verex’s faithful.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：掠夺者
阵营：混乱邪恶
神职：欲望、掠夺、抢劫 
领域：混乱、魅惑、邪恶、诡计 
子领域：欺骗、情欲、盗窃
偏好武器：战斧
圣徽：带金币的老鼠
圣兽：凶暴老鼠
在其他文化中，贪婪之神可能潜伏在阴影中，他们的崇拜者也会这样做，隐秘地实践他们的信仰，但兽人不同，对他们来说，贪婪和欲望实际上是美德。
威雷克斯是一个厚颜无耻的小偷，他鼓励兽人拿走他们想要的任何东西或任何人。他是强盗掠夺者和篡夺者的保护神。然而，两面派和隐匿并不有失威雷克斯的身份，所以他同时也是欺诈和盗窃之神。兽人会在掠夺者获得宝贵的财宝时赞美掠夺者，但当他们成为盗窃的受害者或只是放错物品时，他们可能会诅咒他的名字。
威雷克斯被描绘成一个穿着镶嵌皮甲的兽人盗贼，与他的兄弟们喜欢的厚重的皮革和金属形成鲜明对比。掠夺者的虹膜是金币的颜色，据说他能看到任何看着他的生物最深的渴望。
在他的时代，威雷克斯与所有其他兽人神结盟并从他们那里偷窃物品，他与萨格勒什的接触最少，因为他很少拥有任何有价值的东西，不值得浪费掠夺者的时间。
由于突袭对他们的生存十分重要，许多兽人在抢劫村庄或掠夺敌对部落时都会召唤掠夺者，但他最忠诚的崇拜者通常是盗贼。崇拜威雷克斯的部落更喜欢游击战而不是集体进攻，并使用外交来转移他们无法赢得的战斗——至少在他们能够获得更强大的地位之前。对于威雷克斯的追随者来说，成功的衡量标准是金钱、配偶和奴隶，而不是杀戮；任何能够通过技艺和欺骗达到目标的兽人都会在威雷克斯的信徒中受到重视。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Verex
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 威雷克斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Cardinal Martyr   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Devotion, Sacrifice, Scars   
Edict: Sacrifice yourself in pursuit of good, champion noble causes, scar your body   
Domains: Destruction, Good, Healing, Law   
Subdomains: Archon, Martyr, Rage, Resurrection   
Favoured Weapon: Dagger   
Holy Symbol: Scarred gold breastplate   
Sacred Animal: Eagle   
Legend tells that Vildeis despises evil more than any other empyreal lord. Other angels rail furiously against the darkness and spend eternity battling its agents. But when Vildeis emerged from the ether of Heaven, it is said, she could not cope with the mere idea of evil-what reality allows such an abomination to exist? To preserve her sanity, Vildeis blinded herself so she could not see the foulness that so often tainted existence and dedicated herself wholly to destroying that which pained her so. Now, her zealous championing of rightness leaves her no peace. She cannot rest, cannot laugh, cannot pause to appreciate her efforts. Only action and repeated sacrifice keep her damaged spirit whole. The Cardinal Martyr's body is marked with countless scars, each one a celestial rune representing a sacrifice she has made. Crimson ribbons cover her useless eyes, and her magnificent red wings carry her aloft as she embarks on divine quests. Her curved dagger, Cicatrix, is never far from her side. Those who stand in Vildeis's shadow hear a maddening chorus of screams, the voices of all the martyred throughout the Great Beyond. Vildeis's followers commit themselves utterly to her worship. The Cardinal Martyr is a demanding mistress, and her tenets are so exact that it is easy to fall out of her favor. Followers of Vildeis give up their homes, families, and wealth to follow her dictums and receive no material reward for their service. To Vildeis's devout, sacrifice in the service of good is its own reward. Those who die acting in Vildeis's name may find rest in their final reward, but the most faithful and talented are raised to serve again, this time as Vildeis's divine agents. Vildeis has no home. She never pauses in her travels, for she is driven mercilessly by her cause.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：红衣烈士
阵营：守序善良
神职：虔诚，牺牲，伤痕
领域：破坏、善良、医疗、守序
子领域：亚空、殉难、狂暴, 回生
偏好武器：匕首 
圣徽：满是伤痕的黄金胸甲
圣兽：鹰
传说薇尔迪斯的原初驱动全然源自她对于邪恶的憎恨。一切邪恶都不应存在，也绝不容许任何例外。对抗邪恶的战争应当永远无止无休，直到一切邪恶都被彻底摧毁。这将会是一场永无止境的斗争，并且过程之中所有必要的牺牲都无比必要，永远正当。摧毁邪恶不会带来任何物质上的好处或奖励——邪恶的毁灭本身，就是一切应得的回报，而且只有在邪恶被彻底灭绝后，这份奖励才能够被享受。疤痕是曾经发生过的战斗所留下的痕迹，是对一切曾被付出牺牲的铭记。薇尔迪斯期望她的追随者全身心投入她的理念，放弃一切，将生命的全部贡献给摧毁世间一切邪恶的事业。
红衣殉道者的化身是一个满身伤痕的人类女性，每个伤痕都组成一个符文，刻画出她所做出的每一次牺牲行为。她的双眼被一块红布遮盖，这样她便能够不再看到世上一切邪恶与恐怖。薇尔迪斯用巨大的血红双翼翔于九天，当她出现时，你能够听到宛若低语般的尖叫——那是所有次元的殉道者所发出的尖鸣。薇尔迪斯的追随者包括殉道者，圣武士和宗教狂热者。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vildeis
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 薇尔迪斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Mourning Storm  
Alignment: Neutral   
Form: Psychopomp Usher 
Areas of Concern: Catastrophes, Last stands, Suicides  
Domains: Fire, Glory, Repose, Weather  
Favoured Weapon: Scythe   
Holy Symbol: Hollow circle with three trailing lines curling clockwise from it   
Vonymos is born from the overwhelming grief mortals experience in the wake of loss, and they embody both the positive and negative things that can grow from that mourning. They represent depression, isolation, and desperation, but also glorious last stands and renewed vigor, playing a role as a muse among the ushers. Vonymos tends to souls fallen to suicide, martyrdom, and catastrophes such as natural disasters and plague. Many feel the usher’s presence as a churning flood of feelings that builds until emotional walls crumble before the tide, but others experience the Mourning Storm’s touch as lightning and fire driving them to desperate action. Vonymos dwells near a glass willow overlooking the Storm of Shards—a cascade of broken, floating stones that drift at the edge of the Spire. The usher sometimes manifests as a wheel of water and wails ringing a single coppery-brown eye, or as a cross between a crow and a knight.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：哀悼风暴 
阵营：绝对中立 
形态：招魂使 
领域：灾难、最后一站、自杀 
领域：火、荣耀、安眠、天气偏好 武器：镰刀 
圣徽：空心圆圈，三个尾随线顺时针卷曲 Vonymos 是凡人在失去亲人之后所经历的巨大悲痛中诞生，他们体现了从悲痛中成长的积极和消极的东西。它们代表着沮丧、孤立和绝望，也代表着光荣的最后一站和重新焕发的活力，在引导者中扮演着缪斯的角色。 Vonymos 倾向于帮助那些死于自杀、殉道和自然灾害和瘟疫等灾难的灵魂。许多人将引座员的存在视为一股翻腾的感情，直到情绪的墙在潮汐前崩塌，但其他人则将哀悼风暴的触感视为闪电和火焰，驱使他们采取绝望的行动。 Vonymos 住在一棵玻璃柳树旁，俯瞰着碎片风暴——一连串破碎的漂浮石头漂浮在尖塔的边缘。引座员有时会以水轮的形式出现，并在一只铜褐色的眼睛里发出哀号，或者是乌鸦和骑士的杂交。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Vonymos
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 沃尼莫斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Green Empress   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Good serpents, The River Sphinx, Wisdom   
Edict: Defend your homelands and your people, aid childbirths, grow papyrus, protect sources of clean water   
Domains: Good, Law, Protection, Travel, Water   
Subdomains: Archon, Defense, Exploration, Purity, Rivers, Trade   
Favoured Weapon: Light mace   
Holy Symbol: Uraeus   
Sacred Animal: Uraeus   
The great River Sphinx, the heart of Osirian life in both ancient and modern times, is embodied in the snake goddess Wadjet, who is said to dwell in the papyrus marshes in the river's delta. Wadjet is the patron and protector of Osirion, and she nourishes the kingdom as the River Sphinx sustains the land and its people. A teacher and giver of wisdom, Wadjet is the mother of the uraeuses, the race of two-headed winged serpents who are her emissaries and spirits of caution, guidance, and protection. Wadjet appears as a woman with the head of a cobra, with winged arms outspread in a protective pose, or as a winged cobra with a woman's face, raised and ready to strike in defense of her land and people. A protector of kings, Wadjet supports Ra and Horus as deities of rulership, but as the guardian of all Osirion, she works with Khepri to protect the common folk as well. Although she has temples in many of Osirion's major cities, countless smaller shrines to Wadjet stand along the banks of the River Sphinx. Oracles are particularly common in Wadjet's priesthood, and the pharaohs of Osirion have long looked to them for insight and counsel.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：翠绿女帝
阵营：守序善良
神职：善蛇、史芬斯河、睿智
领域：善良、守序、保护、旅行, 流水
子领域：亚空、防御、探索、纯净、江河、交易
偏好武器：轻型硬头锤
圣徽：圣蛇
圣兽：圣蛇
史芬斯河─欧西里昂从古至今的命脉，有着蛇神瓦吉特这一化身，传说蛇神居住在大河出海口的中一片生长纸莎草的沼泽中。瓦吉特是奥西里昂的守护神，祂如同史芬斯河滋养众生一般眷顾这个国家。身为传授睿智者的瓦吉特也是圣蛇─一种双头带翼飞蛇─的圣母，而身为慎戒、引导与守护之圣灵的圣蛇也担当蛇神的使者。
瓦吉特以生着眼镜蛇首、生羽双臂状似保护身后之人一般张开的女性形象示人，有时也会被描绘成长着女人脸，腾空而起准备为了保国护民而出击的带翼眼镜蛇。身为君主守护神，瓦吉特协助统御之神的拉与荷鲁斯，在奥西里昂守护者这一层面上，则与凯布里一同庇护平民百姓。
瓦吉特是法老的守护神，圣蛇也是奥西里昂皇家徽记的一部分。除了奥西里昂大城市里的神庙以外，史芬斯沿岸也散布著许多瓦吉特的祭坛。先知在侍奉瓦吉特的神职人员中相当常见，而奥西里昂的法老自古就常向他们寻求智慧与建言。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wadjet
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 瓦吉特

LocalizedStrings.enGB: An immobile, blazing curtain of the shimmering fire springs into existence. The wall deals fire damage when it appears, to all creatures in the area on your turn each round, and also to any creature that passes through it. The damage delt is 2d6 points of damage +1 point of damage per caster level (maximum +20). The wall deals double damage to undead creatures.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 闪耀的火焰形成了一道静止的、炽热的帷幕。当火墙出现时，每次轮到你的回合对该区域中的所有生物以及穿过它的任何生物造成 2d6 + 1/每施法者等级的火焰伤害（最大 +20）。火墙对不死生物造成双倍伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wall of Fire
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 烈焰之墙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
War: You gain a +2 insight bonus on attack rolls and deal an additional 1d6 points of damage each time you hit a foe.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
战争：你在攻击检定上获得 +2 洞察加值，并且每次击中敌人时额外造成 1d6 点伤害。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 战争领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 3rd level and every 3 levels thereafter, this class gains a bonus feat in addition to those gained from normal advancement. These bonus feats must be selected from those listed as Combat Feats, sometimes also called "fighter bonus feats."
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 3 级和之后的每 3 级，该职业除了从正常升级中获得的专长外，还获得一个额外专长。额外专长必须从“战斗专长”中选择，有时也被称为“战士额外专长”。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Water: You gain cold resistance 30, and a +6 enhancement to your CMD.

水：你获得 30 的寒冷抗性，并且你的 CMD 得到 +6 增强。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Water Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 水领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Additional Use
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——额外使用次数

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A paladin/dread knight can add the axiomatic property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
An axiomatic weapon is infused with lawful power. It makes the weapon lawful-aligned and thus overcomes the corresponding damage reduction. It deals an extra 2d6 points of damage against chaotic creatures.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
圣武士/恐惧骑士可以将公正属性添加到与的神圣/亵渎武器结合增强的武器上，但这会占用授予该武器的 2 点增强加值。
公正武器灌有守序之力。该力量使得该武器成为守序{g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}阵营{/g}武器，因此可穿透相关的{g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}伤害减免{/g}。在击中混乱阵营生物时，额外造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g}点{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Axiomatic
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——公正

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A paladin/dread knight can add the brilliant energy property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 4 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
A brilliant energy weapon ignores nonliving matter. Armor and shield bonuses to AC (including any enhancement bonuses to that armor) do not count against it because the weapon passes through armor. (Dexterity, deflection, dodge, natural armor, and other such bonuses still apply.) A brilliant energy weapon cannot harm undead, constructs, or objects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
圣武士/恐惧骑士可以将光能属性添加到与的神圣/亵渎武器结合增强的武器上，但这会占用授予该武器的 4 点增强加值。
光能武器能够无视无生命物质。因武器能够直接穿过防具，所以盔甲和盾牌对于{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}防御等级{/g}的加值（包括防具的强化加值）无效。（{g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}敏捷{/g}、偏斜、闪避、天生防御和其他类似加值依旧生效。）光能武器无法对不死生物、构装体或物品造成伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Brilliant Energy
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——光能

LocalizedStrings.enGB: A paladin/dread knight can add the flaming burst property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 2 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon. A flaming burst weapon functions as a flaming weapon that also explodes with flame upon striking a successful critical hit. The fire does not harm the wielder. In addition to the extra 1d6 fire damage from the flaming ability, a flaming burst weapon deals an extra 1d10 points of fire damage on a successful critical hit. If the weapon's critical multiplier is ?3, add an extra 2d10 points of fire damage instead, and if the multiplier is ?4, add an extra 3d10 points of fire damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
圣武士/恐惧骑士可以将焰爆属性添加到与的神圣/亵渎武器结合增强的武器上，但这会占用授予该武器的 2 点增强加值。
焰爆武器的作用如同炽焰武器，不过在成功进行{g|Encyclopedia:Critical}重击{/g}时还会爆出一阵烈焰。火焰不会伤害持用者。除了炽焰武器给予的{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点额外{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}火焰伤害{/g}之外，焰爆武器在成功重击时还会额外造成1d10点火焰{g|Encyclopedia:Damage}伤害{/g}。若武器重击倍数为×3，则改为额外造成2d10点火焰伤害。若重击倍数为×4，则改为额外造成3d10点火焰伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Flaming Burst
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——焰爆

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A paladin/dread knight can add the flaming property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 1 point of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
A flaming weapon is sheathed in fire that deals an extra 1d6 points of fire damage on a successful hit. The fire does not harm the wielder.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
圣武士/恐惧骑士可以将炽焰属性添加到使用她的神圣/亵渎武器结合增强的武器上，但这会占用授予该武器的 1 点增强加值。
炽焰武器覆盖有高温火焰，成功命中后会造成{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g}点额外{g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}火焰伤害{/g}。火焰不会伤害持用者。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Flaming
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——炽焰

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A paladin/dread knight can add the keen property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 1 point of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
The keen property doubles the threat range of a weapon. This benefit doesn't stack with any other effects that expand the threat range of a weapon (such as the keen edge spell or the Improved Critical feat).
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
圣武士/恐惧骑士可以将锐锋属性添加到用她的神圣/亵渎武器结合增强的武器上，但这会占用授予该武器的 1 点增强加值。
锐锋属性能够使得武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Critical}重击{/g}威胁范围翻倍。该效果不与其他可增加武器重击威胁范围的效果叠加（例如磨锋砺刃{g|Encyclopedia:Spell}法术{/g}或精通重击{g|Encyclopedia:Feat}专长{/g}）。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Keen
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——锐锋

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
A paladin/dread knight can add the speed property to a weapon enhanced with her divine/profane weapon bond, but this consumes 3 points of enhancement bonus granted to this weapon.
When making a full attack, the wielder of a speed weapon may make one extra attack with it. The attack uses the wielder's full base attack bonus, plus any modifiers appropriate to the situation. (This benefit is not cumulative with similar effects, such as a haste spell.)
Divine/Profane Weapon Bond - Speed
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神圣/亵渎武器盟誓——追击

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
By holding aloft a holy symbol and calling your deity’s name, you take on an aspect of that divinity. When you cast this spell, choose a domain offered by your deity. You gain that domain’s benefits, along with the listed physical changes; abilities that allow a saving throw use this spell’s DC. 
Weather: You do not take penalties or damage or suffer from reduced visibility or other effects due to natural weather. You gain electricity resistance 30, and your call lightning and call lightning storm spells and effects always function as though called outdoors in stormy weather.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
通过高举一个圣徽并呼唤你信仰的神灵的名字，你就获得了祂的一部分神性。当你施展此法术时，选择一个由你的神祇提供的领域。您将获得该领域的好处，以及列出的物理变化；允许豁免检定的能力的DC等同该法术的DC。
天气：您不会因自然天气而遭受减值、损伤、能见度降低或其他影响。你获得 30 点电击抗力，并且你的召雷术和召唤雷暴法术和效果总是像在暴风雨天气中被施展一样发挥作用。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Invoke Deity - Weather Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 召唤神灵 - 天气领域

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch infuses life and weapons with chaos, and you carry a divine whimsy wherever you go.
Touch of Chaos: You can imbue a target with chaos as a melee touch attack. For the next round, anytime the target rolls a d20, he must roll twice and take the less favorable result. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Unexpected Whimsy: All enemies within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you must succeed a Will saving throw or they collapse into gales of manic laughter, falling prone. Those who fail their saving throws can take no actions other than laughing for 1 round, but are not considered helpless. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time for every 4 levels you possess beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
以你的手为武器注入混乱的生命，无论你走到哪里，你都带着各种奇思妙想。
混乱之触：混乱之触：以近战{g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}接触攻击{/g}，对目标灌注混乱之力。在下一轮中，当目标{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}投骰{/g}结果为d20时，他必须投骰两次，并取较不利的那次投骰结果。每天可使用次数为{g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}感知{/g}调整值+3。
无厘头：以一个标准动作，你可以通过舞蹈，演剧或说笑话打破他人的敌意。所有处于你30尺范围内的敌人都必须通过一个DC=（10+1/2你的牧师等级+你感知调整值一半）的意志检定，否则将直接笑倒在地1轮，陷入俯卧状态。同时，在豁免检定上失败的生物将在1轮内无法进行任何动作（不过不视为无助）。你可以在8级每天使用一次此能力，之后每4级多获得一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Whimsy Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 滑稽子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: All enemies within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you must succeed a Will saving throw or they collapse into gales of manic laughter, falling prone. Those who fail their saving throws can take no actions other than laughing for 1 round, but are not considered helpless. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time for every 4 levels you possess beyond 8th.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Unexpected Whimsy
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 无厘头

LocalizedStrings.enGB: All enemies within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you must succeed a Will saving throw or they collapse into gales of manic laughter, falling prone. Those who fail their saving throws can take no actions other than laughing for 1 round, but are not considered helpless. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time for every 4 levels you possess beyond 8th.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，你可以通过舞蹈，演剧或说笑话打破他人的敌意。所有处于你30尺范围内的敌人都必须通过一个DC=（10+1/2你的牧师等级+你感知调整值一半）的意志检定，否则将直接笑倒在地1轮，陷入俯卧状态。同时，在豁免检定上失败的生物将在1轮内无法进行任何动作（不过不视为无助）。你可以在8级每天使用一次此能力，之后每4级多获得一次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Your touch infuses life and weapons with chaos, and you carry a divine whimsy wherever you go.
Touch of Chaos: You can imbue a target with chaos as a melee touch attack. For the next round, anytime the target rolls a d20, he must roll twice and take the less favorable result. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Unexpected Whimsy: All enemies within 30 feet of you that can see and hear you must succeed a Will saving throw or they collapse into gales of manic laughter, falling prone. Those who fail their saving throws can take no actions other than laughing for 1 round, but are not considered helpless. You can use this ability once per day at 8th level and one additional time for every 4 levels you possess beyond 8th.
Domain Spells: hideous laughter, communal protection from law, dispel magic, confusion, acidic spray, cloak of dreams, word of chaos, cloak of chaos, summon monster IX.

领域法术：狂笑术，共用防护守序，解除魔法，困惑术，酸液喷射，梦境护幕，混沌之语，混沌护幕，召唤怪物 IX。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can use wild shape to change into a dragon-scaled version of yourself with long fangs, gaining a +1 natural armor bonus to your AC and a bite attack appropriate for your size (1d6 points of damage for a Medium druid) but otherwise retaining your usual form.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你使用野性变身，成为长有长牙的龙鳞形态，在AC上获得+1天生防御，获得一次适合你体型的啮咬攻击（中体型德鲁伊造成1d6伤害），其他则保留正常身体状态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can use wild shape to change into a dragon-scaled version of yourself with long fangs, gaining a +1 natural armor bonus to your AC and a bite attack appropriate for your size (1d6 points of damage for a Medium druid) but otherwise retaining your usual form.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你使用野性变身，成为长有长牙的龙鳞形态，在AC上获得+1天生防御，获得一次适合你体型的啮咬攻击（中体型德鲁伊造成1d6伤害），其他则保留正常身体状态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Shape - Dragon Fangs
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙形 - 龙牙

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You can use wild shape to change into a dragon-scaled version of yourself with long fangs, gaining a +1 natural armor bonus to your AC and a bite attack appropriate for your size (1d6 points of damage for a Medium druid) but otherwise retaining your usual form.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你使用野性变身，成为长有长牙的龙鳞形态，在AC上获得+1天生防御，获得一次适合你体型的啮咬攻击（中体型德鲁伊造成1d6伤害），其他则保留正常身体状态。

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a medium black dragon. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, a +4 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a acid breath weapon, and resistance to acid 20. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成一条中型黑龙。你的力量获得 +4 体型加值，体质获得 +2 体型加值，AC 获得 +4 形态天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，酸性喷吐武器和对酸液的抵抗力 20。你的移动速度增加10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（1d8）、两次爪抓（1d6）和两次翼击（1d4）。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 6d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。此能力需要消耗 2 次野性形态次数。

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙形——黑龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Shape - Brass Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙形——黄铜龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a large brass dragon. You gain a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a fire breath weapon, damage reduction 5/magic, and resistance to fire 20. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d6), two claws (1d8), two wing attacks (1d6), and one tail slap attacks (1d8). You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Dragon Shape - Large Brass Dragon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙形——大型黄铜龙

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a medium dragon-like creature. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, a +4 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). Your breath weapon and resistance depend on the type of your dragon prototype. You can only use the breath weapon once per casting of this spell. All breath weapons deal 6d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage.
This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你变成了中型龙类生物。你在力量上获得 +4 体型加值，在体质上获得 +2 体型加值，在 AC 上获得 +4 形态天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，喷吐武器和对一种元素的抵抗力。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（1d8）、两次爪抓（1d6）和两次翼击（1d4）。你的喷吐武器和抗性取决于你的龙种的类型。每次施放此法术时，你只能使用一次喷吐武器。所有喷吐武器造成 6d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。此能力需要消耗 2 次野性形态次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wild Shape (Dragon)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野性形态（龙）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
This ability functions as Wild Shape (Dragon) except that it also allows you to assume the form of a large dragon-like creature. You gain the following abilities: a +6 size bonus to Strength, a +4 size bonus to Constitution, a +6 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a breath weapon, damage reduction 5/magic, and resistance to one element. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (2d6), two claws (1d8), two wing attacks (1d6), and one tail slap attack (1d8). You can only use the breath weapon twice per casting of this spell (when you use it, the duration of your breath weapon ability is reduced by 1/2 caster level minutes), and you must wait 1d4 rounds between uses. All breath weapons deal 8d8 points of damage and allow a Reflex save for half damage. Line breath weapons increase to 80-foot lines and cones increase to 40-foot cones.
This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 此能力与野性形态（龙）一样发挥作用，但它还允许您呈现大型类龙生物的形态。你获得以下能力：力量+6体型加值，体质+4体型加值，AC+6形态天生防御加值，免疫困难地形，喷吐武器，伤害减免5/魔法，抵抗一种元素。你的移动速度提高 10 英尺。你还获得一次啮咬（2d6）、两次爪抓（1d8）、两次翼击（1d6）和一次尾扫（1d8）。每次施展此法术你只能使用喷吐武器两次（当你使用它时，你的喷吐武器能力的持续时间减少 1/2 施法者等级分钟），并且你必须在两次使用之间等待 1d4 轮。所有喷吐武器造成 8d8 点伤害并允许反射豁免减半伤害。线型喷吐武器增加到 80 英尺，锥形增加到 40 英尺。此能力需要消耗 2 次野性形态次数。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wild Shape (Large Dragon)
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 野性形态（大型龙）

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You become a medium green dragon. You gain a +4 size bonus to Strength, a +2 size bonus to Constitution, a +4 form natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, a acid breath weapon, and resistance to acid 20. This ability costs 2 uses of your Wild Shape resource.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, you can unleash a blast of air in a 30-foot line. Make a combat maneuver check against each creature in the line, using your caster level as your base attack bonus and your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength modifier. Treat the results as a bull rush attempt. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，你可放出30尺直线的冲击波，用你的“施法者等级+感知修正”作为战技加值来冲撞线上生物。每天“3+感知修正”次。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wind Blast
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风爆

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
You can manipulate wind, mist, and lightning, and are resistant to electricity damage.
Wind Blast: As a standard action, you can unleash a blast of air in a 30-foot line. Make a combat maneuver check to push back each creature in the line, using your caster level as your base attack bonus and your Wisdom modifier in place of your Strength modifier. Treat the results as a bull rush attempt. You can use this ability a number of times per day equal to 3 + your Wisdom modifier.
Electricity Resistance: At 6th level, you gain resist electricity 10. This resistance increases to 20 at 12th level. At 20th level, you gain immunity to electricity.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
你可以操纵风、雾和闪电，并且可以抵抗电击伤害。
风爆：以一个标准动作，你可放出30尺直线的冲击波，用你的“施法者等级+感知修正”作为战技加值来冲撞线上生物。每天“3+感知修正”次。
电击抗性：达到6级时，你将获得10点电击抗性。此抗性在12级时将增加为20。达到20级时，你将获得电击免疫。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wind Subdomain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风子域

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 9th level, a storm druid can select another domain or subdomain from those available to her through her nature bond.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 9级时，暴风之主可以额外选择一个他自然纽带提供的领域或子领域。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Windlords Domain
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风王

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 2nd level, a storm druid is unaffected by all light wind and snow effects.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 2级时，自然或魔法所起风其效性对暴风之主来说降低一级，此能力取代穿林。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Windwalker
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 风行者

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Elder of Divinity   
Alignment: Lawful Good   
Areas of Concern: Ceremonies, Religiousness, Service   
Domains: Good, Knowledge, Law, Protection   
Subdomains: Archon, Defense, Legislation, Loyalty, Purity   
Favoured Weapon: Heavy mace   
Holy Symbol: Censer hanging from a sapphire mace   
Sacred Animal: Egret   
In his palatial quarters in the Great Library of Harmonious Scripture, Winlas maintains a massive tome detailing every sacred ceremony in existence, knowledge that he uses to counteract the evil done by profane observances. Winlas stands 11 feet tall and has skin the shade of unspoiled parchment. His white silk robe is impeccably clean beneath his heavy tunic of blue brocade trimmed in gold. A sweeping tapestry depicting countless religious rituals-each one minutely detailed in silver threadhangs from his shoulders, and he wears a four-pointed crown of beaten gold. Depictions of the lord of ceremonies show him as an old man with a heavy tome in his arms. The Elder of Divinity teaches that religious ritual unites the faithful, and there is great power in numbers. Religious rituals are not distant prescriptions, but elements of worship passed down from the divine and shaped by pious mortals over the years. Winlas does not encourage loose interpretations of rituals or careless development of new rites. Instead, he and his agents communicate the importance of following religious doctrine to the letter and work to preserve these sacred rites in their entirety.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：神学先师
阵营：守序善良 
神职：仪式，宗教，服务
领域：善良、知识、守序、保护
子领域：亚空、防御、立法、忠诚、纯净
偏好武器：重型硬头锤
圣徽：蓝宝石战锤上垂下的焚香炉
圣兽：白鹭
在他位于和谐圣典大图书馆宫殿般的私人房间，文拉斯保存着一本巨著，详述了现存的每一个神圣仪式，他运用这些来对抗世俗仪式带来的邪恶。文拉斯身高 11 英尺，肤色如纸。他的白色丝绸长袍在他沉重的金镶边蓝色锦缎束腰外衣下一尘不染。一幅描绘无数宗教仪式的宽幅挂毯——每一个都用银线细细细细地挂在他的肩膀上，他戴着一顶四角金冠。
在对仪式之主的描绘中他是个携带一本大书的老人。神性长老教导说，宗教仪式将信徒团结在一起，人多力量大。宗教仪式并非遥不可及的处方，而是从神传下来的崇拜元素，并由虔诚的凡人多年来塑造而成。
文拉斯不鼓励对仪式的松散解释或对新仪式的粗心发展。相反，他和他的代理人传达了遵循宗教教义的重要性，并努力完整地保存这些神圣的仪式。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Winlas
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 文拉斯

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The deeds done in the name of your Deity have been noted, at 15th level the Temple Champion gains the hidden wisdom of her faith, gaining a +4 to her Wisdom Score.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以你的神祇名义所做的事迹已被注意到，在 15 级时，圣殿冠军获得了她信仰的隐藏智慧，她的感知+4。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wisdom of the Temple
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 神殿智慧

LocalizedStrings.enGB: The stars themselves hold many answers, you may add your Charisma modifier to your Wisdom modifier on all Wisdom-based checks. In addition, once per day you can cast one spell as if it were modified by the Empower Spell or Extend Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 星辰蕴含着许多奥秘，你可以在所有基于感知的检查中将您的魅力调整值添加到你的感知调整值。此外，每天一次，你可以施展一个法术，就好像它应用了法术强效或法术延时专长，但不会增加法术的施法时间或等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Once per day you can cast one spell as if it were modified by the Empower Spell or Extend Spell feat without increasing the spell’s casting time or level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 每天一次，你可以释放一个法术，如同其被增效或者延时超魔专长影响，而不实际增加其施法时间或者等级。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: As a standard action, the stargazer causes one creature within 30 feet to burn like a star. The creature takes 1d6 points of fire damage for every 2 levels the stargazer possesses and emits bright light for 1 round. A successful Fortitude saving throw halves the damage and negates the emission of bright light. The stargazer can use this hex a number of times per day equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 1), but must wait 1d4 rounds between uses.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，观星者可以使30尺内一个单位燃起星光。目标受到每2观星者等级1d6点火焰伤害，并散发出强光１轮。成功的强韧豁免可以减半伤害并不会发光。该巫术每日使用次数为观星者的魅力调整值，连续使用之间至少间距1d4轮。

A successful Fortitude saving throw halves the damage and negates the emission of bright light. The stargazer can use this hex a number of times per day equal to her Charisma modifier (minimum 1), but must wait 1d4 rounds between uses.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 以一个标准动作，观星者可以使30尺内一个单位燃起星光。目标受到每2观星者等级1d6点火焰伤害，并散发出强光１轮。成功的强韧豁免可以减半伤害并不会发光。该巫术每日使用次数为观星者的魅力调整值，连续使用之间至少间距1d4轮。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 13th level, a mooncaller gains DR 3/silver, increasing to DR 4/silver at 16th level and DR 5/silver at 19th level.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在第 13 级，唤月者获得 DR 3/银，在第 16 级增加到 DR 4/银，在第 19 级增加到 DR 5/银。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: This creature takes 1 hit point damage each turn for each stack of this status. This can be stopped through the application of any spell that cures hit point damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 此状态每叠加一层，此生物每回合会受到 1 点生命值伤害。这可以通过应用任何治愈生命值伤害的法术来终止。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wounded
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 创伤

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wounding
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 创伤

LocalizedStrings.enGB:
Titles: The Monkey King, Aware of Vacuity   
Alignment: Chaotic Neutral   
Areas of Concern: Drunkenness, Nature, Trickery   
Edict: Inspire passion, comfort and free the repressed, seek your true self and desires   
Domains: Chaos, Liberation, Travel, Trickery   
Subdomains: Deception, Exploration, Freedom, Protean, Revolution, Thievery   
Favoured Weapon: Quarterstaff   
Holy Symbol: Stone Monkey   
Sacred Animal: Monkey   
Sun Wukong, the Monkey King, is the Tian Xia god of trickery, nature, and drunkenness. Originally a stone statue, Sun Wukong was given life and eventually became king of all monkeys. That was not enough for him, so he went before Qi Zhong, god of magic, hoping to glean the secret of immortality. Qi Zhong would not part with this secret, but taught Sun Wukong many other techniques. Undeterred, the ambitious Monkey King then sneaked into Pharasma's Boneyard and erased his name from her records, so gaining immortality.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN:
称号：美猴王，虚无之悟 
阵营：混乱中立 
神职：醉酒、自然、诡计
信条：激发激情，安慰和释放被压抑的人，寻找真正的自我和渴求
领域：混乱、自由、旅行、诡计
子领域：欺骗、探索、自由、星灵、革命、盗窃
偏好武器：木棍
圣徽：石猴 
圣兽：猴
美猴王孙悟空是一个极其狡黠的神祗，有关于他的神话传说在龙国数不胜数。据说最初，孙悟空只是一具活化的石猴雕塑，并以自己的能力成为了猿猴之王。不过它完全不满足于这种凡俗形态，所以孙悟空找上了魔法之神齐仲以探求不朽之法。药师祖自然不会轻易就分享永生的秘密给一只猴子，不过他还是教了孙悟空很多魔法的知识。最后，孙悟空只身潜入到法莱斯玛的骨园神域，偷偷从生死薄上抹掉了自己的名字从而获得了不死之身。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wukong
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 悟空

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wyrm singers spin fragments of the story of the ongoing struggle between noble Apsu and wicked Dahak.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者们一代代传唱关于善龙之父阿卜苏与恶龙之神达哈克二者间永续万古的龙族战争的秘闻片段。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wyrm Singer
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 12th level, once per day as a swift action, a wyrm singer can grant a breath weapon attack to himself or an ally affected by his draconic rage raging song. Using the breath weapon is a standard action, and it affects creatures in a 30-foot cone or a 60-foot line. The breath weapons deal 1d6 points of damage per 2 character levels, and are of an energy type of the wyrm singer’s choice (acid, cold, electricity, or fire). Creatures caught in the area can attempt a Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the characters level + their Constiution modifier) to halve the damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在12级时，以一个迅捷动作，龙战颂者可以使自己或是一个被龙族狂怒影响的盟友获得一次喷吐武器攻击。使用这个喷吐武器需要一个标准动作，它的范围可以是30尺锥形或是60尺线型。这个喷吐武器造成每两个龙战颂者的歌者等级1d6点能量伤害，伤害类型由龙战颂者选择（酸蚀，寒冷，火焰或电击）。被喷吐武器攻击的生物可以通过一个DC=（10+龙战颂者的歌者等级一半+他的魅力调整值）的反射检定来减半伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Grant Breath Weapon
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 获得喷吐武器

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wyrm Singers Acid Breath
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者酸蚀喷吐

LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者寒冷吐息（线形）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your breath weapon may be either a 30-foot cone or a 60-foot line. The breath weapon deals 1d6 points of electricity damage per 2 character levels. Creatures caught in the area can attempt a Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the characters level + their Constiution modifier) to halve the damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的喷吐武器可以是30尺锥形或者60尺线形。这个喷吐武器造成每两个龙战颂者的歌者等级1d6点电击伤害。被喷吐武器攻击的生物可以通过一个DC=（10+龙战颂者的歌者等级一半+他的魅力调整值）的反射检定来减半伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wyrm Singers Electricity Breath - Line
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者电击吐息（线形）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Your breath weapon may be either a 30-foot cone or a 60-foot line. The breath weapon deals 1d6 points of fire damage per 2 character levels. Creatures caught in the area can attempt a Reflex save (DC = 10 + 1/2 the characters level + their Constiution modifier) to halve the damage.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你的喷吐武器可以是30尺锥形或者60尺线形。这个喷吐武器造成每两个龙战颂者的歌者等级1d6点火焰伤害。被喷吐武器攻击的生物可以通过一个DC=（10+龙战颂者的歌者等级一半+他的魅力调整值）的反射检定来减半伤害。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wyrm Singers Fire Breath - Line
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙战颂者火焰吐息（线形）

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a wyrm singer can kindle an echo of ancient rage felt between warring dragon clans in his allies. This ability acts as inspired rage, except those affected gain a +2 bonus on melee attack and damage rolls and a +2 bonus on saving throws against paralysis and sleep effects (but they still take a –1 penalty to their AC), rather than inspired rage’s normal bonuses. At 4th level and every 4 skald levels thereafter, the song’s bonuses on saves against paralysis and sleep effects increase by 1. At 8th and 16th levels, the song’s bonus on melee attack and damage rolls increases by 1.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在1级时，龙战颂者可以在他的盟友心中点燃诸龙在进入战争时所爆发的古老狂怒。这个能力的效果与激发狂暴战怒之歌类似，但被它所影响的目标不会获得激发狂暴战怒之歌原本赋予的好处，而是会在近战攻击与伤害检定，以及对抗麻痹与睡眠效果的豁免检定上获得+2士气加值（在防御等级上仍然会承受-1减值）。在4级和之后每提升4个歌者等级时，龙战颂者的本战怒之歌赋予的对抗麻痹与睡眠效果的豁免检定加值额外+1；在8级和16级时，本战怒之歌在近战攻击和伤害检定上提供的加值再额外+1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a wyrm singer can kindle an echo of ancient rage felt between warring dragon clans in his allies. This ability acts as inspired rage, except those affected gain a +2 bonus on melee attack and damage rolls and a +2 bonus on saving throws against paralysis and sleep effects (but they still take a –1 penalty to their AC), rather than inspired rage’s normal bonuses. At 4th level and every 4 skald levels thereafter, the song’s bonuses on saves against paralysis and sleep effects increase by 1. At 8th and 16th levels, the song’s bonus on melee attack and damage rolls increases by 1.

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Draconic Rage
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙族狂怒

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 1st level, a wyrm singer can kindle an echo of ancient rage felt between warring dragon clans in his allies. This ability acts as inspired rage, except those affected gain a +2 bonus on melee attack and damage rolls and a +2 bonus on saving throws against paralysis and sleep effects (but they still take a –1 penalty to their AC), rather than inspired rage’s normal bonuses. At 4th level and every 4 skald levels thereafter, the song’s bonuses on saves against paralysis and sleep effects increase by 1. At 8th and 16th levels, the song’s bonus on melee attack and damage rolls increases by 1.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在1级时，龙战颂者可以在他的盟友心中点燃诸龙在进入战争时所爆发的古老狂怒。这个能力的效果与激发狂暴战怒之歌类似，但被它所影响的目标不会获得激发狂暴战怒之歌原本赋予的好处，而是会在近战攻击与伤害检定，以及对抗麻痹与睡眠效果的豁免检定上获得+2士气加值（在防御等级上仍然会承受-1减值）。在4级和之后每提升4个歌者等级时，龙战颂者的本战怒之歌赋予的对抗麻痹与睡眠效果的豁免检定加值额外+1；在8级和16级时，本战怒之歌在近战攻击和伤害检定上提供的加值再额外+1。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: At 14th level, a wyrm singer embraces the essence of the draconic histories, allowing his allies to manifest aspects of a dragon in their physical forms. The wyrm singer selects a single ally within 50 feet to take on a draconic aspect (as per form of the dragon I) of a type of the wyrm singer’s choice. The ally cannot use the breath weapon attack provided by form of the dragon. The wyrm singer must expend 1 round of raging song each round to maintain wyrm saga, and can affect only a single ally at a time.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 在14级时，龙战颂者念诵龙族历史中关于其一族本质的秘密，将自己的盟友变化为巨龙之型。龙战颂者可以选择一个距离他60尺内的盟友使其获得龙族的化身（如同法术龙形I），变身的龙类生物类型由龙战颂者指定。这个盟友在变身时不能使用龙类的喷吐武器。龙战颂者每轮必须消耗1轮的战怒之歌使用时间来维持龙吟，并且他只能使用本战怒之歌来影响一个盟友。

LocalizedStrings.enGB: Wyrm Saga
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 龙吟

LocalizedStrings.enGB: You are in a dragon-like creature form now. You have a +4 polymorph bonus to Strength, a +2 polymorph bonus to Constitution, a +4 natural armor bonus to AC, immunity to difficult terrain, and resistance to acid 20. Your movement speed is increased by 10 feet. You also gain one bite (1d8), two claws (1d6), and two wing attacks (1d4). You do not gain the breath weapon normally gained from dragonkind spells.
LocalizedStrings.zhCN: 你现在变身为类龙生物形态。你的{g|Encyclopedia:Strength}力量属性{/g}获得+4{g|Encyclopedia:Size}体型{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，{g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}体质属性{/g}获得+2体型加值，{g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}获得+4天生防御加值，对困难地形免疫，获得喷吐{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}，20点酸蚀抗性。你的{g|Encyclopedia:Speed}移动速度{/g}提高10英尺。你还获得了1次啮咬（{g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g}），2次爪抓（1d6），2次翼击（1d4）。你不会获得一般龙形法术给予的喷吐攻击。
